desc: [' \t', 'Data Analysts for migration from existing Data ware house platform to New Big Data Analytics Platform', ' \t', 'Work with the different squads / technology team to ensure Data ingestion priorities aligned to the compute requirements, help drive value extraction for the different use cases', ' \t', 'Facilitate & work the technology team based on prioritization of systems /data files for ingestion working with CBG Business teams – product, channel, segment, marketing etc. based on the user stories.', ' \t', 'Coordinate UAT activities for migration to New Data Platform - including ensuring completeness and adequacy of test case, clarifying roles and responsibilities of those involved in performing and signing of UAT, working with testers, and complete testing assigned to BA central team.\xa0\xa0', ' \t', 'Define compute requirements to facilitate the DataMart’s / Downstream use cases.', ' \t', 'Platform and tools management – ensuring all downstream tools and processes are aligned to the new architecture – SAS, QlikView, Contextual Marketing Platform (CMP), etc. Manage testing and coordinate with Technology on implementation.', ' \t', 'Ensure operational readiness as per use case criteria’s / Testing Methodology – including user onboarding and training, data management frameworks in place for analytical cluster & use of SAS, Python, R etc.', ' \t', 'Metadata verification, Data Verification for the Ingested Data & completeness check for Compute layer based on the use cases.', ' \t', 'Would require working on the Analysis, Migration of existing SAS scripts conversion to SAS Viya/ to New Data Platform.', ' \t', 'Tracking of Defects & updates in either JIRA / Confluence, Scenario Testing & plan for closure.', ' \t', 'Manage and drive continuous improvement tools, script optimization, storage etc.', ' ']

desc: ['You will be part of a very vibrant and dynamic team at the heart of Zeemart that is innovating the way the businesses can increase efficiency through streamlining their procurement and ordering process in the F&B industry. Our platform connects buyers and suppliers through a simple interface, making discovery, purchasing and communicating more powerful and easier than before.', '  ', "In joining Zeemart as a Data Analyst, you'll be in a key role that helps deepen the customer interactions by applying advanced data analytics. We will be expecting you to have extensive experiences in data science and analytics field - developing models, rules and algorithms from structured and unstructured sources and performing deep-dive analysis to derive data-driven decisions.", '  ', 'DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:', '\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Apply statistical tools/models to perform advanced data analytics, identify key underlying drivers for growing customer engagement and business opportunities, and recommend a clear action plan going forward.', '   ', 'Develop and implement artificial intelligence algorithms, rules and rapid prototypes from big data sets that will be fed into various business programs.', '   ', 'Behavioral segmentation based on customer journey, profiles, transaction patterns, and app activities that will lead to highly personalized customer insights.', '   ', 'Design and monitor A/B testing and various engagement activities.', '   ', 'Perform deep-dive analysis to solve various business problems arising from marketing, dynamic incentive programs, and campaign management.', '   ', 'Build and automate intuitive dashboards that help visualize and answer complex business problems.', '   ', 'Identify key areas of performance measurement for the Zeemart’s platform.', '   ', 'Work closely with respective Team Leads to setup and monitor KPIs.', '   ', 'Generate regular analytics reports on Zeemart’s platform activity', '   ', 'Provide analysis of reports and propose actionable insights to continuously refine the platform.', '   ', 'Lead discussions on taxonomy, business process logic as well as crucial areas of interface with 3rd party providers for online payments, logistics, CRM, etc.', '   ', 'Explore latest technology developments such as AI, predictive analytics, machine learning, etc. which will give Zeemart a competitive edge in the industry.', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'Analytical mind with sound business insights. Ability to translate the business problems and requirements into analytics solutions.', '   ', 'Knowledge of a variety of predictive models, machine learning algorithms and statistical techniques, e.g. logistic regression, decision tree, clustering, neural networks, support vector machines, principal component analytics, natural language processing.', '   ', 'Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques', '   ', 'Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects), Databases (SQL), Programming (XML, R-lang or Python , Javascript, or ETL frameworks), Statistical packages for analyzing datasets (Excel, SPSS, SAS etc) and data visualization tools (Tableau, Qlik).', '   ', 'Experience in Adobe Analytics / Adobe Campaign is a plus.', '  ', '  ', 'Knowledge of CRM platforms, campaign management, and A/B testing.', '  ', 'Good verbal and written communication skills.', '  ', 'University degree, preferably in computer science, engineering or analytical discipline, e.g. mathematics, statistics, IT, economics, finance, accounting.', '  ', '3 - 5 years working experience in data analytics or business intelligence units. Experience in supply chain within the F&B industry will be favorable.', '  ', 'Self-motivated with a can-do spirit!']

desc: ['Overview of job', '  ', 'You will support senior colleagues in achieving the efficient delivery of econometric analysis. Typical responsibilities and duties are the preparation of data (cleaning and performing required ETL operations), contributing to the building and interpretation of models and helping to write results and implications.', '  ', 'Reporting of the role', '  ', 'This role reports to the Project Manager', '  ', '3 best things about the job:', '  ', ' \t', 'Be part of a dynamic team, responsible for harnessing the power of data and technology to provide timely, actionable business insights to our clients', ' \t', 'Be part of a global Centre of Excellence and work for clients across the globe', ' \t', 'Learn and develop yourself in cutting edge technologies and platforms in the field of data and analytics', ' ', '  ', 'Measures of success –', '  ', 'In three months:', '  ', ' \t', 'Undertake data extraction, manipulation, formatting and analysis', ' \t', 'Analyze datasets to ensure that each KPI is understood and can be explained back to the team.', ' \t', 'Ensure that all tables, charts and other information produced by you or others has been checked for accuracy and formatted to the\xa0standards before passing on to senior project team.', ' \t', 'Provide support to more senior colleagues in data collection including the preparation and sending of data requests, chasing outstanding data and querying data with clients and agencies.', ' \t', 'Help the broader team in writing intermediate presentation decks, like data validation.', ' ', '  ', 'In six months:', '  ', ' \t', 'Assist in the building of comprehensive econometric models according to the project specification.', ' \t', 'Validate models, identify areas of weakness, suggest and test improvements and ensure robustness and validity.', ' \t', 'Help to run scenarios required to answer client objectives.', ' ', '  ', 'In 12 months:', '  ', ' \t', 'Actively seek more efficient ways of doing things for yourself and others and turn suggestions into actions including in service and product development.', ' \t', 'Demonstrate flexibility and work across multiple clients and projects at a time as directed by your project manager', ' ', '  ', 'About Singapore', '  ', 'GroupM Singapore operates in one of the most dynamic and exciting environments in the world. Although it is a small domestic market, there is a vibrant media industry which is undergoing rapid evolution as digital technology reshapes the way marketing supports advertisers’ needs. Being at the crossroads of Asia means that aside from the local clients and media owners, we also have a high proportion of multi-national clients and media owners.', '  ', 'As the largest media investment management company in Singapore with over 41% market share (Recma) and over 650 employees, GroupM Singapore is the premiere organisation to join and develop a career in.']

desc: ["You're the type of person who has a passion for taking raw numbers and turning them into actionable insights. Your friends all know you as someone with a true interest in technology, who likes nothing more than spotting a creative way to improve a process. You have a natural eye for detail, and an interest in the financial markets. You are independent and determined, but thrive as part of a team. You enjoy dealing with people, and you're that person who knows what customer service really means.", '  ', 'Our team', '  ', 'Bloomberg runs on data, and our Global Data department is responsible for acquiring it and supplying it to our clients. Our Market Data Analysts collect, analyse, process and publish the data which is the backbone of our iconic Bloomberg Terminal- the data which ultimately moves the financial universe. They apply problem-solving skills to identify innovative workflow efficiencies, and they implement technology solutions to improve our systems, products and processes- and all this while providing platinum customer support to our customers.', '  ', "We'll trust you to:", '  ', ' \t', '\xa0Acquire, update, maintain and process financial data using various internal systems and proprietary company software', ' \t', '\xa0Come up with innovative ways to enhance our systems and to make our data-related processes more\xa0 efficient, accurate and timely', ' \t', '\xa0Participate in time-sensitive projects, and collaborate with your global colleagues to deliver new initiatives', ' \t', '\xa0Partner closely with internal departments such as Sales, Analytics, News and Engineering', ' \t', '\xa0Provide a platinum level of service to Bloomberg customers', ' ', '  ', "What's in it for you?", '  ', ' \t', '\xa0Comprehensive training giving you a thorough overview of financial concepts, various data sets, and of course our state-of-the-art Bloomberg terminal', ' \t', '\xa0Gain in-depth, hands-on experience of one particular market sector (For example: Company Financials)', ' \t', '\xa0Opportunity to gain exposure to and interact with key market players in business and finance', ' \t', '\xa0Make a true business impact on our products and clients – our data moves markets!', ' \t', '\xa0Real potential for exciting and varied career progression', ' ']

desc: ['Observational and Pragmatic Research Institute (OPRI) is a unique academic research institution, working with both the pharmaceutical and academic industry, with the overarching goal to improve the lives of patients through conducting vital global real-world research. OPRI is part of a global network of international companies, with partner companies located in the United Kingdom and Australia.', '  ', 'OPRI has been leading the paradigm shift in real-world evidence for the past 12 years, by delivering pragmatic clinical trials, disease registries and\xa0database research.', '  ', 'We are currently seeking a hard-working and motivated Data Analyst to join our international team. You would be involved in supporting the team developing the first global severe asthma registry ever developed, joining a young and enthusiastic team in supporting a globally-renowned project.', '  ', 'Key responsibilities of the role will be to:', '  ', '   ', 'Provide support on database querying, population and reporting, using structured query language (SQL).', '   ', 'Assist in generate data releases following study protocol requirements and service reports (Tableau).', '   ', 'Advise internal team members and external clients on study database(s) content.', '   ', 'Engage in building and maintaining data dictionaries and system technical documentation.', '   ', 'Undertake quality checks to assure high standards of data and code.', '   ', 'Contribute to data analyses as required for research projects.', '   ', 'Maintain compliance with information governance and company policies.', '  ']
req: ['Qualifications', '  ', 'BSc or equivalent qualification with strong technical or scientific component (e.g. Computer Science, Maths, Statistics).', '  ', 'Experience', '  ', '   ', 'Familiarity with structured query language (SQL) and database processing (ETL, stored procedures, large datasets)', '   ', 'Strong ability for data analysis, interpretation and visualization.', '   ', 'Experience in at least one data or statistical package (SAS, R, or Stata)', '   ', 'Some experience in data dictionaries and advanced documentation systems.', '  ', '  ', 'Key skills:', '\xa0data manipulation (SAS, R, or Stata), relational databases (esp. my SQL and SQL Server), clinical or medical research, proactive approach.', '  ', 'Desirable', ': statistical background (models, correlations, hypothesis), general purpose programming languages (e.g. Python), database administration tools (migration, DB administration), experience of working with clinical databases']

desc: ['PropertyGuru Group is Asia’s leading online property company and the preferred destination for over 25 million property seekers to find their dream home, every month.\xa0 PropertyGuru and its group companies empower the property seekers with the widest option of more than 2 million homes, in-depth insights and solutions that enable them to make confident property decision across Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia and Vietnam.', '  ', 'PropertyGuru.com.sg was launched in 2007 and revolutionised the Singapore property market by taking it online and made property search transparent for the property seeker. Over the decade, the group has grown from a regional property media powerhouse to a high-growth technology company with a robust portfolio of No.1 property portals, award-winning mobile apps; best-in-class developer sales enablement platform, ePropertyTrack and a host of industry-leading property offerings such as awards, events and publications – across eleven countries in Asia.\xa0\xa0', '  ', 'For more information, please visit\xa0www.PropertyGuruGroup.com', '  ', 'Our websites attract more than 100 million monthly page-views which result in non-stop massive click-stream for behaviour data with around 130 million users. As a result, PropertyGuru has the most comprehensive data for property supply and demand in Southeast Asia.', '  ', 'Our Data Science team is empowered to build unique and compelling user experiences using machine learning and data. The work done by our Data Analysts are highly sought after as the business sees the Data Analysts as partners in their journey who drive and create tremendous impact to the business.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', ' \t', 'Influence business by creatively exploring the data to inform the business', ' \t', 'Translate the user at scale and help drive the decision making', ' \t', 'Translate complex findings and results into a compelling narrative for the business', ' \t', 'Partner with business stakeholders to define and evaluate the key metrics for the business’ success and progress e.g. assist stakeholders in understanding the reason behind data changes', ' \t', 'Investigate questions around user experiments and help understand the reasons', ' \t', 'Communicate analyses and recommendations to the business stakeholders for their decision making', ' \t', 'Ensure that the analyses are repeatable and accessible', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Bachelor’s degree in IT or relevant field. Alternatively, lesser qualifications with strong experience in machine learning will also be considered', ' \t', 'Minimum 2+ years of industry experience in working with terabyte scale datasets. 4+ years preferred.', ' \t', 'Communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional business partners of varying technical levels', ' \t', 'Build clear and simple Tableau dashboards and presentations', ' \t', 'Working knowledge of relational databases (BigQuery, Redshift, MySQL) and query authoring (SQL)', ' \t', 'Experience working with Google Analytics is a plus', ' \t', 'Experience in Python, R, C++, Java, Go, Scala is a plus', ' ']

req: ['JOB PURPOSE', '  ', '  ', 'This role sits within the COO Business Integration & Analytics team as a BA/Senior Data Analyst for the applications in the COO Library (COOL) in Agile / SCRUM manner.', '  ', 'Role is very exciting as it provides the candidate opportunity to work with Business and IT partners, learn Banks Businesses/Products/Processes and to develop relationship with senior stakeholders.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The Role Responsibilities', '  ', '  ', 'Provide Agile Team Business and Product guidance and knowledge.', '  ', 'Work closely with Product owner/Scrum master to ensure the Backlog is up-to-date and User stories are ready for sprint planning.', '  ', 'Act as SME for all Data sourcing, Data modelling, data quality requirements for applications within the COO Library.', '  ', 'Understand the business process, workflow required to guide Agile team so that Data requirements are covered completely and correctly.', '  ', 'Actively participate and contribute in SCRUM planning, SCRUM stand-up and Sprint retrospective meetings.', '  ', 'Provide leadership guidance and support to team.', '  ', 'Help and Support SCRUM team on UAT and sign-off from Ops teams.', '  ', 'Engage with Data Architect and keep them updated on Project progress and take their inputs while designing the Data requirements for the applications assigned.', '  ', 'Work in collaborative way with CDO colleagues.', '  ', 'Provide inputs to PSC and other Project meetings.', '  ', 'Identify and raise risks well in advance so that they can be managed.', '  ', 'Other duties as assigned\xa0', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', '  ', 'Minimum of 10 years of Banking industry work experience with a focus on Change management. Preferred: Experience as a BA/Data Analyst in projects. Experience with Data analytics and Visualization tools', '  ', 'Minimum of 7 years of experience in large-scale projects/programs with significant change impact and multiple dependencies within and across organizational boundaries. Preferred: Experience in Agile / Scrum approach.', '  ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Computer or equivalent required; Master’s Degree preferred', '  ', 'Ability to work within a team as well as direct a team', '  ', 'Ability to simultaneously execute multiple roles individually, including SCRUM Product Owner, SCRUM Master, Business Analyst, Data Analyst.', '  ', 'Proven track record to tactically manage projects thru to delivery', '  ', 'Ability to communicate and build relationships with all levels of an organization (End Users – Sr. Executive Level), including both technical and non-technical audiences', '  ', 'Capable and reliable in meeting tight schedules and deadlines as well as high attention to detail while maintaining clear customer expectations throughout the life cycle of a project/engagement', '  ', 'Multi-disciplinary leadership capability, a strong customer focus, excellent people skills and the ability to develop process driven solutions\xa0', '  ', 'Good planning and forward-thinking skills.', '  ', 'Ability to work independently and able to assist team members in their strategies.', '  ', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills', '  ', 'Good organizational and documentation skills are essential', ' ', '  ', 'Preferred but Not essential', '  ', '  ', 'Knowledge of Data Quality Management Framework.', '  ', 'Working experience in the role of PEGA Business architect/System Architect.', '  ', 'SCRUM Master/Product Owner certification.', '  ', 'Experience of working in a Project in Agile / SCRUM approach either as a SCRUM Master / Product Owner.', '  ', 'Strong data skillset, including SQL query building and/or BI analytics', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']

job_title: ['Office of Planning - Senior Data Strategist  /  Analyst (Data Analytics Unit)']
desc:
['Job Description:', '
', 'You will be part of a new Data Analytics (DA) Unit that is responsible to drive the following objectives:', '
', '
', 'Spearhead objectives of DA Unit in alignment to RP’s organisational mission.', '
', 'Undertake DA projects of strategic importance leading to policy formulation/changes.', '
', 'Provide advice and guidance to other departments to undertake DA projects.', '
', 'Champion and promote the use of data analytics.', '
', 'Work with internal and external technical teams to ensure usability and integrity of data for DA work.', '
', 'May work in partnership with internal departments as well as other organisations on other DA projects.', '
', '
', 'As a Senior Data Strategist/Analyst, you will have the opportunity to:-', '
', '
', 'Formulate strategies to achieve objectives of DA Unit.', '
', 'Translate business requirements and objectives into data models and effective implementation/ dashboard solutions.', '
', 'Advise in the migration of existing excel-reports and design dashboards and reports using visualization tools such as Tableau.', '
', 'Advise on the adoption of suitable machine learning, predictive models or other relevant techniques on a variety of data to derive meaningful statistics, uncover new actionable insights and predictive analytics.', '
', 'Promote understanding of the ecosystem of Data Science/ Big Data tools including data extraction and transformation.', '
', 'Advise in the planning, development and delivery of solutions.', '
', 'Recommend and communicate data-driven findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.', '
', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'Requirements:', '
', '
', '3-5 years of experience in work involving the analysis of data to refine policies, strategies and operations.', '
', 'Previous experience in data visualisation, machine learning, statistical analysis work preferred.', '
', 'Experience in spearheading initiatives in an equivalent DA Unit preferred.', '
', 'Experience in Education organisations or Institutes of Higher Learning will be advantageous.', '
', 'Excellent people skills — you’ll be meeting with stakeholders to translate business needs into technical requirements.', '
', 'Strong attention to detail, time management skills and ability to work under pressure.', '
', 'Ability to use programming languages such as R / Python / SQL and associated data analytics libraries for data preparation and analysis.', '
', 'Experience in working with data visualisation tools such as Qliksense, Tableau to enhance a data narrative, create insightful visualisation and analytics.', '
', 'Able to use SQL for data extraction from existing IT systems.', '
', 'Qualification in Mathematics, Computer science, Engineering, or any related disciplines.', '
', 'Show fair knowledge in relevant hardware/software products.', '
']

desc: ['BAF (Data Analytics)', ' ', "We are looking for Business Analysts (Data Analytics) who's\xa0interested in using data to help the government design solutions that address its policy and business problems, and stay close to the needs of the general public.\xa0 The applicant will be responsible for demonstrating how better use of data can help recommend new policies, streamline operations or bring more customised solutions for citizens. He/she should have some training and working experiences on data analytics, and should be comfortable with hands-on data manipulation, data modelling and data visualisation.\xa0\xa0", ' ', 'What to Expect:', ' ', ' ', 'Provide data analytics consulting services to the government agencies, including data analytics planning and strategy – perform data analytics visioning and road-mapping, business case development, implementation planning, organisational planning, budget and risk management planning', ' ', 'Work closely with stakeholders to understand their needs/pain points, scope the problem and develop business case on how to turn data into critical information and knowledge that can be used for policy making, streamlining operations or developing solutions for citizens. \xa0', ' ', 'Advise stakeholders on the key ICT trends and best practices in data analytics, assess applicability for adoption and recommend solution that best fits stakeholders’ needs', ' ', 'Perform data cleaning, pre-processing and feature engineering that facilitate meaningful analysis', ' ', 'Work closely with data scientists to mine insights from structured and unstructured data and to resolve complex statistical modelling problems to answer pertinent business questions.\xa0', ' ', 'Design dashboards and interactive visualization as tools for data exploration as well as for storytelling.\xa0 Present analytics insights to business users and stakeholders', ' ', 'Work with stakeholders to ensure smooth deployment and adoption of new solution', ' ', ' ', 'How to Succeed:', ' ', ' ', 'Degree/Master in any discipline; Diploma graduates with relevant experience will also be considered.', ' ', 'Minimum 3 years of relevant working experience', ' ', 'Ability to take a broad, strategic perspective as well as drill deep to understand business needs and challenges', ' ', 'Understand key concepts, techniques and considerations in Machine learning and Data analytics', ' ', 'Training and relevant experience in one or more of the following areas:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Statistical modelling tools such as: R, Python, RapidMiner, Knime, SAS, Matlab or SPSS', ' ', 'Data manipulation using scripting languages like Python or using ETL tools', ' ', 'Visual analytics technologies like Tableau, Qlikview or D3.js', ' ', 'End-to-end analytics architecture, preferably with some working knowledge of big data stack', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, with ability to pitch ideas and influence stakeholders', ' ', 'Strong analytical, conceptualisation and problem solving skills', ' ', 'Team player with strong organization and people handling skills', ' ', 'Passion for the use of analytics and data to improve public service', ' ']

desc: ['BACKGROUND:', ' ', 'About Dentsu Aegis Network', ' Dentsu Aegis Network helps clients build consumer relationships by communicating their products and brands effectively. Our distinctive and innovative range of products and services include marketing and communications strategies through digital marketing and creative execution, media planning and buying, creative services, technology applications, SEO, content creation, brand tracking and marketing analytics.', ' Find out more about us at https://www.dentsuaegisnetwork.com/', ' \xa0', ' ', 'About Dentsu Aegis Network’s Global Data Innovation Centre', ' As the world of data continues to grow exponentially in the advent of connected devices, IoT, industrialised digitization of the economy and the way people move through digitized networks, Dentsu Aegis seeks to harness the power of data and transform this into intelligent applications, products and platforms.', ' \xa0', ' The Dentsu Aegis Network Global Data Innovation Centre, hubbed in Singapore, is a strategic initiative to ensure that the Group stays at the forefront of the digital economy and develops global products which sit at the intersection of deep domain knowledge, consumer psychology, data and technology.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:', ' As a Data Science Analyst, you will work closely with the Data Scientists and the engineering team to develop leading edge data analytics solutions and capabilities that uncovers insights from vast amounts of structured and unstructured data, through a combination of research and experimentation.', ' \xa0', ' On a day to day basis, your responsibilities can comprise of:', '  ', '   ', 'Apply quantitative methods and build statistically valid and scalable algorithms that convey actionable conclusions from very large datasets. You should be able to synthesize scientific publications on statistical applications and then write programs to implement the applications that are most suitable for our data.', '   ', 'Complete tasks effectively and in a timely manner.', '  ']
req: ['\u200b\u200bWe invite people passionate about data and artificial intelligence to join a growing team.\xa0', ' You have to be a\xa0', 'self-starter, hands-on builder and collaborative team player', '. You can think on your feet, connect disparate dots, imagine connections and importantly, craft approaches to turn ideas and imagination into real capabilities, inspired by data. You are excited by your work going live in the market with clients and teams around the world.', '  ', 'Desired Skills and Experience', '  ', '   ', '1+ years of experience in applied data science.', '   ', 'At least a Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering or Information Systems.', '   ', 'Familiar with Python programming, including pandas and NumPy libraries.', '   ', 'Working knowledge in machine learning / data mining.', '   ', 'Highly logical, systematic, independent and fast learner.', '   ', 'Self-starter and motivated.', '   ', 'Confident, responsible and can proactively think of and implement solutions to tricky problems.\u200b', '  ']

job_title: ['Analyst, Data Engineer, Consumer Banking, Technology and Operations (WD03017)']
desc: ['Business Function', '  ', "Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.\xa0", '  ', 'As part of this organization, you will be joining the Operations Intelligence Unit of Singapore Consumer Banking Operations: you will be working on a workforce optimization project which aims to improve data accuracy and data reliability of operations staff performance data. Your primary focus will be ensuring the smooth running of our current technical infrastructure and enabling the successful transitioning to the new one, while also taking active part in developing the new workforce optimization data and solution elements.', '  ', 'As an ideal candidate, we are looking for a profile with an established database admin and software engineering skills who also has a well-founded interest in data mining, analytics and modelling', '  ', 'Responsibilities\xa0', '  ', ' \t', 'SUPPORT DAY TO DAY BAU (25%) –Database maintenance and support \t', ' \t\t', 'Execute and manage weekly parameter update (run, resolve, co-ordinate w/other non-technical teams)', ' \t\t', 'Monitor dashboard uptime, supervise completion of automated scripts', ' \t\t', 'Triage service disruptions, take part in initial root cause identification, allocate and report resolution process', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'PROJECT WORK (75%) \t', ' \t\t', 'SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT (60%): Transitioning the technical architecture from SAS db/scripts to DBS proprietary cloud platform with python-based scripting; take part in python-based application development (full development lifecycle: BR to BAU) and in script conversion from SAS to python', ' \t\t', 'DATA MANIPULATION (15%):', ' \t\tAutomate inclusion of new data sources: full data discovery cycle (perform data mapping, analysis, verification and data quality checks) for each new data source from team prioritization/data source identification to BAU)', ' \t\tDevelop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy in the new architecture', ' \t', ' \t', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Diploma or Degree holder of Information Technology, Business, Mathematics or Statistics', ' \t', 'At least 2-4 years of experience in software development, and relational database maintenance/support, including open source technologies', ' \t', 'Able to interpret database schemas, both RDBMS and Hadoop that represent and support business processes', ' \t', 'Proficient in writing and optimizing SQL on Teradata or similar relational database', ' \t', 'Able to handle large and complex codebases', ' \t', 'Understanding of administrative tasks such as end user access to front end and maintenance of security matrix and code versioning tools such as TortoiseSVN', ' \t', 'Experience in data visualization and statistical data modelling (ie. QlikView, Power BI, Cognos, SAP Business Objects, R or Python stat packages, SPARK\xa0 R would be an advantage.', ' \t', 'Interest or experience in advanced data mining, big data tool stacks and/or Machine Learning, (Deep) Neural Networks, Game Theory, R Optimization Infrastructure packages', ' \t', 'Strong problem-solving skills and openness to consider alternative suggestions', ' \t', 'Proactive and independent work ethic', ' \t', 'Willingness to work as part of a high performing team in an individual contributor role', ' \t', 'A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques', ' ']

desc: ['About Bank of America Merrill Lynch: ', '  ', 'Our purpose as a firm is to make financial lives better, through the power of every connection. Across the world, we partner with leading corporate and institutional investors through our offices in more than 40 countries. In the U.S alone, we serve almost all Fortune 500 companies and approximately 59 million consumers and small-business customers. We provide a full suite of financial products and services, from banking and investments to asset and risk management. We cover a broad range of asset classes, making us a global leader in corporate and investment banking, sales and trading.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '  ', 'Connecting Asia Pacific to the World', '  ', 'Our Asia Pacific team is spread across 23 offices in 12 markets. We are focused on connecting Asia to the world and the world to Asia, using our global expertise to ensure success is shared between us, our clients and our communities. Our regional footprint covers 12 currencies, more than a dozen languages and five time zones, placing us firmly among the region’s leading financial services companies.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Bank of America Merrill Lynch is committed to attracting, recruiting and retaining top diverse talent from across the globe. Our diversity and inclusion mission is to actively promote an inclusive work environment where all employees have the opportunity to achieve personal success and contribute to the growth of our business. Each of our global Employee Networks bring together employees, create dialogue and awareness in support of our Diversity and Inclusion mission.', '  ', 'Bank of America Merrill Lynch is an equal opportunities employer.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Position Description', '  ', 'A Static Data Analyst is required to work within the Reference Data Services team as part of Securities Operations in the Global Markets business. The role involves maintaining static data in multiple in-house applications to facilitate trading and post-trade activity in a timely and accurate manner. The position requires excellent research skills, critical thinking, problem solving, and data analysis and data management. The candidate must be comfortable and willing to work in a fast paced environment with competing demands and capable of meeting strict deadlines.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Key Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Completing new account setup', ' \t', 'Resolving exceptions and data scrubbing', ' \t', 'Calling over cash instructions to external clients', ' \t', 'Act as control function to offshore team', ' \t', 'Project contributions', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']

Toluna has 22 offices in Europe, North America, Latin America, Asia Pacific, and MENA.', '  ', 'They are looking for a ', 'Data Science', '\xa0', 'Analyst', ' to support\xa0growing demand for exciting digital research technology involving Big Data.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Key Responsibilities:', '  ', '   ', 'Understand the client’s business needs and how our technology can help', '   ', 'Lead the discussion with the client on the best solution', '   ', 'Build a project analysis framework for the business solution – create analysis plan, work on hypotheses to test, build models, etc.', '   ', 'Guide the team in the processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used', '   ', 'Apply data mining techniques and statistical analysis to uncover insights from data', '   ', 'Present results in a visual and client-ready manner using Toluna’s existing tools', '   ', 'Create standard procedures, process and best practices for the Big Data analysis to be used for current and succeeding projects', '  ']

desc: ['About this opportunity', '  ', 'The Role of iTero Data and Reporting Analyst is to collaborate and support the success of the iTero APAC team through quality data and reporting analytics. job_title: ['Industrial Placement - Data Analytics and Support Analyst']
desc: ['About BlackRock', '  ', 'BlackRock helps investors build better financial futures. As a fiduciary to investors and a leading provider of financial technology, our clients turn to us for the solutions they need when planning for their most important goals. As of December 31, 2018, the firm managed approximately $5.98 trillion in assets on behalf of investors worldwide. For additional information on BlackRock, please visit www.blackrock.com | Twitter: @blackrock | Blog: www.blackrockblog.com | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/blackrock.', '  ', 'About the team – BlackRock Data Services', '  ', 'BlackRock Data Services (BDS) ensures that all information necessary for the investment management process, as well as portfolio (Core Enterprise Data) and client servicing (Client Servicing Data), is complete, accurate, timely and effectively controlled. BDS provides information services and solutions in support of all BlackRock and BlackRock Solutions businesses.', '  ', 'Industrial Placement Program - 19th August 2019 to 14th February 2020', '  ', 'Curious about funds, active investments, technology and data? Ever wonder what it is like working for an Asset Manager like BlackRock? Join us in our first Industrial Placement program and for 6 months, learn from the experts in the industry in specific areas of your interest. We are hiring in Risk, Quantitative and Analytics(RQA), BlackRock Data Services (BDS), Client Service Management (CSM) and Global Fixed Income teams here in our Singapore office.', '  ', 'If you are intellectually curious, self - motivated and always intrigued about the asset management industry, this would be a great opportunity for you.', '  ', 'This program will run for 6 months and there is no guarantee of a permanent conversion. Program is valid for individuals between 0 to 3 years of experience and have some relevant technical knowledge / skills as specified. As this is a short - term contractual hire, visa sponsorship will not be provided for this program. Shortlisted candidates must be able to work in Singapore without requiring any additional work authorization and are permanent resident or a citizen.', '  ', 'Deadline for submission: 30th April 2019']
req: ['About the team – BlackRock Data Services', '  ', 'BlackRock Data Services (BDS) ensures that all information necessary for the investment management process, as well as portfolio (Core Enterprise Data) and client servicing (Client Servicing Data), is complete, accurate, timely and effectively controlled. BDS provides information services and solutions in support of all BlackRock and BlackRock Solutions businesses.', '  ', 'We are looking for individuals with:', '  ', "You should have at least a Bachelor's in Finance/Economics/Accounting/Statistics/Technology and maybe a Post-graduate certification in a similar genre.", '  ', 'You can be a fresh graduate or someone in the field with not more than 3 years of work experience and have meaningful transferable skills in the areas of data management.', '  ', 'To be successful in this program, you should be passionate about the finance industry and be familiar with at least one financial instrument.', '  ', 'Working knowledge in either of the following language would be excellent: SQL, Unix, VBA/Macro or ', 'Python', '  ', 'You will be involved in:', '  ', ' \t', 'Analyzing trends in queries to constantly improve service and client deliverables. Take the opportunity to understand client, market and fund information across BlackRock and external data providers to configure new client deliverables.', ' \t', 'Support various projects, including automation/standardization efforts and the evolution of standard deliverables using existing tools or developing new methods if possible.', ' ']

desc: [' ', 'COMPANY DESCRIPTION', ' ', '  ', 'NTUC Enterprise is the holding entity and single largest shareholder of the NTUC Social Enterprises. NTUC Enterprise aims to create a greater social force to do good by harnessing the capabilities of the social enterprises to meet pressing social needs in areas like health and eldercare, childcare, daily essentials, cooked food and financial services. Serving over two million customers, NTUC Enterprise wants to enable and empower all in Singapore to live better and more meaningful lives.', '  ', ' ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', ' ', '  ', 'The Analytics Centre transforms big data into actionable insights which enable the SEs to make decision that directly impact the outcomes of their business. \xa0', '  ', 'By identifying patterns and building models that help to interpret and predict the behaviors of different customer segments, we will uncover opportunities for partners to grow their business through more effective marketing, better product development and stronger customer engagement.\xa0', '  ', 'We are on the lookout for talented individuals to join us as Business Analysts.\xa0This role will work very closely with NTUC First Campus Corporate Development team, which is responsible for development and delivery of data analytics solutions to the organization.', '  ', 'As a thought and practice leader in the early childhood care and education field, NTUC First Campus (NFC) has been partnering working families to fulfil the promise of young children since 1977. We believe that every child, from every background, deserves opportunity to enjoy a high quality early childhood education for a good start in life.', '  ', 'NFC is one of the largest operator of preschool services in Singapore with more than 160 centres and 4,500 staff. Its portfolio of brands includes My First Skool, The Little Skool-House International and The Catepillar’s Cove. NFC also support the development of early childhood educators through its training institute (SEED) Other services include school-based student care services through its afterschool brand and parenting programs through its Parent’s College unit.', '  ', 'NFC seeks to leverage on its analytics capabilities to deliver better outcomes for parents, children and staff as to further its social mission.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:\xa0 ', '  ', '   ', 'Work closely with business units and corporate functions to understand priorities and develop analytical models to generate actionable insights that help inform those business decisions', '   ', 'Works with team leaders and members to solve client analytics problems and documents results and methodologies', '   ', 'Retrieve and clean data to make it usable from a variety of sources (and formats)', '   ', 'Performs experimental design approaches to validate finding or test hypotheses.', '   ', 'Validates analysis by comparing appropriate samples', '   ', 'Present the results using visualization tools to stake holders', '   ', 'Make and present clear, data-driven, and actionable, recommendations to the business on new initiatives and areas for potential improvement', '   ', 'Work closely with the Centralized Analytics Center to inculcate best practices and standardize analytic approach', '  ']

Moreover, he or she will excel at developing recommendations that transcend the numbers', '   ', 'Ideally, the candidate will be ambitious and results-oriented – an analytical whiz with outstanding communication skills, high initiative, and strong drive to lead change', '   ', 'The successful candidate is someone who makes value out of data and proactively fetches information from various sources and analyzes it for better understanding about how the business performs, and will look to automate certain processes', '   ', 'We are looking for a Sales Operations Data Analyst that will needed', '   ', 'Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems', '   ', 'Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used analysis and recommendations for strategic decision making', '   ', 'Lead ongoing analysis of business performance and present recommendations to GTM leadership for strategic decision making and investment', '   ', 'Identify opportunities to improve business processes and generate a functional requirements document', '   ', 'Create and drive adoption of new business and system processes for desc: ['Powered by big data and advanced technologies, insights from analytics are disrupting everything from how companies create competitive advantage to day-to-day business processes. But companies don’t have analytics problems; they have business problems that analytics can address.', ' ', ' Our view is that the human element is just as critical as technology and data to realizing true value from analytics. \xa0This involves individual and organizational considerations that become the bridge from data to insights to action. \xa0', ' \xa0\xa0', ' ', 'The opportunity', ' ', ' As a Senior Consultant, you will deliver value-added services to our clients and you are required to be a specialist in managing both structured and unstructured enterprise data and deliver analytics-related solutions to Ernst & Young clients across Asean. \xa0In addition, you are required to communicate effectively with the project manager & team members in the region regarding the progress of the project and be a role model to the team members in exhibiting the Ernst & Young best practices.', ' ', ' At Ernst & Young, the true value lies in embedding analytics deeply into business processes at the point of where decisions are made – by human beings.', ' \xa0', ' ', 'Your key responsibility:\xa0', ' ', ' This is a role where no two days are the same – so you’ll find yourself taking on plenty of new responsibilities as you go. You’ll work alongside clients and colleagues, balancing your time between developing security strategies, advising stakeholders, providing workshops and supporting business development. If you’re flexible and ready to adapt to a constantly changing environment, there’s no better place to develop your skills. Since you’ll be working directly with clients, some travel will be required.', ' ', ' ', 'Skills and attributes for success', '  ', '   ', 'Analytical and problem-solving skills combined with experience in leveraging data analytics to drive insights and business decisions. ', '   ', 'Analyze client’s business and supply chain requirements', '   ', 'Develop supply chain optimization models and statistical analysis using packaged as well as custom optimization software tools (e.g. LLamasoft Supply Chain Guru, LLamasoft Transportation Guru, SAS, R, Python, GAMS)\xa0', '   ', 'Analyze and interpret optimization results and derive insights\xa0', '   ', 'Communicate technical insight from analytics and modeling to senior executives in a business-oriented and pragmatic way ', '   ', 'Provide critical thinking and subject-matter expertise to quantitative and qualitative aspects of client engagements', '   ', 'Strong attention to details and ability to multi-task.', '   ', 'A strong work ethic.', '   ', 'A willingness to travel to meet client needs; travel is estimated at 20%.', '  ']
req: ['To qualify for the role you must have', '  ', '   ', 'BS in Engineering or Computer Sciences', '   ', '3-\xa07\xa0years of working experience in consulting, analytics software-as-a-service or technology industry.', '   ', 'Strong experience in solving supply chain planning and design problems using quantitative approaches', '   ', 'Working knowledge of commercial network design tools such LLamasoft SCG, IBM LNP or similar\xa0', '   ', 'Advanced data analysis and processing skills in MS Access, Excel, and SQL', '   ', 'Familiarity with custom optimization engines such as GAMS, LINDO, CPLEX', '   ', 'Working knowledge on a statistical package such as SAS, SPSS, R or Python\xa0', '   ', 'Working knowledge of visualization tools like Tableau, QlikView or any other BI solution.', '   ', 'Strong understanding of supply chain design levers and metrics', '   ', 'Understanding of supply chain planning at strategic, tactical and operational level\xa0', '   ', 'Fundamental understanding of science behind optimization', '   ', 'Articulate, with excellent oral and written communication skills.', '   ', 'Adaptable, able to interact and build strong relationships with people from a diverse range of backgrounds.', '   ', 'Intellectually rigorous, with strong analytical skills and a passion for data.', '   ', 'Sound logical reasoning and deep thinking ability.', '   ', 'Ability to work accurately to a high level of detail.', '  ', '  ', 'Ideally, you’ll also have', '  ', '   ', 'MS in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Decision Sciences, Engineering or Computer Sciences (preferred)', '   ', 'Supply Chain certifications such as CSCP / CPIM are a plus', '  ', '  ', 'We offer a competitive compensation package where you’ll be rewarded based on your performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. In addition, our Total Rewards package includes medical and dental coverage, and a range of programs and benefits designed to support your physical, financial and social wellbeing. Plus, we offer:', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' What working at EY offers', ' We’re interested in flexible professionals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritise shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. You’ll also need the confidence to give professional advice and guidance to colleagues and clients from a diverse range of cultures, often with limited information – both verbally and in writing. If you’re a fast learner, with strong influencing skills and a genuine passion for information system security, this role is for you.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'What we look for', '  ', '   ', 'Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues around.', '   ', 'Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career.', '   ', 'The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you.\xa0', '  ', '  ', ' ', 'About us', ' \xa0', ' EY is a global professional services organisation providing advisory, assurance, tax and transaction services. We are committed to doing our part in building a better working world for our people, our clients and our communities. And we are united by our shared values and a dedication to delivering exceptional client service.', ' \xa0', ' Want to get to know us better?', ' ', ' Visit www.ey.com/SG/careers\xa0', ' Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/EYSGcareers\xa0', ' Connect with us on Linked In: http://bit.ly/EYLinked_Careers\xa0', ' Watch us on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/ernstandyoungglobal\xa0', ' \xa0', ' We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.', ' ', ' © 2017 Ernst & Young Advisory Pte. Ltd. All Rights Reserved.']

desc: ['Powered by big data and advanced technologies, insights from analytics are disrupting everything from how companies create competitive advantage to day-to-day business processes. But companies don’t have analytics problems; they have business problems that analytics can address.', ' ', ' Our view is that the human element is just as critical as technology and data to realizing true value from analytics. \xa0This involves individual and organizational considerations that become the bridge from data to insights to action. \xa0', ' \xa0\xa0', ' ', 'The opportunity', ' ', ' As a Senior Consultant, you will deliver value-added services to our clients and you are required to be a specialist in managing both structured and unstructured enterprise data and deliver analytics-related solutions to Ernst & Young clients across Asean. \xa0In addition, you are required to communicate effectively with the project manager & team members in the region regarding the progress of the project and be a role model to the team members in exhibiting the Ernst & Young best practices.', ' ', ' At Ernst & Young, the true value lies in embedding analytics deeply into business processes at the point of where decisions are made – by human beings.', ' \xa0', ' ', 'Your key responsibility:\xa0', ' ', ' This is a role where no two days are the same – so you’ll find yourself taking on plenty of new responsibilities as you go. You’ll work alongside clients and colleagues, balancing your time between developing security strategies, advising stakeholders, providing workshops and supporting business development. If you’re flexible and ready to adapt to a constantly changing environment, there’s no better place to develop your skills. Since you’ll be working directly with clients, some travel will be required.', ' ', ' ', 'Skills and attributes for success', '  ', '   ', 'Analytical and problem-solving skills combined with experience in leveraging data analytics to drive insights and business decisions. ', '   ', 'Analyze client’s business and supply chain requirements', '   ', 'Develop supply chain optimization models and statistical analysis using packaged as well as custom optimization software tools (e.g. LLamasoft Supply Chain Guru, LLamasoft Transportation Guru, SAS, R, Python, GAMS)\xa0', '   ', 'Analyze and interpret optimization results and derive insights\xa0', '   ', 'Communicate technical insight from analytics and modeling to senior executives in a business-oriented and pragmatic way ', '   ', 'Provide critical thinking and subject-matter expertise to quantitative and qualitative aspects of client engagements', '   ', 'Strong attention to details and ability to multi-task.', '   ', 'A strong work ethic.', '   ', 'A willingness to travel to meet client needs; travel is estimated at 20%.', '  ']
req: ['To qualify for the role you must have', '  ', '   ', 'BS in Engineering or Computer Sciences', '   ', '1 - 3\xa0years of working experience in consulting, analytics software-as-a-service or technology industry.', '   ', 'Strong experience in solving supply chain planning and design problems using quantitative approaches', '   ', 'Working knowledge of commercial network design tools such LLamasoft SCG, IBM LNP or similar\xa0', '   ', 'Advanced data analysis and processing skills in MS Access, Excel, and SQL', '   ', 'Familiarity with custom optimization engines such as GAMS, LINDO, CPLEX', '   ', 'Working knowledge on a statistical package such as SAS, SPSS, R or Python\xa0', '   ', 'Working knowledge of visualization tools like Tableau, QlikView or any other BI solution.', '   ', 'Strong understanding of supply chain design levers and metrics', '   ', 'Understanding of supply chain planning at strategic, tactical and operational level\xa0', '   ', 'Fundamental understanding of science behind optimization', '   ', 'Articulate, with excellent oral and written communication skills.', '   ', 'Adaptable, able to interact and build strong relationships with people from a diverse range of backgrounds.', '   ', 'Intellectually rigorous, with strong analytical skills and a passion for data.', '   ', 'Sound logical reasoning and deep thinking ability.', '   ', 'Ability to work accurately to a high level of detail.', '  ', '  ', 'Ideally, you’ll also have', '  ', '   ', 'MS in Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, Decision Sciences, Engineering or Computer Sciences (preferred)', '   ', 'Supply Chain certifications such as CSCP / CPIM are a plus', '  ', '  ', 'We offer a competitive compensation package where you’ll be rewarded based on your performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. In addition, our Total Rewards package includes medical and dental coverage, and a range of programs and benefits designed to support your physical, financial and social wellbeing. Plus, we offer:', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' What working at EY offers', ' We’re interested in flexible professionals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritise shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. You’ll also need the confidence to give professional advice and guidance to colleagues and clients from a diverse range of cultures, often with limited information – both verbally and in writing. If you’re a fast learner, with strong influencing skills and a genuine passion for information system security, this role is for you.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'What we look for', '  ', '   ', 'Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues around.', '   ', 'Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career.', '   ', 'The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you.\xa0', '  ', '  ', ' ', 'About us', ' \xa0', ' EY is a global professional services organisation providing advisory, assurance, tax and transaction services. We are committed to doing our part in building a better working world for our people, our clients and our communities. And we are united by our shared values and a dedication to delivering exceptional client service.', ' \xa0', ' Want to get to know us better?', ' ', ' Visit www.ey.com/SG/careers\xa0', ' Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/EYSGcareers\xa0', ' Connect with us on Linked In: http://bit.ly/EYLinked_Careers\xa0', ' Watch us on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/ernstandyoungglobal\xa0', ' \xa0', ' We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.', ' ', ' © 2017 Ernst & Young Advisory Pte. Ltd. All Rights Reserved.']

desc: ['Do you have a pulse on new technologies and a desire to change the way business gets done?\xa0Do you want to implement emerging solutions for some of the most successful companies around?\xa0If you answered yes to these questions and you are passionate about helping clients effectively manage enormous amounts of data to generate knowledge and value, then we want to meet you.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'There will never be a typical day at Accenture Analytics, but that’s why people love it here. The opportunities to make a difference within exciting client initiatives are unlimited in the ever-changing digital landscape.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Here are just a few of your day-to-day responsibilities:', '  ', ' \t', 'Deliver large-scale programs that integrate processes with technology to help clients achieve high performance.', ' \t', 'Design, implement and deploy custom applications on Hadoop.', ' \t', 'Implementation of complete Big Data solutions, including data acquisition, storage, transformation, and analysis.', ' \t', 'Design, implement and deploy ETL to load data into Hadoop.', ' ']
req: ['In order to be successful at this role, you must have experience in most of the following:\xa0\xa0', '  ', ' \t', '7 years of experience with 5 years of hands on predictive analytics experience using structured and unstructured data to solve business problems.', ' \t', '5 years of experience deploying large analytics initiatives/ programs across industry verticals is a must. Any prior experience with a blue chip global management consulting firm is also a plus.', ' \t', 'Strong experience in consultative selling and large scale analytics project delivery.', ' \t', 'Strong executive presence and inspirational leadership qualities.', ' \t', 'Good understanding and knowledge of statistical tools (SAS, R), analytical methods and big data technologies (Hadoop).', ' \t', 'Full life cycle Development', ' \t', 'Minimum 1 year of experience Developing REST web services', ' \t', 'Data Science and Analytics (machine learning, analytical models, MAHOUT, etc.)', ' \t', 'Data Visualization', ' ', '  ', 'All of our consulting professionals receive comprehensive training covering business acumen, technical and professional skills development.\xa0 You’ll also have opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization.\xa0 We offer a variety of formal and informal training programs at every level to help you acquire and build specialized skills faster. Learning takes place both on the job and through formal training conducted online, in the classroom, or in collaboration with teammates. The sheer variety of work we do, and the experience it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a career.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law']

desc: ['As Senior Data Engineer you will have a proven track record of being able to deliver code for big data platforms, and Python, and take responsibility for the production and delivery of the in house and 3rd party data technology platform allowing them to provide improved services.', '  ', 'Successful candidates will possess advanced programming technical expertise, strong collaborative and execution capabilities, excellent communication skills, a practical and flexible mindset, and high attention to detail and work quality.', ' \xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities of the role', '  ', ' \t', 'Integrate all owned media touch-points data into single view and build data supply structure', ' \t', 'Utilize big data stacks to build scalable pipeline and monitor data infrastructure', ' \t', 'Conduct detailed part verification, validation and reliability testing.\xa0\xa0\xa0', ' \t', 'Develops and maintains data pipelines, code/update Ansible and Python jobs', ' \t', 'Test and maintain running of current data pipeline jobs and highly scalable data management system', ' \tof Ansible playbooks, Pythons jobs, PySpark jobs, Infrastructure on AWS, Google Cloud, GoCD build server', ' \t', 'Integrate new data management technologies and software engineering tools into existing structures', ' \t', 'Recommend ways to improve data reliability, efficiency and quality', ' \t', 'Collaborate with data architects, modelers and IT team members on project goals', ' \t', 'Collaborate with Marketing Planner, and Data analyst to contribute to new use cases', ' \t', 'Enhance data collection procedures, including applying data cleansing, outlier identification, and missing data techniques that are relevant for building analytic systems', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['Be Transformational.', ' ', 'Make your mark. Create an impact.', ' ', "At IRAS, we partner you to deliver quality tax services and foster a competitive tax environment for our nation's social and economic growth. By leveraging digital capabilities as part of a future-ready team, your opportunities keep expanding. ", ' ', 'As an Infocomm Specialist, you have the technology smarts and are at the forefront of leading infocomm trends. At IRAS, you can harness your expertise to be a digital change agent in our transformation journey. You will partner business divisions to model smart and agile IT systems to shape our digital architecture. With exposure to big data platforms, you will unleash your technical expertise to create innovative digital enterprise solutions.', ' ', 'The result? Seamless IT interface for customers and other innovations that benefit external and internal stakeholders.', ' ', 'Job Purpose:', ' ', 'You will be responsible for designing and architecting the new enterprise data and analytics platform that will enable embedded, data-driven processing, insights and decision making.', ' ', 'Key Duties and Responsibilities:', ' ', ' ', 'Design and architect the future data and analytics platform to enable extensive use of data and analytics enterprise-wide in IRAS', ' ', 'Define strategy and principles for data management', ' ', 'Understand how data will be used, and implications on people, processes and technology', ' ', 'Evaluate and advise business users on suitability and applicability of database, Big Data, and analytics platforms, tools and software for use in IRAS', ' ', 'Develop strategies for data acquisitions, archive recovery, and data repository / data hub implementation', ' ', 'Determine database structural requirements for the various data repositories to ensure data can be readily consumable regardless of source and type', ' ', 'Plan and conduct research, proof-of-concepts, prototypes to demonstrate technical solution and feasibility.', ' ', 'Develop principles, standards, best practices and tools for naming, describing, governing, managing, modelling, cleansing, transforming, moving, storing, searching and delivering all data within the organization', ' ', ' ', 'Skills and Knowledge:', ' ', ' ', 'Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent', ' ', 'At least 5 years’ experience in data modelling, data architecture, analytics platform architecture, and/or Hadoop and Big Data solution architecture', ' ', 'Strong knowledge of current and emerging database, Big Data, Hadoop and analytics technologies, platforms and tools', ' ', 'Advanced knowledge of and rich experience with data and information modelling techniques and tools', ' ', 'Deep knowledge of information design, usability and storage technologies', ' ', 'Certifications in data architecture, Big Data architecture, data science, big data analytics or equivalent would be advantageous', ' ', 'Strong analytical and design skills, able to translate high level business requirements into the required data and analytics platform architecture, and create designs/prototypes of solutions where required', ' ', 'Strong customer relationship management and interpersonal skills, including teamwork, facilitation and negotiation', ' ', 'Strong leadership skills, able to influence others based on earned respect and experience', ' ', 'Strong problem solving skills', ' ', 'Good written and verbal communication skills, able to articulate technology solutions to various audiences', ' ', 'Performance-driven, full of enthusiasm, capable of working independently and have a high level of initiative and integrity', ' ', ' ', 'Please submit your resume via Careers@Gov or email to careers@iras.gov.sg. Only short-listed candidates will be notified.']

desc:
['Punggol Digital District (PDD) is an upcoming mixed-use development that will house the key growth sectors of the digital economy such as cybersecurity and data analytics. It is also the first digital district in Singapore where we will integrate smart technologies horizontally on a single Open Digital Platform (ODP) to yield synergies across various technologies.\xa0The ODP will become a reference digital architecture for future smart districts in Singapore and transform the way we work, live and play.', '
', 'What to Expect:\xa0', '
', 'As a Data Analytics Lead, you will help develop strong data science capabilities within the Smart District Division in JTC. You are expected to use data science to help the team develop descriptive, predictive and prescriptive analytics capabilities to streamline work process. You will be working closely with other Government Agencies such as GovTech, IMDA, CSA as well as Strategic Industry Partners to formulate and implement the data analytics strategy for an Open Digital Platform (ODP) for Smart Districts.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Chart and drive the data analytics strategy for the Open Digital Platform,', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with stakeholders to understand their needs, scope the problems and develop business case to operationalize insights from data,', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Specify requirements to build data science capabilities within the ODP, and', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design dashboards and interactive visualization tools for data exploration', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'How to succeed:', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, Quantitative Social Science or related degrees. Advanced degrees and relevant certifications (e.g. Coursera) preferred,', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimally 5 years of relevant working experience, preferably in Facility Management or data science field,', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have experience leading a data science team, and implementing domain-specific analytics project', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to take a broad, strategic perspective as well as drill deep to understand business needs and challenges,', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understand key concepts, techniques and considerations in machine learning and data analytics,', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Training and relevant experience in one or more of the following areas:', '
', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Data science tools such as R, Python', '
', 'o\xa0\xa0\xa0Visual analytics technologies like Tableau, Qlik', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, with ability to pitch ideas and influence stakeholders,', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Team player with strong organization and people management skills', '

desc: ['You provide decision support by leading, planning and executing data analytics studies. This includes developing machine learning models and data products, and directing data analytics studies to evaluate options and highlight insights. You also collaborate with business units to translate business problems into tractable analytics projects and implement them. Additionally, you groom the junior members of the analytics team and the larger community of practice in MINDEF/SAF. Your challenge lies in communicating effectively with users to understand their business while conveying to them complex and technical information, as well as keeping abreast of the latest knowledge and skills on data analytics.', ' ', 'You must have a tertiary qualification with strong mathematics and computing foundation, with 5 years’ relevant work experience in data analytics. Proficiency in Python, R or other analytics tools will be considered favourably.', ' ', 'To apply, please visit our website at http://www.mindef.gov.sg/dxo/careers-details.html#/tab2. Only applications submitted through our website will be processed.', ' ', 'Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

desc: ['About\xa0Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) ', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualisation solutions. For more information about I²R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', '  ', 'We are looking for highly-motivated and skilled data engineer to work on a new initiative on developing advanced automatic data pre-processing techniques for facilitating key data analytics applications in various industry domains, including advanced manufacturing and engineering, financial services, healthcare, and urban development. Successful candidate will work with a team of data scientists and data engineers to develop novel methodology for automatic data integrity check, data imputation, and segmentation for structured data and time-series data commonly generated by industry companies. Successful candidate will have the opportunity to tap into a large pool of industrial data from different disciplines and to interact with the companies to understand their real data needs. Successful candidate will also engage in project scoping with industry companies to develop solution to address the data analytics needs.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['Summary', '  ', 'The Internal Audit Data Analytics Assistant Manager conducts audits pertaining to risk management, Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX), and internal controls in medium and high complexity areas with minimal supervision. He/She in responsible for audit preparation, creation, testing, and reporting of results. The incumbent working under the direction of the Audit Manager, leads all aspects of assigned audit engagements. He/She assists external auditors in addressing testing and compliance issues. The Internal Audit Data Analytics Assistant Manager play a vital role in the development & implementation of data analytics program into the audit methodology.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Controls self-audit processes (SOX and Non-SOX)', '  ', ' \t', 'Retests to verify testing was completed per IIA and department Standards (e.g., end-of-year sampling, roll forward testing, retesting, etc.).', ' \t', 'Reviews self-audit tests to ensure complete and proper documentation is provided.', ' \t', 'Reports audit review finding to management to obtain additional corrective actions and to highlight improvement opportunities for future self-audit reviews.', ' \t', 'Reviews effectiveness of established self-audit processes and recommends improvement to management to validate that self-audits are properly completed.', ' \t', 'Documents findings and action plans on the year-end Corrective Action Plan (CAP) to provide as reference for management and external auditors.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Executes Audits', '  ', ' \t', 'Adheres to new accounting guidelines to ensure successful implementation into the audit process.', ' \t', 'Allocates resources and expenses as planned to ensure audits are completed on time and within budget.', ' \t', 'Uses auditing web tool (i.e., risk management area reporting tool) to document audit findings.', ' \t', 'Manages progress of audit programs to ensure proper completion (e.g., sufficient number of samples reviewed, audit properly completed, etc.).', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Validates Appropriateness of Corrective Action Plan Results', '  ', ' \t', 'Completes the action plan document (i.e., CAP) to provide test results and recommendations.', ' ', '  ', ' \t', 'Interacts with District, Region and Corporate management to finalize audit results and obtain corrective actions.', ' \t', 'Follows-up with management to ensure corrective actions were implemented.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Leads Audit Preparation', '  ', ' \t', 'Develops test plans for new areas to identify milestone activities.', ' \t', 'Assists manager to complete the risk assessment process and development of audit schedules.', ' \t', 'Reviews audit processes (e.g., process map, narrative and control point listing, etc.) to ensure documentation is current and to identify any gaps in test procedures.', ' \t', 'Interviews relevant staff to confirm process activities are documented accurately.', ' \t', 'Prepares work papers (i.e., description of implemented audit controls tests) to formally document audit activities.', ' \t', 'Completes audit preparation activities (travel arrangements, pre-site testing, etc.) to ensure a smooth audit engagement.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', etc.).', ' \t', 'Assists external auditors with additional testing required to verify previous results.', ' \t', 'Provides years- end final documentation to ensure compliance with Sarbanes-Oxley and prevent misstatements of financial reporting.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Data Analytics', '  ', ' \t', 'Determine the analytics needed for the various audits performed.', ' \t', 'Analyze data to generate meaningful and actionable insights to enhance internal controls.', ' \t', 'Detailed analysis of large datasets to improve on internal models and programmes.', ' ']
