desc: ['Responsibilities', '\xa0', 'As a Lecturer, your contributions go beyond teaching and facilitating learning. You play a critical role in recognising and nurturing your students’ potential and their lifelong learning needs. In addition, you will carry out industry or consultancy projects to help you remain relevant in your profession and to evolving changes in industry, and maintain strong linkages with industry and schools. You will also have the opportunity to have industry attachments or experience on a regular basis to update your skills, knowledge and practices of your profession. Those with good and relevant experience can look forward to Senior Lecturer or equivalent positions, with career development opportunities to leadership positions in the Colleges or Headquarters.', 'Requirements', ' ', 'College Central\xa0', ' ', ' ', 'You should be trained in Electronics Engineering, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IoT related subjects, with at least 3 years of relevant experience in design, develop and deployment of embedded firmware for IoT & Communication hardware and software.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'You should be familiar in one or more of the following areas:', ' ', ' ', '- roduct electronics design related to analogue, digital and power electronics', ' ', '- PCB Cad design software rules and routing', ' ', '- programming skills on C, C++ or python\xa0', ' ', '- IoT/Cloud development and data visualization', ' ', '- electronics assembly and hardware', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'College East', ' ', "You should be trained in Information Technology, Computer Science, Data Science and/or Analytics, with\xa0at least 3 years of relevant work experience to be able to develop students' skills in implementing IoT/software applications, including data analytics solutions.", ' ', 'You should possess relevant experience in one or more of the following areas:', ' ', '- development of IoT applications', ' ', '- data analytics technologies and Big Data', ' ', '- proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R or similar (familiarity with Python-based libraries such as scikit-learn, numpy/scipy and pandas is preferred)', ' ', '- programming web and mobile applications would be advantageous', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['SportSG is seeking for an individual who will be responsible to plan for the provision and distribution of sport facilities through Sports Facilities Master Plan (SFMP), to meet the recreational and sporting neets of both residents’ and athletes.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Job Responsibilities', ' ', 'As a Master Planner, in support of SportSG’s Vision 2030, you are', ' ', ' ', 'Responsible in establishing the following:', ' ', 'Optimise land use for sport facilities to support Team Singapore and community requirement/needs', ' ', 'Cater to the needs of residents, ActiveSG Clubs & Academies, Active Health Labs through master planning studies', ' ', 'Collaborate with Urban Redevelopment Authority (URA) and other agencies to ensure that land/space requirements are provided for.', ' ', 'Identify new sporting concepts and facility planning for better integration and land optimization', ' ', 'Review the planning norms and parameters for sport facilities to ensure facilities are well distributed', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', ' ', 'Require to work with other agencies such as URA/HDB to ensure that:', ' ', 'The implementation of the SFMP is aligned with their building programmes and development plans', ' ', 'To ensure SFMP projects are implemented on schedule and within the approved budget', ' ', 'Project status are systematically tracked and documented for records', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', ' ', 'To leverage on IT (Geographic Information System & Data Analytics):', ' ', 'With the use of spatial and data analytics in planning of sport infrastructure and facilities', ' ', 'To analyse the data statistics collected from ActiveSG to aid in the projection and planning of sport facilities', ' ', 'To study insights of user preferences and utilisation trends', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', ' ', 'To establish partnership, collaboration with inter agencies in planning and design of sport facilities and spaces by:', ' ', 'Participating various workgroups in contributing planning perspectives to respective work streams', ' ', 'Assessing land use proposals/consultations from other government agencies and Grassroot Advisers to determine impact on existing sport facilities', ' ', 'Providing inputs and response to public feedback through various channels', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', ' ', ' ', '  ', ' ', ' ', 'Degree in Urban Planning or equivalent preferred', ' ', 'Degree in Urban Geography, Urban Studies or Economics may be considered with relevant working experience', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'More than 2 years of relevant working experience in private or public sector and has been involved in developing land use proposals or master planning projects.', ' ', 'Work experience in public sector preferred especially in dealing with planning and economic agencies (e.g. URA, HDB, LTA, MOF, STB, EDB).', ' ', 'Knowledge of Geographical Information Systems (GIS) and experience in using data analytics would be an advantage', ' ', 'Good interpersonal skills, especially dealing with different stakeholders from varied backgrounds (government agencies, internal colleagues, public, etc)', ' ', 'Ability to review and make recommendations regarding research, new technologies/ initiatives, collaboration opportunities etc to value-add to the facilities planned.', ' ', 'Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts and draw valid conclusions and propose recommendations.', ' ', 'Possess excellent writing skills and presentation skills', ' ', 'Leads an active and healthy lifestyle with a keen interest in sports', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', '  ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'The level of offer will commensurate with applicant’s experience and track records.']

desc: ['   ', 'Drive the use of analytics in healthcare to derive insights for population health and patient care.', '   ', 'Leverage analytics in support of policy and programme planning work for key priorities of MOH.', '   ', 'Draw talents across healthcare landscape to support and participate in data analytics work.', '   ', 'Health Analytics for Clinical Excellence, Operation Efficiency and Cost Effectiveness across the clusters', '   ', 'Responsible to lead the Business Intelligence (BI) team or manage vendor in the development and implementation of proposed Business Intelligence applications system.', '   ', 'Establish and promote a consistent set of BI skills, standards, and best practice.', '   ', 'Responsible to setup the governance structure for BI and analytical programs, projects, practices, software, and architecture.', '   ', 'Responsible for building the plans, priorities, infrastructure and competencies that the organization needs to take forward-looking strategic decisions by using the BI and analytical software capabilities.', '   ', 'Work with Technical Project Manager to understand and analyze project requirements and implement desired solutions in the area of integration interfaces and protocols.', '   ', 'Develop project plans and track project deliverables to ensure that the projects are completed within budget, schedule and quality standards.', '   ', 'Define project tasks and resource requirements to achieve optimal utilization of resources.', '   ', 'Manage multiple projects and is responsible for the execution from initiation to completion.', '   ', 'Manage the risks that affect the delivery of the project outcome.', '   ', 'Present reports and project updates to stakeholders on a regular basis.', '   ', 'Implement process improvements to reduce development time and assist in the integration of complex business factors to implement long-term strategic planning objectives.', '   ', 'Be familiar with industry best practices and integrate them into the application solutions.', '   ', 'Manage and support a team of integration engineers on daily operation issues.', '   ', 'Provide coaching and guidance to the team in the area of application integration.', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent.', '   ', 'Minimum 10 years and above of experience in developing, implementing and maintaining BI systems and experience in running large scale application integration projects.', '   ', 'Experience in all phases of the BI project lifecycle.', '   ', 'Experience in the setup or managing of BI competency centre is an added advantage.', '   ', 'Experience in managing a team is a must.', '   ', 'Possess prior hands-on experience with technologies such as BI tools (Informatica, SAP BODS, SAP BO, and OBIEE), .NET & MS-SQL/Oracle databases & messaging technologies such as Cloverleaf QDX, MQSeries or JMS, ESB, BPE.', '   ', 'Good interpersonal skills with the ability to work with different groups of stakeholders.', '  ']

desc: ["To lead and work with the team to collect and analyse feedback data on medical undergraduate postings and modules in NUS and Healthcare Institutions (HCIs) to assess and improve the quality of the School's medical undergraduate curriculum.", '  ', 'To establish and apply systems to collect, manage, and analyse data so as to support data-driven decision-making.', '  ', 'To organise and maintain institutional knowledge by improving existing administrative process.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '1) Continuous Quality Improvement through data collection and analysis:', '  ', '  ', '  ', "Oversee the collection and analysis of data from students' feedback on medical undergraduate postings and modules.", '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Oversee the generation of feedback and analytical reports.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Liaise with internal and external stakeholders to collect and review feedback data from students, including addressing of their questions/concerns as well as engagement and training.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Maintain the Online Feedback Portal and seek to enhance it with the support of the Information Technology Unit (ITU).', '  ', ' ', '  ', '2) Business Process Improvement through data analytics:', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Partner with internal teams, developers, and strategy partners to review data sets and detect, diagnose, and repair data quality errors.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Identify and design process improvements to prevent future data quality errors.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Partner with developers and internal teams to improve data coverage and analytic capabilities.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Partner with data engineers to assist with the development of database systems. This may involve the identification, design, and implementation of internal process improvements.', '  ', ' ', '  ', '3) Supervise and guide staff to achieve desired outcomes for the above responsibilities.', '  ', '4) Prove on-site operational support for NUS Medicine clinical examinations and other activities critical to our education missions.', '  ', '5) Any other relevant ad-hoc duties as assigned.']

desc: ['About the Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R)', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. For more information about I2R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', '  ', 'Successful\xa0candidate will work with a team to conduct exciting R&D on multimedia security, in one or more of the following areas: tampering detection, data hiding, security intelligence and analytics, pattern recognition, machine learning & analytics.\xa0Successful candidate\xa0will be involved in researching and developing advanced technologies and algorithms to detect, analyse, and assess data related to anomalies in image/audio/video signals.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', ' \xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']

We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

desc: ["KPMG in Singapore is part of a global network of professional services firms providing Audit, Tax and Advisory services. With 200,00 outstanding professionals in the network working together to deliver value in 154 countries and territories, we offer a globally-consistent standard of service based on professional capabilities, industry insight and local knowledge. In the ASEAN region, KPMG member firms operate across all 10 countries. Our industry focus helps KPMG firms’ professionals develop a rich understanding of clients' businesses and the insight, skills and resources required to address industry-specific issues and opportunities.", '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'We invite highly motivated, dynamic professionals to join our growing Technology Solutions & Innovation team.', '  ', 'The Technology Solutions and Innovation team within KPMG Information Technology Services is dedicated to creating and delivering value to our business by leveraging on IT technology. The team is responsible for delivering customer-focused solutions and high quality IT services internally to enable our business.', '  ', 'The role involves:', '  ', '   ', 'Manages and perform end to end Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of the Information System Projects.', '   ', 'Troubleshoots, improves and upgrades existing applications.', '   ', 'Establishes controls to ensure the validity of the data, and develops processes to automate these tasks.', '   ', 'Performs analysis in data access, data integration, data visualization, database design and implementation.', '   ', 'Implements the strategy roadmap for enterprise data, implementation, and data management for new data sources, publicly available data, business-to-business partnerships, and data analytics systems.', '   ', 'Understands and gathers the business requirements and business processes, to design the Data Warehouse (DW) schema, and define Extract-Translate-Load and/or Extract-Load- Translate processes for DW.', '   ', 'Drives rapid prototyping and design for new projects. Translates broader business initiatives into objectives and concrete goals, aligning appropriately with other groups for efficient and coordinated actions.', '   ', 'Creates Discover-Access-Distil strategies to bring significant value data understanding.', '   ', 'Participates in projects and works with project teams using both Agile and Waterfall methods.', '   ', 'Draws conclusions and effectively communicates findings with both technical and non- technical team members, providing active leadership skills across project team and business community.', '   ', 'Performs vendor and product evaluations and delivers solutions, training, and documentation', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'Degree in Information Technology/Computer Science or equivalent', '   ', 'Minimum 3 to 5 years’ of experience in application development.', '   ', 'Expertise in SQL, SSRS, ETL, Tableau, Power BI or experience in developing dashboard visualizations.', '   ', 'Knowledge in areas like jQuery, Angular/Typescript, .NET programming, CI/CD (Jenkins/VSTS) and Micro services.', '   ', 'Knowledge and working experience with Cloud, AI Automation, Big Data technologies would be advantageous.', '   ', 'Possess strong analytical abilities, with good documentation and self-management skills. Able to multi-task and work well under pressure.', '  ', '  ', 'Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted by KPMG Talent Acquisition team.']

desc: ['About Standard Chartered\xa0', ' We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East. \xa0', '  ', "To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. \xa0It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.\xa0", '  ', "We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.", '  ', 'The Role Responsibilities', '  ', 'The successful candidate will be the part of a start-up team building an innovative platform leveraging data, analytics to drive automated decision-making, smart automation across the full lifecycle of the business. This is a rare opportunity for a self-driven, start-up minded, strong and passionate developer to participate and contribute to a paradigm shift. We want People driven by the mission!', ' \xa0', ' The successful candidate is expected to be an experienced developer in building critical low-latency/data-analytics driven solutions in investment banking/hedge funds/technology companies (low-latency trading systems or AdTech sector). This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0You’ve built something exceptional you can showcase – demos/github/detailed explanation etc..', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong knowledge of equities, bonds electronic markets and standard market making strategies', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong financial knowledge – to ease integration of quants libraries', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong problem solving skills', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong algorithm design and implementation background', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong knowledge in data structures', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong experience handling a vast amount of data', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong modelling background from raw data to a building for production fast predictive / explanation models', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong knowledge of statistics, data-analysis / machine learning / recommender engines concepts', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proficient in a major language C# or Java and C++ for specific routines/algos', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Technical knowledge in a no-SQL / doc / columnar DB such as mongoDB, kdb, shell scripts in Linux/Unix and/or windows-based environments', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Experience in low latency, real-time, scalable systems, systematic trading, targeting / recommender systems, garbage collector, queuing, scheduling, complex events processing (CEP)', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Understanding of modern architecture/designs – micro-services/API-first development/high-throughput/event-driven/agent-based system, compositional frameworks', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Understanding of software development lifecycle', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Some knowledge of application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines']
req: ['Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'Others desirable skills/knowledge:', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Ability to think “Product/platform” with a strong alignment with expected business outcomes/journeys', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Ability to scope minimum viable functionalities for quick and iterative/incremental deliveries – this is a must for the candidate', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Knowledge and some practical experience in modern dev-ops - CI/CD, containerization, orchestration', '  ', 'Soft skills:', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Fluent in English (speaking and writing)', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Outstanding problem-solving skills', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proactive, self-starter, autonomous Self-motivated, multi-tasking, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills, solution oriented with proven results', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Good team spirit', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Extreme curiousness', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0This is a very demanding role which requires a start-up/entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to work fast, efficiently, under pressure on multiple deliveries', '  ', 'How to Apply', '  ', 'Please visit - ', 'https://scb.taleo.net/careersection/ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=1900007596&lang=en ', '\xa0to apply now and take the next step in fulfilling your potential.', '  ', 'You can search and view current opportunities across our global organisation and apply immediately by visiting www.standardchartered.com.', '  ', 'To help speed up your application, please note the following:', '  ', ' \t', 'You will need to log in (or register if you are visiting our careers site for the first time) before you can apply for a specific role', ' \t', 'Some roles may require you to undertake an online talent assessment in addition to completing the application form (to facilitate this process it is preferable that you provide us with an email address as part of your contact information)', ' \t', 'We will ask you about your education, career history and skills and experience, it may be helpful to have this information at hand when completing your application', ' ', '  ', 'It usually takes 15 - 20 minutes to complete the application form; you can save your application at any time and return to complete it at your convenience.', '  ', 'Diversity & Inclusion', '  ', 'Standard Chartered is committed to diversity and inclusion. We believe that a work environment which embraces diversity will enable us to get the best out of the broadest spectrum of people to sustain strong business performance and competitive advantage. By building an inclusive culture, each employee can develop a sense of belonging, and have the opportunity to maximise their personal potential.']

desc: ['This position is a tactical role which supports the company’s strategic goals by utilizing data analytics from CRM database, CLS database, competitor and market research data and products data to map and evaluate key customers’ value chain to present insights so that we can sell to our customers better because we match the customers’ needs better than any of the other competitors.\xa0 The incumbent works within the strategic plan to execute specific assignments which help to maximize the company’s marketing initiatives and relevance to the key customers. Based in Singapore, the Market Analyst reports directly to the Marketing Director.', '  ', ' \t', 'Proactively map and perform extensive data analysis on key customers’ value chain.', ' \t', 'Work with IT team to develop data analytics platform.', ' \t', 'Perform benchmarking, and business and economic analysis of key customers.', ' \t', 'Providing analysis of the sales performance of our products in relations to business data of our customers to provide insights so that we can meet the customers needs better than any of the other competitors.', ' \t', 'Accurately present findings in an appropriate and timely manner to allow the Marketing Director to make critical decisions based on data analysis.', ' \t', 'Assist in the identifying and qualifying product-fit opportunities in the value chain.', ' \t', 'Develop, organize and maintain database on Sharepoint.', ' \t', 'Determine trends pertaining to the customers’ business.', ' \t', 'Monitor competitive products and their market share, sales and marketing activities targeting the key customers.', ' \t', 'Provide activity reports.', ' \t', 'Other job-related duties as needed to support business efforts and to fulfill positive and proactive Marketing initiatives.', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Bachelor’s degree in Data Analytics, Business Analysis or Computer Science with at least 3 years of specific experience researching and analyzing business intelligence data.', ' \t', 'Working knowledge of data visualization tools such as Power BI.', ' \t', 'Proficient in SPSS or any other statistical tools.', ' \t', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Excel.', ' \t', 'At least 2 years of experience in a corporate market research and data analytics.', ' \t', 'Background in planning, designing, managing, analyzing, reporting of qualitative and quantitative research studies.', ' \t', 'Experience in designing research screeners / questionnaires.', ' \t', 'Ability to translate unstructured information into structured information.', ' \t', 'Ability to present complex information internally.', ' \t', 'Ability to handle multiple projects efficiently.', ' \t', 'Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively in a diverse team environment.', ' \t', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills, problem-solving skills, and critical-thinking skills.\xa0', ' \t', 'Ability to meet deadlines and maintain professional demeanor while working under pressure.', ' ', '  ', 'The Marketing Analyst is a strategic marketing job. Based at Kemin’s Asia Pacific regional headquarters in Singapore, the incumbent is required to have time flexibility and may require accomplishing additional work after the usual office hours. The incumbent may be expected to travel both regionally and internationally occasionally.']

desc: ['About\xa0Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) ', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualisation solutions. For more information about I²R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg\ufeff', '  ', 'We are looking for strong candidates in the field of Artificial intelligence and deep learning, with an interest in working on both fundamental algorithms in large-scale machine learning or deep learning, and also applying it to practical problems in vertical domains.', '  ', 'The position, based within the Program in Artificial Intelligence at I2R, entails working closely with a highly interdisciplinary team of researchers with training from leading universities like MIT, Stanford and CMU. Listed below are problems of interest in the Deep Learning 2.0 project:', '  ', 'Multimodal Deep Learning: ', 'Towards effective learning from heterogeneous data sources', '  ', 'Currently, deep learning is applied in various areas such as visual computing, speech recognition, text mining, etc. In each area, the learning model is trained with large amounts of data in isolation. A multimodal learning approach from heterogeneous data sources, including video, speech, text, etc. is necessary to achieve breakthrough in performance.', '  ', 'Unsupervised Deep Learning: ', 'Towards 10X fewer labeled samples', '  ', 'Labeling large amounts of training data is one of the most time-consuming steps in the deep learning pipeline, and is often not feasible. The aim is to achieve the same performance with 10x fewer labeled training samples. This is a strong step in the direction of unsupervised deep learning, where representations are learnt with large amounts of unlabeled unstructured data.', '  ', 'Deep Learning on Embedded Devices: ', 'Towards 100X smaller models', '  ', 'Current deep learning models have 10s of millions of neurons, making it infeasible for deployment on mobile and embedded hardware. The aim is to achieve models that are 100x smaller, with little loss in performance. This capability will also be critical for emerging neuromorphic platforms, where the number of spiking neurons is orders of magnitude smaller than in current state-of-the-art deep learning models.', '  ', 'Online Deep Learning: ', 'Towards Near Real Time (NRT) model updates', '  ', 'State-of-the-art deep learning models still take several days to train on expensive GPU infrastructure. A common problem is when new data (including new classes) are constantly added to an evolving, always-learning system. Algorithms to move towards real-time updates will be essential.', '  ', 'Extreme Deep Learning: ', 'Training 1B neural networks efficiently', '  ', 'The high model capacity of deep networks is why increasing amounts of data and model size improves performance. However, there are substantial challenges in hardware and algorithms challenges in training very large models efficiently. The aim is to address these challenges to achieve more efficient training.', '  ', 'Deep Learning for Spoken Language Processing and Natural Language Understanding: ', 'Towards better modelling of human communication', '  ', 'Language technology has made great advances through deep learning in the past five years, penetrating fields such as speech recognition and machine translation. However, there are still numerous challenges that need to be addressed, ranging from the requirement of specialized linguistic resources to large amounts of annotated data, and to insufficient theoretical grounding in deep learning. This aim attempts to address challenges that are often overlooked by major commercial AI players.', '  ', 'White-Box Deep Learning: ', 'Towards interpretable and contextually informed models', '  ', 'Current deep learning models are largely black-boxes that are not informed by contextual relations and provide little intuition. Improved abilities to regulate the learning process, and interpret the resulting predictions will be essential for the next wave of AI applications -- especially for complex learning scenarios and applications involving critical decisions.', '  ', 'Incorporating Knowledge Graphs into Deep Learning: ', 'Towards better understanding of images', '  ', 'Current deep learning systems today have no real understanding of images, with output typically a bunch of bounding boxes, learnt using a large number of label or sentence-level associations. Knowledge graphs like the MIT ConceptNet will be used to understand higher level semantics and relationships between entities, to improve classification accuracy.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Minimum Bachelor in\xa0Computer Science, Statistics, or Data Science intensive fields, with expertise in one or more of the following areas:    ', '     ', 'Large-scale machine learning', '     ', 'Deep learning, supervised or unsupervised', '     ', 'Applying state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to practical problems in different domains', '    ', ' ', '   ', 'Experience in corporate or application oriented environments is a plus', '   ', 'Ability to work independently, as well as in teams highly desired', '   ', 'Good communication skills for proposals, reports, and publications', '   ', 'Strong programming abilities (e.g. Perl, Bash, C/C++, Java, Python, R, MATLAB)', '   ', 'Computer vision and deep learning skills desirable', '  ', '  ', 'The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified']

desc: ['About the Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R)', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. For more information about I2R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', '  ', 'The department of Image and Video Analytics of Institute for Infocomm Research (I2R), A*STAR, is looking for talented candidates to join our multi-disciplinary team in the development of an automated aircraft inspection system. As part of the Aerospace Industry Transformation Map (ITM), the project looks into how automation, image analytics, robotics and artificial intelligence can improve the productivity of the manual aircraft inspection process. We are looking for candidates with passion in research and development, as well as translating R&D technology into industry applications. Successful candidate will be required to work with a team of research scientist, engineers in robotics, vision, machine learning and human-computer interaction.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', ' \xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']

job_title: ['Senior Manager / Assistant Director (Data Science), NUHS Management Decision Support Office']
desc: ['As Senior Manager/Assistant Director in Management Decision Support Office, you will identify, design and build models for initiatives where data analytics can be applied to transform and optimize program deliverables.', '  ', 'Job Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', 'Collaborate with key stakeholders, namely programme and cross-functional teams and senior management, to prioritize information needs.', '   ', 'Identify available and relevant datasets and make strategic recommendations on such collection, integration usage and leading in the discovery processes with stakeholders to model and frame scenarios that will impact on business processes and decision-making.', '   ', 'Manage the entire data modeling cycle, including data preparation, data modeling, evaluation and deployment.', '   ', 'Interpret data and analyze results to derive insights and foresight, and provide feedback to align programmes.', '   ', 'Mentor and train junior data professionals in the application of data science.', '   ', 'Collaborate with data engineering on future-proofing architecture that scales with time and complexity', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'Minimum Master’s degree in Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, Information Management, Mathematics, Economics, Operation Research, Engineering or Finance.', '   ', 'At least 5 years of relevant working experience.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Good interpersonal skills, a detail-oriented and flexible person who can work across different areas within the team as well as alignment cross functionally outside the team.', '   ', 'Ability to deliver clear, concise reports and presentations/dashboards and effectively articulate observations and recommendations.', '   ', 'Proficient in the use of Data Visualization & Management Tools (e.g. Tableau), Commercial Statistical Software (e.g. SAS, SPSS, STATA) and/or open source platforms (e.g. R and Python).', '   ', 'Ability to build and interpret probabilistic models of complex, high-dimensional systems is a plus. Experience with Regression Models, Neural Networks, Cluster Analysis, Structural Equations Models, formulating and solving OR models like linear (large-scale), mixed integer, non-linear and evolutionary programming methods is a plus;', '   ', 'Knowledge of natural language processing, text mining, Random Forest and Ensemble Models is a plus', '   ', 'Familiar with database management, architecture design, system integration, security and data governance is a plus', '   ', 'Can-do attitude and ability to work independently, comfortable with ambiguity', '   ', 'Thrive in problem solving, learning and applying new knowledge.', '  ']

job_title: ['Executive / Senior Executive (Systems and Data Branch), Planning Division']
desc:
['The Planning Division (PD) under SPSG oversees Group-level planning and strategy development, systems and data management, data analytics, manpower planning and internal capability development. The Systems and Data Branch (SDB) oversees, manages and develops ICT systems to support service delivery and data sharing across the social service sector.', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'Responsibilities:', '
', 'You will be support MSF’s mission of nurturing resilient individuals, strong families and a caring society by equipping front line social service professionals with systems and data to enable them to perform their work in an effective and efficient manner.', '
', 'You will work with MSF/ITG and IT vendors in ensuring the development and management of existing and new Information Technology (IT) systems overseen by SDB. This entails developing and implementing operational workflows for business users; coordinating the gathering of requirements from business users and prioritising the service requests and system enhancements; and working with MSF/ITG and IT vendors to roll out the prioritised enhancements to better enable the IT systems in supporting service delivery.', '
', 'You will also be responsible for handling enquiries and user feedback, and generating data analysis and reports. Over the course of the work, you will have the opportunity to work closely with various internal and external stakeholders e.g. Social Service Offices, Family Service Centres, other ministries, non-government organisations and private vendors.', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'Competencies required:', '
', 'You are proactive, dynamic and always looking to learn new things. Besides strong analytical and project management skills, you are people-centric with good written and verbal communication skills. You are resourceful and work well both independently and as part of a team. Knowledge of and experience working in social sector environment is an advantage. Strong skills in data handling is also preferred e.g. experience in usage of data extraction tools, proficiency in MS Excel.']

desc: ['TD Enterprise Information Management', '  ', 'Building a World-Class Technology Team at TD', '  ', "We can't afford to be boring. Neither can you. The scale and scope of what TD does may surprise you. The rapid pace of change makes it a business imperative for us to be smart and open-minded in the way we think about technology. TD's technology and business teams become more intertwined as new opportunities present themselves. This new era in banking does not equal boring. Not at TD, anyway.", '  ', "TD Data and Information Management covers building, developing, designing, and implementing involved with tech data management solutions. Where do we begin? These experts analyze, design, develop and support TD's info management system; lead and support bank data curation; develop data road map and info management strategies; focus on complex data integration, and drive use of our data reference model. This area doesn't work in isolation. We love data and we feel the same about integration and our assignments prove it.", ' \xa0', '  ', 'TD Enterprise Information Management', '  ', 'Residing within ', 'Enterprise Information Management ', "(EIM), the Enterprise Information Management group is responsible for the delivery and support of technology solutions for the Corporate function unit, including distributed and centralized applications. desc: ['Our centre is developing human-centred computing systems and solutions to help address some of the key challenges related to aging. job_title: ['Research Assistant / Research Associate / Postdoctoral Fellow / Research Fellow']
desc: ['Research Fellow/Postdoctoral Fellow, Research Associate and Research Assistant', '  ', '\xa0For “Healthcare Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics”', '  ', 'The above positions are now available to support the Principal Investigator, Assistant Professor Feng Mengling, for his research in the areas of healthcare data analytics and AI solutions.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Dr. Mengling Feng', ' (http://web.mit.edu/mfeng/www/) is truly a cross-disciplinary scientists, who is currently a faculty member of the School of Public Health, School of Computing and School of Medicine, National University of Singapore (NUS). He is also the Senior Assistant Director working directly with the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and Chief Medical Information Officer (CMIO) at National University Hospital (NUH). Dr. Feng is also an affiliated scientist with MIT. His research is to develop effective data analysis and machine learning methods to extract actionable knowledge from medical big data to improve the quality of care. Dr. Feng’s work was recognized by both well-established journals, such as Science Translational Medicine, and top international conferences, such as KDD, AAAI and AMIA.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Cross-disciplinary and International AI Lab', '  ', 'The selected candidates will be working in a cross-disciplinary team consists of data scientists, physicians, post-docs, PhD students and well respected faculty members from NUS, NUH and SGH. The candidates will be working on healthcare projects funded by our Ministry of Health, Health Promotion Board and AI Singapore. As Dr. Feng is an affiliated scientist, his lab constantly work with faculties and students from the Harvard-MIT Health Science Technology division. Dr. Feng has over 10 joint publications with Harvard and MIT between 2017 and 2018. He has also been organizing the annual NUS-MIT Healthcare AI Datathon (www.nus-datathon.com).', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Potential Industrial and Overseas Exposure', '  ', 'Dr. Feng also collaborates closely with various local and international industrial partners. Therefore, members in Dr. Feng’s team often have opportunities to work as affiliated scientists in our partnering companies, such as MSD, IBM, SAP, Philips, local and international start-ups.']
req: ['Major responsibility of the selected candidate is to apply and develop machine learning and AI technologies to solve healthcare challenges raised by our clinical collaborators. company: ['SINGAPORE-MIT ALLIANCE FOR RESEARCH AND TECHNOLOGY CENTRE']
desc: ['Overview', '  ', 'The Scientific Director will be a key member of an interdisciplinary research programme addressing key technology bottlenecks in cell therapy manufacturing: (i) critical quality attributes of safe, effective cell therapy products and (ii) integrated process analytics to monitor and modulate those attributes. While cell therapies are poised to transform healthcare for both the industry and the patient, there remain many outstanding scientific and technical challenges to significant global impact that this R&D programme addresses. This high-impact focus includes measurement and feedback control of processing parameters that contribute to cell viability and function during cell proliferation, and the measurement at intermediate and final steps of the cell product properties correlated with positive therapeutic outcomes.', '  ', 'This interdisciplinary team comprises engineers, biologists, clinicians, and manufacturing experts from multiple MIT academic units, and multiple Singapore-based universities, research centers, and hospitals who are experienced at translational demonstrations of technologies in safety-regulated industries such as cell therapies. Our unique, enabling and cross-cutting capabilities include cell and clinical biology, microfluidics, real-time optics and spectroscopies, 3D-printed devices, process analytics, data analytics, and bioinformatics. This programme will demonstrate these approaches required of cell-based personalized medicine through three translational testbeds (three Flagship Projects), ultimately facilitating access for more patients to life-saving, approved cell therapies for currently intractable health challenges', '  ', 'SMART seeks a Scientific Director with experience and expertise in cell therapy manufacturing.\xa0 She or he will:', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', '  ', 'Assist the Co-Lead Principal Investigators to support a team of investigators in executing technical scope and milestones of the program;', '  ', 'Participate in a Council of co-investigators who will set scientific operation milestones and internal operation policies of an interdisciplinary research team and programme;', '  ', 'Manage internal (within SMART Interdisciplinary Research Group) and external communications;', '  ', 'Support external partnerships and collaborations with clinical, industrial, and regulatory stakeholders;', '  ', 'Act as technical expert within the wider clinical and cell therapy production / commercialization landscape in Singapore and facilitate team awareness on potential opportunities, complementary efforts by other R&D teams, and emerging production challenges in industry and clinical settings;', '  ', 'Act as a subject matter expert and provide consistent co-mentorship to postdoctoral and graduate student researchers in the program;', '  ', 'Represent the research programme at meetings with governmental agencies, industry sponsors, or visitors;\xa0', '  ', 'Oversee financial administration of the program; and', '  ', 'Perform other related duties as required.', ' ']
req: ['  ', 'Ph.D. in Biology, Chemistry, Biological Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Cell Biology, or Biophysics;', '  ', 'Biopharmaceutical experience, particularly with experience in industry, clinical, and/or manufacturing settings;', '  ', 'At least 3 years’ experience in research management in a medium/large scale research center or industry;', '  ', 'Demonstrated ability to build strategic collaborations to strengthen and enhance the research projects;', '  ', 'Proven ability to manage complex, multi-stakeholder programs;', '  ', 'Excellent written / verbal communication skills; and', '  ', 'MIT alumnus/alumna or previous MIT or SMART research appointment preferred.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Interested applicants will have to submit their full CV (including papers published, patents filed, etc.), a cover letter, a research leadership statement (2 pages), and list of three references (to include reference names and contact information). We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

job_title: ['Strategic Marketing Analyst, Scalable Marketing Solutions - Singapore']
desc: ['Company overview:', '  ', 'Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers.', '  ', 'The area: Online Partnerships Group - Global Partnerships', '  ', 'Google helps our partners find better ways to reach their audiences and manage their digital businesses. In return, our partners provide great content for our products, and they syndicate Google products to enhance their sites and apps. Global Partnerships team members expand and support these relationships by continually finding new opportunities and solving technical problems for our partners. The wider Global Partnerships team includes a variety of different organizations, including CorpDev, Emerging Business Development, Strategy and Operations, Google for Startups, Area 120 and our Display Advertising Business.', '  ', 'The role: Strategic Marketing Analyst, Scalable Marketing Solutions - Singapore', '  ', "The Online Partnerships Group (OPG) uses our portfolio of product solutions, including AdSense and Google Marketing Platform tools, to help online publishers grow their businesses. You'll provide creative, industry-leading online advertising solutions for publishers and developers and identify new opportunities. Some of the largest publishers on the web rely on our products and we're always trying to exceed their expectations and strengthen our long-term partner relationships. We help grow Google's business with the largest online publishers and provide account management for users of AdSense, Google Ad Manager and more.", '  ', 'Additional Role Description:', '  ', 'As a Strategic Marketing Analyst, you will use your analytical and technical skills to grow the online businesses of AdSense publishers and AdMob developers. You’ll be immersed in massive datasets using Google Infrastructure and tools. You’ll connect your data expertise with the knowledge of other subject matter experts to uncover and develop new tactics our publishers can use to grow their businesses. You’ll partner with marketers to make sure they have compelling data that will be used to reach out to a massive number of publishers with customized, personalized messages, while using and growing your data analytics skills to solve challenging problems. The work is a mix of campaign opportunity sizing, data mining, lead generation, measurement, data exploration, data analysis, and automation.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '- Mine massive datasets and analyze them to create customized recommendations at scale to help our publishers grow their businesses.', '  ', '- Extract and transform datasets, explore and highlight insights through data visualization. Transform complicated problems into simpler tractable ones.', '  ', '- Build data pipelines and scripts to enable automation of scalable sales and marketing campaigns.', '  ', '- Design measurement metrics focused on strategic priorities, design A/B tests, and measure results for marketing campaigns.', '  ', '- Engage with the broader sales, marketing, product, and engineering teams to understand strategic priorities and identify potential recommendations that will resonate with publishers.']

desc: ['Mission', '  ', 'Your mission is to help transform our business into an agile, well-informed, data-driven decision making powerhouse.', '  ', 'As a BI Team Lead, you will need to work closely with the product, sales, marketing and strategy teams within the business, and deploy best practices in data modelling, warehousing architecture, visualizations and storytelling to solve critical problems and unveil opportunities and trends for the business to succeed.', '  ', 'In A Nutshell', '  ', '   ', 'Be a part of the MoneySmart team to understand how our visitors are engaging with us, understand what their needs are and how we can serve them better \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '   ', 'Drive decision making within the BI team, progressing both how data and BI is used within the organisation as well as with external partners or consumers', '   ', 'Setting and implementing a BI and data analytics strategy, for internal (analyst) and customer (business) consumption', '   ', 'Identify customer segments by integrating new and old data sources that will inform marketing and sales', '   ', 'Work to quantify various opportunities to help the team prioritise the product roadmap \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '   ', 'Work side-by-side with marketing, product and engineering to ensure your analysis and insights translate to meaningful outcomes and a better experience for our customers', '   ', 'Build relationships with teams across the company, from marketing and engineering to customer support and business development', '   ', 'Provide data stewardship for the business which include building and maintaining data definitions, enforcing data policies and ensuring compliance across the organization', '   ', 'Provide leadership and mentorship to junior members of the BI team', '  ']

desc: ['Role and Purpose:', '  ', 'The Senior Staff Technical Program Manager, reporting to Senior Director of IT Business Transformation, will serve as the IT program lead for APAC Power Services and Gas Power Systems (GPS). You will be responsible for program management, change management, last-mile deployment, and region local solutioning. The program manager will partner with regions’ technology pillars (analytics/data and IT Ops) to ensure local solutioning and global tools meeting business outcome and operating needs.', '  ', 'Essential Responsibilities:', '  ', 'The program manager will also partner closely with regions functions, including sales, project installations, Quality, Inquiry To Order (ITO) & Order To Requisition (OTR), FieldCore, etc, to ensure APAC IT programs are aligned to region’s growth plan and cost-out/cost-avoidance targets. The program manager will also act as APAC process SME to global IT vertical COEs for both GPS and Power Services.', ' ', ' • Responsible for all last-mile programs IT success & executions for APAC, including ERP and enterprise systems, and local solutioning. Ensure all IT system and data/analytics are rolled out sustainablefor both long terms and short terms.', ' • Region’s Subject Matter Expert (SME) for Power Services and GPS regional process and local configurations. Be familiar with APAC GPS and Power Services business models and country dynamics, to lay out IT programs aligned to P&L business outcome (growth, costs, etc)', ' • Responsible for simplification outcome, from process, systems and data perspectives, across all APAC region functions', ' • Define programs (either leverage global platforms or region’s innovated platforms), to drive CoPQ along with Quality and functions.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['To be successful in this role you would possess and/or demonstrate the following', '  ', '• BS, BA, MS and/or MBA in engineering, computer science, or information technology, with 7+ years of experience in the relevant field, 4+ years of program management and software management, and 2+ years of managing executive stakeholders and client management.', ' • Proven track record of leading programs, facilitating workouts, and managing program outcome success and executions.\xa0', ' • Ability to work across matrixed structure, and influence stakeholders and key users, across ITO and OTR functions.', ' • Strong communication skills and inclusiveness with functions and IT.', ' • Proven as a change agent & have ability to think outside of BOX.', ' • Cultural awareness & sensitivity: ability to flex style to suit differing cultural norms\xa0', ' • Demonstrated organizational skills, high standard of accuracy, attention to detail, and excellent follow-up skills.', ' • Ability to work effectively with all levels in the organizations, including senior leadership.\xa0', ' • Ability to propose solutions that solve business challenges and IT roadblocks.\xa0', ' • Effective interpersonal & strong influencing skills']

desc: ['About Standard Chartered\xa0', ' We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East. \xa0', '  ', "To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. \xa0It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.\xa0", '  ', "We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.", '  ', 'The Role Responsibilities & Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'The successful candidate will be the part of a start-up team building an innovative platform leveraging data, analytics to drive automated decision-making, smart automation across the full lifecycle of the business. This is a rare opportunity for a self-driven, start-up minded, strong and passionate developer to participate and contribute to a paradigm shift. We want People driven by the mission', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Own the deliveries and improvements', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Exceed stakeholders and management expectations', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Build services with a framework and generic pattern mindset for scale across multiple dimensions – optimized compute/performance, functional, visualization, quality control', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Develop scalable real-time low-latency processing solutions using an agile delivery method', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Maintain data & analytics for systematic decision-making, processing / controls', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Develop and maintain automated testing', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Do whatever it takes to maintain stability, availability and performance', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Manage the infrastructure in relation with the Technology services group', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Work with PSS to ensure a smooth production transition and seamless support', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Understand the criticality of a real-time trading system and ensure related requirements are met', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Manage interfaces, dependencies, risks, issues', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Manage contracts, plans, trackers, architecture diagrams, data flow diagrams, JIRA, Confluence and key communication documents', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Partner with stakeholders to capture requirements and deliver solutions – deep understanding of the problem and context along with ownership are key to be successful in this role']
req: ['The successful candidate is expected to be an experienced platform engineer/manager in building critical low-latency/data-analytics driven solutions in investment banking/hedge funds/technology companies (low-latency trading systems or AdTech sector). This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0You’ve built something exceptional you can explain or showcase', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Ability to think “Product/platform” with a strong alignment with expected business outcomes/journeys', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Advanced knowledge of application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Understanding and demonstrable experience of modern architecture/designs – micro-services/API-first development/high-throughput/event-driven/agent-based system, compositional frameworks', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Ability to scope minimum viable functionalities for quick and iterative/incremental deliveries – this is a must for the candidate', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Good knowledge of Python, basic data-analysis / machine learning concepts', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Understanding of software development lifecycle', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong knowledge of equities/bonds electronic markets', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Background rooted in development – knowledge of one or more general purpose programming languages, C# and Java', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proven experience in all or a few of these areas: markets/venues connectivity, testing frameworks, low latency, real-time, scalable systems, systematic trading, targeting / recommender systems, garbage collector, queuing, scheduling, complex events processing (CEP)', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Technical knowledge in a no-SQL / doc / columnar DB such as mongoDB, kdb, shell scripts in Linux/Unix environment and or windows-based environments', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Knowledge and some practical experience in modern dev-ops - CI/CD, containerization, orchestration', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0knowledge and experience in FIX, Market Data, Analytics and OMS is a plus', '  ', 'Other desirable skills/knowledge:', ' \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Some very basic knowledge of UI concepts – javascript/html5/openfin/electronjs', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Some knowledge of electronic trading algo/strategies and latest progress in the area', ' ', ' Soft skills:', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Fluent in English (speaking and writing)', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Outstanding problem-solving skills.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0 Proactive, self-starter, autonomous Self-motivated, multi-tasking, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills, solution oriented with proven results', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Good team spirit', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Extreme curiousness', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0This is a very demanding role which requires a start-up/entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to work fast, efficiently, under pressure on multiple deliveries', '  ', 'How to Apply', '  ', 'Please visit - ', 'https://scb.taleo.net/careersection/ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=1900007592&lang=en', ' \xa0to apply now and take the next step in fulfilling your potential.', '  ', 'You can search and view current opportunities across our global organisation and apply immediately by visiting www.standardchartered.com.', '  ', 'To help speed up your application, please note the following:', '  ', '  ', 'You will need to log in (or register if you are visiting our careers site for the first time) before you can apply for a specific role', '  ', 'Some roles may require you to undertake an online talent assessment in addition to completing the application form (to facilitate this process it is preferable that you provide us with an email address as part of your contact information)', '  ', 'We will ask you about your education, career history and skills and experience, it may be helpful to have this information at hand when completing your application', ' ', '  ', 'It usually takes 15 - 20 minutes to complete the application form; you can save your application at any time and return to complete it at your convenience.', '  ', 'Diversity & Inclusion', '  ', 'Standard Chartered is committed to diversity and inclusion. We believe that a work environment which embraces diversity will enable us to get the best out of the broadest spectrum of people to sustain strong business performance and competitive advantage. desc: [' ', ' ', 'We are seeking an energetic and passionate Project Manager who has experience with large scale onboarding of digital services, to', '\xa0', 'join our Citizen Products team who eat, talk, dream about delivering digital services and products that citizens want.', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Be part of the team that collaborates with Government agencies and industries to understand citizens’ current pain points, their expectations so as to deliver personalized services that are anticipatory, relevant and easy to use.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'As a Project Manager with human touch from acquired soft skills honed over the years, you will be expected to be a great listener and communicator who can interacts well with government agencies, key stakeholders and solution partners. You will play an integral part in a team who create vision, plan with data and execute with heart.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'What to Expect:', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Effective in generating interest, explaining value proposition and onboarding of agencies to our suite of products that are used across the government.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Proactively support our onboarded agencies, through timely identification of arising issues and diligently follow through the resolutions to demonstrate high level of professionalism.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Well positioned to operate the various citizen facing digital service products ranging from virtual assistant bot (Ask Jamie), web analytics (wogaa.sg) to citizen engagement platform (ideas.gov.sg) and more.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Apply data analytics to obtain insights on customers’ behaviour in order to drive relevancy of our products’ anticipatory engine so as to deliver personalized services.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Use data to identify gaps and services of our products, continuously seeking to enhance our products’ features that are well accepted by the citizens.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Excellent project management skills and familiar with various service delivery models from hybrid waterfall to agile and from in-source, co-source to out-source.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Manage relationships with stakeholders and vendors to ensure delivery of milestones on time.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'How to Succeed:', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Ability to see our products from the eyes of the citizens and is passionate about serving them through our technological offering of meaningful and relevant digital services.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Experience in managing application systems through their full life cycle, exhibit a learning mind set and at ease with continuous improvement as a way of life.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Minimum 10 years of experience with good blend of project management and technical roles are preferred.\xa0 Less senior candidates with exceptional drive are welcome too.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Disciplines in Computing / Computer / Electronics Engineering or Information Technology', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Experience with software design, application development, user acceptance test including network and system infrastructure will be favored', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['CRM Manager', '  ', 'A well-established British recruitment company is looking for a CRM Manager, Asia Pacific to be based in Singapore. Having been in the industry for over 40 years, they have greatly expanded to include operations in various continents such as Asia Pacific, Africa, America and more. Some of their key industries include Financial Services, Healthcare, FMCG and Professional Services.', '  ', 'Being part of the Group Services: Marketing team, you will report to the Senior CRM Manager, Asia Pacific. You will support the business in their data analytics requirements, propose methods to acquire and retain customers as well as be involved in growth campaigns across the APAC region.', '  ', 'If this is something you are looking for, apply now!', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', ' \t', 'Inform stakeholders and the business on upcoming methods involving data management', ' \t', 'Analyse data to inform business development and campaigns', ' \t', 'Work with IT to manage CRM system and data warehousing', ' \t', 'Be involved in CRM initiatives and oversee execution of campaigns', ' \t', 'Maintain and improve data management processes and accuracy', ' \t', 'Recommend and manage end-to-end marketing campaigns based on analysis of customer and client data', ' \t', 'Act as a liaison between the IT and CRM team to identify consumer segments to be targeted for campaigns', ' \t', 'Propose and implement database segmentation', ' \t', 'Carry out surveys to obtain feedback on how to improve business processes', ' \t', 'Provide advise and recommendations where necessary for business growth', ' ']
req: ['Requirements:', '  ', ' \t', 'At least 5 years of data analysis, coding and reporting experience in a SQL Server environment', ' \t', 'Experience in SQL data extraction, overseeing and driving campaigns and projects', ' \t', 'Analytical, data-driven, well-versed with Excel', ' \t', 'SQL experience is a must', ' \t', 'Ability to build strong relations with internal and external parties', ' \t', 'Experience working with several SDLC methodologies such as Waterfall and Agile', ' \t', 'Experience in PowerBI, Exact Target, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Pardot or Marketo is preferred', ' \t', 'Experience managing campaigns, projects, proposals and presentations to senior management is preferred', ' \t', 'Exposure working with various teams across several regions is preferred', ' \t', 'Experience with Crystal Reports or other reporting package is advantageous', ' ', '  ', 'Interested? Apply away! Sophia Holmans - EA License: 11C4388 Registration: R1872027']

desc: ['Responsibilities: \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 \xa0\xa0', '  ', ' \t', 'Ownership of the overall architecture development lifecycle for the on-premise platform, both for the customer implementation in Singapore as well as for the reusable on premise\xa0product to be derived from it', ' \t', 'Assessment of the business requirements and presentation of architectural\xa0recommendations\xa0', ' \t', 'Definition of the target architecture for the REAMS solution and for the future product\xa0type platform design\xa0\xa0', ' \t', 'Oversee and management of the implementation of the target architecture\xa0', ' \t', 'Close work with the business and technical staff and as key contributor in the part of the data business team\xa0', ' \t', 'Management of stakeholder expectations and requirements\xa0', ' \t', 'Maintenance of constructive relationships with suppliers to allow effective and productive\xa0evaluation of vendor offerings against business requirements, constraints and priorities\xa0', ' ', '  ', 'Main Duties: \xa0\xa0\xa0', '  ', ' \t', 'Design, Development and Operationalization of REAMS Architecture\xa0', ' \t', 'Design, Oversight and management of the implementation of the target data architecture\xa0(Data Modelling)\xa0', ' \t', 'Preparation, Integration and analysis of huge structured and un structured data\xa0\xa0', ' \t', 'Design and development of scalable end-to-end data pipelines for batch and stream\xa0processing\xa0', ' \t', 'Interaction with customers and business stakeholders to understand business\xa0requirements and identify data analytics driven business opportunities\xa0', ' ']
req: ['Qualifications required for the position:\xa0', '  ', ' \t', 'Full life cycle experience, responsible for the development of a complete set of\xa0architectural views for an enterprise in accordance with one of the more common\xa0architecture frameworks\xa0', ' \t', 'Strong knowledge of design and architectural patterns\xa0', ' \t', 'Strong Experience in Big Data Technologies like Hadoop, MapReduce, Kafka, HBase,\xa0Cassandra, Hive, Presto und Spark\xa0', ' \t', 'Strong Experience in SQL- und NoSQL-databases\xa0\xa0', ' \t', 'Strong working knowledge in Programming languages like Scala, Python, Java, SQL\xa0', ' \t', 'Experience to DevOps tools & infrastructure such as Jenkins, GITHUB, Eclipse,…\xa0', ' \t', 'Experience working in an Agile development environment\xa0', ' \t', 'Experience of software development methodologies and structured approaches to\xa0', ' \t', 'system development\xa0', ' \t', 'Awareness of systems management and operational support tools\xa0', ' \t', 'Security and/or infrastructure experience would also be a significant benefit\xa0', ' ', '  ', 'Essential Skills required for the position', '  ', ' \t', 'Strong business analysis skills and experience, including development of business vision\xa0and strategies, functional decomposition, requirements capture, process modeling\xa0', ' \t', 'Strong knowledge of design and architectural patterns.\xa0', ' \t', 'Big Data Technologies like Hadoop, MapReduce, Kafka, HBase, Cassandra, Hive,\xa0Presto und Spark\xa0', ' \t', 'Strong Experience in SQL- und NoSQL-databases\xa0\xa0', ' \t', 'Programming languages: Scala, Python, Java, SQL\xa0', ' ']

desc: ["The Manager/Senior Manager uses data analytics and determines new strategies to make production processes more efficient to meet organisation's goals. He/She establishes, implements and manages projects to meet operational objectives. He/She manages his/her team resources and balances between production requirement and manpower resources to ensure organisation's sustainability. He/She integrates quality principles and methodology to enhance engineering performance within the organisation.  ", '  ', 'In addition the Manager/Senior Manager evaluates the organisation’s approach towards a lean enterprise and uses data analytics for business insights identification. He/She drives innovation practices in the organisation and review manufacturing processes to reduce working capital and optimize inventory levels.  ', '  ', 'As a people manager, the Manager oversees manpower, financial, training and resource planning deployment within the organisation. He displays a high level of organisational awareness and leadership skills by working in a consultative manner with other departments/sections within the organisation.  ']
req: ['~ Analyse data for business insights identification.  ', ' ~ Analyse production efficiencies.  ', ' ~ Conduct interviews and make hiring decisions.  ', ' ~ Determine priorities dynamically and set planning assumptions for work in progress levels by product, cycle time and yield.  ', ' ~ Develop On-the-job training programme.  ', ' ~ Develop workplace learning plan.  ', ' ~ Evaluate organisations approach towards a lean enterprise.  ', ' ~ Evaluate the sustainability of manufacturing process by preparing rough cut capacity plans.  ', ' ~ Evaluate workplace safety and health management system for compliance and improvement.  ', ' ~ Improve operation planning through use of big data and advanced analytics modelling.  ', ' ~ Integrate quality principles and methodology to enhance engineering performance.  ', ' ~ Lead change management in the organisation.  ', ' ~ Manage balance between production requirement and manpower resources.  ', ' ~ Manage innovation practises in organisation.  ', ' ~ Manage manufacturing key metrics including loading, performance to commitments, on time delivery and bottlenecks.  ', ' ~ Manage material requirements planning taking into account the sales forecast, production plan and production capacity.  ', ' ~ Resolve workplace grievances and disputes.  ', ' ~ Review manufacturing processes to reduce working capital and optimise inventory levels.  ']

job_title: ['Director  /  Senior Manager, Indirect Tax , APTC, Singapore']
desc: ['The indirect tax team within EY\'s Asia Pacific Tax Center ("APTC") is expanding and looking for strong candidates at the Director / Senior Manager level to join our team.', '  ', 'The opportunity', '  ', 'The indirect tax team within EY\'s Asia Pacific Tax Centre ("APTC") operates as a team of highly experienced indirect tax professionals who are our centre of excellence delivering APAC wide solutions to\xa0multi-national companies.', '  ', 'Work comprises of four core components:', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'Delivery of operational excellence initiatives concerning supply chain, operating model design and performance improvement that drive strategic business growth for our clients (Operating Model Effectiveness ("OME"))', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Digital Indirect Tax including advising our clients on how to build a robust indirect tax strategy for profitable growth in the face of vast digital change, including advising on the indirect tax considerations relevant to cross border digital operating models implemented by both traditional and disruptive companies', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Working with our tax technology and transformation practice group to design and implement technology and data supported solutions to optimise indirect tax processes and identify indirect tax saving opportunities', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'APAC wide indirect tax advisory engagements comprising both global trade and VAT, providing our clients with the APAC solution', ' \t', ' ', '  ', 'All components are\xa0increasingly supported by the use of indirect tax technology and data analytics. Although prior experience of technology and analytics is not required, any candidate must be actively interested in developing themselves in this area.', '  ', 'Your key responsibilities', '\xa0', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'Stay abreast of Digital Tax Administration trends and indirect tax policy changes impacting the way our clients do business', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Demonstrate an understanding of complex supply chain concepts and effectively apply customs and indirect tax knowledge to client situations', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Assist in developing and delivering quality OME and Digital Indirect Tax work products in a timely and responsive manner', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', "Thoroughly analyse client information. Prepare quality practical approaches to the client's situation", ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Develop recommendations and implementation plans for clients and team members', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Run client relationships and leverage internal/ external relationships to generate revenue opportunities for the firm', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Develop deep sector and geography insights on indirect tax issues and advise clients accordingly (the role is not a mere project management role coordinating advice from other EY office locations)', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Work seamlessly with tax and advisory colleagues across APAC and Rest Of World (ROW)', ' \t', ' ']
req: ['To qualify for the role you must have', '  ', '   ', ' ', "A Bachelor's degree in any subject", ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Minimum of 6 years of relevant work experience; 8 years of relevant experience for Director', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Strong technical knowledge across either Global Trade or VAT (ideally both); full technical training will be provided on indirect tax, customs or digital tax areas as needed', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Excellent verbal / written communication skills in business English', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Strong project management skills', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced professional services environment and cope with undefined situations\xa0', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Willingness to travel in APAC', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience working in professional services firms and/ or industry', ' ', '  ', '  ', 'Ideally, you’ll also have', '  ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience working in Asia or with Asian languages \xa0', ' ', '  ', '  ', 'What we look for', '  ', 'Highly motivated individuals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritize shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. An effective communicator, you’ll be a confident team player that collaborates with people from various teams while looking to develop your career in a dynamic organization.\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', '\xa0', '  ', 'What working at EY offers', '  ', 'EY offers a competitive remuneration package where you’ll be rewarded for your individual and team performance', '. ', 'We are committed to being an inclusive employer and are happy to consider flexible working arrangements. ', 'Plus, we offer:\xa0', '  ', '   ', ' ', 'Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you\xa0', ' ', '  ', '  ', 'About EY', '  ', 'As a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services, we hire and develop the most passionate people in their field to help build a better working world. This starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities and creative freedom to make things better. So that whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we’ll make our ambition to be the best employer by 2020 a reality.\xa0\xa0', '  ', 'If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.', '  ', 'Join us in building a better working world.\xa0', '\xa0', '  ', 'Apply today.', '\xa0', '\xa0', '  ', 'Want to get to know us better?', '  ', 'Visit www.ey.com/SG/careers', '  ', 'Become a fan on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/eycareerssingapore', '  ', 'Connect with us on Linked In: http://bit.ly/EYLinked_Careers', '  ', 'Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/EY_Singapore', '  ', 'Watch us on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/ernstandyoungglobal', '  ', '\xa0']
