desc: ["We help organizations to work smarter and grow faster. Our work is always evolving to respond to industry trends and management focus, and we combine our deep technical skills in response to our clients' changing needs. Over time, what we do remains closely linked with helping our clients improve the way they operate, innovate and grow, reduce costs, manage risks, leverage talent and change the way they do business. Our aim is to support our clients in designing, managing and executing lasting beneficial change.", ' ', ' We pride ourselves on our strong supportive team culture and diverse mix of backgrounds. We also strongly believe in the importance of potential and desire to learn. As such is it important to us that you fit well within our team, have a strong desire to learn and develop your own skills and also support and coach others.', '  ', ' ', ' If you share the same vision we want you on our team! Join us and gain exposure to a wide range of industry clients, be rewarded with a career built on a variety of experiences, and the opportunity for senior leadership development within our firm. We will also provide you the opportunity to develop a global network of contacts across PwC who will support you in your growth as a leader, consultant and process automation professional.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'DESCRIPTION', '  ', 'The role of Technology Consulting\xa0(Intelligent Automation) sits within the Digital and Emerging Technology practice of PwC Consulting. Intelligent Automation is one of our key offerings and this role is responsible for managing our client pursuits and engagements across client value delivery, people development and business operations.', '  ', 'As the Intelligent Automation Associate, you\xa0will also continually collaborate with other Technology consulting functions (such as Data & Analytics, Cybersecurity and Digital Solutions) to foster innovation, efficiency and holistic solutions for our clients. Ideally the\xa0 associate should have the technical capability to develop and test with relevant understanding of the process automation implementation lifecycle which are essential to carry out some or all of the following responsibilities:', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '  ', 'To work with client team and key stakeholders to execute engagement sprints with exceptional status reporting', '  ', 'To identify risks, undertake root cause analysis, build mitigation plan around it and seek support in appropriate forums to ensure delivery and outcome parameters', '  ', 'To work with Intelligent Automation leadership in practice development through:', '  ', 'Development of Intelligent Automation proof of concepts (POC) in advanced stages in terms of Machine Learning, Conversational Intelligence, and Artificial Intelligence etc.', '  ', 'Development of go-to-market strategies, white papers, etc.', '  ', 'Assisting in managing vendor alliances, other PwC teams in Singapore/SEA and other PwC Intelligent Automation entities globally', '  ', 'Evangelizing intelligent automation across the firm and across Southeast Asia (SEA) region', '  ', 'To be successful in this role, you will need to demonstrate:  ', '   ', 'Consulting mindset with systematic thinking', '   ', 'Business Analysis and understanding client needs', '   ', 'Business Acumen across one or more industries/ functions', '   ', 'Clear and impactful presentation skills', '   ', 'Ability to work with unpredictability and loosely defined problems', '   ', 'Ability to interact and collaborate effectively and professionally', '   ', 'Self-motivated with minimal need for executive steer', '   ', 'Passion for using intelligent automation to solve client problems in an agile manner', '   ', 'Ability to propose solutions while collaborating with closely related spectrum of Data and Analytics, Change Management, Enterprise Solutions, Cybersecurity etc.', '   ', 'Passion to work with, learn from and mentor teams with varying skill sets, background, and geographical locations', '  ', '  ', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']
req: [' \t', '3+ years of experience with a consulting or technology firm. ', ' \t', 'Possess\xa0 understanding in the areas of Technology automation / robotics', ' tools (Automation Anywhere, Blue Prism, UiPath, Work Fusion etc.) and understanding of the technical architecture. Certification', ' \t', 'Some experience with broader business process re-engineering efforts and principles (Lean, workflow design, etc.).', ' \t', '\xa0Understanding of Microsoft Power point, Excel and Word skills.', ' \t', 'Self-driven, curious and a fast-learner, and able to take responsibility for personal growth and development', ' \t', 'Able to demonstrate the ability to research and analyse pertinent client, industry, and technical matters', ' \t', 'Possess strong problem-solving skills and able to prioritise and manage multiple tasks', ' \t', 'Able to interact with various levels of internal and external stakeholders both in written and verbal forms', ' \t', 'Passionate about client service', ' ']

desc: ['Kroll’s Business Intelligence and Investigations (“BII”) practice is world-renowned for our trusted experts, global resources, local insight, and actionable results. As the originator of the modern, independent internal investigation, over our 45-year history Kroll has conducted thousands of investigations worldwide. Clients have entrusted us with assisting them to resolve some of their most difficult and business critical challenges.', '  ', 'Our investigative services include financial, internal, and regulatory investigations, asset searches, brand protection, forensic accounting, dispute advisory services, litigation support, business/market entry intelligence, transaction intelligence, proxy contests, intellectual property infringement and product counterfeiting, and regulatory or court-ordered monitorships.', '  ', 'Kroll’s BII practice is staffed with a multidisciplinary team of professionals who include former prosecutors, law enforcement officers and journalists, as well as certified public and forensic accountants, data analytics experts, and certified fraud examiners.', '  ', 'Summary of Position', '  ', 'As Associate Director you will assist in the BII practice by enhancing Kroll’s current data analytics capabilities, providing clarity around prospective clients, resource identification, competitor intelligence and Kroll’s overall abilities to enhance market presence.', '  ', 'You will also be responsible for conducting research and analysis, structuring projects and managing resources and preparing conclusions for clients. This role requires an imaginative and creative thinker with the ability to work to tight deadlines often balancing a significant and varied caseload.']
req: ['Responsibilities:', '  ', ' \t', 'Provide expert, reliable and robust analysis of complex situations and data for clients', ' \t', 'Development and management of projects, throughout the life and the engagement: meeting with client to discuss needs, preparation of commercial and technical proposal, agreement of engagement, development of working plan and budget, allocation of resources, direction of project team members, delivery and quality assurance and project invoicing', ' \t', 'Act as client contact throughout projects and contribute to management of the client relationship', ' \t', 'Exercise good judgment demonstrate innovation and adapt working strategy based on results obtained', ' \t', 'Take ownership of project and deliverables and manage workflow and costs effectively', ' \t', 'Ensure ethical conduct, quality of services, use of best practices and compliance with policy and SOPs in each project', ' \t', 'Identify project risks and effectively manage them', ' \t', 'Contribute to the professional development and evaluation of junior project team members', ' \t', 'Demonstrate excellent judgment, be commercially-focused and be driven by professional excellence and a commitment to the Kroll brand.', ' ', '  ', 'Requirements:', '  ', ' \t', 'Strong academic background, preferably in the fields of Finance, Journalism, International Relations, International Business and Political Science, Law or Security Studies', ' \t', '4-6 years of relevant work experience in project managing investigative/research cases and/or investment advisory', ' \t', 'Prior experience in Risk Assessment and/or Forensic Accounting', ' \t', 'Proven ability grasp client needs and to analyze large data sets in order to deliver readily understandable executive reports and dashboards', ' \t', 'Strong team, project and client management experience, along with strong interpersonal skills', ' \t', 'Proficient in a broad variety of investigative methods', ' \t', 'Proficient in MS Office. Ideally also proficient in investigative analysis tools', ' ']

desc: ['About Standard Chartered\xa0', ' We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East. \xa0', '  ', "To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. \xa0It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.\xa0", '  ', "We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.", '  ', 'The Role Responsibilities & Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'The successful candidate will be the part of a start-up team building an innovative platform leveraging data, analytics to drive automated decision-making, smart automation across the full lifecycle of the business. This is a rare opportunity for a self-driven, start-up minded, strong and passionate developer to participate and contribute to a paradigm shift. We want People driven by the mission!', ' \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Build services with a framework and generic pattern mindset for scale across multiple dimensions – optimized compute/performance, functional, visualization, quality control', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Develop scalable real-time low-latency processing solutions in an agile delivery method', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Maintain data & analytics for systematic decision-making, processing / controls', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Develop and maintain automated testing', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Do whatever it takes to maintain stability, availability and performance', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Partner with stakeholders to capture requirements and deliver solutions – deep understanding of the problem and context along with ownership are key to be successful in this role']
req: ['The successful candidate is expected to be an experienced developer in building critical low-latency/data-analytics driven solutions in investment banking/hedge funds/technology companies (low-latency trading systems or AdTech sector). This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0You’ve built something exceptional you can showcase – demos/github/detailed explanation etc..', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Ability to think “Product/platform” with a strong alignment with expected business outcomes/journeys', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Advanced knowledge of application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Understanding and demonstrable experience of modern architecture/designs – micro-services/API-first development/high-throughput/event-driven/agent-based system, compositional frameworks', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Ability to scope minimum viable functionalities for quick and iterative/incremental deliveries', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proficiency in one or more general purpose programming languages, C# or Java', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0In-depth core Java or C# knowledge experience', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proven experience in low latency, real-time, scalable systems, systematic trading, targeting / recommender systems, garbage collector, queuing, scheduling, complex events processing (CEP)', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0C++ for specific routines is a plus', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Technical knowledge in a no-SQL / doc / columnar DB such as mongoDB, kdb, shell scripts in Linux/Unix environment and or windows-based environments', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong knowledge and some practical experience in modern dev-ops - CI/CD, containerization, orchestration', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong knowledge and experience in FIX, Market Data, Analytics and OMS is a plus', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Experienced in Agile/Scrum-Kanban and related tools – JIRA, Confluence', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Understanding of software development lifecycle', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Knowledge of equities/bonds electronic markets is a strong plus', '  ', 'Other desirable skills/knowledge:', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Some knowledge of Python, basic data-analysis / machine learning concepts', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0some very basic knowledge of UI concepts – javascript/html5/openfin/electronjs', ' \xa0', ' Soft skills:', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Fluent in English (speaking and writing)', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Outstanding problem-solving skills.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proactive, self-starter, autonomous Self-motivated, multi-tasking, with strong analytical and problem-solving skills, solution oriented with proven results.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Good team spirit', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Extreme curiousness', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0This is a very demanding role which requires a start-up/entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to work fast, efficiently, under pressure on multiple deliveries', '  ', 'How to Apply', '  ', 'Please visit - ', 'https://scb.taleo.net/careersection/ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=1900007587&lang=en', ' \xa0to apply now and take the next step in fulfilling your potential.', '  ', 'You can search and view current opportunities across our global organisation and apply immediately by visiting www.standardchartered.com.', '  ', 'To help speed up your application, please note the following:', '  ', ' \t', 'You will need to log in (or register if you are visiting our careers site for the first time) before you can apply for a specific role', ' \t', 'Some roles may require you to undertake an online talent assessment in addition to completing the application form (to facilitate this process it is preferable that you provide us with an email address as part of your contact information)', ' \t', 'We will ask you about your education, career history and skills and experience, it may be helpful to have this information at hand when completing your application', ' ', '  ', 'It usually takes 15 - 20 minutes to complete the application form; you can save your application at any time and return to complete it at your convenience.', '  ', 'Diversity & Inclusion', '  ', 'Standard Chartered is committed to diversity and inclusion. We believe that a work environment which embraces diversity will enable us to get the best out of the broadest spectrum of people to sustain strong business performance and competitive advantage. By building an inclusive culture, each employee can develop a sense of belonging, and have the opportunity to maximise their personal potential.']

desc: ["ICIS is a division of Reed Business Information, part of RELX Group.\xa0Part of the $10bn FTSE100 RELX Group, Reed Business Information (www.reedbusiness.com/uk) is a globally renowned data analytics and information company. We are\xa0the world's largest\xa0petrochemical\xa0market information provider\xa0and have fast-growing energy and fertilizer divisions. With a global staff of more than 800, ICIS has employees based around the world.", '  ', 'Our aim is to give companies in global commodities markets (like Shell, Unilever & Exxon Mobile) a competitive advantage by delivering valuable information and analytics tools which enable our customers to identify and react to opportunities in markets which are constantly evolving.\xa0', '  ', 'To be able to support our customers the best way we can, we have Client Success people close to our customers with teams in Houston, London, New York and Singapore.', '  ', 'For our Client Success team in Singapore we are looking for a Client Success Executive who is comfortable in taking the initiative and will wow our customers.', '  ', 'Your Key Responsibilities', '  ', 'In your role as Client Success Executive you pro-actively help our customers getting the full value out of the solutions we offer them. You will serve as the customer’s primary point of contact and have flexibility to travel and visit customers to build on existing good relationships. The successful candidate will be spending 50% of the time in customer engagement and 50% of the time cross and up selling.', '  ', 'Other key responsibilities include:', '  ', '  ', 'On-boarding of new customers.', '  ', 'Retain and grow the business by increasing user engagement with our solutions.', '  ', 'Make use of client usage data to identify risks and minimize those risks.', '  ', 'Gather and report customer feedback to the wider organization.', '  ', 'Promote, provide and encourage training.', '  ', 'Providing support to inbound client inquiries via telephone, email and live chat.', '  ', 'Identifying root causes of issues and solve them.', '  ', 'Collaborating with and supporting our sales account managers to ensure we maintain our high retention rates.', ' ']
req: ['Experience', '  ', 'You have the ability to think on your feet. You will not always know the right answer, but you’re the kind of person who is always up for the challenge. You’ll rely on your resources and quickly research a response.', '  ', 'To be successful in this role, you cannot do without a deep understanding of client businesses and their needs. We will help you in gaining this expertise with extensive training but you need to be an eager learner.', '  ', 'Other skills that are required:', '  ', '  ', 'Excellent communication skills with a positive attitude and a passion for delivering exceptional customer service.', '  ', 'Excellent problem solving skills and ability to exercise initiative.', '  ', 'Self-motivated, well organized and able to prioritise.', '  ', 'Effective written and verbal communication skills.', '  ', 'Ability to build relationships internally across different levels of the organisation and externally.', '  ', 'Awareness of working with various Web Browsers, good knowledge of MS Office.', '  ', 'Team player\xa0', '  ', 'Fluency in English. This role will be servicing our China and Taiwan market, hence, Chinese speaker at a professional working capacity will be needed for this role.\xa0', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Reed Business Information Benefits Package:', '  ', 'Working for Reed Business Information means working for\xa0a technology driven organisation. We are listed amongst the world’s top-100 ‘online superpowers’.', '  ', 'We offer new hires a world-class training program and the opportunity to work in an energetic, growing and fast-paced environment.']

desc: ['We are seeking an energetic and passionate\xa0', 'Project Manager (Onboarding and Operations)', '\xa0who has experience with large scale onboarding of digital services, to join our Citizen Products team who eat, talk, and dream about delivering digital services and products that citizens want.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Be part of the team that collaborates with Government agencies and industries to understand citizens’ current pain points and their expectations so as to deliver personalized services that are anticipatory, relevant and easy to use.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'As a\xa0', 'Project Manager (Onboarding and Operations)', '\xa0with human touch from acquired soft skills honed over the years, you will be expected to be a great listener and communicator who can interact well with government agencies, key stakeholders and solution partners.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'What to Expect:', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Effective in generating interest, explaining value proposition and onboarding of agencies to our suite of products that are used across the government.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Proactively support our onboarded agencies, through timely identification of arising issues and diligently follow through the resolutions to demonstrate high level of professionalism.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Well positioned to operate the various citizen facing digital service products ranging from virtual assistant bot (Ask Jamie), web analytics (wogaa.sg) to citizen engagement platform (ideas.gov.sg) and more.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Apply data analytics to obtain insights on customers’ behaviours in order to drive relevancy of our products’ anticipatory engine so as to deliver personalized services.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Use data to identify gaps and services of our products, continuously seeking to enhance our products’ features that are well accepted by the citizens.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Excellent project management skills and familiar with various service delivery models from hybrid waterfall to agile and from in-source, co-source to out-source.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'How to Succeed:', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Disciplines in Computing / Computer / Electronics Engineering or Information Technology', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Ability to see our products from the eyes of the citizens and is passionate about serving them through our technological offering of meaningful and relevant digital services.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Experience in managing application systems through their full life cycle, exhibit a learning mind set and at ease with continuous improvement as a way of life.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Minimum 10 years of experience with good blend of project management and technical roles are preferred. Less senior candidates with exceptional drive are welcome too.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Good understanding of Government processes', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Experience with software design, application development, user acceptance test including network and system infrastructure.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Good presentation skills', ' ', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['Imagine companies only needing to interact with a single government product for all their engagements. desc: ['MHA S&T Associate Programme', ' ', 'The Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) aspires to be a world-class organisation in delivering safety and security for our people. In pursuing our mission to make Singapore our Safe and Secure Best Home, we remain always constant and true to our core values of Honour and Unity.', ' ', 'The MHA Science &Technology (S&T) Associate Programme is a programme designed for STEM graduates with less than 3 years of work experience who are keen to improve Singapore’s Safety & Security.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'What we offer:', ' ', 'As an S&T Associate, you will specialise in domains critical to safeguarding national security such as : (a)Forensics, (b) Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear and Explosives (CBRNE), (c)Biometrics & Profiling, (d)Sense-making & Surveillance, (e)Cybersecurity, (f)Data Analytics & Artificial Intelligence and (f) Robotics and Automation. Associates will take on challenging projects in these domains under the guidance of Senior Domain Practitioners and lead one greenfield project to build up your portfolio.\xa0 As you work with our Home Team Departments (e.g. SPF, SCDF, SPS, CNB, ICA, HTA), you will apply Science & Technology expertise to address safety and security challenges for Singapore.\xa0 You will also benefit from professional development opportunities including training and overseas learning trips. In addition, each S&T Associate will be personally mentored by a Senior Management Mentor.', ' ', 'To better understand the types of Science & Technology work undertaken by the Home Team, please click here.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'We are looking for:', ' ', ' ', 'Applicants with STEM disciplines/background preferred', ' ', 'Applicants who have completed internships, projects or personal achievements which reflect a passion for Science & Technology Work', ' ', 'Applicants who possess skills relevant to the S&T Domains', ' ', 'Applicants who are technologically savvy and collaborative', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Join us:', 'The application for the MHA S&T Associate Programme is open all year round.', ' ', 'When submitting your CV and other relevant documents for the application, please also upload a ', 'separate MS word file', ' indicating:', ' ', ' ', 'Your top 3 preferences for specialisation out of these 11 domains in rank order', ': (a)Forensics, (b)Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear and Explosives (CBRNE), (c)Biometrics & Profiling, (d)Sense-making & Surveillance, (e)Cybersecurity, (f)Data Analytics & Artificial Intelligence, (g) Robotics & Automation, (h) Command, Control, Communications, Computers & Intelligence (C4i), (i)Platforms, vehicles and weapons, (j) Protective Security and (k)Human Factors.', ' ', 'A short write-up of your passion for Science and/or Technology with specific examples of internships, projects, hackathons, other personal hobbies and tech skill-sets you possess.', ' ', ' ', '\xa0']
skills: ['Analysis', 'CISSP', 'Computer Forensics', 'Computer Security', 'Disaster Recovery', 'Firewalls', 'IDS', 'Information Security', 'Information Security Management', 'Intrusion Detection', 'IPS', 'Linux', 'Network Security', 'Penetration Testing', 'Python', 'Risk Management', 'Security', 'Security Architecture Design', 'Security Audits', 'Vulnerability Assessment']

desc: ['About Standard Chartered\xa0', ' We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East. \xa0', " To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. \xa0It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.\xa0", " We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.", '  ', 'The Role Responsibilities', '  ', '\xa0- This position will be responsible for the successful execution of deploying the next generation digital platform and analyzes the adoption and usage of the platform', ' \xa0- Be a Digital Channel platform expertise for product deployment:', ' \xa0- Create management dashboards for monitoring the usage of channel product and services and get it implemented with the technology team', ' \xa0- Results monitoring and analysis, with production of monthly/quarterly management data to highlight deployment progress and product usage', ' \xa0- Provide insights on product usage and recommend improvements on digital platform usage', ' \xa0- Analyze client usage metrics and provide recommendations for platform performance improvement', ' \xa0- Enhancement of the migration processes with more deep data analytics', ' \xa0- Work with Technology team to facilitate migration', ' \xa0- Client selection and usage analysis for migration. Good understanding of the current classic application and assess the client selection before the list is shared with the regional teams', ' \xa0- Review and sign off use case scenarios and test cases for migration testing', ' \xa0- Ensure that existing customer usage is analyzed, setup and transaction information validated, and signed off prior to go-live', ' \xa0- Perform user acceptance testing as needed', ' \xa0- Work with Country Digital Platform management teams to gather product customizations to local country flavors and to facilitate country adoption and usage', ' \xa0- Collect and analyze data to assist in determining product direction and define changes that will bring in more clients.', ' \xa0- Extend support to the channel management and development teams on a need basis', ' \xa0- Work with the client servicing / support teams to analyse and understand the client query patterns and provide a roadmap of improvements on application', ' \xa0- Assist (with data analysis) to plan, manage, and execute business migration activities (in addition)']
req: ['Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', '\xa0- Minimum 8 years of banking experience in managing digital channels and an expert in transaction banking', ' \xa0- Relevant channel management experience in Transaction Banking space with proficiency in Cash Management and Trade Finance domains', ' \xa0- Analytical methodologies and comfortable to work with large scale data and produce statistical analyses', ' \xa0- Strong product and customer service focus with the ability to communicate with technical management, sales, and client support teams.', ' \xa0- Experience with software development methodologies such as Agile and experience working with Scrum teams', ' \xa0- Prior experience of executing customer migration between digital platforms is highly desirable.', ' \xa0- Strong investigative ability and curiosity to comprehensively explain the trends of migration plan vs progress, client usage patterns etc. Good problem solving and \xa0- strong analytical skills. Comfortable to use analytical tools such as Google Analytics, Power BI, Tableau and proficient in Excel and Power point', ' \xa0- Possess excellent verbal and written communication skills, both technical and functional', ' \xa0- Education- Computer Science and/or Engineering with finance background, MBA, or commercially focused degree.', '  ', 'How to Apply', ' Please visit - ', 'https://scb.taleo.net/careersection/ex/jobdetail.ftl?job=1900009692&lang=en', ' \xa0to apply now and take the next step in fulfilling your potential.', ' You can search and view current opportunities across our global organisation and apply immediately by visiting www.standardchartered.com.\xa0', ' To help speed up your application, please note the following:', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0You will need to log in (or register if you are visiting our careers site for the first time) before you can apply for a specific role', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Some roles may require you to undertake an online talent assessment in addition to completing the application form (to facilitate this process it is preferable that you provide us with an email address as part of your contact information)', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0We will ask you about your education, career history and skills and experience, it may be helpful to have this information at hand when completing your application', ' It usually takes 15 - 20 minutes to complete the application form; you can save your application at any time and return to complete it at your convenience.', ' Diversity & Inclusion\xa0', ' Standard Chartered is committed to diversity and inclusion. We believe that a work environment which embraces diversity will enable us to get the best out of the broadest spectrum of people to sustain strong business performance and competitive advantage. By building an inclusive culture, each employee can develop a sense of belonging, and have the opportunity to maximise their personal potential.']

desc: ['Agilent inspires and supports discoveries that advance the quality of life. We provide life science, diagnostic and applied market laboratories worldwide with instruments, services, consumables, applications and expertise. Agilent enables customers to gain the answers and insights they seek ---- so they can do what they do best: improve the world around us. Information about Agilent is available at www.agilent.com.', '  ', 'This Software/Computer engineer is part of Factory Automation/Solution Engineering team, particularly focusing on supply chain tool, data analytics and dashboard development and deployment. Factory Automation Engineering team works on several hardware and software automation projects along with production/supply chain efficiency projects. Strong project management skill, interpersonal/communication skill, supply chain experience/knowledge and programming skills in C-Family (C, C++, Java, C#), Python, HTML, Visual Basic; are essential.', '  ', 'Projects include:', '  ', '  ', 'Software automation development for supply chain and planning efficiency improvements.', '  ', 'Supply chain and other Business Metrics data mining automation.', '  ', 'Development of software or tool or GUI for supply chain and business request.', '  ', 'Create supply chain automation or software tool to enable supply chain data analysis for improvement opportunities.', '  ', 'Lead and manage data solutions projects with cross functional team.', '  ', 'Analyse complex problems, interpret operational needs, and develop creative & innovative solutions involving data model design/ reporting assembly/ application structure.', '  ', 'Collaborate with validation engineer on computerized system validation for ISO9001 and ISO13485 compliance.', ' ']
req: ['Qualifications: ', '  ', '  ', 'The job candidate must have a Bachelors or Masters Degree in Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or Electrical Engineering with minimum of 8+ years relevant experience in software development and supply chain.', '  ', 'Candidates with other Engineering qualification with proven track records in software/computer engineering skills in supply chain field are encouraged to apply.', ' ', '  ', 'Experience in the following areas are mandatory: ', '  ', '  ', 'Supply chain knowledge, understanding and experience.', '  ', 'Programming skill/languages: C-Family (C#, C++, Java), HTML, Visual Basic, Python.', '  ', 'Ability to communicate needs, plans and achievements at all levels of a corporate organization.', '  ', 'Demonstrated ability to set priorities and meet commitments.', '  ', 'Ability to simultaneously participate in multiple issues as they arise in a manufacturing environment.', '  ', 'Ability to work in a hands-on environment.', '  ', 'Ability to take on new challenges and learn from the experience of co-workers.', '  ', 'Experience scheduling and completing tasks on schedule.', '  ', 'Project coordination and management skills.', '  ', 'Proven advanced verbal and written communication skills including data visualization skills.', '  ', 'Strong interpersonal skills -- crisp and passionate communicator.', '  ', 'Self-motivated, independent and able to multi task.', ' ', '  ', 'Agilent is an equal opportunity employer.']

desc: ['About the Role:', '  ', 'Reporting to Pricing Manager, you will be responsible for\xa0to perform in depth pricing and data analysis under\xa0your portfolio to support Pricing Manager and other BC functions on decision making.\xa0Your responsibilities include organizing and conducting weekly pricing meetings with the sales and demand teams to collect pricing information, develop, maintain and implement new pricing tools as required, and prepare market and pricing performance reports (weekly, monthly and quarterly) for performance monitoring purposes. The challenges of this role includes internal co-ordination among internal functions to collate accurate information for timely and accurate decision making on pricing, understanding market dynamics of different regions and detailed data analysis for reporting.', '  ', 'Key Accountabilities:', '  ', '   ', 'Develop and run price / data analytics which can form basis for discussions in performance review forums', '   ', 'Generate timely price monitoring report to monitor compliance of pricing policy, seek feedback and report on deviations', '   ', 'Request / collect and develop pricing data and analysis as well as prepare presentation materials for various internal and cross functional meetings', '   ', 'Provide supporting data for price recommendations', '   ', 'Support Pricing Manager on operational pricing decisions', '   ', 'Run pricing model / tool and address operational queries from sales', '   ', 'Plan and organize activities pertaining to regular weekly, monthly and quarterly meetings', '   ', 'Regular follow-up and monitoring to ensure implementation of required actions which are generated from weekly, monthly or quarterly meetings', '  ']
req: ['About You:', '  ', '   ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Economics/Engineering/Management', '   ', 'Minimum 5 years relevant working experience in pricing and analysis with a track record of successfully performing excel spreadsheet analysis', '   ', 'Basic understanding of PO products', '   ', 'Ability to understand profit drivers in business and operation', '   ', 'Analytical', '   ', 'Excellent knowledge in MS Office', '   ', 'Planning and organizing', '   ', 'Financial literacy', '   ', 'Good communication and interpersonal skills', '   ', 'Cultural sensitivity to regions specific local practices', '  ']

desc: ['Company overview:', '  ', 'Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers.', '  ', 'The area: Sales Operations', '  ', "The Go-to-Market Operations (GtM) team ensures Google's complex and ever-evolving Ads business runs smoothly. We are instrumental in setting go-to-market strategy, and ensuring flawless execution and operations against the strategy. We have teams embedded in each of the major Ads business areas as well as global teams that work across the business areas. Team members are analytical and strategic, with a pragmatic sense of how to get things done.", '  ', 'The role: Sales Strategy and Operations Manager - Singapore', '  ', 'The Business Strategy & Operations organization provides business critical insights using analytics, ensures cross functional alignment of goals and execution, and helps teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward. We stay focused on aligning the highest-level company priorities with strong day-to-day operations, and help evolve early stage ideas into future-growth initiatives.', '  ', 'Additional Role Description:', '  ', 'As a Sales Strategy and Operations Manager for Google’s Asia Pacific business, you will be responsible for leading, supporting and project managing a diverse range of strategy projects and initiatives that are critical to the future growth of Google’s business in Asia Pacific. In this role, you will engage and coordinate closely with a large range of Google’s global, regional and local teams.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '- Drive strategic initiatives with data analytics and insights.', '  ', '- Develop and shape differentiated growth strategies and efficiency initiatives for Google in APAC countries collaborating cross-functionally across the various stakeholders and assets.', '  ', '- Provide operational and strategic management updates and support the operations of the regional APAC business and management agenda.', '  ', '- Manage the strategy development and communication process with senior executives across all levels.', '  ', '- Drive strategy implementation initiatives and manage regional and global programs across APAC into measurable growth or share impact.']
req: ['Minimum qualifications:', '  ', '- MBA degree or equivalent practical experience', '  ', '- 5 years of experience in a strategy consulting company or equivalent', '  ', 'Preferred qualifications:', '  ', '- Experience in Internet, Media, Technology industries.', '  ', '- Experience in engaging across Asian markets and cultures.', '  ', '- Experience in operational topics and strategy implementation with hands-on engagement style.', '  ', '- Demonstrated experience and success in leading and developing teams with a strong focus on performance, coaching, mentoring and collaboration.', '  ', '- Convincing executive presence and demonstrated influencing skills.', '  ', '- Ability to speak and write in English fluently and idiomatically.']
skills: ['Business Development', 'Business Strategy', 'CRM', 'Customer Service', 'Event Management', 'Leadership', 'Management', 'Marketing', 'Marketing Strategy', 'Microsoft Office', 'Negotiation', 'New Business Development', 'Program Management', 'Project Management', 'Sales', 'Social Media', 'Strategic Planning', 'Strategy', 'Team Leadership', 'Training']

job_cat: ['Public / Civil Service, Real Estate / Property Management']
desc: ['Job Purpose', ' ', "Manage JTC's Land Stock and ensure that the land in the Corporate Land Bank (CLB) is put to optimal use.", ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Key Responsibilities', ' ', '(i) Land Use Policy Development', ' ', 'Develop policies to support industrial restructuring or intensify land use that achieve land productivity, supported with detailed research and data analytics, ensuring the proposals are aligned to the long term land resource needs.', ' ', '(ii) Land Resource Planning and Management', ' ', 'Evaluates proposed reservations of CLB land from rest of JTC Divisions considering the requirements of different industries and cluster needs and propose alternative suitable parcel when necessary to ensure the proposed land use is well-optimised.', ' ', 'Identifies land parcels that best fit the immediate/short term needs of the clusters and make it available at the right time. This includes ensuring the vacant land in the CLB is put to good use to reduce holding costs, advising on the site constraints, timing of the purchase taking into consideration the financials involved and expediting the alienation process to meet the customers’ timeline and business needs.', ' ', 'Track the land recycling plan to support the redevelopment of land to optimise its use. This includes conducting regular island-wide land expiry reviews and identifying sites for redevelopment or buyback, as well as replacement sites for affected lessees if necessary, participating in the development of the masterplans for the estates.', ' ', 'Manage the land planning issues for the estate, working closely with both internal and external stakeholders and consultants to facilitate rezoning proposals, development/redevelopment projects.', ' ', 'Work closely with other groups in JTC e.g. engineering and project management colleagues to ensure land is prepared and made available in timely manner to meet industries’ needs; cluster officers, architects and planners to create innovative products and ideas for optimal land use and sustainable development.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Requirements', ' ', 'Relevant qualification in ', 'real estate/economics, planning, geospatial analytics.', ' ', 'Broad knowledge of industry trends.', ' ', 'Good analytical and interpersonal skills.', ' ', 'Excellent written and presentation skills required.', ' ', 'Able to work independently but also a good team player.']

desc: ['GroupM, the world’s largest media investment company and are a part of WPP. In fact, we are responsible for one in every three ads you see globally. We are currently looking for a Strategy Director to join us. In this role, you will provide strategic leadership to our international clients, resulting in tangible business outcomes.', '  ', 'We are looking for a passionate, self-motivated individual with\xa0to support large global and multi-national clients, such as Lóreal, Jetstar, Chevron, Tiffany, Chanel, Mondelez and more.', '  ', 'This will include projects such as:\xa0creating global/regional communication frameworks for local markets to adapt, uncovering consumer insights through data, analytics and agency tools, coming up with innovative solutions and ideas, working without Wavemaker content teams, developing award-winning communication plans, forming agency perspective on changes in consumer and media behaviors.\xa0', '  ', 'As we continue to roll-out our new operating model (Rapid Growth Planning) for Global, Regional and key local clients it is critical that this individual champions the new model, helps to ensure the full team embraces the approach and ensures this is front and center in all the work. This will include holding training sessions for the rest of the business.', '  ', 'Support and lead strategy for Global, Regional and key local pitches', '  ', 'At GroupM APAC, our people are our strength, which is why fostering a culture of diversity and inclusion is important to us.', '  ', 'Reporting of the role', '  ', 'This role reports to: This role reports to Managing Director, Global Client Solutions Singapore.\xa0 This role also has a dotted line to the Client Solutions Head of Strategy based in London.', ' ', ' ', 'Job Details:', '  ', 'You will work collaboratively with our client leaders and specialists to develop seamlessly integrated outputs for our clients. More specifically, you will be responsible for:', '  ', ' \t', 'Driving our integrated planning responses for key clients, founded in great consumer insight and delivering transformational ideas', ' \t', 'Developing effective working relationships with specialist leaders across Digital, Analytics, Content and Performance', ' \t', 'Leading the strategic response, often as a part of a multi-agency team, including working effectively with planners from other agencies & disciplines', ' \t', 'Championing Rapid Growth Planning, operating system and ensuring our Purchase Journey obsession is reflected in the work we produce', ' \t', 'Leading our strategic response for key new business pitches', ' \t', 'Coming up with innovative and creative ideas in conjunction with our Wavemaker Content team', ' \t', 'Coaching planners & account teams to deliver great integrated planning responses and innovative and creative ideas', ' \t', 'Driving digital adoption, in collaboration with the Director of Digital & Platforms, such that we recommend the right digital acceleration strategies to our clients', ' \t', 'Liaising with the global Client Solutions community and particularly other strategists to share best practice and cross fertilize craft skills and work', ' \t', 'With client leads, contributing to client growth plans, and as a part of the management team driving client growth', ' \t', 'Driving quality of agency output outside of day to day planning responses through award entries and client-specific thought leadership', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Must have strong Media Agency experience', ' \t', 'Excellent understanding of integrated communications processes', ' \t', 'Strong digital knowledge or digital background', ' \t', 'Demonstrate exceptional strategic & critical thinking and effective problem-solving skills', ' \t', 'Consistently exhibit natural curiosity and dynamism', ' \t', 'Innate ability to respectfully challenge the status quo', ' \t', 'Proven record of building client relationships', ' \t', 'Sound financial acumen including budget control and account profitability', ' \t', 'Possess and utilize advanced level presentation, verbal and written skills', ' \t', 'Display strong communication, coaching and people skills', ' \t', 'Actively and openly participate in team, agency, and industry initiatives', ' ']

job_title: ['Operations, Securities Division Operations, Equities Trading Services, Analyst']
desc: ['OPERATIONS', '  ', "Operations is a dynamic, multi-faceted division that partners with all parts of the firm to provide banking, securities, and asset management services to clients around the world. In addition, Operations provides essential risk management and controls to preserve and enhance the firm's assets and its reputation. For every new product launched and every trade executed, it is Operations that develops and manages the processes and controls that enable business flow.", '  ', 'YOUR IMPACT\xa0', '  ', 'Are you looking to join a dynamic and fast paced team, applying your analytical and problem solving skills for maximum impact,\xa0whilst deepening your knowledge of Equity Derivatives? Equity Trading Services is seeking a professional who is looking to partner\xa0with our business and other internal and external stakeholders to provide market leading business enablement and risk and control\xa0services.\xa0', '  ', 'OUR IMPACT\xa0', '  ', 'Our team of critical thinkers partners with groups in all areas of the firm to perform financial analytics, reporting, data analytics and\xa0engineering. Our division also provides critical operations design and handles capital markets operations to ensure business flows\xa0smoothly across our global offices. From day one, team members play a vital role in upholding the three Operations principles of\xa0client focus, process innovation, and risk management.\xa0', '  ', 'Equity Trading Services provides front to back post-execution support to all equity based derivative activity in Asia. The Middle\xa0Office team has critical focus on front office day to day risk and trading surveillance, new issuances, client service, corporate\xa0actions processing and strategic firm and business infrastructure projects.\xa0', ' ', ' Middle Office acts as first point of contact for the various Equities Trading desks, assisting in the execution of both new\xa0client and hedging activity. Clients execute trades across a range of product wrappers e.g OTC, Securitised , Synthetic and it is\xa0Middle Office’s responsibility to ensure positions are booked and maintained correctly in our risk systems. There is a strong\xa0emphasis on knowledge and expertise which requires that all team members are fully versed in products and systems used as well\xa0as the processes and procedures that must be followed when performing day to day tasks.\xa0', ' ', ' HOW YOU WILL FULFILL YOUR POTENTIAL\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Prepare to gain a comprehensive understanding of the operational process lifecycle by interacting with internal and external\xa0stakeholders including clients, trading desks, brokers, Sales, Structuring and other federation teams in order to work toward the\xa0shared goal of business enablement and risk mitigation\xa0', '   ', 'Partner with a team of product experts to review all operational aspects of the trade flow while gaining strong technical knowledge,\xa0risk control and commercial awareness\xa0', '   ', 'Use your inquisitive mind set to identify efficiency opportunities with respect to process flow methodology as well as enhance', '   ', 'scalability\xa0', '   ', 'Leverage your quantitative skills to decompose complex regulatory and operational process requirement, and propose creative, robust solutions\xa0', '   ', 'Oversight & ownership of the full front to back operational flow ensuring that seamless execution of trades, new business and flow\xa0enhancements\xa0', '  ']
req: ['SKILLS & EXPERIENCE WE’RE LOOKING FOR\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Ability to demonstrate a sound of understanding of a range of Equity Derivative products as well as Cash Securities. Strong Team-\xa0working skills – for working with both internal departments\xa0and globally\xa0', '   ', 'Track record in the development of client relationships and key stakeholders, both internally and externally\xa0', '   ', 'Ability to gain a strong understanding of the business and work with Prime Brokerage, Marketing, Structuring, Trading and Sales\xa0desks\xa0', '   ', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills\xa0', '   ', 'Ability to thrive under pressure\xa0', '   ', 'Strong leadership skills essential – this role will require a self-starter who can manage competing deadlines and can prioritize\xa0appropriately', '  ', '  ', '© The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., 2019. All rights reserved,\xa0Goldman Sachs is an equal employment/affirmative action employer Female/Minority/Disability/Vet.']

job_title: ['Operations, Reg & Control Ops, Regulatory Ops - Derivatives Regulatory Reporting - Associate (51814)']
desc: ['YOUR IMPACT', '  ', 'We are looking for a professional individual who wants to apply their financial market knowledge and further develop their understanding of a growing sector of the financial markets at the heart of regulatory reform.\xa0 With the continued high rate of change in the regulatory reporting space, Regulatory Operations professionals have the platform to significantly impact the Operations landscape and the wider business.', '  ', 'OUR IMPACT', '  ', 'OPERATIONS', '  ', 'Our team of critical thinkers partners with groups in all areas of the firm to perform financial analytics and reporting and data analytics and engineering. Our division also provides critical operations design and handles capital markets operations to ensure business flows smoothly across our global offices. From day one, team members play a vital role in upholding the three Operations principles of client focus, process innovation, and risk management.', '  ', 'REGULATORY OPERATIONS', '  ', 'The Derivative Regulatory Operations group sits within Regulatory Operations and is responsible for ensuring Goldman Sachs is compliant to its non-financial reporting obligations and acts as the single point of contact for all regulatory related client engagements across Operations.', '  ', 'The role provides an excellent opportunity to work in a high-profile team and to contribute to Goldman Sachs and its clients demonstrating excellent leadership, commercial effectiveness and outstanding client service.\xa0 It is a fantastic opportunity for someone who is motivated, ambitious and excited about contributing to our business as part of a team who are responsible for driving change within a demanding and complex environment.', '  ', 'HOW YOU WILL FULFILL YOUR POTENTIAL', '  ', '   ', 'Partner with many other areas of the firm including the Front Office, Middle Office, Technology, Legal, Compliance, as well as interaction with external clients and regulators to support various reporting functions.', '   ', 'Respond to internal or external queries regarding regulatory obligations', '   ', 'Perform and lead analysis on remediation and corrective actions working closely with production team, remediation BAs and technology teams.', '   ', 'Actively participate in the development in strategic initiatives across the reporting architecture for Goldman Sachs and its clients.', '   ', 'Perform and lead analysis on new/change of rules which will have impact to reporting function and partner with external industry participants & internal stakeholders to implement the reporting infrastructure', '   ', 'Partner with business and other internal team for new business initiative and work together to ensure firm will be in compliant for regulatory requirement', '   ', 'Interact with regulator thru inspection, new/change of rules, and issue escalation', '   ', 'Pro-actively collaborate with the global organization', '   ', 'Support team involvement in other GS activities outside of daily work', '  ']
req: ['SKILLS & EXPERIENCE WE’RE LOOKING FOR', '  ', 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS', '  ', '   ', 'Strong analytical skills with an ability to understand complex workflows', '   ', 'Strong attention to detail', '   ', 'Flexible, proactive and self-starting individual with high levels of ownership', '   ', 'Proven ability to organize and prioritize own workload and drive results', '   ', 'Strong interpersonal skills together with the ability to influence others and make decisions', '   ', 'Able to work effectively within a global team', '   ', 'Experience in an Operations Control Environment', '  ', '  ', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', '  ', 'Language: Business level English and\xa0Japanese as the role involves interaction with Japanese speaking colleagues and clients\xa0but not mandatory', '  ', '   ', 'Experience with OTC Derivative Transaction Reporting (i.e. CFTC, EMIR, CSA, MAS, ASIC, HKMA, JFSA etc)', '  ', '  ', 'or', '  ', '   ', 'Working knowledge of OTC derivative financial products including trade lifecycle', '  ', '  ', '© The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., 2019. All rights reserved\xa0Goldman Sachs is an equal employment/affirmative action employer Female/Minority/Disability/Vet.']

job_title: ['Operations, Regulatory Operations - Derivatives Regulatory Reporting - Executive Director  (51290)']
desc: ['YOUR IMPACT', '  ', 'We are looking for a professional individual who wants to apply their financial market knowledge and further develop their understanding of a growing sector of the financial markets at the heart of regulatory reform.\xa0 With the continued high rate of change in the regulatory reporting space, Regulatory Operations professionals have the platform to significantly impact the Operations landscape and the wider business.', '  ', 'OUR IMPACT', '  ', 'OPERATIONS', '  ', 'Our team of critical thinkers partners with groups in all areas of the firm to perform financial analytics and reporting and data analytics and engineering. Our division also provides critical operations design and handles capital markets operations to ensure business flows smoothly across our global offices. From day one, team members play a vital role in upholding the three Operations principles of client focus, process innovation, and risk management.', '  ', 'REGULATORY OPERATIONS', '  ', 'The Derivative Regulatory Operations group sits within Regulatory Operations and is responsible for ensuring Goldman Sachs is compliant to its non-financial reporting obligations and acts as the single point of contact for all regulatory related client engagements across Operations.', '  ', 'The role provides an excellent opportunity to work in a high-profile team and to contribute to Goldman Sachs and its clients demonstrating excellent leadership, commercial effectiveness and outstanding client service.\xa0 It is a fantastic opportunity for someone who is motivated, ambitious and excited about contributing to our business as part of a team who are responsible for driving change within a demanding and complex environment.', '  ', 'HOW YOU WILL FULFILL YOUR POTENTIAL', '  ', '  ', 'Partner with many other areas of the firm including the Front Office, Middle Office, Technology, Legal, Compliance, as well as interaction with external clients and regulators to support various reporting functions.', '  ', 'Respond to internal or external queries regarding regulatory obligations', '  ', 'Perform and lead analysis on remediation and corrective actions working closely with production team, remediation BAs and technology teams.', '  ', 'Actively participate in the development in strategic initiatives across the reporting architecture for Goldman Sachs and its clients.', '  ', 'Perform and lead analysis on new/change of rules which will have impact to reporting function and partner with external industry participants & internal stakeholders to implement the reporting infrastructure', '  ', 'Partner with business and other internal team for new business initiative and work together to ensure firm will be in compliant for regulatory requirement', '  ', 'Interact with regulator thru inspection, new/change of rules, and issue escalation', '  ', 'Pro-actively collaborate with the global organization', '  ', 'Support team involvement in other GS activities outside of daily work', ' ']

job_title: ['Operations, Securities Division Operations, Equities Trading Services Operations, Associate (51430)']
desc: ['OPERATIONS', '  ', "Operations is a dynamic, multi-faceted division that partners with all parts of the firm to provide banking, securities, and asset management services to clients around the world. In addition, Operations provides essential risk management and controls to preserve and enhance the firm's assets and its reputation. For every new product launched and every trade executed, it is Operations that develops and manages the processes and controls that enable business flow.", '  ', 'YOUR IMPACT\xa0', '  ', 'Are you looking to join a dynamic and fast paced team, applying your analytical and problem solving skills for maximum impact,\xa0whilst deepening your knowledge of Equity Derivatives? Equity Trading Services is seeking a professional who is looking to partner\xa0with our business and other internal and external stakeholders to provide market leading business enablement and risk and control\xa0services.\xa0', '  ', 'OUR IMPACT\xa0', '  ', 'Our team of critical thinkers partners with groups in all areas of the firm to perform financial analytics, reporting, data analytics and\xa0engineering. Our division also provides critical operations design and handles capital markets operations to ensure business flows\xa0smoothly across our global offices. From day one, team members play a vital role in upholding the three Operations principles of\xa0client focus, process innovation, and risk management.\xa0', '  ', 'Equity Trading Services provides front to back post-execution support to all equity based derivative activity in Asia. The Middle\xa0Office team has critical focus on front office day to day risk and trading surveillance, new issuances, client service, corporate\xa0actions processing and strategic firm and business infrastructure projects.\xa0', ' ', ' Middle Office acts as first point of contact for the various Equities Trading desks, assisting in the execution of both new\xa0client and hedging activity. Clients execute trades across a range of product wrappers e.g OTC, Securitised , Synthetic and it is\xa0Middle Office’s responsibility to ensure positions are booked and maintained correctly in our risk systems. There is a strong\xa0emphasis on knowledge and expertise which requires that all team members are fully versed in products and systems used as well\xa0as the processes and procedures that must be followed when performing day to day tasks.\xa0', ' ', ' HOW YOU WILL FULFILL YOUR POTENTIAL\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Prepare to gain a comprehensive understanding of the operational process lifecycle by interacting with internal and external\xa0stakeholders including clients, trading desks, brokers, Sales, Structuring and other federation teams in order to work toward the\xa0shared goal of business enablement and risk mitigation\xa0', '   ', 'Partner with a team of product experts to review all operational aspects of the trade flow while gaining strong technical knowledge,\xa0risk control and commercial awareness\xa0', '   ', 'Use your inquisitive mind set to identify efficiency opportunities with respect to process flow methodology as well as enhance', '   ', 'scalability\xa0', '   ', 'Leverage your quantitative skills to decompose complex regulatory and operational process requirement, and propose creative, robust solutions\xa0', '   ', 'Oversight & ownership of the full front to back operational flow ensuring that seamless execution of trades, new business and flow\xa0enhancements\xa0', '  ']
req: ['SKILLS & EXPERIENCE WE’RE LOOKING FOR\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Ability to demonstrate a sound of understanding of a range of Equity Derivative products as well as Cash Securities.', '   ', 'Strong Team-\xa0working skills – for working with both internal departments\xa0and globally\xa0', '   ', 'Track record in the development of client relationships and key stakeholders, both internally and externally\xa0', '   ', 'Ability to gain a strong understanding of the business and work with Prime Brokerage, Marketing, Structuring, Trading and Sales\xa0desks\xa0', '   ', 'Excellent communication and interpersonal skills\xa0', '   ', 'Ability to thrive under pressure\xa0', '   ', 'Strong leadership skills essential – this role will require a self-starter who can manage competing deadlines and can prioritize\xa0appropriately', '  ', '  ', '© The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., 2019. All rights reserved,\xa0Goldman Sachs is an equal employment/affirmative action employer Female/Minority/Disability/Vet.']

desc: ['Hiring Cluster’s Description & Reporting Lines', ' ', 'Reporting to the Assistant Director (Workforce Planning & Capabilities), you will be part of the Workforce Planning & Capabilities (WPC) unit in the Workforce Development cluster in PSD.', ' ', 'The WPC unit works with public agencies to drive strategic workforce planning and workforce capability development at the sectoral and agency levels. Our goal is to strengthen workforce planning and develop capabilities in the Public Sector. This includes providing thought leadership to public sector agencies in strategic HR management (e.g. workforce planning, job re-design, competency-based HR management) to help them transform the workforce and be more future-ready.', ' ', 'As a Senior Executive / Manager (WPC), you will work with other officers within the WPC unit to plan public sector manpower and develop policies to build workforce capabilities to meet the Public Service’s current and future priorities. You will identify and develop strategies to build critical workforce capabilities and address workforce gaps in the Public Service based on workforce data, projections, and insights on public sector manpower. You will also have the opportunity to work on other related portfolios within the WPC unit, which may include developing strategies and recommendations to prepare officers for workforce disruption.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Specific Job Responsibilities', ' ', ' ', 'Work on major agency projects and initiatives to diagnose and develop effective workforce plans for public sector agencies. This will include working with agencies to understand their current context, strategic vision, and organisational strategies and provide consultancy and advisory services to the agencies to develop workforce strategies and implementation plan anchored on competencies.', ' ', 'Develop the necessary tools and resources to support workforce planning, and equip agencies on the know-how to use these tools and resources.', ' ', 'Work with public agencies to put together the projections of public sector jobs and capabilities landscape in the medium term.', ' ', 'Research and analyse workforce trends and the impact on public sector manpower, and recommend the adoption of progressive practices and interventions for the affected workforce segments.', ' ', 'Identify and build critical workforce capabilities at the system level required to meet Public Service’s current and future priorities.', ' ', 'Work with a diverse group of agencies across the Public Service, and in collaboration with the Civil Service College, other PSD clusters, and consultancy firms to develop and implement programmes and initiatives to build and address workforce capabilities and gaps.', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Requirements', ' ', 'We are looking for self-motivated individuals who value integrity, teamwork and take pride in going the extra mile to provide excellent service. An ideal candidate should possess the following:', ' ', 'Work Experience and Knowledge', ' ', ' ', 'At least 2 years of working experience in strategic planning, policy making, manpower planning, capability development, or HR consulting.', ' ', 'Experience in developing insights from trends and quantitative and qualitative data, and translating insights into actionable strategies and initiatives.', ' ', 'Experience in running data analytics and visualisation using software such as advanced Excel, R programming, or Tableau will be an added advantage.', ' ', 'Knowledge of workforce planning and workforce trends and practices will be added advantages.', ' ', ' ', 'Competencies', ' ', ' ', 'Strong analytical and critical thinking abilities.', ' ', 'Strong communication, writing and presentation skills.', ' ', 'Can work well with concepts and translating conceptual ideas to action. ', ' ', 'Can work effectively with stakeholders to deliver on business outcomes.', ' ', 'Ability to translate research, data, and insights in a way which captures attention and relates to stakeholders’ interests.', ' ', 'Result-oriented, motivated and able to learn and adapt quickly to changing situations.', ' ', ' ', 'Only shortlisted applicants will be notified within 2 weeks after closing date.', 'Successful candidates will be offered a 2-year contract in the first instance.']

desc: ['You will work closely with the data analytics team and internal and external stakeholders to support the development, deployment and maintenance of data protection policies and technical solutions for\xa0the governance and safeguarding of privacy and confidentiality of all research databases, as well as the ensuring of institutional integrity under prevailing regulations and institutional policies (including the Human Biomedical Research Act and the Personal Data Protection Act, among others).', '  ', 'You will develop and document solution architectures and solution requirements. You will also be involved in defining end user proof-of-concept/MVPs for pilot solutions, usage models and corresponding technologies in test bed or end user environments.', '  ', 'You will work with end users, implementation scientists and ecosystem partners to deploy those solutions, collect data and evaluate outcomes in early pilot implementation environments.']
req: [' \t', 'Bachelor’s / Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering or any related computational disciplines or equivalent', ' \t', 'At least 1 year of technical solutions experience in a relevant data science area', ' \t', 'Knowledge in major programming/scripting language is required (e.g. R/Python, Java,\xa0Javascript, Ruby, Julia, PHP)', ' \t', 'Familiarity with healthcare database management\xa0systems,processes, and healthcare data governance policies and regulations will be advantageous', ' \t', 'Up-to-date knowledge of data security risks\xa0and competency in tackling such threats will be advantageous', ' \t', 'Interfacing experience\xa0with RESTful APIs, cloud services\xa0andGitHub\xa0will be advantageous', ' \t', 'Experience in using database language (e.g., SQL, NoSQL,\xa0DataFlow) will be advantageous', ' \t', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and ability to work with incomplete or imperfect data', ' \t', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', ' \t', 'Organised, meticulous and able to work independently as well as in a team', ' ']

desc: ['As Manager in AIO - Value Drive Office (VDO), you will assist in planning, managing and implementing Health Informatics and data analytics for value driven outcome projects in NUHS. You will work closely with various departments to identify and/or support them to drive value creation in their current workflow.', '  ', 'Job Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', 'Coordinate VDO projects’ activities and project meetings.', '   ', 'Facilitate monthly meetings with Senior Management.', '   ', 'Assign, track and monitor VDO team members in their project deliverable and timeliness of completion of key tasks.', '   ', 'Conduct data and VDO dashboard verifications and consolidate VDO data for reporting purposes.', '   ', 'Perform big data analysis, draw insights and engage stakeholders in providing possible solutions.', '  ']

desc: ['About\xa0Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) ', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualisation solutions. For more information about I²R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', '  ', '\ufeffWe are looking for a highly-motivated and skilled research engineer to work on real-world text data analysis, processing and classificaiton.\xa0\xa0', '  ', 'He/she will work with a team of scientists with core responsibilities to fulfill research tasks and deliverables.\xa0 He/she will learn the state of- the-art in the relevant research fields and have the opportunity to solve real-world challenging problems in the medical data domain.']

desc: ['Instructor in Interactive Media Design (Educator Track)', '  ', 'The Department of Communications and New Media at National University of Singapore is looking to fill the following Educator Track (teaching only) positions.', '  ', 'We seek applicants with expertise in data science, interactive media design and software studies. The applicant will have (industry related and/or teaching) experience in one or more of the following areas:', '  ', ' \t', 'Data analytics, big data, data visualisation, and use of software tools such as R and Python, and web technologies.', ' \t', 'Computational media and communication, and artificial intelligence', ' \t', 'Game studies', ' \t', 'User interface, user experience and HCI design', ' ', '  ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Successful candidates must have a Masters’ degree or a closely affiliated discipline by the appointment of start date and a record of excellence in teaching in large comprehensive universities. The candidate must also have approximately 2 years of teaching experience. A passion for working closely with students and a commitment to student learning are essential. Successful candidates are also expected to have experience with online teaching and the development of MOOCs.', '  ', 'The successful candidate is expected to teach 5 modules per academic year. Other duties include supervision of honours students and graduate students, and administrative service.', '  ', 'The anticipated start date is 1 July prior to the beginning of the semester in August 2019.', '  ', 'For further enquiries, please email: ', 'cnmbox15@nus.edu.sg']
req: ['Interested parties must submit the following documents, in an email clearly indicating the position they are applying for, to Ms Jasmin Tay at\xa0cnmbox15@nus.edu.sg:', '  ', ' \t', 'NUS Personal Particulars Form (http://www.fas.nus.edu.sg/cnm/images/Brochures/Personal-Particulars-Form.pdf)', ' \t', 'NUS Personal Data Consent Form for Job Applicants (http://www.nus.edu.sg/careers/files/NUS-Personal-Data-Consent-for-Job-Applicants.pdf)', ' \t', 'Academic History: certificates of degrees obtained, scholarships and awards.', ' \t', 'Employment History: Full CV, including education, professional background, teaching and supervision, research activities and achievements, honours and awards, and service accomplishments to date. List all academic and non-academic positions.', ' \t', 'Copies of Academic Degree Certificates obtained', ' \t', 'Teaching Portfolio: \t', ' \t\t', 'A preface (maximum 300 words) that makes the case for your appointment. This should be highly distilled summary of your key contributions to student learning and educational leadership, guided by your teaching philosophy.', ' \t\t', 'A Teaching Statement that focuses on evidence of student learning and educational leadership (if applicable). Note that the Teaching Statement, together with documents on research (where applicable) and service contributions should be no more than a maximum of 3,000 words.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Documents on research, where applicable. Note that the documents on research (together with the Teaching Statement and documents on service contributions) should be no more than a maximum of 3,000 words.', ' \t', 'Teaching evaluations and peer review reports, if available. Other evidence of teaching excellence and/or other contributions to education e.g. curriculum development, pedagogical innovation, etc. should be provided.', ' \t', 'If applicable, a complete list of publications, grouped according to papers, books, and reviews, including page numbers, in bibliographic form.', ' \t', 'Documents on service contributions. List and elaborate on the impact of service to department/faculty/university, international academic community, and/or national and international agencies. Note that the documents on research (together with the Teaching Statement and documents on service contributions) should be no more than a maximum of 3,000 words.', ' \t', 'Teaching evaluations and peer review reports, if available. Other evidence of teaching excellence and/or other contributions to education e.g. curriculum development, pedagogical innovation, etc. should be provided.', ' \t', 'THREE ', 'letters of reference to be arranged by the applicant to be submitted directly by the referees at\xa0cnmbox15@nus.edu.sg.', ' ', '  ', 'For full consideration, please submit a complete application, including letters of recommendation', ', by 3\xa0May 2019', '. Applications received after this date may be considered until the position is filled. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.', '  ', 'Enquiries may be directed to\xa0cnmbox15@nus.edu.sg. Further information about working at the National University of Singapore is available at\xa0http://www.nus.edu.sg/careers/whyjoinus.htm.\xa0\xa0', '  ', 'Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. The review will continue until the job is filled.']

desc: ["As the SEA Associate Account Manager, you will partner the SEA Business Lead through the\xa0delivery of multiple work streams to meet our client's expectations.
