desc: ['Do what’s next', '  ', 'Would you like to Think Big! and outside the box, have your Voice heard and know that your contributions make Tremendous impact on results? Do you thrive in an environment where you are encouraged to make effective decisions by Analyzing Complex Problems and creating Scalable Simplified solutions which can have a direct impact on our results? If this sounds like you….Let’s talk.', '  ', 'Life at Autodesk', '  ', 'Innovative. Rewarding. Respectful.\xa0 These are words we hear every day from employees about life at Autodesk.', '  ', 'To empower our customer with technology that impacts the world, we start by empowering our employees to make a difference.\xa0 We encourage employees to demonstrate their expertise, mentor the team, make effective decisions and be an order Shaper. Autodesk Employees are free to share opinions and know that they will be respectfully listened to.', '  ', 'Position Summary', '  ', 'As a global leader in 3D design, engineering, and entertainment software, Autodesk helps people imagine, design, and create a better world. Autodesk accelerates better design through an unparalleled depth of experience and a broad portfolio of software to give customers the power to solve their design, business, and environmental challenges. In addition to designers, architects, engineers, and media and entertainment professionals, Autodesk helps students, educators, and casual creators unlock their creative ideas through user-friendly applications.', '  ', 'As Autodesk continues to transform as a Subscription Offering Product company, we are making investments to change business processes and modernize our Sales, Marketing and Support systems. As part of this effort, Autodesk is seeking a talented Senior Data Engineer focused on Sales BI reporting developments along with experiences in data analytics, data transformation, database development and/or sales finance/operations processes and performance management. In this role, you will get an opportunity to contribute to the success of Autodesk’s transition.', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Designing, building, and testing SAP ERP application extensions, including customized reports, utilities, interfaces, and forms, using a combination of ABAP reports, function modules, classes and methods, BAPIs, BADIs, enhancements, ALE/IDOCs, workflow, forms development (SAPScript, SmartForms, and Adobe Forms) and other SAP technologies', ' \t', 'Using your analytical and technical skills to translate business and functional requirements into cohesive technical specifications and strong solutions', ' \t', 'Using your communication skills to collaborate with other Agile developers, analysts, and business partners in remote locations to gather requirements, provide status updates, participate in code reviews and\xa0 team meetings, and collaborate on cross-platform data sharing solutions', ' \t', 'Working closely with the Basis team to monitor, test and tune application components for optimized performance and integration.', ' \t', 'Participation in code reviews and in on-going improvements to development standards and methodologies', ' ']

desc: ['At Sabre, we achieve success by building extraordinary teams with exceptional people - that means finding the best and brightest to join Sabre. Does that sound like you? Sabre offers a diverse and comprehensive technology solutions portfolio that helps power our customers within the travel industry. These technologies include Cloud Computing, Software (SaaS), Big Data / BI, Mobility, UX / UI and Transactional Processing. Headquartered in Southlake, Texas, USA, we have approximately 10,000 employees in 60 countries. As a global company, we have won numerous awards for being a top employer and corporate citizen, and offer many opportunities for career growth and personal development. To learn more about the people and culture of Sabre, follow us on Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn.', '  ', ' GENERAL DESCRIPTION:', '  ', 'In the rapidly evolving world of online travel, Data & Analytics are driving growth and next generation innovations. We are looking for a strong analyst in our vibrant & growing APAC Online team. You will use various sources of data (e.g. shopping and booking) to analyze market trends, the competitive landscape, and customer needs to help Sabre online customers succeed in the Asia Pacific region.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'REQUIREMENTS:', '  ', ' \t', 'Strong analytical and problem solving skills', ' \t', 'Proficient in analytical methods & tools (e.g. SAS, R, Matlab) and experienced in data visualization (e.g. Tableau). Object-oriented programming and scripting experience is highly desirable.', ' \t', 'Take ownership, with demonstrated drive for excellence and perseverance', ' \t', 'Comfortable diving into complex systems/issues and business problems, and able to quickly grasp/define ambiguous situations', ' \t', 'Effective in cross-functional collaborations and external discussions with Sales, Airlines, Agencies, and etc with willingness to market the product/capabilities', ' \t', 'Excellent presentation skills to simplify complex product, technical and analytical insights to a business audience and vice versa', ' ']

desc: [' ', 'COMPANY DESCRIPTION', ' ', '  ', 'NTUC Enterprise is the holding entity and single largest shareholder of the NTUC Social Enterprises. NTUC Enterprise aims to create a greater social force to do good by harnessing the capabilities of the social enterprises to meet pressing social needs in areas like health and eldercare, childcare, daily essentials, cooked food and financial services. Serving over two million customers, NTUC Enterprise wants to enable and empower all in Singapore to live better and more meaningful lives.', '  ', ' ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', ' ', '  ', 'As Senior Cloud Database Admin, you will design and develop database structures and schemas, analyze client workflow, determine the best solutions for a successful project, and share knowledge of database, big data or data analytics. As a part of the team, you will help the teams adopt to cloud native database solutions. To be successful in this role the candidate must have deep knowledge cloud data technologies and align technology solutions to specific business objectives.', '  ', 'As Senior Cloud Database Admin you will:', '  ', '   ', 'Automate the build, operation, backup, restore, and monitoring of databases used across NTUC', '   ', 'Develop and evaluate database infrastructure performance criteria and measurement methods', '   ', 'Support day-to-day operations and management of an enterprise level production database in the cloud', '   ', 'Monitors user access and performance of the database systems', '   ', 'Create best practices for cloud database operations', '   ', 'Participation in maintenance windows and on-call rotation is required', '   ', 'Contributing to other support and automation efforts as needed', '  ', '  ', '\xa0']

Experience with replication/clustering and partitioning a must', ' \t', 'Experience writing and executing stress tests on databases and services', ' \t', 'Experience in troubleshooting and resolving database problems', ' \t', 'Very good Knowledge of indexes, index management, statistics, data-at-rest encryption, secure connectivity', ' \t', 'Experience with Big Data concepts and technologies, especially using AWS or GCP (ex: MongoDB, Redshift, etc.)', ' \t', 'Experience with cloud database technologies (ex: AWS RDS, Redshift, DynamoDB, MS SQL, etc.)', ' ']

desc: ['Overview of job', '  ', 'GroupM is the world’s largest media investment company and are a part of WPP. In fact, we are responsible for one in every three ads you see globally. We are currently looking for a Talent Acquisition Manager to join us. In this role, you will be responsible for leveraging on recruitment technology and using creative talent attraction techniques to bring in the best and brightest talents across the globe to GroupM.', '  ', 'At GroupM APAC, our people are our strength, which is why fostering a culture of diversity and inclusion is important to us.', '  ', 'Reporting of the role', '  ', 'This role reports to the HR & Talent Director, SG\xa0and\xa0Head of Talent Acquisition, APAC', ' ', ' ', '3 best things about the job:', '  ', ' \t', 'You will recruit\xa0best\xa0talents for the world’s leading media agency group where you will partner strategically with all our agencies’ business leaders, MDs, CEOs etc.', ' \t', 'Work in a fun and fast-paced industry at the heart of digital, data, analytics, content and technology, and we value new ideas and thinking to bring in the next wave of best talents for our business', ' \t', 'Demonstrate your talent vision and leadership that will transform and inspire the Singapore talent acquisition team to become a stronger strategic partner for the business and group.', ' ', '  ', 'In this role, your goals will be:', ' In three months:', '  ', ' \t', 'Build up a solid understanding of the media and digital industry, agencies’ business structure\xa0and\xa0talent requirements', ' \t', 'Establish a strong business relationship with our agencies’ stakeholders and understand their needs and desired expectations.', ' \t', 'Lead and motivate your team with a clear vision and strategy to deliver high-quality work, and cultivate a strong solution driven & growth mindset', ' \t', 'Be familiar with internal practices, process and policies, and technology available, and partner with the Head of Talent Acquisition, APAC to review & strengthen the talent acquisition strategy.', ' ', '  ', 'In six months:', '  ', ' \t', 'Deliver a clear and concise strategy to build a talent pipeline and ensure positive candidate experience from application to placement', ' \t', 'Understand clearly the complexity of the business requirements and structure, and able to successfully manage expectations and influence stakeholders to support the talent acquisition processes and policies', ' \t', 'Review and recommend smart and effective recruitment tools/technology to attract best talents in shortest time', ' \t', 'Use quantitative/qualitative data to provide a regular predictive analysis for business leaders, Talent and HR leaders in anticipation of future requirements', ' ', '  ', 'In 12 months:', '  ', ' \t', 'Identify as the expert and trusted talent acquisition partner for our agencies and group', ' \t', 'Evaluate full year recruitment and team gaps/performance, and envision future strategy to achieve best in class hires', ' \t', 'Increase the % of hires through\xa0internal\xa0program (e.g referral program)', ' ', '  ', 'What your day job looks like at GroupM:', '  ', ' \t', 'Build an open, collaborative and authentic agency relationship across all levels that will support and manage the agencies’ requirements and desired expectations', ' \t', 'Work closely with the Head of Talent Acquisition APAC and HR & Talent Director to implement the talent acquisition strategy (in line with the business strategy and any regional talent acquisition strategy) across the group', ' \t', 'Partner effectively with the commercial heads and agency leads on hire requests and approval from regional HQ in ensuring on time hire requests submitted', ' \t', 'Research and implement new strategies and technologies to build\xa0relevant\xa0talent pipeline, and always encouraging the talent acquisition team to be proactively searching, connecting and identifying top talents in the market', ' \t', 'Cultivate an open and nurturing culture with the mindset to train and coach, helping the team to overcome work challenges and contribute effectively', ' \t', 'Provide effective recruitment advice, guidance\xa0and\xa0solutions to all hiring managers across the group, including statutory obligations', ' \t', 'Maintain a good knowledge and understanding of competitive compensation in the media and digital industry', ' \t', 'Ensure all relevant Sarbanes Oxley Compliance procedures and processes are followed, adhered to and evidenced at all times', ' \t', 'Actively search and drive all recruitment initiatives/programs that promote both foreign and local hiring', ' ', '  ', 'More about GroupM', '  ', 'GroupM leads and shapes media markets by delivering performance enhancing media products and services, powered by data and technology. Our global network agencies and businesses enable our people to work collaboratively across borders with the best in class, providing them the opportunity to accelerate their progress and development. We are not limited by teams or geographies; our scale and diverse range of clients\xa0letsus be more adventurous with our business and talent. We give our talent\xa0the space, support\xa0and\xa0tools to innovate and grow.', '  ', 'Discover more about GroupM at\xa0www.groupm.com\xa0', ' Follow @GroupMAPAC on Twitter', ' Follow GroupM on LinkedIn -\xa0https://www.linkedin.com/company/groupm', '  ', 'About Singapore', '  ', 'GroupM Singapore operates in one of the most dynamic and exciting environments in the world. Although it is a small domestic market, there is a vibrant media industry which is undergoing rapid evolution as digital technology reshapes the way marketing supports advertisers’ needs. Being at the crossroads of Asia means that aside from the local clients and media owners, we also have a high proportion of multi-national clients and media owners.', '  ', 'As the largest media investment management company in Singapore with over 41% market share (Recma) and over 650 employees, GroupM Singapore is the\xa0premiere\xa0organisation\xa0to join and develop a career in.']

desc: ['About the Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R)', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. For more information about I2R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', '  ', 'The Deep Learning 2.0 program is a multi-year A*STAR Al program, focused on capturing the Next wave of deep learning. desc: ['Punggol Digital District (PDD) is an upcoming mixed-use development that will house the key growth sectors of the digital economy such as cybersecurity and data analytics. It is also the first digital district in Singapore where we will integrate smart technologies horizontally on a single Open Digital Platform (ODP) to yield synergies across various technologies.\xa0The ODP will become a reference digital architecture for future smart districts in Singapore and transform the way we work, live and play.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Scope and Responsibilities', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Assist to establish the direction for the IT/Engineering architecture, standards, design and implementation approaches of an Open Digital Platform (ODP) for smart estates system solutions.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Work with partners to integrate technology verticals into the ODP.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Develop data communication protocols between autonomous systems, robotics and IoT systems.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Design and develop protocols adapters. \xa0\xa0', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Research, design, evaluate and develop technical requirements and specifications.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Develop test cases and test required software modules and APIs.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Conduct POCs and trial for identified use cases.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Requirements', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Degree in Engineering/Computer Engineering or equivalent', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Skilled in developing firmware for microcontrollers, sensors and other relevant electronics technologies', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Familiar with IoT Architecture.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Familiar with Data Distribution Services (DDS).', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Understanding of close-loop control systems.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Good programming skills in C/C++', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Familiarity with OPC, Modbus, BACnet, DALI, DMX, LoRA or DSRC will be a bonus.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Mechatronics knowledge as well as Robotics Operating System (eg ROS) will be a bonus.', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['About RedMart', '  ', "RedMart is Singapore's largest online grocery marketplace. We are a part of Alibaba-backed Lazada, Southeast Asia’s leading online shopping and selling platform. Our online marketplace offers over 100,000 grocery and household essentials items with the convenience of home delivery 7 days a week. Our mission is to save people time and money for the important things in life.", '  ', 'We are a fast growing, tech-powered company with an awesome culture (see our culture deck). We have great tech teams in Singapore and Bangalore. We work on a wide range of areas: consumer-facing mobile and web applications, search, recommendations, e-commerce, marketing automation, CRM, marketplace seller platform, supply chain automation, warehouse fulfilment and automation, transportation logistics and last mile delivery. If you are interested in being part of the team that is transforming the grocery business, helping people save time and money daily, solving interesting challenges, and working with smart and passionate people, we want to hear from you.', '  ', 'Role Purpose', '  ', 'At RedMart we use technology to delight our customers; we innovate to make our customers’ lives better.\xa0\xa0', '  ', 'As Engineering Manager - Transport you will be responsible for leading a software team building transport intelligence systems at RedMart. This team is responsible for optimising delivery efficiency while maintaining a high rate of on-time delivery and offering a variety of delivery options to our customers. The team will be based in Singapore.\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'As an Engineering Manager you will:', '  ', '• Lead a team of software engineers and data scientists that has full ownership of key parts of RedMart’s Last Mile Delivery platforms, such as routing and location intelligence.', '  ', '• Conceptualize and implement transportation and telematics products, apps, algorithms and data analytics to provide a fast, reliable, convenient delivery experience at financially sustainable costs.\xa0', '  ', '• Set the technical architecture for the team and take an active role in defining the product roadmap.\xa0', '  ', '• Be responsible for driving impact by delivering on key initiatives as well as technical and business KPIs. You’ll be expected to make a significant impact on these through great technical judgment, business process understanding, close relationships with other technical leaders and your business counterparts, focused execution and frequent delivery.', '  ', '• Attract, develop and retain the best software engineers and data scientists. Help them innovate, make an impact, continually improve at their job and grow in their careers.', '  ', '• Champion engineering and operational excellence. Lead your team to design, implement, test and run in production robust, highly available automated routing solutions that our 24/7 store and operations can rely on.\xa0\xa0', '  ', '• Lead and contribute to cross-functional initiatives to improve engineering at RedMart.', '  ', '• Collaborate with other engineering leaders, product managers, and business counterparts to deliver company-wide initiatives.', '  ', '• Foster a culture of continuous improvement through mentoring, feedback, and metrics.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'What do we look for in a candidate?', '  ', '• Customer focus. Everything we do starts with our customers external and internal.', '  ', '• Impact. We are results oriented. We value people who focus on the right things and get them done.', '  ', '• Perseverance. Building a great company that customers love is hard work. Many challenges await and we are looking for team members we can count on when things get tough.', '  ', '• Ownership. We are looking for team members who are not only owners of their work but regard themselves as owners of the company as well. They are flexible in what they do and constantly seek out ways to have a greater impact on customers and our company.\xa0', '  ', '• Breadth and depth of technology experience and strong technical and product judgment.\xa0', '  ', '• Track record of building and leading great development teams through hiring and coaching.\xa0', '  ', '• Track record of successfully delivering multi-stakeholder projects that marry technology, people, and processes.\xa0', '  ', '• Machine Learning and Domain knowledge. Experience with building software for logistics, transportation or running Machine Learning and optimization systems in production is a must.', '  ', '• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.']
req: ['We develop on a modern technology stack that focuses on enabling engineers to be productive and impactful. Engineers work in teams to determine their own release schedules; teams develop, release and operate their software independently. We are strong believers in automation: we use automation for continuous integration, testing, and delivery. Although we use Amazon Web Services, we use open source software where possible. We continuously add to and update our technology stack.', '  ', '• Microservices written in Java or Scala using Play Framework or Akka, and occasionally Python and NodeJS.', '  ', '• AngularJs for web apps.', '  ', '• Native apps use Objective C/Swift (iOS) and Java/Kotlin (Android), Fastlane, Calabash, Cocoapods/Gradle, JUnit, and occasionally hybrid React Native.', '  ', '• MongoDB, Cassandra, Hazelcast for storage.', '  ', '• RabbitMQ for messaging.', '  ', '• AWS infrastructure, with HAProxy, Nginx, Redis. Chef deployments.', '  ', '• GitHub, Travis CI and Trello, Slack for development tools.', '  ', '• Testing with JUnit, ScalaTest, FrisbyJS, Calabash and Selenium.', '  ', '• Kinesys, Spark and AWS Redshift for our data infrastructure.\xa0']

desc: ['Reporting to – Supply Chain Senior Manager', ' ', ' Responsibilities:', ' • Operate material handling system to ensure right material and accurate quantity are delivered.', ' • inventory management, delivery time and cost saving.', ' • Processes and plan, schedule and control the flow of goods.', ' • Facilitate implementation of ideas that are implementable and generates business value regarding logistic and warehouse management.', ' • Handle client requests, source the materials and prepare the quotation to clients.', ' • Possess strong customer relationship in providing immediate responses to their enquiries.', ' • Provide efficient sourcing and strong negotiation strategies with local and international vendors on price, quality, commercial terms and expediting and deexpediting of goods as per customer request.', ' • Capable of ensuring smooth coordination between end users and factory in case of technical clarifications and approval of drawings.', ' • Finalizes contractual documents according to client’s general purchasing conditions for supplies and by ensuring the conformity with the regulations which may be applied.', ' • Liaises with finance department for payments term and collection.', ' • Good knowledge about Incoterms and working with courier services.', ' • Constantly review current supply chain operating models with respect to changing customer needs to improve.', ' • Assist to implement supply chain optimization plans.', ' • Maintain the key performance metrics of supply chain systems to measure efficiency.', ' • Implement material management plans on daily basis with regards to schedules, manpower and quality.', ' • Analyse customer needs and expectation to identify business opportunity.', ' • Support collection of data required for data analytics application.', ' \xa0']
req: ['Requirement:', " - Candidate must possess at least A-Level/diploma/ bachelor's Degree/Post Graduate Diploma/Professional Degree in any field.", ' - Preferably Manager specialized in Engineering - Oil/Gas, Mining industries or equivalent.', ' - With at least 3 Year(s) of marketing working experienced in the oil and gas industry, preferably in Asia Pacific Region.', ' - Committed to excellence, good presentation and communication skills in writing and speaking.', ' - Able to work under pressure in a fast-pace environment. Have a good, positive attitude and working driven passion.', ' \xa0']

desc: ['New enterprise systems are being deployed throughout AMERA (Asia-Pacific, Middle-East, Russia, Africa), transforming the way we run our B2B lens business. desc: ['About Tookitaki', '  ', 'Tookitaki is providing machine learning-powered enterprise solutions to address regulatory compliance problems in the financial services sector. Incorporated in November 2014 in Singapore, the company is led by a core team with cumulative 30-years’ experience in finance, AI and big data analytics. Backed by institutional investors such as Jungle Ventures and Spring Seeds (a subsidiary of the Singapore Government), the company’s accolades include:', '  ', ' \t', 'We are among the selected 21 companies which got accreditation from the government of Singapore for their stringent technology, finance and operations due diligence (www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/programmes-and-grants/startups/accreditation-at-sgd)', ' \t', 'We won the first place in the MAS FinTech Awards (Singapore SME) in the regulatory compliance space from the Monetary Authority of Singapore for our approach to make the workflows in AML and Reconciliation scalable and highly auditable (beyond ML based black box approach) (www.mas.gov.sg/News-and-Publications/Media-Releases/2016/Ten-FinTech-companies-recognised-for-innovative-solutions-at-inaugural-FinTech-Awards.aspx)', ' \t', 'We are voted as one of the top 21 AI start-ups focusing on the financial services space by medici (www.letstalkpayments.com/medici-top-21-ai-companies/)', ' \t', "We graduated from Nomura's corporate innovation program in November 2017 where we successfully delivered our product – Reconciliation Management Suite – in a pilot environment (https://inc42.com/buzz/nomura-voyager-fintech-accelerator-voyager-demo-day/)", ' ', '  ', 'In regulatory compliance, we focus on anti-money laundering and reconciliation and our products – Alerts Management Suite (AMS) and Reconciliation Management Suite (RMS) – cater to these areas, respectively. The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  ', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to exiting core-banking applications (REST API end points), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  ', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Banks need to move beyond static rule-based systems and adopt a new approach to prevent financial and reputation loss. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMS, RMS and PMS.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['Role: ML Engineer', '  ', 'Engineering @ Tookitaki', '  ', 'The engineering team is responsible for building a robust predictive platform, which can add significant value to the BFSI vertical in solving operational and compliance risk problems. We take pride in building the system right and continuously evolving it. You have the freedom to choose right tools for the task. We also encourage to participate in and contribute to open source community.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Our Ideal Candidate ', '  ', 'Our engineering team is looking for a lead machine learning engineer with a work experience of 4+ years. The candidate would be responsible for contributing to product development and would be considered a good fit if he/she:', '  ', ' \t', 'Ships high quality code and believes in TDD', ' \t', 'Has deep experience with one of JVM languages such as Scala, Java and Python', ' \t', 'Has understanding of and working experience with Machine Learning and AI', ' \t', 'Has the ability to engineer low-latency systems from ground up', ' \t', 'Has deep understanding working with big data/data engineering components like HDFS, Yarn, Hive and Spark', ' \t', 'Has experience tuning the complex systems for performance optimizations - including application tuning, runtime tuning and infrastructure tuning', ' \t', 'Has deeper understanding of efficient memory management, GC tuning and application profiling Has experience defining the right tech stack and designing the overall architecture of the system Has experience working with one or more cloud providers, preferably AWS', ' \t', 'Enjoys digging into open-source project and contributing back', ' \t', 'Is well versed with tools of the trade - Git, IDEs, and build tools', ' \t', 'Has a keen desire to learn and grow', ' \t', 'Has experience working with one or more distributed NoSQL stores', ' \t', 'Has the ability to lead and mentor other members in the team', ' ', '  ', 'Educational/Professional Requirements ', '  ', ' \t', 'PhD or master’s in computer science or related quantitative discipline from a reputed institution', ' \t', 'Work experience of 4+ years', ' ', '  ', 'Desired Non-technical Requirements', '  ', ' \t', 'Very strong communication skills both written and verbal', ' \t', 'Strong desire to work with start-ups', ' \t', 'Must be a team player', ' ', '  ', 'Job Perks', '  ', ' \t', 'Attractive variable compensation package', ' \t', 'Flexible working hours - everything is results-oriented', ' \t', 'Opportunity to work with an award-winning organization in the hottest space in tech - artificial intelligence and advanced machine learning', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['About the Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R)', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Listed below are problems of interest in the Deep Learning 2.0 project:', '  ', 'Deep learning application in AME (Semiconductor domain): ', 'Explore state-of-the-art deep learning technologies in Advance Manufacturing Engineering, especially in semiconductor industries. desc: ['About\xa0Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) ', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualisation solutions. For more information about I²R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg\ufeff', '  ', 'We are looking for strong candidates in the field of Artificial intelligence and deep learning, with an interest in working on both fundamental algorithms in large-scale machine learning or deep learning, and also applying it to practical problems in vertical domains.', '  ', 'The position, based within the Program in Artificial Intelligence at I2R, entails working closely with a highly interdisciplinary team of researchers with training from leading universities like MIT, Stanford and CMU. Listed below are problems of interest in the Deep Learning 2.0 project:', '  ', 'Deep learning application in AME (Semiconductor domain): ', 'Explore state-of-the-art deep learning technologies in Advance Manufacturing Engineering, especially in semiconductor industries. Including, but not limited to, yield analysis and prediction, predictive maintenance (PdM), advanced DoE analysis and prediction, etc.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['   ', 'Minimum Bachelor in Computer Science, Statistics, or Data Science intensive fields, with expertise in one or more of the following areas:', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Large-scale machine learning', '   ', 'Deep learning, supervised or unsupervised', '   ', 'Applying state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to practical problems in different domains', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Experience in corporate or application oriented environments is a plus', '   ', 'Ability to work independently, as well as in teams highly desired', '   ', 'Good communication skills for proposals, reports, and publications', '   ', 'Experience with one of Tensor Flow, Theano, Caffe, CNTK. Skills', '   ', 'Strong programming abilities (e.g. Perl, Bash, C/C++, Java, Python, R, MATLAB)', '   ', 'Computer vision and deep learning skills desirable', '  ', '  ', 'The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified']

desc: ['ABOUT TAIGER', '  ', 'Headquartered in Singapore, TAIGER is a fast-growing Artificial Intelligence (AI) company with a global footprint. Our mission is to help organizations optimize operational efficiencies by automating complex cognitive tasks. We are a market leader and the pioneer of Knowledge Work AutomationTM. The solutions we provide use natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision techniques (e.g. semantic analysis, concept-extraction, multi-language knowledge graphs, and object detection) to provide unparalleled accuracy in information extraction for industry leaders across the financial services, government sectors and more. TAIGER is recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor. Find out more about us at\xa0www.taiger.com\xa0and\xa0www.linkedin.com/company/taiger', '  ', 'PRODUCT MANAGER', '  ', 'We are building a team passionate about cutting-edge AI technology and the potential of TAIGER. You should be motivated by growth opportunities with your responsibilities expanding in scope. You can also look forward to be part of a dynamic start-up environment where your contribution matters.', '  ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', '  ', ' \t', 'Work closely with internal and external customers, sales and engineering teams to oversee delivery of product requirements in-line with stakeholder needs, technical capabilities and with alignment to success metrics.', ' \t', 'Drive modern forms of product planning, customer discovery, product discovery, and product development process, as well as ensure successful execution and implementation of product roadmaps.', ' \t', 'Assist in the execution of TAIGER’s product strategy, working closely with Director, Product to develop a clear product roadmap with realistic milestones and measurable outcomes.', ' \t', 'Ensure that TAIGER’s products remain competitive, relevant and innovative in the market by comparing existing solutions against relevant products to gather a strong understanding of latest products trends and the Artificial Intelligence domain.', ' \t', 'Create internal product functions for TAIGER, ensuring that resource capabilities, and technical limitations are optimized to achieve company product vision.', ' \t', 'Develop external opportunities, and ensure that sales decisions are supported with internal technical documentations, data-analytics and product collaterals to enable data-driven decision making.', ' ']
req: ['REQUIREMENTS', '  ', ' \t', 'BSc or MSc in Computer Science, Engineering, Business or related disciplines.', ' \t', '3+ years of experience in Product Management for technology / software products or Artificial Intelligence domain-related product experience.', ' \t', 'Demonstrated understanding and interest in the Artificial Intelligence industry and driving innovation aligned with technology trends and customer needs.', ' \t', 'Prior working experience developing product functions within large-scale technology, financial or government organizations, converting strategic product plans to measurable go-to-market outcomes.', ' \t', 'Expertise in translating customer needs into user stories through qualitative needs analysis user research methods and research analysis creating, conducting, and analysing usability evaluations.', ' \t', 'Proven track record in stakeholder management with excellence written and oral command of English.\xa0', ' ', '  ', 'YOU WILL BE AT AN ADVANTAGE WITH THESE SKILLS', '  ', ' \t', 'You have strong problem-solving skills and possess a high degree of creativity and resourcefulness.', ' \t', 'You have a track record of successfully delivering quality, on-time results.', ' \t', 'You are a strong communicator with ability to deliver clear and impactful messages.', ' \t', 'You possess effective time management and networking skills.', ' \t', 'You demonstrate excellent organizational, analytical and strategic skills.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'In TAIGER we believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will result in a better workplace for our team and a better product for our clients. Join the growing team at TAIGER today!', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '*TAIGER does not engage any recruitment agencies for recruitment of talents into our company. All job applications should be submitted directly to TAIGER.']

desc: ['Business Function\xa0', '  ', 'Group Audit helps the Board and Executive Management meet the strategic and operational objectives of the DBS Group. We conduct independent checks to ensure that the Group’s risk and control processes are adequate and effective. All our team members are highly sought-after professionals who work as trusted advisors to our clients, in all matters related to a company’s internal controls.\xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities\xa0', '  ', '1. Manage and oversee execution of the audit plan/ issues and initiatives', '  ', '   ', 'Conduct risk-based projects, and review system implementation, applications and other IT-related risk areas, including information gathering from stakeholders, execution and documentation of analysis, and communication of results.', '   ', 'Define and implement testing layers of computer systems (for example, application, database, operating system, data, infrastructure) for information technology (IT) effectiveness.', '   ', 'Develop IT audit procedures with innovation and creative thinking using data analytics and automation.', '   ', 'Analyze and identify IT control points on services-oriented architectures, cloud services, virtualized environments, network technologies, agile software development and information security.', '   ', 'Evaluate IT components of platforms and applications against internal standards, policies, procedures and IT standards and framework, including identifying symptoms and root cause.', '   ', 'Proactively inform IT Audit management on the major risk event, IT incident, and external audit and regulatory issues arising during the audit or through regular contact with line management.', '   ', 'Ascertain that major concerns and recommendations raised by internal and external auditors, and regulators are resolved satisfactorily.', '   ', 'Propose, develop and/ or drive initiatives that will help to develop an internal knowledge base.', '  ', '  ', '2. Experience in one of the following areas:', '  ', '   ', 'Virtualisation technology.', '   ', 'Cloud computing technology,\xa0', '   ', 'Docker/containerisation technology.', '   ', 'Development operations (DevOps) environment, with strong understanding of the IT infrastructure components/processes that are essential in supporting continuous delivery, integration, automated testing, and performance monitoring associated with application development.\xa0', '  ', '  ', '3. Support staff and self-development', '  ', '   ', 'Keep abreast of own professional development to enhance one’s skills and competence.', '   ', 'Coach and guide junior staff on all audit engagements.', '  ']

desc: ['About Us', '  ', 'The We Company’s mission is to elevate the world’s consciousness. Our global platform reimagines and positively impacts how we work, live and grow through three distinct business lines: WeWork’s mission is to create a world where people work to make a life, not just a living; WeLive’s mission is to build a world where no one feels alone; WeGrow’s mission is to unleash every human’s superpowers. Through design, technology, and hospitality we are creating a community that helps people live life with purpose and have a meaningful impact in the world. The We Company began 2019 with more than 400,000 members. In less than ten years, we’ve built a global network of 400 locations across 100 cities and nearly 30 countries, and we’re just getting started.', '  ', 'About the Role', '  ', 'We are in search of a Space Planner who is eager to be an integral part of our Due Diligence process for new WeWork locations as well as partnering with our Design Strategists for Powered by We (PxWe) locations. \xa0As a Space Planner, you will actively engage in the spatial and financial evaluation of potential new properties sourced by the Real Estate team. Ideally you will have professional experience in space planning, but this position is also good for someone with an architectural background who is highly efficient, solution-oriented, data savvy and BIM fluent. Having a firm grasp on both spatial reasoning and computational design is integral to succeeding in this role and we want to find someone passionate and committed to it. \xa0 \xa0', ' \xa0', ' ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', 'Work directly with real estate and design strategy teams to complete test fits for potential new WeWork locations and Powered by We clients.', '   ', 'Analyze existing building conditions and incorporate WeWork or PxWe client space standards and other agreed to programmatic elements into optimized space plans to determine feasibility', '   ', 'Generate USF plans and calculate USF for potential new locations', '   ', 'Make recommendations to enhance space standards, operational efficiency, service delivery, cost savings, and innovative service advancements', '   ', 'Prepare documentation for internal and external review, presentation, and approval', '   ', 'Utilize data analytics and analysis tools to guide the team in generating optimal space solutions', '   ', 'Reports to Head of Architecture', '  ']
req: ['Qualifications', '  ', '   ', "Bachelor's degree and minimum 2 years practical experience in space planning for commercial real estate or hospitality clients. Experience in multi-family mixed use developments, retail, or other building typologies may also be considered.", '   ', 'Professional experience with Revit is required. Experience with Dynamo and Grasshopper is a plus.', '   ', 'Must be able to provide initial analyses of and incorporate ADA, zoning, and local building codes.', '   ', 'Strong time-management skills with the ability to take on multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines punctually', '   ', 'Must understand projects of all scales (50,000sf - 500,000sf) and types (single floor/whole building renovation, single/multiple client operational models, standard/custom work)', '   ', 'Possess strong analytical skills and the ability to develop conclusions and recommendations', '   ', 'Demonstrate proficiency in architectural and engineering drawings, concepts and design', '   ', 'Experience in managing projects of varied scope and complexity', '   ', 'Proficient in databased software platforms (e.g. MS Excel, Airtable, Google Sheets)', '   ', 'Strong oral, written, and presentation skills', '   ', 'Desired Characteristics', '   ', 'Desire to learn and grow within a diverse community of designers', '   ', 'Quick learner and highly resourceful problem-solver', '   ', 'Demonstrated commitment to delivering high quality design', '   ', 'Relationship builder', '   ', 'Ability to work independently and as part of a team', '   ', 'Takes ownership of tasks to ensure successful completion', '   ', 'Strong attention to detail and quality', '   ', 'Must be fluent in English', '  ']

desc: ['About the role', '  ', 'At DATAVLT, we’re on a mission to make life easier for our users by providing an innovative, on-demand data analytics platform integrated with blockchain to help business owners understand their data, gain insights and make sharper decisions while continuing to focus on developing their business and scaling efficiently.', '  ', 'As a Product Designer, you will work in a cross-functional environment to design user-centric products for the DATAVLT platform. In this role, you will discover what are our user needs by conducting research into market gaps, user behaviours and motivations. You will be given autonomy and ownership to inspire change and create new innovative products. Your job as a Product Designer is to help the team to solve complex challenges and craft impressionable experiences that would highlight our products’ functionalities and capabilities.']

desc: ['Product Manager will own the key KPIs of the mobile app product that we have released globally. He/She will set business KPIs, track and analyze them, and work closely with the internal content managers, Marketing team, development team and others to plan and execute actions to improve the product.', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Reporting to the Vice president of App business', ' \t', 'Lead and drive the Product Manager activities for our mobile App.', ' \t', 'Conduct and communicate in-depth analysis of in-App economy trends using data insights and strong business acumen to impact top line KPIs.', ' \t', 'Engage with Content Managers, Marketing, development team to make sure that product requirements incorporate inputs from various stakeholders', ' \t', 'Create, balance and optimize economy models for virtual economies.', ' \t', 'Track performance on a daily basis, communicate weekly KPIs to internal and external stakeholders and adjust designs / plans accordingly.', ' \t', 'Develop and implement app health review cycles that carefully consider internal and external feedback as well as key product metrics to continually improve the product.', ' \t', 'Build top-down and bottom-up models to inform product roadmap and mitigate risk.', ' \t', 'Leverage Data Analytics, A/B testing, Push Notifications and other partner tools to drive KPIs.', ' \t', 'Track and develop expert level understanding of the mobile app industry, including developing ability to qualitatively and quantitatively teardown mobile games.', ' ']

desc: ['Corporate Administration & Infrastructure Department ', ' ', ' The Corporate Administration & Infrastructure Department (CAID) is responsible for managing the workspace of GIC’s offices in 10 locations, procuring office goods and services and market data, implementing enterprise digital workplace solutions, and managing the business continuity management programme. candidates to join CAID in the areas of workplace management as an Associate/AVP.', '  ', ' ', 'Key Responsibilities', '  ', '  ', 'Ensure the regular maintenance and smooth running of the building management, mechanical & engineering and security systems including managing outsourced vendors and providers and rostered duties to provide round the clock support for robust office infrastructure', '  ', 'Oversee timely and efficient execution of tasks and support of the day-to-day operations for workplace security/safety which may include overseeing requests from global offices\xa0', '  ', 'Partners with global offices/cross functional teams to identify, propose and deliver initiatives using cutting edge techniques and technologies e.g. Artificial Intelligence, Data analytics etc. to improve overall effectiveness of the workplace services', '  ', 'Manage incidents ensuring swift resolution, minimal disruptions and identifies root causes of incidents for continual improvement', '  ', 'Drive the review and liaison with landlord on facilities, corporate lease related matters and renovation/upgrading works for the offices', '  ', 'Understand business requirements and lead renovation and refurbishment projects', '  ', 'Provide regular reports and metrics to senior management on cost management and budget spent against service delivery (e.g., outage reporting and incident responses)', '  ', 'Keep abreast of market trends on facilities and real estate developments & trends, workplace security developments, and leverage the knowledge to drive process improvements and efficiencies within the corporate real estate domain (e.g., use of new technologies)', '  ', 'Ensure compliance of facilities management with regulatory requirements (e.g. health, safety & environment regulations)', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['Healint is recruiting a Global Project Manager who will ensure our major projects are on their track and delivered in a timely manner. The Global Project Manager is expected to manage all aspects of the interaction with our clients as it relates to the specific project cycle: sourcing of new projects, tender, agreement, delivery and follow-up.\xa0', '  ', 'As the Global Project Manager, your organizational and leadership skills are your major assets for this role. You have a positive attitude, and are self- motivated, a self-starter who is confident to take the initiative and carry out duties with minimal supervision but still adhere to process. You are a dynamic professional with a strong knowledge of the pharmaceutical industry, a positive attitude and ambition to make things happen.', '  ', 'The Global Project Manager will be responsible for:', '  ', '   ', ' ', 'Working collaboratively with the Heads of Departments, to direct the major projects, and implementation across delivery Teams and external stakeholders.\xa0', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Ensuring a high level of communication, understanding and satisfaction for projects.', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Managing/overseeing all projects from inception, including managing timelines and deliverables, budget tracking, scope alignment, client communications, resource management, drafting and monitoring workplans / schedule and ensuring quality deliverables are shared on time\xa0', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Optimizing data analytics to support ongoing project’s deliverables\xa0', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Coordinating a smooth workflow and communication between internal resources, vendors, consultants, data & technical teams, as it relates to assigned ongoing projects\xa0', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Leading periodic cross-functional meetings and project status reports and providing solutions for roadblocks to stakeholders', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Overseeing other projects e.g. insights reports, etc. as assigned by supervisor or other senior leadership.', ' ', '  ']

desc: ['The National University of Singapore is recruiting a Deputy Director for the Lloyd’s Register Foundation Institute for the Public Understanding of Risk (LRFIPUR), National University of Singapore (NUS). Founded in 1905, NUS is consistently ranked among the world’s top 30 universities and Asia’s top 2 universities. It is an innovative, research-intensive university with over 36,000 students from 100 countries.\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Background', '  ', 'Established in 2016, LRFIPUR is the first of its kind in Asia and aspires to become a world leading centre of excellence that will inspire the public understanding of risk in Asia and globally. The Institute will undertake independent research and education, building connections with practical end-users such as policy makers, decision makers and opinion formers in governments, industry sectors, regulators, the media and the general public. It will be multi-disciplinary, spanning engineering, statistics, sociology, and psychology, including the application of big-data analytics to on-line data sources to better understand public attitudes and anxieties around everyday risks.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'This Institute aims be a magnet attracting top international risk-related experts for cross-learning and collaboration that will develop into a renowned global institution for global risk understanding. The direction, priorities and output of the Institute will be independent in order to earn public credibility. It will also provide objective commentary on hot topics surrounding the popular understanding of risk. The Institute will generate new understanding and develop new tools and approaches applied to enhancing the public understanding of risk and promoting communication between all stakeholders in society.']
req: ['The Institute seeks to hire a world-renowned scholar or industry expert in a relevant field to be its Deputy Director. Successful applicants should have proven experience and a strong track record in running similar-sized international, multidisciplinary programmes on the scale intended for the Institute. The appointment of Deputy Director is a full-time position with generous support for research and outreach activities.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The Deputy Director will support the Director and be part of the Institute’s management board, which works in consultation with the Institute’s Governing Board to provide leadership in research, education and outreach. He or she should be a visionary and energetic leader who is capable of building international connections.\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Interested candidates are encouraged to find out more at\xa0http://lrfi.nus.edu.sg']

desc: ['About\xa0Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) ', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualisation solutions. For more information about I²R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', '  ', 'The candidate is required to perform the following tasks:', '  ', '  ', 'Develop of semi-supervised or unsupervised method for machine translation or language understanding', '  ', 'Integration of knowledge and language understanding into the NMT Framework', ' ']
req: ['  ', 'Minimum Bachelor in\xa0Computer Science, specialise in Computational Linguistics', '  ', 'Entry level graduates with relevant experience in machine translation, natural language processing, machine learning theory and practice are welcome to apply', '  ', 'Adept in C/C++ programming or Python programming', '  ', 'Ability to work independently as well as a good team player', ' ', '  ', 'The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified']

desc: ['We are looking for highly motivated Research Fellow with strong research interests at the junction of mobility, urban sensing, transportations, and big data analytics. desc: ['About the Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R)', '  ', 'The Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R) is a member of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) family and is Singapore’s largest ICT research institute. Our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. For more information about I2R, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', '  ', 'We are looking for strong candidates in the field of Artificial intelligence and deep learning, with an interest in working on both fundamental algorithms in large-scale machine learning or deep learning, and also applying it to practical problems in vertical domains.', '  ', 'The position, based within the Program in Artificial Intelligence at I2R, entails working closely with a highly interdisciplinary team of researchers with training from leading universities like MIT, Stanford and CMU. Listed below are problems of interest in the Deep Learning 2.0 project:', '  ', 'Deep learning application in AME (Semiconductor domain): ', 'Explore state-of-the-art deep learning technologies in Advance Manufacturing Engineering, especially in semiconductor industries. Including, but not limited to, yield analysis and prediction, predictive maintenance (PdM), advanced DoE analysis and prediction, etc.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']

Skills', '  ', 'Strong programming abilities (e.g. Perl, Bash, C/C++, Java, Python, R, MATLAB)', '  ', 'Computer vision and deep learning skills desirable', ' ', '  ', 'The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. desc: ['ABOUT TAIGER', '  ', 'Headquartered in Singapore, TAIGER is a fast-growing Artificial Intelligence (AI) company with a global footprint. Our mission is to help organizations optimize operational efficiencies by automating complex cognitive tasks. We are a market leader and the pioneer of Knowledge Work AutomationTM. The solutions we provide use natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision techniques (e.g. semantic analysis, concept-extraction, multi-language knowledge graphs, and object detection) to provide unparalleled accuracy in information extraction for industry leaders across the financial services, government sectors and more. TAIGER is recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor. Find out more about us at\xa0www.taiger.com\xa0and\xa0www.linkedin.com/company/taiger', '  ', 'PRODUCT MANAGER', '  ', 'We are building a team passionate about cutting-edge AI technology and the potential of TAIGER. You should be motivated by growth opportunities with your responsibilities expanding in scope. You can also look forward to be part of a dynamic start-up environment where your contribution matters.', '  ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', '  ', '   ', 'Work closely with internal and external customers, sales and engineering teams to oversee delivery of product requirements in-line with stakeholder needs, technical capabilities and with alignment to success metrics.', '   ', 'Drive modern forms of product planning, customer discovery, product discovery, and product development process, as well as ensure successful execution and implementation of product roadmaps.', '   ', 'Assist in the execution of TAIGER’s product strategy, working closely with Director, Product to develop a clear product roadmap with realistic milestones and measurable outcomes.', '   ', 'Ensure that TAIGER’s products remain competitive, relevant and innovative in the market by comparing existing solutions against relevant products to gather a strong understanding of latest products trends and the Artificial Intelligence domain.', '   ', 'Create internal product functions for TAIGER, ensuring that resource capabilities, and technical limitations are optimized to achieve company product vision.', '   ', 'Develop external opportunities, and ensure that sales decisions are supported with internal technical documentations, data-analytics and product collaterals to enable data-driven decision making.', '  ']
req: ['REQUIREMENTS', '  ', '   ', 'BSc or MSc in Computer Science, Engineering, Business or related disciplines.', '   ', '3+ years of experience in Product Management for technology / software products or Artificial Intelligence domain-related product experience.', '   ', 'Demonstrated understanding and interest in the Artificial Intelligence industry and driving innovation aligned with technology trends and customer needs.', '   ', 'Prior working experience developing product functions within large-scale technology, financial or government organizations, converting strategic product plans to measurable go-to-market outcomes.', '   ', 'Expertise in translating customer needs into user stories through qualitative needs analysis user research methods and research analysis creating, conducting, and analysing usability evaluations.', '   ', 'Proven track record in stakeholder management with excellence written and oral command of English.\xa0', '  ', '  ', 'YOU WILL BE AT AN ADVANTAGE WITH THESE SKILLS', '  ', '   ', 'You have strong problem-solving skills and possess a high degree of creativity and resourcefulness.', '   ', 'You have a track record of successfully delivering quality, on-time results.', '   ', 'You are a strong communicator with ability to deliver clear and impactful messages.', '   ', 'You possess effective time management and networking skills.', '   ', 'You demonstrate excellent organizational, analytical and strategic skills.', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'In TAIGER we believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will result in a better workplace for our team and a better product for our clients. Join the growing team at TAIGER today!', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '*TAIGER does not engage any recruitment agencies for recruitment of talents into our company. All job applications should be submitted directly to TAIGER.']

desc:
['You will be involved in the specialise domains such as biometrics, Sense & Making & Surveillance, Cyber security, video or data analytics. As project manager/system engineer you will manage and execute assigned projects under Command & Control Programme Team. Your will responsible for successful project development and maintenance of these programmes. You will ensure that all project deliverables meet the required quality standards and ensure smooth handling and taking over of knowledge during project handover. In addition, you will be required to process procurement papers, tender specifications, proper tracking of all finance-related transactions. You may also be required to perform other project duties or administrative as required by the head of department.', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'Job Description/Expectations', '
', 'The role will give you opportunities to:', '
', '• Apply engineering knowledge to solve well-defined engineering problems', '
', '• Assist in development of engineering solutions for projects/programmes', '
', '• Develop practical solutions within clearly defined policies, principles and objectives', '
', '• Implement engineering solutions and robust validation for the specific system or sub-system.', '
', '• Address capability gaps and identify suitable technologies or develop new capabilities', '
', '• Synergize the use of common technologies/infrastructure to cooperate and collaborate with various agencies to achieve organisational objectives.', '
', '• Perform system administration/management of the systems.', '
', '• be involve in various procurement papers, proper tracking of all finance-related transactions', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'Requirements', '
', '• Engineering, Computer Science or Information Technology or any other related fields.', '
', '• Preferably with at least 2 years of project or system management experiences in managing small to large scale.', '
', '• Possess knowledge in information management technologies and area of IT security', '
', '• Possess knowledge in System Engineering methodology and life cycle management', '
', '• Possess excellent communication skill both in terms of good writing and presentation skills', '
', '• Good communication and interpersonal skills', '
', '• Strong analytical skills, resourceful, meticulous and a team player', '
', '• Able to multi-task and work independently', '
', '• Knowledge in C2 systems, and IT infrastructure such as servers, routers, switches, firewalls, big data hosting, video platform, storage, security etc would be an advantage.']

desc: [' \t', 'Provide daily administration & support on emerging cloud technology which has hands-on experience on Azure, O365 and various cloud services such as container services, ASE, data analytics etc.', ' \t', 'Prefer have the appreciation on legacy technology such as VMWare, SAN which can involve on transformation projects', ' \t', 'Pariticipate and make recommendation on improving monitoring of IT Infrastructure to ensure optimal IT Services delivery', ' \t', 'Support and involved or lead cloud computing migration and operation which could be initiated from cross-function team', ' \t', 'Support overseas/ remote office IT infrastructure setup.', ' \t', 'Have the understanding of data center operation support and administration.', ' \t', 'Coordinate and conduct regular attestation reviews as per policies and procedures.', ' \t', 'Providing solutions to business.', ' \t', 'Manage projects when required.', ' \t', 'Review workflow, processes and ensure SOPs are in place and remain relevant.', ' \t', 'Define, develop architectural & setup standards and implementation guide to meet business needs globally.', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Technical know-how and experience in IT solutions such as (but not limited to) and at least operated in more than one of the following: \t', ' \t\t', 'A must to have in-depth experience in architecture design, managing and support the following applications/systems – Cloud Computing Platforms (Office365, Azure, AWS,etc), Microsoft Active Directory, DNS & DHCP Services, GPO, Microsoft Windows Server Operating Systems etc.', ' \t\t', 'Good knowledge in administrating the following technologies will be a plus – Microsoft Lync/Skype for Business, Linux based Operating Systems, VMware & Hyper-V hypervisors, SAN/NAS, Endpoint Backup Solution, Citrix, CommVault, Public & Private Certificates management.', ' \t\t', 'Certifications such as Microsoft Certified Professioanl (MCSE various track), VMware, PMP/ PRINCE2, ITIL V3, AWS Certified Solutions Architect/ Azure Solutions Architect will be an added advantage.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Minimum 6 years hands on experience in the above stated technologies', ' \t', 'Independent worker with initiatives, resourceful, positive attitude, friendly deposition, and team player.', ' \t', 'Experience in working with different cultures and demographics.', ' \t', 'Good analytical skills and attention to details.', ' \t', 'Good verbal and written communication.', ' \t', 'Willing to work on Jurong Island, and able to work on weekends occasionally.', ' ']

job_title: ['Temporary Staff for Home Team Foundation Course']
desc: [' ', ' ', 'Position', ' ', 'Temporary Staff to support the administration of the Home Team Foundation Course', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Background', ' ', 'The Centre for Home Team Foundation Training and Heritage of the Home Team Academy, Ministry of Home Affairs is searching for a temporary staff to provide administrative support for the implementation of the Home Team Foundation Course (HTFC).', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'The HTFC is a two-week residential programme and will serve as a key milestone course to build a One Home Team mindset for all the new-entrant Home Team Senior Officers. The HTFC will support Home Team Transformation 2025 by exposing its participants to the Home Team’s challenges, sharing how the Home Team is transforming to meet these challenges, and equipping them with cross-cutting skills such as data analytics. Through its experiential elements and learning visits, the HTFC also seeks to strengthen the Home Team culture and foster camaraderie through shared experiences and ethos. All new-entrant Home Team Senior Officers are required to attend the HTFC within one year of passing out from their respective Home Team Department’s basic courses. There are 10 runs of the HTFC expected in a calendar year.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Job Responsibilities', ' ', '1. To assist in the submission of budget requirements and monitoring of', ' ', 'expenditure for the course;', ' ', '2. To procure in bulk, the personal-issued items such as course attire;', ' ', '3. To work with respective Home Team Departments on the nomination of course participants;', ' ', '4. To liaise and coordinate with lecturers and trainers according to the planned course timetable;', ' ', '5. To procure and coordinate the meal arrangements for various events e.g. daily meals at HTA Cookhouse and Closing Ceremony lunch at MHA;', ' ', '6. To provide logistical support and coordination such as the booking of accommodation, training facilities and venues at the Home Team Academy, Training Village, Home Team Tactical Centre and Ministry of Home Affairs;', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', '7. To procure and manage the transportation services for learning visits;', ' ', '8. To perform the administrator role for the Home Team Learning Management System such as setting up of accounts, uploading of pre-course reading materials and evaluation questions;', ' ', '9. To procure and prepare course-related materials such as stationery, certificates, certificate holders, course photographs and journals;', ' ', '10. To ensure that the layout plans are in accordance to the conduct of lessons;', ' ', '11. To work with Training Safety and Assessment Branch, HTA on the training safety aspects such as preparation of risk assessment forms for outdoor activities;', ' ', '12. To procure and work with Corporate Services, HTA on the accommodation arrangement such as cleaning services for rooms and linen;', ' ', '13. To work with Security Branch, HTA and partner agencies on security-related issues e.g. security clearance; and', ' ', '14. To assist in the preparation and administering of course assessment;', ' ', '15. To arrange for photo-taking of key activities such as fireside chats and group photo', ' ', '16. To prepare certificates for participants, including editing and printing of group photo and certificates', ' ', '17. To procure and manage the team building activity', ' ', '18. To administer and consolidate all the module and course feedback;', ' ', '19. To assist in report generation of collated data for further analysis; and', ' ', '20. Other duties as directed by the HTFC Course Manager.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Job Requirements:', ' ', '1. Experience in government procurement processes;', ' ', '2. Experience in supporting events for senior management;', ' ', '3. Self-driven, able to work independently or in teams, manage multiple task and tight deadlines;', ' ', '4. Proficient in Microsoft Office;', ' ', '5. Strong interpersonal, verbal and communication skills; and', ' ', '6. Willing to commit a minimum of 11 months consisting of five-days work week.', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['We are seeking a high energy and passionate Virtual Assistant (Chatbot) product evangelist with good technical knowledge to join our team that develop meaningful digital services.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Our products’ motto is to serve our citizens’ need through intuitive user centric design and anticipates their evolving needs with data analytics as they transit through crucial moments of their life.\xa0 Be part of the team that builds the next generation multi-channel virtual assistant that can intelligently engages citizens in conversational manner as it helps to identify and complete their transactions with the Government.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'You will be collaborating with diverse group of multi-disciplinary colleagues, forward looking government agency stakeholders and competent solution partners, all bonded by the same burning desire to make a better future through our products.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'You shall exhibit an outcome oriented personality and is experienced with the realization process from system design to solution evaluation to technical implementation.\xa0 The ability to pick up new skills and constantly looking for relevant emerging solutions are equally important in our work!\xa0 Of course, we can never escape from operational work that comes with the need to keep our digital services running 24/7.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Success in this role will be demonstrated by your ability to translate our products’ vision into reality.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'You will play an integral part in a team to design and then realize the Government’s next phase plans to engage Citizens using conversation.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'What to Expect:', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Analyze business requirements, design and implement pilots and proof of concepts', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Develop, integrate and maintain in-house or external artificial intelligent and cognitive solution stacks', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Create models, train and leveraging machine learning APIs to build solutions with embedded intelligence in a variety of domain-specific chatbot use-cases', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Design master question and answer pairs and develop conversational flow', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Write automated unit, feature and regression test suites', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Support operation and handle queries for our suite of operationalized products', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'How to Succeed:', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Disciplines in Information Technology, Data Science or related fields', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Knowledgeable in major chatbot frameworks or products in the market', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Ability to implement conversational chatbots, develop effective training phrases, build domain centric intent-entity relationship or information graphs', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Optimize master question-and-answer pairs and improve user experience through content design', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Hands-on experience in developing webhook applications using Node.js or other server-side code implementation', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Broad conceptual understanding of Machine Learning (Supervised & Unsupervised), Machine Classifiers and etc.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'General domain understanding of Natural Language Processing, Speech-to-text, Speech Synthesis, Sentiment Analysis and other relevant cognitive services related domains', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Comfortable to work on system design and development projects or system roadmap that involves a hybrid of matured technology and maturing technology.', ' ', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['Responsibilities', '\xa0', 'As a Lecturer, your contributions go beyond teaching and facilitating learning. You play a critical role in recognising and nurturing your students’ potential and their lifelong learning needs. In addition, you will carry out industry or consultancy projects to help you remain relevant in your profession and to evolving changes in industry, and maintain strong linkages with industry and schools. You will also have the opportunity to have industry attachments or experience on a regular basis to update your skills, knowledge and practices of your profession. Those with good and relevant experience can look forward to Senior Lecturer or equivalent positions, with career development opportunities to leadership positions in the Colleges or Headquarters.', 'Requirements', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'You should be trained in Engineering, Mechatronics, Mechanical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related field in the discipline. Mechatronics background with teaching experience is a plus.', ' ', 'Preferably three years of industry experience with at least one of the following areas: Mechatronics/Robotics, Automation, Programmable Logic Controllers, Systems Integration, Networking, Industrial and Collaborative robotics, Electromechanical Systems, Mechanical Engineering Design.', ' ', 'Multi-disciplinary engineering industry experience with a focus on Advanced/Smart Manufacturing, Industrial Internet of Things, machine to machine networking and data collection, Data Analytics and Systems Analysis for Manufacturing, Systems Integration of Industry 4.0 will be an added advantage.', ' ', 'Skills/Abilities:', ' ', ' ', 'Proficient in Microsoft Office applications such as word-processing and presentation software, internet, including e-mail application.', ' ', 'Effective verbal, written, and listening communication skills.', ' ', 'Proficiency in electronics hardware design and prototyping, including: Microcontroller Programming (Arduino, Raspberry Pi), Python, Labview, Matlab, and Arduino IDE or equivalent', ' ', 'Familiarity with 3D software such as AutoCAD, Solidworks, Autodesk’s Inventor or equivalent.', ' ', 'Comfortable with technology and its integration in the classroom.', ' ', 'Ability to work with colleagues-students, convey knowledge in-a-form students can understand, and be able to adapt teaching techniques to student needs-various instructional setting.', ' ', 'Ability to work independently as well as within a group and be able to motivate students. Ability to work with a diverse group of students.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['Citi Security Operations Center (SOC).\xa0', ' Principle Responsibilities:', ' •Enhance the value of the current deployment of commercial tools used by Security Operations Center.', ' •Evaluate new technologies and participate in Proof of Concept (POC) projects', ' •Research and identify the new areas of risk and exposure where SOC should focus.', ' •Conducts threat research on threat intelligence received from either external vendors or internal groups', ' •Participate in SOC internal projects such as SOC tools development, data analytics and SOC lab expansion.', ' •Participate in major security events as subject matter expert.']

Intrusion detection and prevention and Network Security Products (IDS/IPS, firewalls, etc.) Host Security Products (HIPS, AV, scanners, etc.)', ' •Knowledge of cutting edge threats and technologies effecting Web Application vulnerabilities and recent internet threats', ' •Exposure on Vulnerability assessment as well as penetration testing or forensic analysis fields are an advantage', ' •Certifications from EC-Council, GIAC, (ISC)² are preferred [CISSP, C|EH, GCIA, CCNA]']
