job_title: ['Senior Associate, Institutional Banking Group, GTS-SME Cash Commercialisation Specialist - (WD03694)']
desc: ['Business Function', '  ', 'Global Transaction Services (GTS) comprises of Cash & Trade, Securities Services and Fiduciary Services. In an increasingly borderless world marked by burgeoning trade flow, expertise in trade finance services is an invaluable asset. With cash the lifeblood of every company, so too, is a good understanding of how to manage these cashflows. Trade Finance, together with Cash Management, is the mainstay of GTS, and is extended to SME and corporate clients for their local and cross-border financial transaction needs.', '  ', ' ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', 'Growing the regional SME business is an important component of the overall bank strategy. As the SME client segment provides a rich and diversified source of CASA balances, it is important for us to capture operating flows from our customers by leveraging our GTS Cash Management capabilities.', '  ', 'To realize this business potential, the Cash Commercialization Specialists play a crucial role. This function will help to drive business growth by executing the joint SME-GTS business strategy, by rolling out new products and by enabling the client facing sales teams to effectively sell the cash management solutions.', '  ', ' This function will be responsible for successful delivery of the following outcomes:', '  ', ' \t', 'Superior Product Proposition: ', 'Develop and strengthen the SME Cash product propositions based on a deep understanding of client needs and processes. Commercialize the product solutions by comprehensively addressing the business needs of specific client segments. SME requirements are typically quite simple – accordingly package existing products to cater for ease of use and scalability. For different markets, there may also be a need for localization of these product packages;', ' \t', 'Sales Enablement: ', 'Implement processes to enable RM / Sales teams to have a clear understanding of the product propositions so that they can easily market these solutions to the relevant client segments. Provide training and marketing support to implement go-to-market plans and drive product usage;', ' \t', 'SME Scale-up:', ' Implement plans to win additional marketshare and share of wallet. Drive actions to scale up the SME business via new client acquisition and product usage. Leverage data analytics to identify new leads. Use digital marketing and acquisition tools to enable clients to be onboarded quickly and efficiently. Develop and implement plans to gain greater business traction in markets like HK, Taiwan, Indonesia and India;', ' \t', 'Digital:', ' Drive efforts to maximize the use digital channels for client acquisition, transactions and ongoing engagements. Focus on providing a positive customer experience with immediate fulfilment wherever possible. Drive greater use of electronic channels like IDEAL and APIs to capture customers’ transactional flows and operating business. Business development of ecosystem opportunities including marketplaces, supply chains, integrated ERP platforms or merchant solutions that allow us to capture new business opportunities at scale;', ' \t', 'Partnerships: ', 'Leverage partnerships with ERP platforms, card networks, insurance partners and others to help deliver better solutions to our customers.', ' ', '  ', 'The Cash Commercialization Specialist will work closely with GTS product managers, SME RMs, product marketing team, IBG Digital and the in-country teams to ensure the delivery of business growth targets. This role will report into the head of GTS-SME Cash Head.']
req: ['Requirements', '  ', ' \t', 'Keen interest in the GTS and SME business;', ' \t', 'Good communication and writing skills;', ' \t', 'Keen interest in new age technology trends;', ' \t', 'Ability to work and collaborate across diversified teams;', ' \t', 'Manage internal and external stakeholders effectively to execute the project plan;', ' \t', 'High sense of responsibility and ownership to ensure given tasks are seen to fruition on time.', ' ']
skills: ['Accounting', 'Auditing', 'Business Development', 'Business Strategy', 'Corporate Finance', 'Due Diligence', 'Finance', 'Financial Analysis', 'Financial Modeling', 'Financial Reporting', 'Investments', 'Leadership', 'Management', 'Management Consulting', 'Mergers & Acquisitions', 'Private Equity', 'Project Management', 'Strategic Planning', 'Strategy', 'Valuation']

job_title: ['Manager /  Senior Manager (Compliance Operations Management), (Labour Relations & Workplaces Division) - 1 year contract']
desc: ['Responsibilities', ' ', 'You will be part of a dynamic team that is responsible for driving the Employment Act compliance through effective detection, intervention and deterrence measures. As such, your scope of duties are as follows:', ' ', ' ', 'Work closely with relevant stakeholders, such as the Tripartite Alliance for Dispute Management (TADM), and Tripartite Alliance for Fair and Progressive Employment Practices (TAFEP) to identify potential non-compliance of the Employment Act. To liaise with other MOM divisions and relevant stakeholders involving cross cutting complaint issues', ' ', 'Adopt compliance and salary declarations as enforcement tools to evaluate employers’ adherence with employment laws or standards', ' ', 'Assess valid complaints and salary claims and recommend appropriate enforcement actions against errant employers based on the established framework which include suspension of work pass privileges', ' ', 'Manage public enquiries on Employment Act violations which include employers’ appeals against suspension of their work pass privileges', ' ', 'Apply design thinking, data analytics and harness technology (e.g., robotic process automation) to continually raise productivity and streamline work processes', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Requirements', ' ', 'You should possess the following:', ' ', ' ', 'Prior experience in enforcement, investigation and prosecution is an advantage', ' ', 'Knowledge of the Employment Act is an advantage', ' ', 'Hands-on experience in robotic process automation, Vlookup, Pivot Table, Tableau and other business solutions', ' ', 'Strong analytical, conceptualisation and interpersonal skills', ' ', 'Ability to demonstrate critical thinking, and looks for new and innovative ways to get things done', ' ', 'Ability to work independently and adapt to an unstructured, evolving, ambiguous and fast-paced environment', ' ', 'Ability to meet high volume demands and work effectively on tight timelines', ' ', 'Excellent communication skills, both oral and written, with the ability to pitch ideas and influence stakeholders', ' ', 'Possess a positive work attitude and able to handle challenging situations', ' ', 'Self-driven and a good team player', ' ']

desc: ['About Tookitaki', '  ', 'Tookitaki is providing machine learning-powered enterprise solutions to address regulatory compliance problems in the financial services sector. Incorporated in November 2014 in Singapore, the company is led by a core team with cumulative 30-years’ experience in finance, AI and big data analytics. Backed by institutional investors such as Jungle Ventures and Spring Seeds (a subsidiary of the Singapore Government), the company’s accolades include:', '  ', ' \t', 'We are among the selected 21 companies which got accreditation from the government of Singapore for their stringent technology, finance and operations due diligence (www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/programmes-and-grants/startups/accreditation-at-sgd)', ' \t', 'We won the first place in the MAS FinTech Awards (Singapore SME) in the regulatory compliance space from the Monetary Authority of Singapore for our approach to make the workflows in AML and Reconciliation scalable and highly auditable (beyond ML based black box approach) (www.mas.gov.sg/News-and-Publications/Media-Releases/2016/Ten-FinTech-companies-recognised-for-innovative-solutions-at-inaugural-FinTech-Awards.aspx)', ' \t', 'We are voted as one of the top 21 AI start-ups focusing on the financial services space by medici (www.letstalkpayments.com/medici-top-21-ai-companies/)', ' \t', "We graduated from Nomura's corporate innovation program in November 2017 where we successfully delivered our product – Reconciliation Management Suite – in a pilot environment (https://inc42.com/buzz/nomura-voyager-fintech-accelerator-voyager-demo-day/)", ' ', '  ', 'In regulatory compliance, we focus on anti-money laundering and reconciliation and our products – Alerts Management Suite (AMS) and Reconciliation Management Suite (RMS) – cater to these areas, respectively. The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  ', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to existing core-banking applications (REST API endpoints), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  ', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Banks need to move beyond static rule-based systems and adopt a new approach to prevent financial and reputation loss. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMS, RMS and PMS.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['Role: Lead Project Manager', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', 'Lead project management office (PMO) at Tookitaki. Your key responsibilities will include:', '  ', '  ', 'Execute, maintain and ensure standards for project management across the organization. You need to the keeper of the best practices, project status and direction – all in one spot.', '  ', 'Provide tangible, repeatable, long term benefits to the business.', '  ', 'Align with cooperate strategy and culture; be agile enough to adapt as strategy shifts.', '  ', 'Be a key enabler for high-performing organization.', '  ', 'Integrate data and information from multiple projects and create the framework for various aspects of project management, but not limited to project scoping, staff forecasting and utilization, delivery methodologic, tools and techniques for project success across the organization.', '  ', 'Coaches, mentors, trains and provides oversight for project managers and delivery staff.', '  ', 'Work with key delivery stakeholders to prepare weekly project portfolio updates and prepare project summary updates for the management.', '  ', 'Ad-hoc assignments as and when needed to support the success of projects.', ' ', '  ', 'Requirements', '  ', '  ', "10 - 12 years' business experience in financial services industry, preferably in banking with 3-4 years of experience in the Tier 1 or Teri 2 consulting firm (McKinsey/BCG/Bain/Accenture/EY/ATK/KPMG)", '  ', 'Proven leadership and people management skills required, along with excellent written, communication in English, and presentation skills.', '  ', 'Very proficient in Powerpoint & Excel tools with an ability to prepare senior management ready decks under tight deadlines', '  ', 'Project management: schedule, dependency and risk management', '  ', 'Graduate / Post-graduate degree preferably in a science or finance related discipline', '  ', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and manage a large number of stakeholders in a fast paced environment.', '  ', 'Ability to attend to details while keeping the big picture goals in mind, manage multiple tasks readily, effectively and within the tight deadlines.', '  ', 'Analytical, solution oriented, strong skills in the area of business process operations and business process improvement activities.', '  ', 'Trusted agent, acts with integrity.', '  ', 'Systematic, tenacious and persistent in following up with multiple parties - including senior stakeholders - to achieve project and program goals', ' ', '  ', '\xa0 Soft Skills ', '  ', '  ', 'Strong interpersonal and organizational skills', '  ', '7+ years’ experience working in external client situations', '  ', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills', '  ', 'Negotiation skills with regard to schedules, issues, change requests, etc.', '  ', 'Strong team orientation and proven ability to execute and produce team results', '  ', 'Demonstrated ability to work in a fast-paced team environment', '  ', 'Understanding and willingness to work in a startup environment', '  ', 'Critical thinking', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Qualifications', '  ', '  ', 'MBA/MS with good knowledge in either data science, financial risk management, reconciliation or compliance domains', ' ', '  ', 'Job Perks', '  ', '  ', 'Attractive variable compensation package', '  ', 'Flexible working hours - everything is results-oriented', '  ', 'Opportunity to work with an award-winning organization in the hottest space in tech - artificial intelligence and advanced machine learning', ' ']

desc: ['Are you interested in data analytics or technology in general? desc: ['Introducing Tookitaki', '  ', 'Tookitaki is providing machine learning-powered enterprise solutions to address regulatory compliance problems in the financial services sector. Incorporated in November 2014 in Singapore, the company is led by a core team with cumulative 150-years’ experience in financial crime, AI and big data analytics. Backed by institutional investors such as Jungle Ventures, Illuminate Financial and Enterprise Singapore (a subsidiary of the Singapore Government), the company’s accolades include:', '  ', ' \t', 'We are among the selected 21 companies which got accreditation from the government of Singapore for their stringent technology, finance and operations due diligence (www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/programmes-and-grants/startups/accreditation-at-sgd)', ' \t', 'We won the first place in the MAS FinTech Awards (Singapore SME) in the regulatory compliance space from the Monetary Authority of Singapore for our approach to make the workflows in AML and Reconciliation scalable and highly auditable (beyond ML based black box approach) (www.mas.gov.sg/News-and-Publications/Media-Releases/2016/Ten-FinTech-companies-recognised-for-innovative-solutions-at-inaugural-FinTech-Awards.aspx)', ' \t', 'We are voted as one of the top 21 AI start-ups focusing on the financial services space by medici (www.letstalkpayments.com/medici-top-21-ai-companies/)', ' \t', "We graduated from Nomura's corporate innovation program in November 2017 where we successfully delivered our product – Reconciliation Management Suite – in a pilot environment (https://inc42.com/buzz/nomura-voyager-fintech-accelerator-voyager-demo-day/)", ' ', '  ', 'In regulatory compliance, we focus on anti-money laundering and reconciliation and our products – Anti-Money Laundering Suite (AMLS) and Reconciliation Suite (RS) – cater to these areas, respectively. The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to exiting core-banking applications (REST API end points), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  ', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Banks need to move beyond static rule-based systems and adopt a new approach to prevent financial and reputation loss. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMLS and RS.']
req: ['Role: ', 'Senior Solution Architect', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0\xa0', '  ', 'Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'Tookitaki’s engineering team is looking for a smart candidate for the position of Senior Solution Architect. The candidate’s roles and responsibilities will include:', '  ', ' \t', 'Working with customers during the sales process to prepare customer and Client Delivery for an engagement', ' \t', 'Actively partnering with sales for closing deals', ' \t', 'Being the sole technical contact for client (be technical expert, not coordinator)', ' \t', 'Communicating with product management on customer needs & problems', ' \t', 'Conducting technical deep-dive sessions with prospects', ' \t', 'Exercising expert knowledge of Tookitaki products and their integration into many diverse financial institutions', ' \t', 'Exercising good knowledge of AI/ML and financial crime', ' \t', 'Assessing, managing and mitigating technical challenges with customer IT environments', ' \t', 'Ensuring technical feasibility of intended solution', ' \t', "Advocating for customer's needs within Tookitaki; ensuring client expectations exceeded", ' \t', 'Occasionally assisting client delivery or perform pre-sales consulting', ' \t', 'Occasionally conducting training for clients or partners', ' \t', 'Working in a collaborative environment with other solution architects', ' ', '  ', 'Skillsets and Experience (must-have)', '  ', ' \t', '5+ years’ experience as any of: systems integrator, software architect, senior data scientist, enterprise architect', ' \t', '3+ years’ customer-facing experience', ' \t', 'Familiarity with AI/ML', ' \t', 'Experience with Linux, Python, JSON/XML, SQL', ' \t', 'Experience with ETL', ' \t', 'Strong English communications skills - verbal, written, presentation', ' \t', 'Clean record from background check', ' ', '  ', 'Preferred Requirements', '  ', ' \t', 'Knowledge of financial crimes (AML, fraud) and banking', ' \t', 'Experience creating and testing a ML model', ' \t', 'Experience working with and supporting a sales organization', ' \t', 'Experience as systems integrator', ' ', '  ', 'Travel Requirements', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', ' \t', 'Up to 50%', ' \t', 'Must be able to travel to Europe, the US, Singapore and more', ' ', '  ', 'Selection Process', '  ', "The candidate will be asked to (1) provide a technical writing sample (document), (2) conduct a conference call presentation for 15-20 minutes on a topic of the candidate's choosing (preferably an AI project) with 10 minutes of Q&A, and (3) write a simple Python program for ETL.", '  ', 'Job Perks', '  ', ' \t', 'Attractive variable compensation package', ' \t', 'Flexible working hours - everything is results-oriented', ' \t', 'Opportunity to work with an award-winning organization in the hottest space in tech - artificial intelligence and advanced machine learning', ' ']

desc: ['About Tookitaki', '  ', 'Tookitaki is providing machine learning-powered enterprise solutions to address regulatory compliance problems in the financial services sector. Incorporated in November 2014 in Singapore, the company is led by a core team with cumulative 30-years’ experience in finance, AI and big data analytics. Backed by institutional investors such as Jungle Ventures and Spring Seeds (a subsidiary of the Singapore Government), the company’s accolades include:', '  ', ' \t', 'We are among the selected 21 companies which got accreditation from the government of Singapore for their stringent technology, finance and operations due diligence (www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/programmes-and-grants/startups/accreditation-at-sgd)', ' \t', 'We won the first place in the MAS FinTech Awards (Singapore SME) in the regulatory compliance space from the Monetary Authority of Singapore for our approach to make the workflows in AML and Reconciliation scalable and highly auditable (beyond ML based black box approach) (www.mas.gov.sg/News-and-Publications/Media-Releases/2016/Ten-FinTech-companies-recognised-for-innovative-solutions-at-inaugural-FinTech-Awards.aspx)', ' \t', 'We are voted as one of the top 21 AI start-ups focusing on the financial services space by medici (www.letstalkpayments.com/medici-top-21-ai-companies/)', ' \t', "We graduated from Nomura's corporate innovation program in November 2017 where we successfully delivered our product – Reconciliation Management Suite – in a pilot environment (https://inc42.com/buzz/nomura-voyager-fintech-accelerator-voyager-demo-day/)", ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'In regulatory compliance, we focus on anti-money laundering and reconciliation and our products – Alerts Management Suite (AMS) and Reconciliation Management Suite (RMS) – cater to these areas, respectively. The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  ', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to exiting core-banking applications (REST API end points), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  ', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Banks need to move beyond static rule-based systems and adopt a new approach to prevent financial and reputation loss. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMS, RMS and PMS.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['Engineering @ Tookitaki', '  ', 'The engineering team is responsible for building a robust predictive platform, which can add significant value to the BFSI vertical in solving operational and compliance risk problems. We take pride in building the system right and continuously evolving it. You have the freedom to choose right tools for the task. We also encourage to participate in and contribute to open source community.', '  ', 'Our Ideal Candidate ', '  ', 'Our engineering team is looking for a Senior Engineering with a work experience of 7+ years. The candidate would be responsible for contributing to product development and would be considered a good fit if he/she:', '  ', ' \t', 'Own the technology strategy and architecture, and roadmap of technology investments in alignment with company position and business strategy', ' \t', 'Lead building technological or data-driven competitive advantages for advancing company key battles', ' \t', 'Own and manage key quality, reliability, and performance metrics of products, platforms, and other systems supporting various functions in the Company', ' \t', 'Ensure acquisition of best practices in various necessary domains of expertise in the company, and scale and democratize the best practices to the rest of the Company', ' \t', 'Ability to attract and retain good talent, and quickly grow engineering and research team', ' \t', 'Achieve a high performance technology Company', ' \t', 'Keep up to date with technology trends, changes, new paradigms of organization, and upcoming disruption, and shape company technology strategy proactively to respond to landscape changes', ' \t', 'Nuanced leadership ability to be able to manage stakeholders and talents across the Company', ' \t', 'Business acumen to be able to align and justify bets and identify technology-relevant opportunities and risks in business', ' \t', 'A passion in coaching and growing talents', ' \t', 'Past experience in implementing data-driven practices and working with data analytics or data engineering or machine learning teams', ' \t', 'Manage a cross-geography team of Engineers and Researchers', ' ', '  ', 'Broad Road Map', '  ', '\xa0Move to become a 10 Mn Revenue company in FY2019-2020', '  ', ' \t', 'DSS – Build a scalable platform for internal and client data scientists. The objective is 2-fold: ability to add related applications (like trade surveillance) easily on top of it in coming years', ' \t', 'allow clients to self-update models, if any policy changes or additional data fields are required Focus on smart ETL, auto ML, self-learning, explain ability and better user experience', ' \t', 'AMLS – Focus on three (03) key components, transaction monitoring, names screening and customer risk rating', ' \t', 'Bring machine learning in all 3 components to move beyond rules and improve efficiency and risk coverage', ' \t', 'RS – Focus on matching and substantiation; bring ML to do auto-matching, instead of rules-based matching and detect exceptions automatically, instead of current manual process', ' ', '  ', 'Desired Non-technical Requirements', '  ', ' \t', 'Very strong communication skills both written and verbal', ' \t', 'Strong desire to work with start-ups', ' \t', 'Must be a team player', ' ', '  ', 'Job Perks', '  ', ' \t', 'Attractive variable compensation package', ' \t', 'Flexible working hours - everything is results-oriented', ' \t', 'Opportunity to work with an award-winning organization in the hottest space in tech - artificial intelligence and advanced machine learning', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['A leading regional bank is currently looking out for a Senior Manager to join its Credit Risk Review function.', '  ', 'Job Responsibilities', '  ', "The bank has gone from strength to strength in the past years in terms of revenue and investing in their employees and digitization, data analytics. The Group Audit team is now looking for a Senior Audit Manager covering Credit Risk Reviews. This will be an individual contributor role, which sits at VP level. Responsibilities of this role include managing and conducting credit risk reviews in accordance with Group Audit's standards and key performance indicators, as well as reviewing AML and CDD conducted by Relationship Managers to ensure the adequacy of operations' procedures for credit facilities and loan documentation. Although this is a regional role, there is minimal travel (~20%) required.", '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Requirements/Qualifications', '  ', ' \t', '9-12 years of experience in credit operations', ' \t', ' \t', 'Prior experience with AML or compliance', ' \t', ' \t', 'Prior audit experience would be advantageous', ' \t', ' \t', 'Strong analytical and numerical skills', ' \t', ' \t', 'Excellent presentation and communication skills', ' \t', ' \t', 'Highly skilled in stakeholder management', ' ']

desc: ['Introducing our firm', '  ', 'BioQuest Advisory is a Singapore based consulting business led by experienced industry veterans from global technology and consulting firms. We partner our industry clients to transform their business and build sustainable growth.', '  ', 'Our key expertise: Robotic Process Automation, Data Analytics, Business Systems Implementation, Business Strategy & Transformation, Process Improvement, Supply Chain Management, Financial Management, Governance & Risk Management.', '  ', '\u200b \u200bOur clients consist of global MNCs and Singapore businesses spanning across multiple industries and Asia Pacific countries.\xa0', '  ', '\u200b', 'The opportunity', '  ', 'BioQuest Advisory is at the exciting phase of our growth in Singapore and across APAC region and is looking for experienced Robotic Process Automation practitioners with strong hands-on technical skills to be part of our journey.', '  ', 'The role', '  ', 'You would be leading our Robotic Process Automation (RPA) project team to partner our clients on their RPA journey. You would be leveraging on your deep knowledge and experience in a variety of RPA solutions to provide leadership in robotic process design, RPA process identification workshops, RPA development, testing and deployment methodologies. Quality and sustainability of the automated process is of high importance.', '  ', 'Your work-scope is not static but dynamic according to each project’s requirements. You would have the opportunity to work with our functional subject matter experts and clients across industries around the Asia region.']
req: ['Your profile', '  ', '   ', 'Degree in Information Technology or any other related discipline', '   ', 'At least 3 years of experience in RPA solution implementation and certified in at least 1 of the top RPA solutions (UiPath, Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere)', '   ', 'More than 5 years of experience in application development, programming in .Net and Object-Oriented Design', '   ', 'Good knowledge and experience in robotic process design, RPA configuration, testing, support', '   ', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills', '   ', 'Good communicator, able to think-on-your-feet, have a customer service attitude', '   ', 'Enjoy working in a team and is a good team leader and player', '  ', '  ', 'Join Us', '  ', 'At BioQuest, we value collaboration, teamwork and knowledge transfers. Our culture is friendly and supportive with a strong emphasis on ethics, diversity and inclusiveness.', '  ', 'As you grow with our firm, you would be able to leverage on your expertise to help transform our clients’ business and gain experience for your personal professional development. We are committed to providing opportunities and coaching to grow our talents.', '  ', 'We are an equal opportunity employer.']

job_title: ['Faculty Positions in Construction Automation - Civil Engineering']
desc: ['The Department of Civil & Environmental Engineering, National University of Singapore (NUS) invites applications for faculty positions in the area of construction automation. The candidate should hold a doctorate in civil engineering and construction and project management, preferably with background and experience in, but not limited to, autonomous system, augmented reality, building information modeling (BIM), smart system, internet of things (IoT), big data analytics, horizontal and vertical integration, artificial intelligence and 3D printing. Relevant experience and professional qualifications (e.g. professional engineer) in civil engineering will be considered favorably. The opening is at the Assistant Professor or Lecturer level. Exceptionally well qualified applicants may be considered at the Associate Professor level.', '  ', 'Postdoctoral experience is highly desirable. The successful candidate must be able to teach effectively in English at both undergraduate and graduate levels and develop an active research programme.', '  ', 'NUS offers internationally competitive remuneration, relocation assistance and other benefits. Newly recruited tenurable faculty members are eligible for start-up grants to facilitate the establishment of their research and development in NUS. Details of terms and benefits are available on http://www.nus.edu.sg/careers/whatyougettoenjoy.html.', '  ', 'Interested candidates should submit with\xa0their applications a detailed curriculum vitae, copies of transcripts, statements of research and teaching interests and professional goals, and the names of three referees.', '  ', 'Further information on the Department of Civil & Environmental Engineering is available at: http://www.eng.nus.edu.sg/cee/. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']
req: ['At least a doctorate degree in Civil Engineering with specialization in construction management.']

job_title: ['Senior Manager, Postgraduate Career Services (3-year contract), LKCSB']
desc: [' ', 'COMPANY DESCRIPTION', ' ', '  ', "Singapore Management University is a place where high-level professionalism blends together with a healthy informality. The 'family-like' atmosphere among the SMU community fosters a culture where employees work, plan, organise and play together – building a strong collegiality and morale within the university.", 'Our commitment to attract and retain talent is ongoing. We offer attractive benefits and welfare, competitive compensation packages, and generous professional development opportunities – all to meet the work-life needs of our staff. No wonder, then, that SMU continues to be given numerous awards and recognition for its human resource excellence.', '  ', ' ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', ' ', '  ', '   ', 'Implement strategies and business development plans to establish strong partnerships with assigned corporates and industry partners', '   ', 'Work with industry partners/ corporates to source and secure internship and employment opportunities for students and to significantly drive internship and employment placement numbers', '   ', 'Provide career advice and career coaching services to postgraduate students from the assigned programmes', '   ', 'Develop, organize and manage events and workshops as part of the Postgraduate Career Management programming', '   ', 'Represent Postgraduate Career Services (PGCS) at programmes recruiting events including information sessions and recruiting dinners and individual meetings/ conversations', '   ', 'Assess, track and report student progress, up through and including employment reporting. Experience with data analytics would be advantageous', '   ', 'Support general ongoing PGCS operations with tasks as assigned', '   ', 'Other duties and special projects as requested by supervisor', '  ']
req: [' \t', 'Relevant undergraduate degree with at least 5 years of professional working experience or relevant postgraduate degree (e.g. MBA)', ' \t', 'Industry experience (e.g. Finance, Consulting, Business Development, HR) would be advantageous', ' \t', 'In addition to industry experience, prefer experience with university Career Services or PG programmes administration', ' \t', 'Global Career Development Facilitator certification (or equivalent) would be advantageous', ' \t', 'Good understanding of, and experience with, career development and career management methodology, preferably at the PG level in Singapore', ' \t', 'Good understanding and experience with advising and coaching professionals and/or PG students with career development', ' \t', 'Demonstrated track record of identifying and building relationships with business clients or partners', ' \t', 'Highly effective communication & advocacy skills to promote students and PG Career Services externally and internally', ' \t', 'Strong interpersonal skills to effectively work with students, corporate partners internal SMU stakeholders', ' \t', 'Strong organizational skills and detail orientation to manage multiple priorities simultaneously', ' \t', 'Desire and ability to work in an environment geared toward collaboration and teamwork', ' \t', 'Good knowledge, comfort and ability with standard office technology (MS Office, Internet, Intranet tools)', ' ', '  ', 'OTHER INFORMATION', '  ', 'Candidates who do not possess the stipulated qualifications but have relevant work experience may still apply. Remuneration and appointment terms shall commensurate with qualifications and experience. SMU reserves the right to modify the appointment terms where necessary.']

We specialise in marketing and brand strategy, consumer planning, advertising, design, interactive, data analytics, direct marketing, promotion and research. We are also the Most-Awarded Effie agency in Singapore, having ranked No.1 in effectiveness for five consecutive years.', '  ', "If you're a HR Practitioner, and the following resonates with you:", '  ', ' \t', 'Like an office job but dislike being bound to your desk all the time.', ' \t', 'Enjoy interacting with colleagues of all levels, ages and nationalities.', ' \t', 'Crave the adrenaline rush of working in a fast-paced environment.', ' \t', 'Strive to be a team player.', ' ', '  ', 'If this describes you, we would like to invite YOU in for a chat!']

desc: ['\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Omnicom Public Relations Group is a global collective of three of the top global public relations agencies worldwide and specialist agencies in areas including public affairs, marketing to women, fashion, global health strategy and corporate social responsibility. It encompasses more than 6,000 public relations professionals in more than 330 offices worldwide who provide their expertise to companies, government agencies, NGOs and nonprofits across a wide range of industries. Omnicom Public Relations Group is part of the DAS Group of Companies, a division of Omnicom Group Inc. that includes more than 200 companies in a wide range of marketing disciplines including advertising, public relations, healthcare, customer relationship management, events, promotional marketing, branding and research.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'As a talent-centric workplace, we recognize that we’re only as good as our people. And our people are outstanding. Every day, we strive to attract, retain and grow the very best talent in the industry, and bring their passion, creativity and smarts to bear for our clients.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The opportunity ', '  ', 'Omnicom Public Relation Group Singapore office has an immediate opportunity for an Account Manager to join our growing team.\xa0 In this dynamic role, you will have the opportunity to build and maintain relationships with top Singapore clients, work closely with the media, and put your solid research, writing, client management skills to use.\xa0 As an experienced industry professional, you will advance brand communications objectives that embrace the client’s strategy and positioning and be an integral part of one of the most successful teams in the office.', '  ', 'What you’ll receive', '  ', 'A progressive environment to propel your career in integrated communications to a new level:', '  ', ' \t', 'Be a vital part of an international network of top industry professionals, and have direct access to key regional leadership in the Singapore office and across our global network;', ' \t', 'A strong coaching and collaboration culture;', ' \t', 'A highly committed, intelligent, and driven team;', ' \t', 'Endless training and professional development opportunities to build your passion for innovation and creative thinking, relentless drive to deliver tangible business results through a combination of technology, data analytics, social media, and communications;', ' \t', 'Career progression as you perform at the highest levels;', ' \t', 'Competitive remuneration and attractive benefits.', ' ']

Omnicom Public Relations Group is part of the DAS Group of Companies, a division of Omnicom Group Inc. that includes more than 200 companies in a wide range of marketing disciplines including advertising, public relations, healthcare, customer relationship management, events, promotional marketing, branding and research.', '  ', 'As a talent-centric workplace, we recognize that we’re only as good as our people. And our people are outstanding. desc: ['The project focuses on optimizing medical resource and appointment scheduling. The project aims to develop patient and resource models for medical appointment scheduling, and design intelligent methods and strategies for scheduling medical appointments and resources with various optimization criteria. We aim to model the treatment plans of patients as workflows and exploit workflow scheduling algorithms in distributed computing for scheduling medical resources and appointments in a coordinated and intelligent manner. We also aim to exploit data analytics, machine learning and advanced simulation techniques to predict uncertainty in medical appointments and develop robust scheduling algorithms for achieving high patient throughput while minimizing demand spikes.']
req: ['Candidates are expected to conduct high-quality research on algorithm design and analysis, performance evaluation, and software prototype development. Applicant should have a minimum qualification of Doctorate degree in Computer Science or any related field.', '  ', 'We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

desc: ['The Offer', '  ', ' \t', 'Great work environment', ' \t', 'Work within a leading employer in the Media & Entertainment industry', ' ', '  ', 'The Employer', '  ', "Our client is Asia’s leading media organisation, engaging minds and enriching lives across multiple languages and platforms. The company's core business is publishing of newspapers, magazines and books in both print and digital editions. It also owns other digital products, online classifieds, radio stations and outdoor media.", '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The Job', '  ', 'As an Audience Strategy Specialist, you will help to set strategy and manage the execution of audience development plans across all media platforms of a leading newspaper.\xa0You will create off-site strategies on how to tell digital stories on new and old platforms.', '  ', 'You will identify emerging growth tactics and new platforms to grow the community using an analytical approach to all levers and platforms. To be successful in this role, you must be a native user of data analytics tools who can make informed strategic and audience decisions.', '  ', 'Your responsibilities include but are not limited to:\xa0', '  ', ' \t', 'Serve as a strategist and a go-between all areas of audience growth and engagement.', ' \t', 'Build an overall social strategy across a number of online and traditional platforms: Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Communities across multiple media, etc.', ' \t', 'Create best practices for programming and editorial content for the different platforms and social share text (e.g. followers are most active at 10am and 4pm, instead of 6 pm - to tweet/post during more during active times)', ' \t', 'Build an editorial strategy for engagement and brand recognition; train producers and editors in crafting social headlines and tactics necessary to help run accounts.', ' \t', 'Test and optimize: run A/B tests to determine what’s working and not working, build templates for social media depending on the platform.', ' \t', 'Work with the community teams on a strategy for reader engagement and outreach and influencers; create conversations around communities of influencers using digital content.', ' ']

desc: ['Introducing Tookitaki', '  ', 'Tookitaki is providing machine learning-powered enterprise solutions to address regulatory compliance problems in the financial services sector. Incorporated in November 2014 in Singapore, the company is led by a core team with cumulative 30-years’ experience in finance, AI and big data analytics. Backed by institutional investors such as Jungle Ventures and Spring Seeds (a subsidiary of the Singapore Government), the company’s accolades include:', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'We are among the selected 21 companies which got accreditation from the government of Singapore for their stringent technology, finance and operations due diligence (www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/programmes-and- grants/startups/accreditation-at-sgd)', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'We won the first place in the MAS FinTech Awards (Singapore SME) in the regulatory compliance space from the Monetary Authority of Singapore for our approach to make the workflows in AML and Reconciliation scalable and highly auditable (beyond ML based black box approach) (www.mas.gov.sg/News-and-Publications/Media- Releases/2016/Ten-FinTech-companies-recognised-for-innovative-solutions-at- inaugural-FinTech-Awards.aspx)', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'We are voted as one of the top 21 AI start-ups focusing on the financial services space by medici (www.letstalkpayments.com/medici-top-21-ai-companies/)', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', "We graduated from Nomura's corporate innovation program in November 2017 where we successfully delivered our product – Reconciliation Management Suite – in a pilot environment (https://inc42.com/buzz/nomura-voyager-fintech-accelerator-voyager- demo-day/)", '  \t', 'In regulatory compliance, we focus on anti-money laundering and reconciliation and our products – Alerts Management Suite (AMS) and Reconciliation Management Suite (RMS) – cater to these areas, respectively. The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  \t', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to exiting core-banking applications (REST API end points), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  \t', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Banks need to move beyond static rule-based systems and adopt a new approach to prevent financial and reputation loss. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMS, RMS and PMS.', ' \t', ' ', '  ', 'careeers@tookitaki.com']
req: ['Engineering/Research@Tookitaki', '  ', 'The engineering/research team is responsible for building a robust predictive platform, which can add significant value to the BFSI vertical in solving operational and compliance risk problems. We take pride in building the system right and continuously evolving it. You have the freedom to choose right tools for the task. We encourage our engineers to participate in and contribute to open-source communities.', '  ', 'Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'Our engineering/research team is looking for a Lead Researcher with 6+ years’ solid research experience, who:', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'Is abreast with the state-of-the-art solutions related to evolving ML areas like Auto ML, explainable and interpretable ML, and online continuous learning.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Has deep interest and experience working on open-ended research problems in machine learning.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Would like to spend the next few years in implementing research ideas into product features to make an industry-wide impact.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Is well versed with computer science skills required to implement the algorithms on big data sets.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Has experience in parallelizing traditional algorithms to leverage advanced computing infrastructure and distributed systems.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Enjoys publishing research findings and presenting them at advanced ML conferences.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Would like to constantly experiment with new research ideas, find its applicability with', '  \t', 'our products to push the boundary forward.', '  \t', 'Desired Non-technical Requirements', ' \t', ' ', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'Very strong communication skills both written and verbal', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Strong desire to work with startups', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Must be a team player', '  \t', 'Job Perks', ' \t', ' ', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'Attractive variable compensation package', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Flexible working hours - everything is results-oriented', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Opportunity to work with an award-winning organization in the hottest technology', '  \t', 'spaces -- artificial intelligence and advanced machine learning', ' \t', ' ']
skills: ['Analysis', 'Analytics', 'Biotechnology', 'Business Development', 'Business Strategy', 'Data Analysis', 'Leadership', 'Lifesciences', 'Management', 'Market Research', 'Marketing Research', 'Product Development', 'Project Management', 'Qualitative Research', 'Quantitative Research', 'R&D', 'Research', 'Statistics', 'Strategic Planning', 'Strategy']

desc: ['About Tookitaki', '  ', 'Tookitaki is providing machine learning-powered enterprise solutions to address regulatory compliance problems in the financial services sector. Incorporated in November 2014 in Singapore, the company is led by a core team with cumulative 30-years’ experience in finance, AI and big data analytics. Backed by institutional investors such as Jungle Ventures and Spring Seeds (a subsidiary of the Singapore Government), the company’s accolades include:', '  ', ' \t', 'We are among the selected 21 companies which got accreditation from the government of Singapore for their stringent technology, finance and operations due diligence (www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/programmes-and-grants/startups/accreditation-at-sgd)', ' \t', 'We won the first place in the MAS FinTech Awards (Singapore SME) in the regulatory compliance space from the Monetary Authority of Singapore for our approach to make the workflows in AML and Reconciliation scalable and highly auditable (beyond ML based black box approach) (www.mas.gov.sg/News-and-Publications/Media-Releases/2016/Ten-FinTech-companies-recognised-for-innovative-solutions-at-inaugural-FinTech-Awards.aspx)', ' \t', 'We are voted as one of the top 21 AI start-ups focusing on the financial services space by medici (www.letstalkpayments.com/medici-top-21-ai-companies/)', ' \t', "We graduated from Nomura's corporate innovation program in November 2017 where we successfully delivered our product – Reconciliation Management Suite – in a pilot environment (https://inc42.com/buzz/nomura-voyager-fintech-accelerator-voyager-demo-day/)", ' ', '  ', 'In regulatory compliance, we focus on anti-money laundering and reconciliation and our products – Alerts Management Suite (AMS) and Reconciliation Management Suite (RMS) – cater to these areas, respectively. The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  ', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to existing core-banking applications (REST API endpoints), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  ', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Banks need to move beyond static rule-based systems and adopt a new approach to prevent financial and reputation loss. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMS, RMS and PMS.']

The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  ', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to exiting core-banking applications (REST API end points), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  ', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMS, RMS and PMS.', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['Role: Implementation engineer', '  ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '  ', 'Engineering @ Tookitaki', '  ', 'The engineering team is responsible for building a robust predictive platform, which can add significant value to the BFSI vertical in solving operational and compliance risk problems. We take pride in building the system right and continuously evolving it. You have the freedom to choose right tools for the task. We encourage our engineers to participate in and contribute to open-source communities.', '  ', 'Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'Our engineering team is looking for a Implementation engineer with 3-6 years solid experience. The candidates responsibilities and required skills and experience are:', '  ', ' \t', 'Managing the big data application stack including HDFS, YARN, Spark, Hive and Hbase', ' \t', 'Deeper understanding of all the configurations required for installing and maintaining the infrastructure in the long run', ' \t', 'Experience setting up high availability, configuring resource allocation, setting up capacity schedulers and configuring data level ACLs using Ranger, Sentry etc', ' \t', 'Experience working with and supporting middle layer technologies including web servers (httpd, ningx), application servers (Jboss, Tomcat) and database systems (postgres, mysql)', ' \t', 'Experience setting up enterprise security solution including setting up active directories, firewalls, SSL certificates, Kerberos KDC servers, etc', ' \t', 'Experience supporting on-premise solutions as well as on cloud - AWS and Azure.', ' \t', 'Experience working with containerized infrastructure and orchestration', ' \t', 'Experience with one or more automation tools - like Ansible, Teraform etc', ' \t', 'Experience working with CI / CD tools like Jenkins and various test report and coverage plugins', ' \t', 'Experience working with and supporting Java and Python based tech stacks would be a plus', ' ', '  ', 'Desired Non-technical Requirements', '  ', ' \t', 'Very strong communication skills both written and verbal', ' \t', 'Strong desire to work with start-ups', ' \t', 'Must be a team player', ' ', '  ', 'Job Perks', '  ', ' \t', 'Attractive variable compensation package', ' \t', 'Flexible working hours - everything is results-oriented', ' \t', 'Opportunity to work with an award-winning organization in the hottest space in tech - artificial intelligence and advanced machine learning', ' ']

desc: ['Introducing Tookitaki', '  ', 'Tookitaki is providing machine learning-powered enterprise solutions to address regulatory compliance problems in the financial services sector. Incorporated in November 2014 in Singapore, the company is led by a core team with cumulative 150-years’ experience in financial crime, AI and big data analytics. Backed by institutional investors such as Jungle Ventures, Illuminate Financial and Enterprise Singapore (a subsidiary of the Singapore Government), the company’s accolades include:', '  ', ' \t', 'We are among the selected 21 companies which got accreditation from the government of Singapore for their stringent technology, finance and operations due diligence (www.imda.gov.sg/industry-development/programmes-and-grants/startups/accreditation-at-sgd)', ' \t', 'We won the first place in the MAS FinTech Awards (Singapore SME) in the regulatory compliance space from the Monetary Authority of Singapore for our approach to make the workflows in AML and Reconciliation scalable and highly auditable (beyond ML based black box approach) (www.mas.gov.sg/News-and-Publications/Media-Releases/2016/Ten-FinTech-companies-recognised-for-innovative-solutions-at-inaugural-FinTech-Awards.aspx)', ' \t', 'We are voted as one of the top 21 AI start-ups focusing on the financial services space by medici (www.letstalkpayments.com/medici-top-21-ai-companies/)', ' \t', "We graduated from Nomura's corporate innovation program in November 2017 where we successfully delivered our product – Reconciliation Management Suite – in a pilot environment (https://inc42.com/buzz/nomura-voyager-fintech-accelerator-voyager-demo-day/)", ' ', '  ', 'In regulatory compliance, we focus on anti-money laundering and reconciliation and our products – Anti-Money Laundering Suite (AMLS) and Reconciliation Suite (RS) – cater to these areas, respectively. The mission or goal is to achieve 40% operational efficiency with significant savings in infrastructure and operational costs.', '  ', "Tookitaki's unique selling proposition (USP) is in our approach where we combine our proprietary modelling technique with our complete auditable framework to make the process dynamic and highly explainable (moving out of the black box approach). Moreover, our flexible on-premise and cloud-packaging capabilities, along with the option of easy integration to exiting core-banking applications (REST API end points), make the solution deployment faster with lesser barrier to entry.", '  ', 'Today, regulatory compliance processes have become more complex and fluidic, increasing the chances for rule-based models to fail. Banks need to move beyond static rule-based systems and adopt a new approach to prevent financial and reputation loss. Tookitaki bridges the gap with its innovative software products – AMLS and RS.']
req: ['Role: VP, Sales', '  ', 'Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'Tookitaki is looking for a vice president, sales position who is responsible for establishing the sales targets to meet the company objectives. The person is responsible for developing strategic sales plans based on company goals that will promote sales growth and customer satisfaction for the organization. The key responsibilities of the position, among others, are:', '  ', ' \t', 'Aggressively building a sales pipeline and developing, managing, and closing sales opportunities in the APAC market.', ' \t', 'Identifying prospects to approach while communicating the Tookitaki value proposition for their business and use cases.', ' \t', 'Developing business and marketing plans to grow opportunities using all tools available such as joint collateral, sales presentations, campaigns, webinars and events.', ' \t', 'Working cross-functionally with key internal stakeholders (e.g. sales teams, data science, marketing, legal, support, etc.) to execute on revenue plan.', ' \t', 'Managing a high volume of engagements and the fast pace of the machine learning solutions market.', ' \t', 'Getting deeply familiar with the machine learning market in order to communicate the Tookitaki value propositions and differentiation from other offerings.', ' \t', 'Giving effective Tookitaki demos to executives and business audiences.', ' \t', 'Developing strong working relationships with Tookitaki and field sales teams.', ' \t', 'Travelling to customer and partner sites as necessary', ' ', '  ', 'Qualifications', '  ', ' \t', 'Experience in selling technology into FS accounts in the APAC region.', ' \t', 'Solid negotiation and analytical skills, and business and financial acumen.', ' \t', 'A proven record of high achievement in sales roles with a hunger to succeed', ' \t', 'Technical acumen to become conversant with machine learning and customer use cases in a shorter timeframe.', ' \t', 'Demonstrable pipeline generation experience, particularly building and executing on a multi-faceted territory plan.', ' \t', 'Ability to work independently in an extremely fast-paced environment and focus on the most important issues impacting outcomes.', ' \t', 'Excellent verbal and written communications skills are a must.', ' \t', 'Intellectual curiosity and the drive and passion to change the world.', ' \t', 'MBA or equivalent relevant business experience.', ' \t', 'Experience with start-ups, big data and analytic technologies is a huge plus.', ' ', '  ', 'Job Perks', '  ', ' \t', desc:
['Senior Manager / Manager\xa0 (Compliance)', '
', 'The Senior Manager / Manager, Compliance, provides independent oversight on the governance and control activities of the business units and propose improvements in such activities so as to ensure that VITAL complies with prevailing corporate service policies and regulations.', '
', 'Responsibilities', '
', '
', 'Implementation of \xa0Compliance and Risk Management Framework', '
', "Work closely with the line managers to implement the organisation's enterprise risk management strategy", '
', "Lead or participate in compliance review covering key aspects of the organisation's operations and\xa0to ensure adherence to the organisation's operating procedures, policies and regulatory requirements", '
', 'Conduct extensive risk review and testing of processes, flows and systems and evaluate the adequacy and effectiveness of internal controls and governance processes', '
', 'Analyse and evaluate compliance and risk management related issues and make practical value-added recommendations to the management and follow up on corrective actions', '
', 'Perform IT system access rights management reviews', '
', 'Assist in investigation on areas of specific concern, including possible initial fraud investigations', '
', 'Present and report compliance and risk issue findings to the management', '
', 'Participate in collaboration projects with functional units and/or policy/system owner on process improvement and streamlining', '
', 'Provide guidance to other team members on governance, risk management and compliance', '
', 'Provide advice on audit risks to other departments', '\xa0', 'Requirements', '
', 'Possess a Degree in Accountancy or equivalent', '
', 'Advanced knowledge and proven ability in use of Microsoft Office applications', '
', 'Relevant experience in managing compliance activities in a corporate or audit environment in the private and/or public sector is an advantage', '
', 'Experience on data analytics and good knowledge of public sector practices is an advantage', '
', 'Good analytical and critical thinking skills, able to consider the potential implications of issues at a detailed level and from a broad level perspective', '
', 'Organised and meticulous with an attention to detail', '
', 'Possess high integrity and high level of professional ethics, able to maintain confidentiality and only speak to the appropriate people about the appropriate subject', '
', 'Self-motivated and committed with a strong sense of urgency and drive to follow-up proactively', '
', 'Able to work in teams and independently at the same time', '
', 'Good verbal and written communication and presentation skills, including crafting messages and communicating findings / practical recommendations to internal / external stakeholders', '
', 'Good interpersonal skills to be able to connect and build a good working relationship with stakeholders at all levels', '
', 'Good negotiation skills with ability to influence and be resourceful to think creatively for effective resolution of diverse issues', '
', '
', 'We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.', '
', '\xa0']

desc: ['Are you passionate about technology and loves programming? Enjoy meeting people, thinking on your feet to solve business challenges?', '  ', 'BioQuest Advisory is a business & technology consulting practice led by experienced industry veterans. We partner our industry clients to transform their business and build sustainable growth.', '  ', 'Our\xa0 HQ is based in Singapore with regional offices across APAC.', '  ', 'Our key expertise: Robotic Process Automation, Data Analytics, Business Systems Implementation, Business Strategy & Transformation, Process Improvement, Supply Chain Management, Financial Management, Governance & Risk Management.', '  ', '\u200b Our clients consist of global MNCs and local businesses spanning across multiple industries and Asia Pacific countries. \xa0Our lead consultants are recognized by the Singapore government to provide Singapore grant related projects and this gives credibility to the quality of work we deliver to our clients.', '  ', 'The opportunity', '  ', '\u200bBioQuest Advisory is at the exciting phase of our growth across APAC region and is looking for talented IT Analysts who are passionate about emerging technology to be part of the journey.', '  ', 'The role', '  ', 'You would be trained in specific technologies and be part of our business & technology advisory team to provide IT consulting services to our clients.', '  ', 'You would work within the project team to partner our clients on an end-to-end project journey including user workshops, system analysis & design to development, testing and go-live support.', '  ', 'Each project is uniquely customized to our client’s requirements. Your work-scope is not static but dynamic according to each project’s requirements. Consulting is an exciting and dynamic career with good exposure across industries, technologies, business practices and opportunities to work with a diverse groups\xa0 of subject experts and clients.', '  ', 'A day in the life of our IT Analysts', '  ', '   ', 'Engaging users for user requirements gathering', '   ', 'Provide advisory on system design best practice and work with users to derive the final system design', '   ', 'Prepare system design documentation and do design walkthrough with users', '   ', 'Develop system according to user requirements, frequently engaging users for clarifications', '   ', 'Work with users to prepare test scripts and cases', '   ', 'Conduct UAT with users and ensure issues identified are resolved', '   ', 'Prepare for system go-live and support', '  ', '  ', 'What you can look forward to in this role:', '  ', '   ', 'Learning opportunities in cutting edge technologies', '   ', 'Consulting career with exposure to multiple industries', '   ', 'Collaborative and supportive work environment', '  ']
req: ['Your profile', '  ', '   ', 'Diploma\xa0in Information Technology, Computer Engineering or any other discipline with good programming training', '   ', 'Preferably 1 year of experience programming preferably in .Net Framework (vb.NET, C#) and good understanding of Object Oriented Programming (OOP), Academic projects included', '   ', 'Familiar with writing system documentation (system design, detail design, test plans, test execution)', '   ', 'Passionate about programming and a career in consulting', '   ', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills', '   ', 'Good communicator, able to think-on-your-feet, have a customer service attitude', '   ', 'Enjoy working in a team and is a good team player', '  ', '  ', 'Join us', '  ', 'At BioQuest, we value collaboration, teamwork and knowledge transfers. Our culture is friendly and supportive with a strong emphasis on ethics, diversity and inclusiveness.', '  ', 'As you grow with our firm, you would be able to leverage on your expertise to help transform our clients’ business and gain experience for your personal professional development. We are committed to providing opportunities and coaching to grow our talents.', '  ', 'We are an equal opportunity employer.', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['The GIC Professionals Programme offers graduate opportunities to talented individuals who are looking to make their future as investment\xa0professionals or\xa0business\xa0professionals.', ' ', ' The Investment Professionals track comprise areas such as:', ' • Economics & Investment Strategy', ' • Fixed Income', ' • Private Equity & Infrastructure', ' • Public Equities', ' • Real Estate', ' • Risk & Performance Management', ' ', ' The Business Professionals track comprise areas such as:', ' • Compliance', ' • Corporate Communications', ' • Data & Analytics', ' • Finance & Accounting', ' • Investment Operations', ' • Technology', ' ', ' Taking place in Singapore over eight months every year, from August to March, you will:', ' • Learn investing and business principles in a 5 to 6-week ‘bootcamp’', ' • Develop organizational perspective and learn from seniors during 9-10 weeks’ rotations to three different functions across GIC', ' • Meet prospective mentors and senior GIC professionals through structured events', " After the programme, you'll go directly into the area of business best suited to your skills and the company's business needs. The scope of our business offers opportunities in many aspects of investment management. Later in your career, you may transfer to other parts of GIC as your interests and ambitions develop.", ' \xa0', ' \xa0']

desc: ['NextWave Partners is a Technology & Energy Recruitment Company. Founded in early 2016 we have quickly established NextWave as a strong brand within the Thermal Power and Renewable Energy sectors.', '  ', 'As of Q3 2017 NextWave set up a Technology Recruitment division to focus on AI, Big Data & Analytics and Cyber Security. Given the success of this division so far and the growth of the technology sector in Asia we are looking to hire a\xa0Recruitment Consultant with a focus on Cyber Security.', ' \xa0', ' NextWave Partners has already grown to 18 people over the last 3 years but has a clear strategic plan to build the Technology team to the same size. Our short-term aim is to grow the Company to 25+ people in our Singapore office over the coming 12 months; after which point, we would like to replicate the business model to cover the Middle East & Americas by setting up various international offices. We will do this though developing and empowering the very best recruiters in the industry to become market leaders in their specialist areas.', '  ', 'The Recruitment Consultant will work closely with the Business Directors to grow the Cyber Security sector within Asia, and Hong Kong in particular. We are looking for someone\xa0who has the desire to see how far they can push themselves outside of the traditional recruitment career path with a development plan to a Senior Management position in future. For NextWave’s high achievers there are opportunities to build recruitment teams and align with Senior Recruitment Consultant through equity and profit share in the business.']

desc: ['GlobalData Plc is a data analytics and media company that was established in 1999, and has been listed on the London Stock Exchange since 2000. Each year, the organisation organizes hundreds of worldwide conferences, seminars, and related learning programs covering a variety of industries including Banking and Finance, Business Management, Technology and much more.', '  ', 'We are currently seeking an experienced sales person to work alongside our existing, global team of event experts.', '  ', 'Based in Singapore you will ultimately be responsible for generating attendance and revenue for 2 APAC events and 4 MENA events.', '  ', 'Initially working on the Singapore Summit and Awards portfolio you will be speaking to the c-suite decision makers of the region’s leading banks and financial institutions.', '  ', 'You will be responsible for inviting the very upper echelons of the banking community to attend our summits as VIP guests.\xa0', '  ', 'Once secured, this high value guest list provides the value proposition for our sponsors who you will approach and sell to.', '  ', 'In addition our world class summit content creates value for paid delegates to whom you will be reaching out and selling tickets to.', '  ', 'Our awards are popular and wins are highly coveted.\xa0 You will be responsible for generating entries and selling winning companies tables at the gala ceremonies.', '  ', 'Working in a high energy environment, the ideal candidate should demonstrate the capability to work towards individual and collective targets using a tailored sales methodology on which you will be thoroughly trained.', '  ', 'Main Duties and Responsibilities', '  ', '• With the support of your line manager and the content team establish a thorough understanding of the value proposition for guests, paid delegates, entries, table bookers and sponsors for each event.', '  ', '• Identify target contacts for each revenue stream including self-sourcing leads and potential sales prospects', '  ', '• Manage and report on a constantly evolving pipeline of sales opportunities all reported on SalesForce', '  ', '• Proactively selling to clients over the telephone and face-to-face', '  ', '• Applying the sales methodology in order to close business', '  ', '• Working towards monthly sales performance targets', '  ', '• Long term business relationship approach with clients to ensure repeat business', '  ', '• Onsite management of sponsors and banking partners who are attending the conferences']
req: ['The ideal candidate must demonstrate:', '  ', '• Resilience and tenacity to perform each sales call with same energy', '  ', '• A healthy determination to succeed and deliver against monthly targets', '  ', '• A high level of integrity and ethical conduct', '  ', '• A proactive can-do attitude; detail oriented and ability to take on several responsibilities are key assets', '  ', '• Willing to learn and adapt to a high function sales role', '  ', '• An aptitude to communicate effectively to C-Level and Heads of Retail Banks, Private Banks and fintech organisations', '  ', '• Ability to research and source leads from the target market', '  ', '• Strong negotiation and objection handling skills; we will provide you with continue training to optimize your skill set', '  ', '• Ability to assimilate large amounts of information quickly', '  ', '• A previous experience in event sales would be a plus', '  ', '• Knowledge of using Salesforce would be useful', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Benefits', '  ', 'In return Globaldata Plc will offer you:', '  ', '• The opportunity to grow and develop your skills', '  ', '• Tailored ongoing training and development with access to industry leading training practices.', '  ', '• A competitive salary + commission']

desc: ['About Standard Chartered\xa0', ' We are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across Asia, Africa and the Middle East. \xa0', '  ', "To us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. \xa0It's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, Here for good.\xa0", '  ', "We're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. This in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.", '  ', 'The Role Responsibilities & Our Ideal Candidate', '  ', 'The successful candidate will be the part of a start-up team building an innovative platform leveraging data, analytics to drive automated decision-making, smart automation across the full lifecycle of the business. This is a rare opportunity for a self-driven, start-up minded, strong and passionate developer to participate and contribute to a paradigm shift. We want People driven by the mission!', ' \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Build front-end components with a framework and generic pattern mindset for scale across multiple dimensions – optimized compute/performance, functional, visualization, quality control', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Think API ie build your front-end with generic primitives exposed to back-end developers through a clear API', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Build a cohesive, simple and pleasant experience for users', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Develop scalable real-time low-latency processing front-end solutions in an agile delivery method', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Develop and maintain automated testing', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Own and build the visualizations and interactions end-to-end (UI, back-end for UI) using a modern and high-performance stack for all users', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Do whatever it takes to maintain stability, availability and performance', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Partner with stakeholders to capture requirements and deliver solutions – deep understanding of the problem and context along with ownership are key to be successful in this role', ' \xa0']

desc: ['·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 ', 'This role will be heavily focused in growing the local business – to develop and enhance strategic partnerships, hunt new business, and win longer term deals to generate growth in the Connected Freight business. ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Dimensions', ':', '  ', 'Connected Freight is a venture under the New Energies business based around building and operating a new type of logistics platform. The platform combines a sleek user interface, data analytics and an efficient multi-vehicle tour-planning algorithm to optimize the flow of business-to-business freight deliveries within a city. The plan is to build out from Shell’s existing supply chains, where manufacturers, wholesalers and distributors move goods to our retail locations. Then expand to other retailers and their supply chains. It is essential to move quickly to market, leverage our incumbent business to help grow, develop volumes and density (network effect), and to maintain an agile approach to add more features or pivot if necessary. In line with the growth aspirations and value monetization goals set by the Connected Freight team, the Account Manager will be primarily responsible in seeking out suitable prospects, mining leads and converting them to customers.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities: ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Lead Generation: Candidate must be able to develop his/her own list of leads that are aligned with business development plans', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Efficient Selling: focus on securing new customers and properly monitoring the progress of prospects', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Pitches: visit leads and pitch to prospect using customize sales presentations depending on prospect’s business needs', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Co-develop materials with Marketing department based on feedback from customers', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Pure hunter role', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Achieve aggressive growth goals and revenue target set by Management', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
