job_cat: ['Advertising / Media , Events / Promotions , F&B, Marketing / Public Relations , Sales / Retail ']
desc: ['About the Company:', '  ', 'Introduced in 2004, 5-hour ENERGY® shots rose to become the number 1 energy shot in U.S.A. in just over a decade. The product is a liquid energy shot that provides energy and focus that lasts for hours. With B-vitamins, amino acids, zero sugar and only 4 calories, it is the healthier and reliable energy choice for consumers. Today, more than 1 million bottle servings are enjoyed by our fans every day.', '  ', 'Our company is looking for people to join us in expanding the billion-dollar 5-hour ENERGY® brand internationally. With footprints in U.S.A., Canada, U.K., Ireland, Spain, Portugal, the Netherland and South Africa, we now aim to bring our well-loved product to the Asia region.', '  ', 'For more information, visit www.5hourenergyintl.com', '  ', 'Designation:', ' \xa0\xa0 Manager, Digital Media', ' ', 'Job Purpose:', ' Media planning for 5-Hour International Corporation Pte Ltd', '  ', 'Job Duties:', '  ', 'He/She will be responsible for development and management of media strategy for both online and off-line campaigns. The candidate will play an integral part of the marketing team and is able to drive successful campaigns for both brand and tactical advertising activities.', '  ', '   ', 'Propose and execute all digital media campaigns and provide support to marketing and ensure brand’s overall objectives are achieved.', '   ', 'Development of media plan for digital and offline media, including television, radio, OOH and print.', '   ', 'Buy media advertising space for brands and in-market and negotiate advertising contracts with media companies to determine pricing and schedules.', '   ', 'Drive digital marketing through data analytics and ROIs in mind.', '   ', 'Daily management and optimization of digital media campaigns including planning and strategy development, contract execution, and reporting.', '   ', 'Monitor performance and recommend optimizations and new / different strategies and tactics.', '   ', 'Develop and manage a regional media calendar.', '   ', 'Responsible for creating digital assets with hands-on experience in the development of digital banner ads, social media ads, SEM ads including image choice, copy writing and media planning functions.', '   ', 'Proven ability to use GA to track relevant metrics and proactively adjust assets and media plans to better hit pre-defined targets.\xa0', '   ', 'Monitor media budget, monthly reporting of marketing effectiveness and weekly project status reporting.\xa0', '   ', 'Review invoices from media companies and resolve any discrepancies.', '   ', 'Support in marketing presentations and reports, consumer analysis and monitoring of new product brand’s performance vs target/ forecast.', '  ', '  ', 'Job Authorities:\xa0\xa0 ', 'Execute all media campaigns as approved by Director, Marketing.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['Skills/Qualifications:', '  ', '   ', 'Minimum relevant University Degree (preferably with minimum 5 years working experience in media and/or in FMCG industry.', '   ', 'The successful candidate is required to liaise with English-speaking & Chinese-speaking associates and creative agencies.\xa0 Fluent in written and conversational English and proficient in spoken and written Mandarin is essential.', '   ', 'Excellent in managing big numbers, data analysis, and with appetite for growth through results-led experimentation.', '   ', 'High proficiency in MS Office particularly Excel, PowerPoint.', '   ', 'Strong analytical, interpersonal and communication skills with a positive attitude and take ownership in the roles and projects.', '  ', '  ', 'The information contained herein is not intended to be an all-inclusive list of the duties and responsibilities of the job, nor are they intended to be an all-inclusive list of the skills and abilities required to do the job.\xa0 The Management may, at its discretion, assign or reassign duties and responsibilities to this job at any time.', '  ', 'The duties and responsibilities in this job description may be subject to change at any time due to reasonable accommodation or other reasons.']

address: ['THE JTC SUMMIT, 8 JURONG TOWN HALL ROAD 609434']
desc: ['Punggol Digital District (PDD) is an upcoming mixed-use development that will house the key growth sectors of the digital economy such as cybersecurity and data analytics. It is also the first digital district in Singapore where we will integrate smart technologies horizontally on a single Open Digital Platform (ODP) to yield synergies across various technologies.\xa0The ODP will become a reference digital architecture for future smart districts in Singapore and transform the way we work, live and play.', ' ', 'Scope and Responsibilities', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'As a Solution Architect in the Smart District Division, you will be responsible to co-develop the end-to-end architecture of an Open Digital Platform (ODP) for Smart Districts with JTC’s strategic partners and partnering Government Agencies. The Solution Architect shall work with the technical leads from GovTech and CSA to ensure the detailed design and development of the ODP are aligned with the Whole of Government Technology Stack. Success in this role will be demonstrated by your strong technical aptitude, Business Sense and ability to communicate in an effective and efficient manner.\xa0', 'Demonstrate leadership in IT and Engineering management by producing strategic and innovative concept proposals, papers, and presentations.', ' ', ' ', 'Translate business requirements, including application resiliency requirements, into application architectural specifications', ' ', 'Creates, evaluates and implements plans and design proposals for high impact solutions, considering key factors such as long-term effectiveness, practicality, technical limitations and criticality', ' ', 'Manage technical project delivery; perform systems reviews and make recommendations of system and code changes; collaborate with development staff to resolve technical challenges; help to analyze and determine performance tuning and scalability improvements of code and queries', ' ', 'Provide architecture and technical support during production', ' ', 'Possesses broad and deep skills across disciplines, ability and interest in mentoring technical staff and raising collective technical competencies', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Requirements', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Graduate degree in any discipline', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Minimum 7 years of design/implementation/consulting experience with distributed applications - must have a minimum of 3 years’ hands-on experience as a technical lead and system architect (i.e. system design, performance tuning, and system prototyping & maintenance)', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Experience in System Engineering Process.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Relevant Experience in Smart Systems development and deployment.', ' ', ' ', 'A solid software development background and multiple industry certifications', ' ', 'Experience in Software Development.', ' ', 'Solid understanding of Server-side, .Net and/or Java development, Service Oriented Architectures (SOA), web services and public web sites / digital services development', ' ', 'Experience in designing, developing and deploying large, scalable production applications on cloud/PaaS platforms and Containers', ' ', 'Working knowledge of DevOps software development tools and methodologies\xa0', ' ', 'Results and customer oriented\xa0', ' ', 'Team player with strong organization and interpersonal skills', ' ', 'Strong written, presentation and stakeholder management skills', ' ']

desc: ['Are you passionate about technology and loves programming? Enjoy meeting people, thinking on your feet to solve business challenges?', '  ', 'BioQuest Advisory is a Singapore based consulting business led by experienced industry veterans from global technology and consulting firms. We partner our industry clients to transform their business and build sustainable growth.', '  ', 'Our key expertise: Robotic Process Automation, Data Analytics, Business Systems Implementation, Business Strategy & Transformation, Process Improvement, Supply Chain Management, Financial Management, Governance & Risk Management.', '  ', '\u200bOur clients consist of global MNCs and Singapore businesses spanning across multiple industries and Asia Pacific countries. \xa0', '  ', 'The opportunity', '  ', '\u200bBioQuest Advisory is at the exciting phase of our growth in Singapore and across APAC region and is looking for talented IT Engineers who are passionate about emerging technology to be part of the journey.', '  ', 'The role', '  ', 'You would be trained in specific technologies and be part of our business & technology advisory team to provide IT consulting services to our clients.', '  ', 'You would work within the project team to partner our clients on an end-to-end project journey including user workshops, system analysis & design to development, testing and go-live support.', '  ', 'Each project is uniquely customised to our client’s requirements. Your work-scope is not static but dynamic according to each project’s requirements. Consulting is an exciting and dynamic career with good exposure across industries, technologies, business practices and opportunities to work with a diverse groups\xa0 of subject experts and clients.', '  ', 'A day in the life of our IT Engineers', '  ', '   ', 'Engaging users for user requirements gathering', '   ', 'Provide advisory on system design best practice and work with users to derive the final system design', '   ', 'Prepare system design documentation and do design walkthrough with users', '   ', 'Develop system according to user requirements, frequently engaging users for clarifications', '   ', 'Work with users to prepare test scripts and cases', '   ', 'Conduct UAT with users and ensure issues identified are resolved', '   ', 'Prepare for system go-live and support', '  ', '  ', 'What you can look forward to in this role:', '  ', '   ', 'Learning opportunities in cutting edge technologies', '   ', 'Consulting career with exposure to multiple industries', '   ', 'Collaborative and supportive work environment', '  ', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['Your profile', '  ', '   ', 'Diploma/Degree in Information Technology, Computer Engineering or any other discipline with good programming training', '   ', 'Preferably 1 year of experience programming preferably in .Net Framework (vb.NET, C#) and good understanding of Object Oriented Programming (OOP), Academic projects included', '   ', 'Familiar with writing system documentation (system design, detail design, test plans, test execution)', '   ', 'Passionate about programming and a career in consulting', '   ', 'Strong analytical and problem-solving skills', '   ', 'Good communicator, able to think-on-your-feet, have a customer service attitude', '   ', 'Enjoy working in a team and is a good team player', '  ', '  ', 'Join us', '  ', 'At BioQuest, we value collaboration, teamwork and knowledge transfers. Our culture is friendly and supportive with a strong emphasis on ethics, diversity and inclusiveness.', '  ', 'As you grow with our firm, you would be able to leverage on your expertise to help transform our clients’ business and gain experience for your personal professional development. We are committed to providing opportunities and coaching to grow our talents.', '  ', 'We are an equal opportunity employer.', '  ', '\xa0']

address: ['THE JTC SUMMIT, 8 JURONG TOWN HALL ROAD 609434']
desc: ['Punggol Digital District (PDD) is an upcoming mixed-use development that will house the key growth sectors of the digital economy such as cybersecurity and data analytics. It is also the first digital district in Singapore where we will integrate smart technologies horizontally on a single Open Digital Platform (ODP) to yield synergies across various technologies.\xa0The ODP will become a reference digital architecture for future smart districts in Singapore and transform the way we work, live and play.', ' ', 'JTC is looking for a multi-talented 3D modeller to spearhead the creation of a unified 3D Command and Control user experience for our smart estate digital platform. You will work with a dynamic team of system engineers to develop a cohesive visual language to create clear, consistent, recognizable, and responsive user interfaces. You will also work with command and control engineers and developers using prototypes, wireframes, workflows, and other design artefacts.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'What to Expect:', ' ', ' ', 'Work with Command and Control (C2) team to develop creative user interface of the C2 system.', ' ', 'Create 2D drawings and 3D models required to support creative user interfaces for smooth and responsive user experience.', ' ', 'Convert 3D BIM models to usable 3D models (such as FBX, OBJ, CityGML) within BIM 360, Infraworks and Unity Engines.', ' ', 'Ability to work in Agile software development environment.', ' ', 'Ability to keep detailed records of relevant work in the project team’s repository.', ' ', 'Willing to learn and pick up new systems and software skills.', ' ', ' ', 'Requirements:', ' ', ' ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent.', ' ', 'Proficiency in 3D modelling, visualization, and graphical software experience with Revit and Autodesk 3ds Max.', ' ', 'At least 3 years of proven experience designing/developing UX/UI', ' ', 'Experience designing user experiences for 3D applications', ' ', 'Able to research and analyze user needs and to design solutions and experiences that solve user problems and customer pain points', ' ', 'Comfortable with making a case for design solutions based on research, UX/UI best practices, and use cases', ' ', 'Experience working with a variety of visual design and prototyping tools', ' ', 'Familiar with interaction design and information architecture', ' ', 'Ability to analyze instrumentation, logging, and other tools for measuring physical quantities', ' ', 'Web development experience (such as React.js and any relevant Javascript frameworks)', ' ', 'Exceptional collaboration and interpersonal skills', ' ']
skills: ['3D', '3D Modeling', '3D Studio Max', 'After Effects', 'Animation', 'Character Animation', 'Computer Animation', 'Concept Design', 'Digital Painting', 'Digital Sculpting', 'Drawing', 'Hard Surface Modeling', 'Maya', 'Mental Ray', 'Modeling', 'Mudbox', 'Photoshop', 'Texturing', 'UV Mapping', 'Zbrush']

desc: ['Get to know our Team:', ' ', ' ', 'As a member of our GrabFamily, not only will your skillsets be capitalized but you will also develop your untapped potential and be inspired with some of the most amazing minds in the industry. Our team consists of young but experienced individuals who are tenacious and energized by the fact that we exist to make a change - a change that has made a societal impact in Southeast Asia.', ' ', ' ', 'The day-to-day activities:', '  ', ' \t', 'Responsible for helping launch and grow the GrabFood business in expansion markets across Southeast Asia.', ' \t', 'Design processes to enable rapid business growth across all customer segments. From acquiring new users, to onboarding Merchants, to driver incentives, marketplace management and business development.', ' \t', 'Build quarterly budgets and manage city and country P&Ls for launch markets', ' \t', 'Act as a strategic thought partner to Country teams around optimising operational metrics to achieve hyper growth as well as playbooking best practices from across the region.', ' \t', 'Build and ramp up high performing local operations teams in short time frames, as well as setting and tracking strategic OKRs.', ' \t', 'Manage new product rollouts for expansion markets as well as generating operational insights for future product development.', ' \t', 'Build dashboards for use of country operations teams to help solve business problems', ' \t', 'Apply extensive analytical and problem-solving skills coupled with business acumen to identify other opportunities to ensure growth targets are achieved', ' \t', 'Work closely with in-country and regional stakeholders within Operations Teams to ensure best practices are shared and executed', ' \t', 'Manage relationships with in-country and regional cross-functional teams (marketing product, customer success, S&P, data analytics) to ensure alignment on the growth strategy for the business and being their key stakeholder from the business perspective.\xa0', ' ']

desc: ['Information Technology Risk Management and Security has become an essential component of the current IT enterprise that provides IT & Automation support to the Pharmaceutical Research, Supply Chain and Marketing organizations.\xa0 Increased risks in both the information security (e.g. cyber threats, malware, etc.) and the regulated areas have required that staff possessing such skills is fully embedded within the IT organization.\xa0 The enterprise is now dependent on these security and compliance experts for identifying, escalating and remediating such IT Risks in a timely and efficient manner.\xa0 Also, emerging technologies like cloud, mobility and data analytics require strong IT Risk and Compliance early involvement.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', "The Vulnerability Management (VM) Analyst Position is responsible for helping to safeguard the company's assets, intellectual property, and computer systems in support of the company's business objectives. The applicant will be responsible for detecting vulnerabilities, researching potential impact to the organization, and communicating the risks to senior VM team members. The VM Analyst works among a team of skilled analysts to address complex or difficult problems as needed within a 24/7 Cyber Security Fusion Center environment.\xa0", '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Primary Job responsibilities', '  ', '• Perform scans to identify vulnerabilities or confirm compliance to security standards.', '  ', '• Maintain patch and vulnerability management practices to protect against the exploitation of critical vulnerabilities.', '  ', '• Facilitate vulnerability remediation efforts through cross Business & IT functions.', '  ', '• Apply knowledge of operating systems, applications, and database vulnerability assessments (to include system configuration checks) on various Information Systems.', '  ', '• Interpret vulnerability assessment results and report findings to senior VM staff as well as recommendations for remediation.', '  ', '• Conduct research on current vulnerabilities and exploits using publicly available, trusted resources and other finished vulnerability products.', '  ', '• Implement and utilize a combination of automated tools (e.g., Nessus, Tanium) and manual checks to identify and validate vulnerabilities.\xa0']
req: ['• Bachelor’s Degree\xa0 in Information Security, Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent experience.', '  ', '• 2-4 years of computer and network security experience preferred', '  ', '• Thorough understanding of fundamental security and network concepts (operating systems, IPS/IDS, TCP/IP, ports, etc.)', '  ', '• Demonstrated analytic expertise – to include ability to think critically and logically in a dynamic, high-pressure, fast-paced environment', '  ', '• Identify operational roadblocks to ensure timely remediation and countermeasures', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Preferred :', '  ', '• 1-2 years of experience in vulnerability management, penetration testing or software development.\xa0', '  ', '• Experience with Microsoft and Unix-based operating systems', '  ', '• Experience managing and tracking vulnerability cases', '  ', '• Experience supporting network security investigations', '  ', '• GCIA, GCIH, CSX, Security +, Network + or similar security certification.']
skills: ['Active Directory', 'Cloud Computing', 'Integration', 'IT Management', 'IT Service Management', 'ITIL', 'Java', 'Linux', 'Management', 'Project Management', 'Security', 'Servers', 'Software Development', 'SQL', 'System Administration', 'Troubleshooting', 'Virtualization', 'VMware', 'Windows', 'Windows Server']

address: ['THE JTC SUMMIT, 8 JURONG TOWN HALL ROAD 609434']
desc:
['Punggol Digital District (PDD) is an upcoming mixed-use development that will house the key growth sectors of the digital economy such as cybersecurity and data analytics. It is also the first digital district in Singapore where we will integrate smart technologies horizontally on a single Open Digital Platform (ODP) to yield synergies across various technologies.\xa0The ODP will become a reference digital architecture for future smart districts in Singapore and transform the way we work, live and play.', '
', 'What to Expect:\xa0', '
', 'As a cybersecurity specialist in the Smart District Division, you will support the development of an Open Digital Platform (ODP) to integrate smart estate technologies horizontally on a single platform. The role requires you to work with industry partners and other Government Agencies, such as CSA and GovTech, to incorporate infrastructure and application cybersecurity requirements into the design, build and operation of the ODP.', '
', 'During the initial phase of the project you will need to work with the project team to identify cybersecurity requirements and concerns, and design/propose workable solutions. Subsequently you will move into the DevSecOps role to work with the software development team to develop security modules that are required to secure the ODP.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop, maintain and operate software security modules required to secure the ODP.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design Security Workflow including security risk detection, resolution and governance reporting.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ensure overall project security design is relevant and fit for purpose.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deploy cyber security products within the ODP.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Coordinate with various partners to test and evaluate the effectiveness of security solutions including laboratory setup and proof-of-concept testing.', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'How to Succeed:', '
', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor's degree computer science/ engineering or related field", '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with Software as a Service (SaaS) platforms.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in key infrastructure and application cybersecurity technologies and standards such as AES, PKI, Twofish, TPM, 2FA technologies, NIST Standards etc.', '
', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Candidates with security certifications such as SANS GSEC, (ISC)2 CISSP or training certificates in security products are preferred']
skills: ['Business Continuity', 'CISSP', 'Computer Security', 'Data Center', 'Disaster Recovery', 'Firewalls', 'Governance', 'Information Security', 'Information Security Management', 'IT Audit', 'IT Management', 'ITIL', 'Management', 'Network Security', 'PCI DSS', 'Penetration Testing', 'Program Management', 'Risk Management', 'Security', 'Vulnerability Assessment']

desc:
['GovTech is tasked with harnessing info-communications technology and related engineering for public sector transformation.\xa0The Governance Group within GovTech designs and implements progressive policies that continuously raise the technology standards and\xa0respond to the ever-changing nature of security threats. The group has also put in place an effective compliance framework and works with all government agencies to achieve this.', '
', 'If you are someone with strong IT audit and compliance background and passionate about technology, looking for opportunities to work with a team of practitioners and leading industry experts, we welcome you to join the Governance Group.', '
', 'As\xa0', 'Director, Audit and Compliance', ', you will be managing a team of audit professionals and tasked to lead the whole-of-government (WOG) IT audit and compliance management, covering over 100 government agencies.', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'What to Expect:', '
', '
', 'Oversee all interactions with agencies, including briefings, audit fieldwork, management responses and follow-up actions to ensure timely execution of audit workplans.', '
', 'Plan, develop and conduct annual IT policy compliance and process audits, as well as technical audits on critical systems and infrastructure.', '
', 'Review audit findings and assess agencies’ and whole-of-government overall state of compliance and risks.', '
', 'Formulate mitigation plans and recommendations to improve state of IT compliance.', '
', 'Prepare and implement development plans to build internal capability in IT audit and compliance management.', '
', 'Plan, source and actively manage outsourced augmentation of internal capability, to deliver the committed deliverables.', '
', 'Promote best practices and raise organizational awareness on matters relating to Governance, Risk and Compliance.', '
', 'Undertake any ad-hoc projects or special reviews, which may include investigation, due diligence and advisory.', '
', 'Driving and implementing transformation projects via pilot project, proof-of-concepts and build prototypes, especially in the area of continuous/anticipate auditing, and data analytics.', '
', '
', '\xa0', '
', 'How to Succeed:', '
', '
', 'Has tertiary qualifications in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology or other related discipline.', '
', 'Possess professional certifications such as CIA and CISA.', '
', 'Has minimally 20 years’ ICT experience, preferably with at least 10 years in ICT audit and/or compliance management positions.', '
', 'Strong understanding of IT management, technology and operations.', '
', 'Prior experience leading audit teams and conducting audit fieldwork and has good working knowledge and understanding of regulatory compliance, governance and internal controls.', '
', 'Possess strong leadership, negotiation and collaboration skills; able to interact with all levels of the organization.', '
', 'Experience in driving successful implementation of IT Audit-related transformation projects is highly desirable.', '
', 'Good written and verbal communication and presentation skills.', '
']

desc: ['Job Responsibilities:', ' ', ' ', 'Identify and develop business opportunities in corporate training space', ' ', 'Gather market intelligence on CET demand and training trends and generate corporate leads.', ' ', 'Develop commercial proposals in response to company needs and conduct sales pitches towards successful closure', ' ', 'Organise relationship-building and networking events', ' ', 'Promote CET through different publicity channels including roadshows and digital platforms', ' ', 'Manage business development and course administration processes', ' ', ' ', 'Requirements:', ' ', ' ', 'At least 5 years of relevant experience preferably in sales and/or business development of adult training\xa0', ' ', 'Excellent interpersonal and communication skills in dealing with people of all levels', ' ', 'Must be IT-proficient in MS Office,\xa0and\xa0familiar in operating web and digital marketing platforms', ' ', 'Pro-active team player, meticulous\xa0and ability to\xa0multi-task', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Additional knowledge/skills/experience in the following areas will be an advantage:', ' ', ' ', 'Customer Relationship Management System (CRMS), relationship building, customer focus, brand management, data analytics, project management, budgeting and account management', ' ', ' ', '\xa0']

desc: ['·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 With the use of data analytics, support the audit by providing insight from analysis and correlation of data extracted from various systems which support the business. Type of testing that the DA can perform includes the following:', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Background information – Performing data profiling and generating statistics to provide context and information on business processes', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Recalculation – Re-performing calculations such as payroll, claims payments and metrics from MI packs', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Exception detection - Finding cases where known restrictions or guidelines have not been adhered to', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Anomaly detection - Finding typical patterns of behaviour and detecting unusual or anomalous patterns.', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Root cause analysis - Identifying and quantifying the factors that contribute to a control failure.', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Provide independent, objective assurance that risks are being managed to ensure they are within the risk appetite approved by the Board.', '  ', 'Support the Audit Director in his / her assessment of the overall risk management environment in Prudential.']
req: ['·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Minimum 5-10 years of hands on technical experience mining and analyzing data using databases and analytics software', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 A strong working knowledge of SQL in a relational database environment', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Experience in machine learning and predictive analytics is an added advantage', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Experience within the financial services industry is preferred, and experience on either insurance of investment management would be ideal', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Experience of working in an audit / risk management environment would be ideal', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 High attention to detail and rigorous logical thinking ability.\xa0', '  ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Good team player, who can win and maintain the professional respect of the team.']

desc: [' \t', 'You work with a team driving Planning and Analytics transformation in Office of Finance with CFOs to provide stewardship in their organizations', ' \t', 'You implement Management Dashboard, Financial Performance Software – Planning, Budgeting and Consolidation', ' \t', 'You ask questions, determine requirement and needs of the customer, taking planning, budgeting, reporting, workflow and other critical factors into consideration', ' \t', 'You develop, configure applications to meet customer requirements, ensure consistent, successful project implementation', ' \t', 'You develop application training guide and you train customer to ensure project success', ' \t', 'You are a team player and execute project tasks to achieve on-time, on-budget implementations.', ' ']

desc: ['KEY RESPONSIBILITIES ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Reporting to the Head of Strategic Business Development, the Global Analytical Lead is accountable for building and implementing a market intelligence function that utilises data analytics to support the end-to-end category strategy and drives value-add activity.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'As the Global Analytical Lead, you will be a strategic analyst, advisor and consultant providing data-supported insights to the Sports & Active Lifestyle business unit and its customers to help improve and grow our business globally. You will be at the forefront of the Sports & Active Lifestyle industry (in nutrition and beyond) whilst acting as the engine behind identifying new partners, customers & opportunities.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'You will partner with Sales and Business Development across the globe to assess, build and present integrated business opportunities based on industry trends and insights drawn from a wealth of data. You have demonstrated analytical expertise, attested business ability and are dedicated to solving complex business challenges.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Data Analysis, Insights & Strategy Development', '    ', '     ', 'Utilise knowledge of online media combined with communication skills and analytical abilities to support growth of the S&AL business (existing and new) via data-based insights generation', '     ', 'Integrate innovative tools & technologies into data sourcing, identification, collection, analysis and visualation to generate insights for the S&AL business', '     ', 'Act as an industry advocate and analyst to surface key industry trends – including market sizing, segmentation, consumer trends, competitor activity, value chain & channel insights.', '     ', 'Conduct deep analysis of competitor offerings and strategies with a deep understanding of their pricing, products, channels, and brand positioning', '     ', 'Combine industry dynamics, business capability & performance and market data and analysis to develop hypotheses on future market dynamics or opportunities and provide recommendations on strategic direction/decision making', '     ', 'Support in the development of the Sports & Active Lifestyle overarching strategy through data-driven analytics', '    ', ' ', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Support & enable new business development initiatives, sales & other S&AL opportunities', '    ', '     ', 'Play an active role in identifying and prospecting potential partner targets for business development initiatives (incl. research, manufacturing, product offering, route to market/channel partners) and new customer leads to support sales target delivery', '     ', 'Work with internal stakeholders, category teams and regional business units to identify and validate new opportunities that will drive the most value for the S&AL category', '     ', 'Support prioritisation of pipeline opportunities across the value chain for the S&AL category via quantitative and qualitative assessment', '    ', ' ', '   ', 'Build and implementing an innovative market intelligence unit', '    ', '     ', 'Utilise data visualisation tools and techniques to provide the S&AL lead team and stakeholders key trends and insights to inform decision making', '     ', 'Develop the market intelligence function as the experts in S&AL consumer & customer requirements, products and market needs globally', '     ', 'Partner with internal and external research, data and digital teams to bring full analytical capabilities to S&AL and its customers', '     ', 'Apply an innovative approach in developing a database & network of data and tools to enable timely intelligence, providing foresight into future market activity and pre-empting opportunities', '     ', 'Be at the forefront of all market activity on an ongoing basis – ensuring any relevant activity is captured and escalated for discussion/attention as required', '    ', ' ', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Stakeholder/Relationship Management', '    ', '     ', 'Work collaboratively and constructively with peers and all stakeholders to achieve and deliver the overall goals and objectives of NZMP Sports & Active Lifestyle Nutrition.', '     ', 'Develop strong working relationships with regional market sales teams', '     ', 'Message the ‘what and why’ of Fonterra in an engaging and authentic way. Act as a knowledgeable advocate for Fonterra’s strategies, policies and practices.\xa0', '     ', 'Develop, implement and maintain an appropriate approach and plan for your function. Ensure a plan is in place and actively used to drive growth.', '     ', 'Utilise fully the systems and processes to deliver the highest level of service to our customers, and be an active contributor to the continuous improvement of these systems and processes.', '     ', 'Enhance the reputation of Fonterra by being an advocate and engaging widely in the Fonterra network and community of professionals to gain support for our customer needs', '    ', ' ', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Leadership and People ', '  ', '   ', 'Cascade Fonterra’s strategic direction, inspire and motivate teams to lift performance and work together towards clear team and individual goals that deliver This is Fonterra', '   ', 'Lead and role model our Fonterra values', '  ', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['   ', 'Experience using search engine marketing (Google Ads), website analytics platforms (Google Analytics and other measurement suite products) and brand analysis techniques (upper funnel analysis).', '   ', 'Experience using SQL to extract and manipulate data or with other programming or scripting languages (e.g., R, Python, C++).', '   ', 'Demonstrated experience with marketing analytics, return on investment/financial modeling and statistical analysis.', '   ', 'Understanding of statistical modeling and quantitative analysis techniques.', '   ', 'Ability to analyze large datasets with the goal of delivering actionable insights', '   ', 'Demonstrated commercial acumen to understand opportunities and challenges of the business and multiple categories', '   ', 'Demonstrated problem-solving skills, proven innovation/creativity with strategic thinking and a natural curiosity to delve further', '  ']

desc: ['INPUT: Key projects and initiatives aligned to the EM Business Intelligence roadmap for 2018-2023 (such as Compass Phases 2 and 3, Territory 360, Customer 360, Attrition Analysis); project proposals containing business rationale, impact, and resource requirements; other business requirements from region/area/LOC senior stakeholders', '  ', 'PROCESS: Work closely with EM Business Intelligence Director in managing the delivery of key pilot projects and initiatives within the function for the whole Emerging Markets; provide regular updates on progress vs plan, highlight risks and opportunities, communicate support needed, manage project dashboard; utilize project management and facilitation\xa0', '  ', 'OUTPUT: Management and communication of project status and delivery, execution plans, milestones, metrics and progress. Mitigation/Risk management support as required.', '  ', 'ACCOUNTABLE for', '  ', ' \t', 'Leading the BI innovation team (i.e. MCM Analytics Lead, other resources) and prepare roll-out to other LOCs, and liaising with Global Tech and Global DDA (digital, data, analytics) teams to pursue best-in-class project deployment across Emerging Markets', ' \t', 'Engaging GMs and SVPs in obtaining support and buy-in for innovation projects that will benefit LOCs in driving business performance', ' \t', 'Leading key BI projects from end-to-end and ensuring on-track execution against timeline and other agreed expectations', ' \t', 'Developing new techniques using artificial intelligence, machine learning, and other predictive analytics models to innovate and explore bold moves that will give the competitive advantage to Emerging Markets to win against competition using advanced analytics', ' \t', 'Serving as catalyst in pursuing new ideas from senior leaders that will deliver best-in-class solution to key business issues and take advantage of opportunities', ' \t', 'Effectively communicating project objectives and progress to ensure engagement and alignment across EM BI team and within EM ComEx LT', ' \t', 'Collaborating and forging value-adding partnerships within EM BI team and other ComEx stakeholders through project management and facilitation', ' \t', 'Promoting a culture of relentless continuous improvement with clear objectives and plans, lead & lag indicators and measures of success.', ' \t', 'Effectively managing project budget and engaging with external vendors in exploring suitable solutions for the projects at-hand', ' \t', 'Promoting rapid sharing of best practices and ensuring fast, clear and consistent implementation of EM BI initiatives', ' ']
req: ['At least 5 years of relevant experience', ' Min Degree in Technology or related', ' Strong communciation skills\xa0', ' Ability to engage with senior stakeholders']

desc: ["The Manager/Senior Manager uses data analytics and determines new strategies to make production processes more efficient to meet organisation's goals. He/She establishes, implements and manages projects to meet operational objectives. He/She manages his/her team resources and balances between production requirement and manpower resources to ensure organisation's sustainability. He/She integrates quality principles and methodology to enhance engineering performance within the organisation.", 'In addition the Manager/Senior Manager evaluates the organisation’s approach towards a lean enterprise and uses data analytics for business insights identification. He/She drives innovation practices in the organisation and review manufacturing processes to reduce working capital and optimize inventory levels.', 'As a people manager, the Manager oversees manpower, financial, training and resource planning deployment within the organisation. He displays a high level of organisational awareness and leadership skills by working in a consultative manner with other departments/sections within the organisation.']
req: [' ~ Analyse data for business insights identification.', ' ~ Analyse production efficiencies.', ' ~ Conduct interviews and make hiring decisions.', ' ~ Determine priorities dynamically and set planning assumptions for work in progress levels by product, cycle time and yield.', ' ~ Develop On-the-job training programme.', ' ~ Develop workplace learning plan.', ' ~ Evaluate organisations approach towards a lean enterprise.', ' ~ Evaluate the sustainability of manufacturing process by preparing rough cut capacity plans.', ' ~ Evaluate workplace safety and health management system for compliance and improvement.', ' ~ Improve operation planning through use of big data and advanced analytics modelling.', ' ~ Integrate quality principles and methodology to enhance engineering performance.', ' ~ Lead change management in the organisation.', ' ~ Manage balance between production requirement and manpower resources.', ' ~ Manage innovation practises in organisation.', ' ~ Manage manufacturing key metrics including loading, performance to commitments, on time delivery and bottlenecks.', ' ~ Manage material requirements planning taking into account the sales forecast, production plan and production capacity.', ' ~ Resolve workplace grievances and disputes.', ' ~ Review manufacturing processes to reduce working capital and optimise inventory levels.']
skills: ['Business Analysis', 'Business Development', 'Business Strategy', 'Change Management', 'CRM', 'Cross-functional Team Leadership', 'Leadership', 'Management', 'Management Consulting', 'Marketing', 'Marketing Strategy', 'Process Improvement', 'Product Management', 'Program Management', 'Project Management', 'Risk Management', 'Start-ups', 'Strategic Planning', 'Strategy', 'Vendor Management']

desc: ['We are looking to fill a postdoctoral position in the area of complex urban systems. The selected candidate will have a unique opportunity to carry out a truly interdisciplinary work with an international team of outstanding researchers within the group. The primary focus will be to carry out data analytics on big data sets associated with human dynamics through a network analytical lens.']

desc: ['Appointments will be for a 3-year initial period with future prospects of a permanent position.', ' ', 'The Centre for Climate Research Singapore (CCRS) is a research institute focusing on a number of weather and climate research areas which are of importance to Singapore and the wider Southeast Asian region. The centre is well supported with long-term core funding from the Singapore Government. In addition to the establishment of a number of research positions, a dedicated CRAY XC-40 has been installed to support modelling activities. The Centre also supports research groups in Singapore with external project funding.', ' ', 'In the climate area there are four main threads to the existing and future research activities:', ' ', ' ', 'The generation of climate scenarios for Singapore and the Southeast Asian region. In 2015 a major climate assessment project was completed and currently CCRS is embarking on a new assessment project to be delivered in the next few years. This project involves the regional downscaling of global model projections to a finer resolution over Singapore and Southeast Asia and a scientific evaluation of the results. Sea level rise is a vital aspect of climate change for Singapore and a dedicated National Sea Level Project has been initiated at CCRS. Current and future work involves an in-depth analysis of the key results coming from climate change projections and a scientific understanding of the mechanisms governing climate change.', ' ', 'The fundamental understanding of climate processes and mechanisms that are of first order importance to Singapore and the wider Southeast Asian region. These include tropical convection, monsoon dynamics, MJO and the role of remote tele-connections from ENSO and IOD. Working with global centres, we are also developing our capabilities in sub-seasonal to seasonal prediction for the Southeast Asian region.', ' ', 'A better characterisation and understanding of decadal climate variability and the drivers of changes in extreme weather in the region is needed. Fundamental research in this area is part of the research programme at CCRS.', ' ', 'Climate change impacts on water resources, human health, biodiversity, food security and the energy sector. These research areas will be pursued in collaboration with research groups in Singapore universities and research institutes.', ' ', ' ', 'We are looking for a team leader for the climate area to both develop and lead the science programme and to grow the group. We are seeking established scientists with an international reputation and a strong background in climate research. The specific job responsibilities will include:', ' ', ' ', 'Lead and line-manage the research team that is working to better understand and predict climate variability and change in Southeast Asia', ' ', 'Undertake and publish their own research in topics important to the region', ' ', 'Develop research plans for the climate research activities', ' ', 'Provide scientific/technical guidance and training to team members', ' ', 'Ensure the appropriate external representation of the centre’s climate work via national and international conferences and workshops', ' ', 'Collaborate nationally and internationally with key institutions that lead in associated climate research activities. There is also the possibility of developing an affiliated academic position with local universities.', ' ', 'Engage in an advisory capacity with national level stakeholders who are responsible for climate change policy and planning', ' ', ' ', 'Requirements', ' ', ' ', 'A PhD (or equivalent research experience) in a relevant physical science such as meteorology, oceanography, mathematics or physics', ' ', 'At least 10 years of post-doctoral research experience, with a proven record of success as demonstrated by publications in peer-reviewed journals', ' ', 'Demonstrated ability to inspire, lead and manage a team of PhD level researchers and technical experts', ' ', 'Experience from participating in large research consortia', ' ', 'Good written and verbal presentation skills', ' ', ' ', 'It is an advantage to have', ' ', ' ', 'Familiarity with tropical/Maritime Continent processes', ' ', 'Experience of leading large scale research consortia', ' ']

desc:
['Appointments will be for a 2-year initial period with a prospect of a permanent position.', '
', 'The Centre for Climate Research Singapore (CCRS) is the research arm of the Meteorological Service Singapore (MSS). Formally launched in 2013, the centre has two research branches: Climate Branch and Weather Branch. The centre’s focus is on weather and climate research areas of importance to Singapore and the wider Southeast Asian region. The centre is well supported with a dedicated super-computer.', '
', 'CCRS is expanding its efforts to develop state-of-the-art Numerical Weather Prediction (NWP) capabilities for operational prediction, as well as to become a regional centre of expertise in high-resolution NWP research and development. In addition to the in-house resources, we also have an extensive collaboration with the UK Met Office that is developing a high-resolution tropical forecast system.', '
', 'We are seeking a highly motivated scientist to join the Weather Modelling Development (WMD) section and lead the cloud physics related activities. The specific job responsibilities of this position will include:', '
', '
', 'Keeping abreast with the latest international developments in model physics with a focus on cloud microphysics;', '
', 'Carrying out research to improve the quality of the forecasts produced by the high-resolution ‘SINGV’ NWP system, for the benefit of Singaporean stakeholders;', '
', 'Performing diagnosis and verification of the forecasts, in terms of relevant high-impact weather parameters, e.g. heavy rainfall, wind gusts, etc.;', '
', 'Providing scientific/technical advice to other team members on some work aspects to improve the effectiveness of the team; and', '
', 'Presenting results at international meetings and publishing the research in peer-reviewed journals.', '
', '
', 'Candidate Requirements:', '
', '
', 'A PhD in a relevant field such as meteorology, fluid dynamics, mathematics or physics;', '
', 'Expertise in radiative transfer and atmospheric turbulence or experience with weather/climate model physics with a focus on cloud microphysics;', '
', 'Demonstrate ability to undertake research work both individually and as part of a team;', '
', 'Proficient in scientific computing;', '
', 'Proven record of success as demonstrated by publications in peer-reviewed journals;', '
', 'Good written and verbal presentation skills; and', '
', 'Able to supervise and coach less experienced team members in conducting research projects (for Senior Research Scientists).', '
']

desc:
['Appointments will be for a 2-year initial period with a prospect of a permanent position.', '
', 'The Centre for Climate Research Singapore (CCRS) is the research arm of the Meteorological Service Singapore (MSS). CCRS has two main branches focussing on Weather and Climate research. Within the Weather Branch, the Weather Modelling Applications (WMA) section conducts research and development in atmospheric dispersion modelling and other downstream applications which utilise Numerical Weather Prediction (NWP) information.', '
', 'CCRS is expanding its efforts to develop atmospheric dispersion modelling capabilities geared towards operational prediction. We are seeking a highly motivated scientist to join the WMA section and lead developments in the area of atmospheric chemistry modelling. The specific job responsibilities of this position include:', '
', '
', 'Developing and enhancing dispersion modelling systems to predict the transport of airborne pollutants in the context of Singapore and the region;', '
', 'Conducting research and analysis to improve modelling of atmospheric chemistry processes for the benefit of air quality forecasting;', '
', 'Performing diagnosis and verification of the dispersion model forecasts and contributing to other aspects of the modelling system development;', '
', 'Keeping abreast with the latest international developments in atmospheric chemistry and air quality modelling;', '
', 'Working with local and international institutes and cultivating relevant research partnerships; and', '
', 'Presenting results at international meetings and publishing research in peer-reviewed journals.', '
', '
', 'Candidate Requirements', '
', '
', 'A PhD (or equivalent research experience) in a research area relevant to atmospheric chemistry modelling;', '
', 'Experience in the development and application of atmospheric dispersion and air quality modelling systems;', '
', 'High level of proficiency in scientific computing and experience working with High Performance Computing (HPC) environments;', '
', 'Demonstrate ability to undertake research work both individually and as part of a team; and', '
', 'Good command of spoken and written English and good communication skills.', '
']

job_title: ['Senior Research Scientist  /  Deputy Principal Research Scientist (Climate variability and predictability)']
desc:
['Appointments will be for a 2-year initial period with a prospect of a permanent position.', '
', 'The Seasonal and Sub-seasonal Prediction (SSP) Section focuses its research on climate processes relevant to Singapore and Southeast Asian region and developing predictions for its stakeholders on timescales ranging from sub-seasonal to seasonal. It also works closely with the Climate Modelling and Prediction (CMP) section which is focused on longer-term climate projections. In keeping pace with international scientific developments and growing interest from stakeholders, Centre for climate Research Singapore (CCRS) is enhancing its capabilities in analysing decadal predictions and understanding the coupled climate processes on this time-scale, aiming at the current knowledge gap between seasonal predictions and climate projections.', '
', 'Against the backdrop of long-term climate change, the ability to detect changes in climate patterns and attribute those changes to variability on shorter (decadal) timescales is crucial. This ensures that the influence of climate drivers, on annual, multi-year, or decadal trends that either moderate or complement the long-term climate effects, are properly quantified. Being in a region that is heavily impacted by ENSO cycle, Indian Ocean sea surface temperature variability and the Madden-Julian Oscillation, it is important to understand how these intra-seasonal to inter-annual phenomena are modulated by longer-term variability.', '
', 'We are seeking an experienced scientist to join the SSP research team within CCRS Climate Branch and contribute to a better understanding of coupled ocean-atmosphere dynamics for decadal variability and predictability. The specific job responsibilities will include:', '
', '
', 'Conduct studies on climate drivers that affect the climate patterns over Singapore and Southeast Asia on the decadal timescale;\xa0\xa0', '
', 'Quantify and attribute observed changes on multi-year and decadal timescales to relevant drivers vis-à-vis climate change;', '
', 'Evaluate existing climate models’ ability to represent multi-year and decadal climate processes;', '
', 'Assess the feasibility of making skilful multi-year and decadal predictions for the region from emerging international database (e.g. World Climate Research Programme’s Decadal Climate Prediction Project) or using novel statistical approaches.', '
', 'Collaborate with other scientists at CCRS on climate variability and its relevance to climate change projections;', '
', 'Contribute to the supervision of junior scientists within the team; and', '
', 'Publish research outcomes in peer-reviewed publications and present findings at international meetings.', '
', '
', 'Candidate Requirements', '
', '
', 'A PhD (or equivalent research experience) in a relevant physical science such as meteorology, oceanography, mathematics or physics;', '
', '5 to 10 years post graduate research experience and a recognised expert in their field;', '
', 'Familiarity with coupled processes across the tropics and the Maritime Continent on various timescales.', '
', 'Demonstrate ability to undertake research work both individually and as part of a team;', '
', 'Good understanding of how decadal climate models are configured and run, and their potential and limitations;', '
', 'Proficiency in scientific computing;', '
', 'Proven record of success as demonstrated by publications in peer-reviewed journals; and', '
', 'Good written and verbal presentation skills.', '
']

desc:
['Appointments will be for a 2-year initial period with a prospect of a permanent position.', '
', 'As a densely populated island city-state situated in the tropics, Singapore is vulnerable to the effects of climate change. The Centre for Climate Research Singapore (CCRS) is the leading national research centre building local research expertise in the weather and climate of Singapore and the wider Southeast Asia region. CCRS delivers climate change assessments to inform policy decisions about adaptation and planning and is currently embarking on a new set of projections coherent with the international research community agenda.', '
', 'The 2', 'nd', ' set of National Climate Change Projection was released for Singapore by CCRS in 2015, in collaboration with the UK Met Office. This involved the regional downscaling of CMIP5 model projections to a finer resolution over Singapore and Southeast Asia using the UK regional climate model and their scientific evaluation. Detailed reports can be found on the CCRS website. An important aspect of the project was to evaluate the performance of the CMIP5 models in representing key atmospheric processes of relevance to the Maritime Continent and Singapore. Current work involves continued in-depth analysis of the large-scale and regional projections to assess the underlying mechanisms driving the projected changes and provide confidence estimates across the range of uncertainties.', '
', 'We are seeking a research scientist with hands-on experience on global and regional climate data analysis, especially in using CMIP global climate modelling databases to deliver regional climate change studies, to join the CMP research team and contribute to the development of the next set of national climate change projections for Singapore. The specific job responsibilities will include:', '
', '
', 'Analyse observed and modelling data to understand multi-scale climate processes in Southeast Asia;', '
', 'Evaluate the latest global climate model simulations from the international community (CMIP) and analyse their skills in simulating climate variability across Southeast Asia and of relevance to Singapore;', '
', 'Contribute to the development of the right framework to perform meaningful downscaling simulations to obtain suitable localised climate change projections;', '
', 'Provide advice for public and private stakeholders on the interpretations of the climate change projections to support mitigation and adaptation policy planning;', '
', 'Provide scientific/technical guidance and collaborate with other scientists in the team; and', '
', 'Publish research outcomes in peer-reviewed publications and present findings at international meetings.', '
', '
', 'Candidate Requirements', '
', '
', 'A PhD (or equivalent research experience) in a relevant physical science such as meteorology, oceanography, mathematics or physics;', '
', 'At least 5 years post graduate research experience and a recognised expert in their field;', '
', 'Demonstrate ability to undertake research work both individually and as part of a team;', '
', 'Good understanding of global climate models and hands-on experience on CMIP datasets;', '
', 'Proficiency in scientific computing;', '
', 'Proven record of success as demonstrated by publications in peer-reviewed journals;', '
', 'Good written and verbal presentation skills; and', '
', 'Familiarity with tropical/Maritime Continent processes (if any).', '
', '
', '\xa0']

['Appointments will be for a 2-year initial period with a prospect of a permanent position.', '
', 'As a densely populated island city-state situated in the tropics, Singapore is vulnerable to the effects of climate change. CCRS is the leading national research centre building local research expertise in the weather and climate of Singapore and the wider Southeast Asia region. CCRS delivers climate change assessments to inform policy decisions about adaptation and planning and is currently embarking on a new set of projections coherent with the international research community agenda.', '
', 'The 2nd set of National Climate Change Projection was released for Singapore by CCRS in 2015, in collaboration with the UK Met Office. Detailed reports can be found on the CCRS website. The specific job responsibilities will include:', '
', '
', 'Carry out the required downscaling simulations with the UM-based SINGV model and possibly other Regional Climate Models;', '

', 'Contribute to the development of the suitable interface between global and regional models;', '

', 'Publish research outcomes in peer-reviewed publications and present findings at international meetings.', '
', '
', 'Candidate Requirements', '
', '
', 'A PhD (or equivalent research experience) in a relevant physical science such as meteorology, oceanography, mathematics or physics;', '

', 'Proven record of success as demonstrated by publications in peer-reviewed journals;', '
', 'Good written and verbal presentation skills; and', '

']

desc: ['The Immunology Group of Bioprocessing Technology Institute (BTI) is seeking two highly motivated individuals for postdoctoral positions to conduct exciting research in genetic engineering of T cells for therapy against cancer and scale-up bioproduction of engineered T cells. Interested candidates should have strong expertise in molecular and cellular immunological techniques and assays, including development of mouse models of cancer and inflammatory diseases. The research hopes to identify and validate engineered T cells with sufficiently high pre-clinical efficacy and safety to be considered for assessment in human clinical trials leading to improvement in lives of cancer patients. Candidates will also be working closely with scientists from industry as part of a joint research collaboration to establish a novel technology platform capable of continuous, large scale and low-cost manufacturing of genetically engineered T cells to meet rapidly growing clinical needs for cancer immunotherapy, the next frontier in human healthcare.', '  ', 'Responsibilities include:', '  ', '   ', 'Generation, phenotypic characterization and functional assessment of genetically engineered immune cells for immunotherapy against cancer', '   ', 'Work closely with scientists from industry to deliver key objectives of joint research collaboration', '   ', 'Communication of scientific results to a variety of audience in written and oral formats', '   ', 'Uphold high standards of research integrity and laboratory safety', '  ']

company: ['SINGAPORE-MIT ALLIANCE FOR RESEARCH AND TECHNOLOGY CENTRE']
job_title: ['Postdoctoral Associate / Research Scientist - Behavioral Modeling (Ref: IRG_FM_2019_007)']
desc: ['Project Overview', '  ', 'Part of the FM research agenda involves the development of the SimMobility platform for the microsimulation of land use and transportation interactions.\xa0 \xa0SimMobility is an agent-based simulator that links together various mobility-sensitive behavioral models with state-of-the-art simulators to predict impacts of mobility demands, infrastructure changes, and evolving transportation options on the deployment and delivery of people, firms, services and freight. \xa0This particular Postdoctoral Associate will focus on the so-called ‘long-term’ module of SimMobility. The behavioral models in the long-term, agent-based simulator address household residential choice, vehicle availability, firm location and real-estate markets in a manner that is tightly integrated with an activity-based ‘mid-term’ model that estimates agent-specific ‘logsum’ accessibility measures for simulated daily activity patterns.', '  ', 'The overall scope of FM research includes a number of projects on the development, and analysis of new and advanced forms of mobility options (such as on-demand mobility and autonomous vehicles), as well as on their urban planning and management implications.\xa0 Both FM, and the SMART Centre, encourage exploration of new ideas and the use of ‘big data’ to advance our understanding of behavioral choices, urban activity patterns and the adoption of new forms of mobility.', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', 'Depending upon project assignment and postdoc skills and interests, the specific responsibilities will involve some combination of the following:', '  ', '  ', 'Enhancing, estimating and calibrating the behavioral models in the long-term simulator,', '  ', 'Generating and updating synthetic populations of residents, firms, and workers for particular cities at various points in time,', '  ', 'Performing complex data analysis and integration of geospatial datasets,', '  ', 'Contributing to the design and initiation of new research projects and ideas related to household and firm behavior as new options evolve for urban mobility and freight delivery,', '  ', 'Presenting research results at international workshops, conferences, and exhibits as well as at internal project meetings,', '  ', 'Co-authoring articles for publication in top-tier, peer-reviewed journals and conferences, and', '  ', 'Monitoring the progress of project components, supervising PhD students, and regularly meeting with Principle Investigators.', ' ']
req: ['The successful candidate must hold a doctoral degree in Urban Planning, Transportation Engineering, Econometrics or a related field. Candidates with experience in urban modeling and data science will have an added advantage. Additionally, they should enjoy working in a multidisciplinary team environment that values problem solving skills and creativity.', '  ', '  ', 'Advanced skill and experience in data processing and analysis is required.', '  ', 'Expertise in agent-based modeling, urban-scale transport modeling; and/or behavioral economics and real-estate markets is desired.', '  ', 'Knowledge of urban economics, discrete choice models, geoprocessing, and database management is expected.', '  ', 'Experience with programming in scientific languages (e.g. Python and R) is necessary.', '  ', 'Familiarity with object-oriented programming languages (e.g. C++ and Java) is desired.', '  ', 'Independent thinking and innovative scientific accomplishments demonstrated via published papers is expected.', '  ', 'Outstanding oral and written communication skills in English is required.', ' ', '  ', 'The Postdoctoral Associate will work with an integrated team of faculty, researchers and students from MIT and Singapore University partners, including (among others): Professors Joseph Ferreira, Christopher Zegras, and Moshe Ben-Akiva of MIT.', '  ', 'Interested applicants should submit the following:', '  ', '  ', "A motivation letter (one or two pages) stating the applicant's interest in working with the Lab, research areas and/or projects of particular relevance, key competencies, and anticipated date of availability,", '  ', 'A full CV, including degrees, relevant projects and positions with dates, and key relevant publications (up to 5), and', '  ', 'Names and contact information of three references.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

job_title: ['Research & Development Project Scientist (Synthetic Biology) – School Of Life Sciences & Chemical Technology']
desc: ['As an R&D Project Scientist, you will be part of a team working to identify novel secondary metabolites for consumer care applications. Your responsibilities will include but are not limited to the following:', ' ', ' ', 'Microbial genome mapping, transcriptome profiling, proteomics and metabolomics analysis;', ' ', 'Novel secondary metabolite Biosynthesis Gene Clusters (BGCs) identification;', ' ', 'Refactoring identified BGCs in yeast;', ' ', 'Pathway optimization for enhanced secondary metabolite production;', ' ', 'Microbial fermentation process development and parameter optimization in bioreactors;', ' ', 'Bioactivity and cellular activity assay of the novel secondary metabolites;', ' ', 'Analysis of experimental results and preparation of technical reports;', ' ', 'Preparation of manuscript for journal publication and patent application;', ' ', 'Preparation of research proposals for grant application and industrial collaboration;', ' ', 'Procurement of laboratory equipment, materials and accessories, chemicals and reagents;', ' ', 'Supervision of junior research staff and final year project students; and', ' ', 'Support research team and assist in laboratory management.', ' ', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Pre-requisites:', ' ', ' ', 'At least 2 years of relevant research experience in Synthetic Biology, Microbial Metabolic Engineering, Molecular Biology, Bioinformatics or a related field', ' ', 'Hands-on experience in microbial metabolic/genetic engineering and fermentation', ' ', 'Able to design and undertake research projects with minimal supervision', ' ', 'Extensive hands-on experience in bioinformatics, microbial genome mapping, microbial secondary metabolite Biosynthesis Gene Cluster (GBC) identification and refactoring, or synthetic biology would be an advantage', ' ', ' ', 'Check out the details of the position and submit online at ', 'https://applyjobs.np.edu.sg', '. Be part of an institution with ', 'that something xtra', '.', ' ', 'We thank all applicants for their interest. Shortlisted candidates will be notified within 2 - 3 weeks after the closing date.']

job_title: ['Senior Research & Development Project Engineer / Scientist (Aquaporin (Aqp) Mass Production) – Environmental & Water Technology Centre Of Innovation']
desc: ['As a Senior R&D Project Engineer/Scientist, you will work with a project team on the funded research project which aims to scale-up the production of high quality AQP for AQP-based biomimetic membranes applications which includes water reuse and desalination. The AQP-based biomimetic membrane technology is ready for practical applications if large-scale production is realised. Your responsibilities will include but are not limited to the following:', ' ', ' ', 'Setup and operation of benchtop bio-fermenter;', ' ', 'Setup and operation of floor-stand Sterilisation-in-Place (SIP) fermentation system;', ' ', 'Cultivation and harvesting of bacteria mass;', ' ', 'AQP protein extraction, purification and characterisation;', ' ', 'Production of proteolipsome;', ' ', 'Purity analysis and quality control;', ' ', 'Analyses and documentation of data/findings for project meetings and progress reports;', ' ', 'Manage project administration and funding; and', ' ', 'Manage project procurement.', ' ', ' ', 'Pre-requisites:', ' ', ' ', 'At least 3 years of relevant research experience in microbiology science which includes preparation and presentation of reports and findings', ' ', 'Experience in bacterial cultivation, protein purification and processes optimisation', ' ', ' ', 'Check out the details of the position and submit online at ', 'https://applyjobs.np.edu.sg', '. Be part of an institution with ', 'that something xtra', '.', ' ', 'We thank all applicants for their interest. Shortlisted candidates will be notified within 2 - 3 weeks after the closing date.']

desc: ['The Monocrystalline Silicon Wafer Solar Cell Group focuses on the research and development of cost-effective high-efficiency (> 22%) solar cells that are suitable for high-volume manufacturing. Full-size p-type and n-type Cz silicon wafers are used as substrates and processed into either monofacial or bifacial solar cells. Selected research topics of the group include silicon surface passivation, silicon bulk passivation, ultrathin layers and new materials for passivated contacts, liquid based novel dielectrics, alternative doping technologies (e.g. ion implantation and doped thin films), solar cell optics, laser processing and advanced metallisation.', '  ', '   ', '\xa0Design and plan activities required to fabricate large-area high efficiency (>21%) p-type & n-type monocrystalline silicon wafer solar cells.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Research focusing on the following:', '  ', '  ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0- \xa0Performing design-of-experiments (DOE) to obtain optimised junction profiles (homogeneous & selective) - diffused/ion-implanted/CVD doped layers', '  ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 - \xa0Integration of passivated contacts for large-area high efficiency industrial solar cells', '  ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 - Advanced metallisation concepts for achieving high conversion efficiency', '  ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 - Advanced characterisation and power loss/gain analysis of silicon wafer solar cells', '  ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 - Effectively contribute in the project team(s) for solar cell efficiency improvements', '  ', '\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 - Effectively plan & communicate ideas and results to the team', '  ', '   ', 'Assist the group with processing and characterisation services for various company-funded and public-funded projects.', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'PhD Degree in Physics, Electrical Engineering or Materials Sciences, with specialization in Silicon photovoltaics or Microelectronics.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Minimum 3 years of experience in silicon wafer solar cell fabrication and characterizations or other relevant experience.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Researchers with prior experience on development of large area silicon wafer solar cells will be preferred.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Required to work in semiconductor clean room and characterisation lab.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Expertise in DOE softwares, AutoCAD or relevant grid design tools.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Excellent written and verbal communication (in English) skills required.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Regular, reliable and predictable attendance required.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Ability to work well with others in a collaborative team environment.', '  ']

desc: ['The Sensors, Actuators, & Microsystems (SAM) team is looking for a microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) research scientist. The scientist will work with a multidisciplinary team and contribute to the development of promising silicon-based MEMS technology for ultra-low power sensors.', '  ', 'The job responsibilities will include:', '  ', '- Designing capacitive and piezoelectric MEMS sensor devices', '  ', '- Investigating MEMS switch design with a focus on contact reliability\xa0', '  ', '- Developing mechanical, piezoelectric, and electrostatic finite element and analytical models', '  ', '- Designing MEMS fabrication processes and working with the process integration team to ensure successful devices', '  ', '- Specifying integrated circuit and packaging requirements for MEMS devices and communicating the requirements to the respective teams', '  ', '- Building test setups and PCB circuits for characterizing MEMS devices']
req: ['Qualifications and Requirements:', '  ', '- PhD in Electrical Engineering / Mechanical Engineering / Applied Physics or equivalent', '  ', '- 3-5 years experience in MEMS', '  ', '- Good intuition and a deep understanding of fundamental mechanical and electrical principles in MEMS. Experience with electrostatic and/or piezoelectric MEMS transduction mechanisms preferred.', '  ', '- Knowledge of typical MEMS fabrication processes, with some experience in microfabrication.', '  ', '- Experience with finite element software such as COMSOL, Coventorware, or Ansys.', '  ', '- Software programming skills for data analysis, such as MATLAB or Python.', '  ', '- Good communication and presentation skills', '  ', '- Ability to work independently, as well as being an excellent team player.']

desc: ['Active control of light at the nanoscale is an important and challenging goal to bring into reality the next-generation of spatial light modulators with sub-wavelength resolution.', '  ', 'This task is currently under development at the Institute of Materials Research and Engineering using the novel concepts of resonant dielectric nanoantennas, within the framework of an inter-disciplinary project involving different A*STAR RIs and Singaporean Universities.', '  ', 'We are looking for a strong candidate to work on the nanofabrication aspects of the project, who will be in charge of the nanofabrication processes as well as of the nanoscale characterization of fabricated samples.', '  ', 'A strong track of record in the fabrication of nanoantennas, nanophotonic and optoelectronic devices is preferable.\xa0', '  ', 'The job will include fabrication of nanoantennas based on semiconductor or/and dielectric materials to be integrated in switchable cells for active control of light propagation and characteristics at the nanoscale. The job will involve, as well, working as a part of a large team, including project members with different science and engineering backgrounds, such as electronics, advanced optical packaging and device engineering and system integration.']
req: ['- PhD in physics or engineering\xa0', '  ', '- 3 years experience (including PhD studies)', '  ', '-\xa0The candidate should be an experimentalist with a strong expertise in nanofabrication techniques as well as in nanoscale characterization techniques such as Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM).\xa0', ' -\xa0The candidate should have, preferably, experience and knowledge in the area of nanophotonics, including nanoantennas and metasurfaces.']

desc: ['Research Scientist', '  ', 'AQP PRO Pte Ltd', '  ', 'Our company is a start-up company aiming to mass-produce aquaporin, a basic building block for application of aquaporin-based biomimetic membrane technology for water treatment.', '  ', 'The successful candidate will perform both experimental and some paper works under a PUB funded project collaborated with NUS.', '  ', 'The main responsibilities of the position include:', '  ', 'A scientist with diploma will be employed to assist the routine laboratory works including fermentation, protein purification, SDS-PAGE, Western blot analysis and routine laboratory procurement, with the supervision of senior staff. Prior working experience in a research lab setting in life sciences is not compulsory, but would be a bonus. Applicants with technical competence in one or more of the following areas of work will be given priority in the selection process: recombinant protein expression and protein purification.', '  ', 'Applicant should email his/her full curriculum vitae and contact information (email and phone number) of three individuals who would have first-hand knowledge of his/her ability in conducting scientific research.']
req: ['Qualifications/Discipline', ': Successful applicant should have a diploma in a Life Science-related discipline.', '  ', 'Skills', ': Applicants with technical competence in one or more of the following areas of work will be given priority in the selection process: recombinant protein expression and protein purification.', '  ', 'Experience', ': Fresh graduate is welcome.', '  ', 'Job:', ' Research and some paper works', '  ', 'Primary Location of Work:', ' Kent Ridge, NUS', '  ', 'Schedule', ': Full-time - Fixed Term (Contract)', '  ', 'Duration', ': 11.5 months if starting from April 15, 2019.']
