desc: ['The National Satellite of Excellence (NSoE) in Design Science and Technology for Secure Critical Infrastructure (DeST-SCI) is a multidisciplinary research center funded by the National Research Foundation, Singapore. NSoE is hosted in iTrust, Centre for Research in Cyber Security at the Singapore University of Technology and Design. Research focus in NSoE is on the design of secure and safe critical infrastructure that includes, plants for water treatment and distribution, the electric power grid, maritime systems, \xa0rail transportation, and AV systems.', '  ', 'Interested individuals may kindly submit their statement of interest and a CV, including publications; only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.']
req: ['Research Scientist, PhD with 5 Years of experiences', '  ', '*Candidates with a degree in any field of Engineering and Computer Science are encouraged to apply. All candidates are expected to be proficient in computer programming in at least one programming language.', '  ', '** Candidates who have made contributions in any of the following areas would be preferred: Attack modelling and anomaly detection; Control systems in Critical Infrastructure; Applied cryptography; Forensics and recovery; Formal modelling and simulation; IOT security testing; Machine Learning and AI; Power grid modelling and analysis.']

desc: ['The responsibilities of the SLS Manager Cell Culture Technologies (CCT) APAC will include managerial responsibilities (appr. 50%) as well as technical responsibilities as and individual contributor (appr. 50%). The workload division between managerial and technical responsibilities may vary with the team size. The team in the APAC region consists of cell culture scientists\xa0 (or Bioreactor Application Specialists) in India, Japan, China, Korea, Taiwan and Australia/New Zealand.', '  ', 'General duties:', \t', 'Daily management of the SLS CCT-APAC team, incuding resource allocation, monitoring activities through agreed metrics and adequate management reporting.', ' \t', 'Harmonize efforts, processes desc: ['GLOBALFOUNDRIES Global Supply Management (GSM) is seeking a highly skilled and motivated Business Intelligence team member to be part of the GSM Team.\xa0The successful candidate for this position will have demonstrated success developing and creating analytical reports needed to drive business performance, broad understanding of Semiconductor operations, and experience in coordinating compilation of procurement data from multiple teams, supporting the administrative needs of the eSourcing event planning and serving as a resource to the GSM organization in analytical tools available.\xa0This team member will be part of the GSM team endeavoring to improve global business processes in support of operational excellence, improved performance and delivering business systems to meet KPI’s critical to enabling the GLOBALFOUNDRIES Manufacturing Technology Roadmap.\xa0The individual can be located at GLOBALFOUNDRIES in any of our Northeast Fab locations, Dresden, Germany, or our Singapore locations.\xa0', '  ', 'This position will require experience in creating standardized reports for the necessary KPIs and analysis needs as well as an ability to communicate effectively and manage inputs across the global organization.\xa0The responsibilities of this position are in the following categories: Project mapping from input to final roll out, designing and generating reports for review, management reporting and administrative support for eSourcing platform tools.\xa0Individual must support and administer the business intelligence process to support procurement operations in meeting financial goals.', '  ', 'Specific Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', 'Develops & administer global reporting dashboards that will drive efficiency in GLOBALFOUNDRIES spend, supplier and price analytics', '   ', 'Develop reporting and analysis to build global GSM KPI’s that are measured in an aligned way across all sites', '   ', 'Engages with procurement leadership to define business driven KPI’s', '   ', 'Monitors and analyzes procurement KPI’s.\xa0Requires technical knowledge of the work involved and the ability to report information to management', '   ', 'Interface with Procurement, IT and Finance teams, Supplier Account Managers and others, to enable exchange of analysis information necessary to drive performance', '   ', 'Prepare operational reports, dashboards and documentation; communicate with GLOBALFOUNDRIES management', '   ', 'Supports business intelligence platform tools and serves as an administrator and point of contact for best known methods and practices', '   ', 'Familiar with a variety of business intelligence concepts, practices, and procedures. Relies on extensive experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals; some degree of creativity and latitude is expected', '  ']

desc: ['Amazon Web Services, Inc.', '\xa0("', 'AWS', '") enables customers of all sizes to run their applications on Amazon’s industry-leading cloud computing infrastructure. AWS is growing very rapidly with hundreds of thousands of companies in over 190 countries on the platform. This growth is driving the need for an experienced individual to fill this new, high-profile position as a\xa0', 'Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst', '.', '  ', 'Amazon has a strong culture of data-driven decision-making; requiring timely, accurate, and actionable intelligence that delivers significant business value. We are looking for a hands-on and motivated self-starter who is passionate about using data to help us measure every area of the business and influence decision-making.', '  ', 'In this role, the\xa0', 'Business Intelligence (BI) Analyst', '\xa0serves as the primary bridge through the business to communicate high value information to support data-driven decision making demands. He/she will continuously evolve management reporting, conduct complex data analysis and deliver business insights in an environment of rapid growth and increasing complexity.', '  ', 'The successful candidate must be able to roll-up his/her sleeves, and work directly with very large datasets and BI tools. He/she will be passionate about their work, detail-oriented, highly analytical and have excellent problem solving skills.', '  ', 'He/she will be passionate about their work, detail-oriented, analytical, and have excellent problem-solving abilities. He/she will be and expert at working with large data sets and the technical tools needed to work with them. He/she will possess good communication and project management skills, is customer obsessed and able to communicate complex business insights; both verbally and in writing; in a clear and precise manner.', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '\xa0', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Create, develop and own the APAC BI reporting and analytical environment', '   ', 'Collaborate with the BI Engineer on the design, development and maintenance of data models', '   ', 'Lead the development and provision of BI reporting through the deployment of self-service reports and dashboards', '   ', 'Lead the development and provision of advanced analysis through the use of classical statistical and machine driven techniques\xa0', '   ', 'Maintain thorough knowledge of existing and emerging open source and proprietary BI and advanced analysis tools\xa0', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering or other related fields', '   ', 'Significant experience in a senior leadership role in Finance, Operations, or other related fields', '   ', 'Expert working knowledge on SQL, and R to perform data querying, building data models and conducting data analysis.\xa0', '   ', 'Exceptional visualisation skills using Tableau, Qlikview or other relevant visualisation tools.', '   ', 'Exhibits sound business judgment, a proven ability to influence others, strong analytical skills, and a proven track record of taking ownership, leading data-driven analyses, and influencing results', '   ', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a track record of presenting to senior management', '   ', 'Effective self-starter who excels in a lean and fast-paced organisation', '   ', 'Good working knowledge on Python and Java to create applications and programmes', '   ', 'Good understanding of different types of databases and their relevant use cases', '   ', 'Experience in conducting data mining studies and employing machine learning\xa0', '   ', 'Experience working within a high-growth, technology company is highly beneficial', '   ', 'AWS certified', '  ']

desc: ['StarHub is seeking an innovative, insightful and results-oriented Lead Business Intelligence Analyst to join our Finance Data and Analytics team. In this role you will be working with massive amounts of data, in order to develop Machine learning and predictive analytical models to provide strategic, value-add insights to the business.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', "'• Work with Information Services to ensure end to end operational efficiency on data preparation, extraction and transformation", '  ', '• Drive execution of data and analytics strategy, supporting infrastructure requirement', '  ', '• Conduct data quality assessment & design solutions to detect and improve data quality problems, include identifying root causes & provide recommendations to address data quality issues, and implement tactical fixes such as cleaning and pruning source data to minimize disruption to data analysis/mining activities', '  ', '• Engage & provide support to various finance advocate teams in the design/implementation of various data visualization dashboards for various data explanatory or exploratory purposes;', '  ', '• Preparing data visualization presentations, to summarize the business situation/context & provide actionable business insights or recommendations', '  ', '• Lead the development and maintenance of Executive Dashboard for centralized reporting of key performance business statistics for Mobile, TV, Broadband and Fixed Products Businesses.', '  ', '• Perform proof of concepts & identify opportunities to adopt new prescriptive or predictive analytics tools & techniques in complex data environment', '  ', '• Design and develop models to support projects across various business verticals.', '  ', '• Design effective analytical approaches taking into consideration performance and scalability to large datasets, adhering to best practices for model development, and perform unit and system testing to validate the results of the analytics models.', '  ', '• Participate and contribute to stakeholders’ requirement gatherings sessions, co-creation workshops to size up stakeholders’ problem statements and formulate best approaches to analytic solutions and models.', '  ', '• Develop new analytics models and innovative techniques/algorithms to enhance capabilities in supporting finance business intelligence', '  ', '• Work with Finance and Business teams to conduct quantitative analysis, draw qualitative conclusions, and transform data sets into value-added information useful to the business', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['• Knowledgeable in different data acquisition techniques, in both traditional & new methods; appreciate the advantages & limitations of different technical solutions in meeting data analytics/visualization needs', '  ', '• Keen eye for opportunities for value creation with applied data science', '  ', '• Bachelor in Statistics/ Data Analytics/ Mathematics/ Computer Science/ Computer Engineering/ Information System and equivalent.', '  ', '• At least 5 years’ experience, preferably in team lead capacity in data analytics and data mining work.', '  ', '• Able to work with large amounts of data (facts, figures, and number crunching) to discover patterns and trends', '  ', '• Utilize in-depth knowledge of modern data driven methods and fuse with industry domain understanding to deliver data driven, value-add business insights', '  ', '• Analytical mind and business acumen with ability to look at the numbers, trends, and data and form conclusions based on findings', '  ', '• Transform business requirements into mathematical and statistical models for analysis and solutioning', '  ', '• Data Intuition: Ask the right questions – recognize what things important and what things are are not important', '  ', '• Proven ability to handle multiple projects concurrently', '  ', '• Excellent communication and presentation skills', '  ', '• Knowledge of R/Python and, SQL is required. Knowledge of Tableau, Microsoft Access, Power BI, Azure, Anaplan, Lava storm (or Infogix Data3Sixty), etc. will be an added advantage', '  ', '*We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

desc: ["Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.", '  ', "Apple's Global Business Intelligence (GBI) team is looking for a Software Engineering Lead for Apple’s Data Warehousing, Business Intelligence and Analytics solutions. Take a leadership role to implement innovative and challenging reporting solutions for one of the world's largest databases. \xa0", '  ', 'GBI team builds extraordinary high performing reporting and analytics solutions. The team consists of delivery leads and development engineers. This role is responsible for the design, implementation, maintenance, and overall health of DW solutions. \xa0', '  ', 'We are seeking a pro-active solution-oriented individual with strong written and verbal communication skills, and have a proven track record in Data warehousing architecture, application design, software lifecycle and technical team management coupled with excellent leadership skills. \xa0', '  ', 'You will enjoy the benefits of working in a fast growing business where you are inspired to "Think Different" and where your efforts play a key role in the success of Apple\'s business.', '  ', '- Deliver highly available, reliable, innovative large-scale data warehousing solutions to facilitate data induction, build optimized aggregates and building reporting solutions', '  ', '- Provide leadership and expertise to define solutions architecture and strategies at all layers, for next generation reporting platform with high performance and scalability', '  ', '- Lead a portfolio of multiple projects, setting priorities with measurable objectives, monitoring and reporting on the process, progress and results', '  ', '- Own ultimate responsibility for the deliverables, working with support and daily operations team to ensure 7x24 operation.', '  ', '- Effectively communicate program status to the senior management and functional partners on a regular basis', '  ', '- Keep up-to-date on the newest technology solutions in market to generate innovative ideas to solve business challenges - Influence work of global multi-functional teams', '  ', '- Provide technical guidance, direction and problem solving to engineering team members. Drive technical excellence in software development and solution design.', '  ', '- Use and help chip in to standard software engineering processes, improve development methodologies over time.', '  ', '- Provide staffing coordination and planning to achieve timely delivery of multiple, concurrent initiatives.']
req: [' \t', 'We are looking for, 8+ years experience developing DW solutions 3+ years leading a technical team, including prior hands-on technical experience\xa0', ' \t', 'Architect and design Enterprise Data warehouse and reporting solutions\xa0', ' \t', 'Solid understanding of analytics needs and proactive-ness to build generic solutions to improve the efficiency\xa0', ' \t', 'Translate complex business requirements into scalable technical solutions meeting Data warehousing standards\xa0', ' \t', 'Provide solutions and recommendations on technical issues in production system\xa0', ' \t', 'Hands on experience in 2 or more of the database technologies like Teradata, Hadoop, Oracle and Vertica\xa0', ' \t', 'Good programming experience in at least 1 of the following programming languages C, C++, Java, Perl, Python\xa0', ' \t', 'Experience in architecting and building robust, scalable and performant data warehousing and analytics solutions\xa0', ' \t', 'Experience or knowledge in the following areas will definitely be a plus :', ' \t', 'New generation technologies like Spark, Scala, Kafka, Advanced Python', ' \t', 'Big Data and NoSQL - Mongo, Cassandra', ' \t', 'Data Science and Machine Learning Knowledge', ' \t', 'Cloud technology exposure', ' \t', 'BS Degree in computer science or an equivalent', ' ']

desc: ['Job Role Description ', '  ', 'The MSBI Senior Business Intelligence Consultants is a BI expert specialized in the ', 'Microsoft BI tools suite', '. desc: ['\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Recruitment Consultant - Job Overview', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Job Overview:', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The Recruitment Consultant will work in between the Sales Team and candidates. \xa0They will work in partnership with the Sales team taking control of managing the recruitment process from candidate generation through to candidate placement. \xa0Recruitment Consultants will work within a vertical market specialization having direct touch points to a network of mid, senior candidates and niche junior level candidates, SearchElect’s internal team members and client contact. They will develop a deep understanding of the various research tools to come up with a ‘Talent Map’ of the market and own candidate control through the entire recruitment process. \xa0In addition to working on various recruitment processes, the Recruitment Consultant will also be at the forefront of market activity. Therefore an important source of business intelligence to feed back into the SearchElect organization and adding value to ensure that the organization remains competitive with a leading edge and capitalizes on market trends and opportunities.', '  ', 'Activities: Overview', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Research Stage: Create search criteria from qualified job forms in order to execute a candidate search and if necessary, collaborate \xa0with the Business Support and refine searches to improve results.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Marketing Stage: Share market knowledge and inform the marketing team with the latest trending topics relevant to the technology industry in order to create brand awareness to target business customers and candidate registrations. \xa0\xa0Align marketing activities and efforts towards recruiting and sales objectives. Feed back any ROI to marketing.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Creation of Talent Pools: Organise candidate CRM and social media \xa0lists and tagging methods of active and passive \xa0candidates within the target area’s of the SearchElect specialist markets. \xa0Collaborate with business support to provide search criteria for ‘watchdogs’.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Intelligence gathering: Generate market intelligence from Candidates. Upload references as Contacts to the Applicant Tracking System. Generate information from potential Clients and Candidates via reference checks for active Candidates. Meet active candidates to learn market intelligence and gain potential leads as well as referrals of new candidates. Increased interaction with our internal database.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Recruiting - Submission’s: Standardise job forms for external advertising. Execute candidate search process against planned path depending on urgency and job scoring criteria. Qualify shortlist of Candidates using SearchElect policy and procedures around red flags, risks, ABC techniques. Collaborate \xa0with the sales team from strategy to follow-up’s pending from the client. Prepare candidates for sendouts. ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Recruiting - \xa0Sendouts: Use talent pools and hiring manager distribution lists to cross market ‘hot candidates’ to target hiring managers. \xa0Sendout shortlist of candidates to hiring managers or HR.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Recruiting - Interviewing: Control entire interview process from the hiring manager request, coordination, candidate and where possible hiring manager preparations, feedback exchanges using the ATS process and policy. Collaborate with sales accordingly. Ensure that Sales team is equipped with all possible red flags and concerns from a candidate perspective to prepare and inform client and eliminate challenges on closing as early as the interviewing stage. Meet and prepare the candidate by stimulating in them the right mindset when they have the interview.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Recruiting - Placement’s: Pre-close the Candidate using the ABC method from first contact. Follow the SearchElect process and policies throughout the lifecycle of the search processes from first contact to offer and counter offer discussions. Ensure proper adherence to the SearchElect red flag procedures to maximise successful placements and reduce the risk of ‘drop offs’.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Recruiting - Post-placement: Follow the SearchElect post placement process and periodically meet with placed candidates for after service and account support activities.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Recruitment - Account Support: Identify potential opportunities within the Company/Client for current or future purposes. Put this down as task or job lead for the sales team to follow through.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Experience required:', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'People-oriented mindset - able to understand and appreciate other perspectives', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Realistic thinker and able to overcome objectives pragmatically', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Understands the difference between IQ/EQ and able to identify the differences between these and how to work with the different balances individually and with other people', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Identifying ‘redflags’ and business risks.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Online data mining – Social Media, websites etc.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Building and structuring internal CRM and systems', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Working with customers in B2B within a professional capacity', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Experience relating to recruitment or talent acquisition in an agency or in house environment', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Good written English to update records', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Strong communication skills to speak with internal and external people.', ' \t', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Skills required:', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'Interviewing', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Market research – Business directory search and build', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Deep Social Media – Linkedin, Facebook , Twitter, Blog etc.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Data research – based on clients', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Organization', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Fluency in English both written and spoken', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Data organization', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Business Intelligence gathering', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Spreadsheets', ' \t', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Personal attributes:', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'Communicative (able to build rapport)', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Influential', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Problem solver', ' \t', ' ']

job_title: ['Business and Operations Manager, Google Cloud - Singapore']
desc: ['Company overview:', '  ', 'Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers.', '  ', 'The area: Google Cloud', '  ', 'Google Cloud helps millions of employees and organizations empower their employees, serve their customers, and build what’s next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are engineered for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. And our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life.', '  ', 'The role: Business and Operations Manager, Google Cloud - Singapore', '  ', 'Google Cloud teams work with schools, companies, and government agencies to make them more productive, mobile, and collaborative. You help fellow sales Googlers by performing budgeting, planning, and analysis activities — and through your passion for the magic of Google products like G Suite and Chrome. Not only do you provide invaluable financial and budgeting input, but you also devise new ways for us to communicate with potential leads and bring them into the Google fold. Your insight means you excel at customer segmentation, acquisition, and retention. You combine clean communication with strong analytical skills and a solid commitment to providing customers with a Googley customer experience. You also peer into the future for us; you examine and analyze statistical data to forecast marketing trends and to identify potential new markets for Google Cloud.', '  ', 'Additional Role Description:', '  ', 'The Google Cloud Customer team helps customers transform and evolve their business through the use of Google’s global data center and software assets. As a Business and Operations Manager, you will partner with Sales leadership to provide actionable insights and use a data driven approach to sharpen decision-making and drive deep understanding of our fast growing business. Combined with the resources of a dedicated sales force, our insights translate directly to accelerated growth and improve Google’s ability to serve its Cloud customers at scale. In this role, you will help drive and develop the performance and strategy our Japan and Asia-Pacific (JAPAC) Cloud business, ensuring rapid and long term sustainable growth for our Cloud offering.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '- Provide thoughtful leadership and influence executive level decision making through deep analytical insight and core business decisions.', '  ', '- Structure and communicate complex, ambiguous, and potentially challenging business issues to advise the Google Cloud Customer Japan and Asia-Pacific (JAPAC) Leadership team.', '  ', '- Build a network across Sales, Operations, Business Intelligence, and Finance, in JAPAC and across the globe, to address a wide analytical and operational questions.', '  ', '- Shape the vision and trajectory for the JAPAC business, partnering with leadership to run regular business reviews and keep the business on track with both our short-term and long-term goals. Delivering strategic insights and targeted action plans to address specific areas of risk and opportunity, leveraging the support of Global teams.', '  ', '- Enable regional teams with at-scale insights, analyses, and common processes and tools. Support and communicate effectively with English speaking clients.']
req: ['Minimum qualifications:', '  ', '- 5 years of experience in strategic planning, consulting, investment banking, or similar role.', '  ', '- Experience with SQL and other database, scripting, or business intelligence tools.', '  ', 'Preferred qualifications:', '  ', "- MBA or other relevant Master's degree.", '  ', '- Ability to construct simple and impactful messages from complex analyses. Ability to influence business leadership.', '  ', '- Ability to take initiative and work in an unstructured environment. Ability to navigate ambiguity, providing clarity and structure.', '  ', '- Ability to create and grow effective cross-functional networks and manage without authority.', '  ', '- Excellent business judgment, analytical, and written and verbal communication skills.', '  ', '- Ability to speak and write in English fluently and idiomatically.']

desc: ['About Nike Direct Digital Commerce (NDDC) Asia Hub \xa0', ' Launch in 2015, NDDC Asia Hub directly serves to bring inspiration and innovation to every Athlete* by enabling consumers to purchase Nike footwear, apparel and equipment through Nike.com and swiftly delivered. \xa0\xa0', '  ', 'As a premium direct to consumer distribution channel for Nike Inc, the digital commerce team is responsible for achieving traffic, conversion and sales targets and operates across key functions to ensure consumers in the 7 countries in South East Asia, India, and Taiwan are served with the best of Nike products and consumer experience. \xa0', '  ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', ' As the leader of the Integrated Knowledge team, this position will oversee the team providing strategic analysis of business intelligence and digital analytics of the NDDC Asia Hub business in these distinct areas:\xa0', '  ', ' ', '1.\xa0\xa0 \xa0Regular Business Evaluation', ' a)\xa0\xa0 \xa0Create, collect and deliver weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual business KPIs by orchestrating inputs across all relevant functions. \xa0', ' b)\xa0\xa0 \xa0Own and deliver weekly business internal touchpoints as well as resulting executive business performance read-outs. \xa0', ' \xa0', '  ', '2.\xa0\xa0 \xa0Deliver Strategic Business Insights', ' a)\xa0\xa0 \xa0Establish operating framework and define a roadmap of insights delivery against existing time and resources. \xa0', ' b)\xa0\xa0 \xa0Prioritize completion of research projects against the growth needs of the business and sizing inefficiencies on data-driven operations across functions. \xa0', ' c)\xa0\xa0 \xa0Deliver insights against the functional pillars of: \xa0Experience, Performance/Strategy, Merchandise, Buyer/Members and Marketing. \xa0', '  ', 'Direct responsibilities include: ', '\xa0', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0 \xa0Team Leadership: \xa0Setting individual and functional objectives to define the future growth of this team. Develop individual and team capabilities with a focus on developing best in class talent, process, and systems that continually overachieve expectations. \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Forecasting/Budgeting: \xa0Work as a central point of contact to define monthly business forecasts as a cross-functional liaison. \xa0Maintain inputs, achieve buy-in and communicate approved forecasts and budgets. \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Internal Systems and Tools liaison \xa0Act as the central liason and driver of the NDDC Asia Hub data across key internal and global partners in Global Consumer Knowledge and data engineering teams. \xa0']
req: ['As functional leader and people manager of this key analytical function within the NDDC Asia Hub team, we are seeking a strong team player with deep experience in statistical business and data analytics in a direct-to-consumer oriented business. \xa0', '  ', 'We are seeking a highly analytical individual with proven success in driving data driven insights within large organizations. \xa0The ability to manage inputs from many teams and individuals that span multiple functions and lines of reporting are crucial for the success. At the end of the day, you are passionate about the consumer and ensuring that the expectations of the NDDC business are continually managed and exceeded. \xa0', ' \xa0', '  ', 'Required qualifications include:', ' \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Completion of a College of University Bachelors degree. \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa05-7 years’ experience with data analysis and web analytics tools in a digital commerce or digital retail business.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Experience building high performing teams with a web analytics function or team. \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Experience with Adobe Analytics, Tableau and other enterprise business intelligence tools and databased. \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proven ability to handle ambiguity in a fast-paced, constantly evolving work environment.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Strong presentation skills, and excellent written and verbal communication skills to a wide range of audiences including senior level corporate executives. \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Knowledge and command of database programming languages such as SQL. \xa0', ' \xa0', '  ', 'Preferred qualifications include: ', '\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Proven ability to lead organizational change and deliver complex projects within an organization', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Advanced degree in mathematics or statistics. \xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Deep knowledge of Nike footwear and apparel.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Familiarity with or experience in engineering database frameworks or infrastructure. \xa0']

desc: ['Role', '  ', 'We are seeking a talented, self-directed Data Engineer to design, develop, implement, test, document, and operate large-scale, high-volume, high-performance data structures for our business stakeholders. Implement data structures using best practices in data modeling and ETL/ELT processes. Gather business and functional requirements and translate these requirements into robust, scalable, operable solutions that work well within the overall data architecture. Analyze source data systems and drive best practices in source teams. Participate in the full development life cycle, end-to-end, from design, implementation and testing, to documentation, delivery, support, and maintenance. Produce comprehensive, usable dataset documentation and metadata. Evaluate and make decisions around dataset implementations designed and proposed by peer data engineers. Evaluate and make decisions around the use of new or existing software products and tools. Mentor junior data engineers.', '  ', ' The ideal candidate relishes working with data, enjoys the challenge of highly complex technical contexts, and, above all else, is passionate about data and analytics. He/she is an expert with data modeling, ETL design and business intelligence tools and passionately partners with the business to identify strategic opportunities where improvements in data infrastructure creates outsized business impact. He/she is a self-starter, comfortable with ambiguity, able to think big (while paying careful attention to detail) and enjoys working in a fast-paced team. The ideal candidate needs to possess exceptional technical expertise in large scale data warehouse and BI systems with hands-on knowledge on SQL, Distributed/MPP data storage, and AWS services (S3, Redshift, EMR, RDS).', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', ' ', 'Design, implement, and support a platform providing ad hoc access to large datasets', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Implement data structures using best practices in data modeling, ETL/ELT processes, and SQL, and Redshift', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Build robust and scalable data integration (ETL) pipelines using SQL, Python and Spark', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Build and deliver high quality datasets to support business analysis and customer reporting needs', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Interface with business customers, gathering requirements and delivering complete data structures', ' ', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Application instructions:', ' To apply, please fill up the application form at\xa0https://grnh.se/ed28c66f2']
req: ['   ', ' ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Business Administration, Mathematics or a related field", ' ', '   ', ' ', '3+ years of industry experience as a Data Engineer or related specialty (e.g., Business Intelligence Engineer, Data Scientist)', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience in data modeling, ETL development, and Data warehousing.', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Data Warehousing Experience with Oracle, Redshift, Teradata, etc.', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience providing technical leadership and mentor other engineers for the best practices on the data engineering space', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience in continually improve ongoing reporting and analysis processes, automating or simplifying self-service support for customers', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience building data products incrementally and integrating and managing datasets from multiple sources', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets', ' ', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Bonus Points', '  ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience leveraging Python, R or Matlab to manipulate data and set up automated processes as per business requirements', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience with Big Data Technologies (Hadoop, Hive, Hbase, Pig, Spark, etc.)', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Experience leading large-scale data warehousing and analytics projects, including using AWS technologies – Redshift, S3, EC2, Data-pipeline and other big data technologies', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Strong ability to interact, communicate, present and influence within multiple levels of the organization', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Track record of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large datasets', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Excellent communication skills to be able to work with business owners to develop and define key business questions and to build data sets that answer those questions', ' ', '   ', ' ', "Master's degree", ' ', '  ']

desc: ['As part of the Finance Systems/Applications team, this IT professional will support reporting and business intelligence requirements for Oracle ERP Fusion Cloud via finance reporting developments, enhancements and maintenance. desc: ['As a leader on the International Marketplace team, you’ll have a unique opportunity to drive GO-JEK’s international expansion.. Working across Southeast Asia, you’ll be responsible for setting up the fundamentals of the business in new expansion markets working with the local teams. Collaborating across diverse stakeholders, it is essential that you command strong communication skills. Leveraging business intelligence data, market insights, and your creativity, you will grow a healthy business managing our product offering, pricing, driver incentives, among others..', '  ', 'Working closely with our technical groups, data analysts, and business teams, you will be a key player in the success story of GO-JEK’s international expansion. With any high-growth business, this will be a fast-paced and dynamic environment.', '  ', ' \t', 'Complex Problem Solving - Leveraging world-class data systems, you will analyze various initiatives to inform key business decisions. This will include supply & demand balancing efforts, customer segmentation decisions, feature prioritisation, and much more.', ' \t', 'Strategy Shaping - Build, maintain, and communicate a detailed strategy for the international business.', ' \t', 'International Launcher - Get in the details of what each country needs to hit their targets. You will work closely with the local teams to understand the nuanced needs of Bangkok, Ho Chi Minh City, and Singapore among others. Be the bridge to connect local nuances to HQ product team.', ' \t', 'Champion of Best-Practice - Design and lead end-to-end experimentations, document and share best practices from your various learnings. Documentation is how we get smarter, better, and faster.', ' \t', 'Build Strong Relationships - \xa0Engage and empathise with country teams. You will not be successful without building trust with your stakeholders. .', ' \t', 'Regional Coverage & Communication - Covering Southeast Asia will require strong digital communication (think emails, Whatsapp, web conferencing) and occasional travel.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']
req: [' \t', '“Can-Do” Attitude: A positive attitude and passion for learning in fast-paced environments. We move fast!', ' \t', 'Fast & Agile: Ability to excel in a constantly changing and rapidly growing workplace.', ' \t', 'Communication: Strong communication skills. You know how to build trust, set goals, and get things done. You aren’t afraid of using whatever channel (face-to-face, email, Whatsapp) is required.', ' \t', 'Data-Driven Outlook: When making decisions you leverage technical resources and data to support hypotheses. You can take the basics of data and draw insights from it. Life without Excel terrifies you. SQL, R, Python experience is a plus.', ' \t', 'Language', ': \xa0 \t', ' \t\t', 'Fluency in business-level English is a must. Bahasa, Vietnamese, Thai, or Mandarin/Cantonese would be a bonus.', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Required Experience: ', ' \t', ' \t\t', 'You’ve got prior learnings using data to make decisions, you have a proven track record of building systems and scaling them, \xa0you have managed diverse stakeholders with ease.', ' \t\t', 'You are an expert in Microsoft Office & Google-Suite products.', ' \t\t', 'You have at least a Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field.', ' \t\t', 'You have 2 years in a professional role in a relevant field.', ' \t', ' \t', ' ']

desc: ['Our Technology Risk services are designed for the dual purpose of strengthening internal controls and, in so doing, helping to improve IT and business performance. In addition to assurance-related engagements such as financial attestation and ISAE 3402 engagements, our IT risk advisory services focus on IT governance and effectiveness; IT program management and assurance; security and controls of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) implementations; and business intelligence and information analysis.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The opportunity', '  ', 'You will develop skills that you will value for your entire career. You will also work with tomorrow’s business leaders and gain hands on best practice experience.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Your key responsibilities', '  ', 'As a Senior Associate within the Technology Risk team, you will participate in and supervise multiple client engagement teams and other related activities. Engagements focus on the assessment and/or evaluation of Information Technology (IT) systems and the mitigation of IT-related business risks. Engagements may be either assurance (attestation) and/or risk advisory in nature, and vary considerably in size and complexity.', '  ', 'You will serve as a fieldwork leader to assist clients in employing proper information systems, resources, and controls to maximize efficiencies and minimize risk.', '  ', 'You will work with client personnel to analyze, evaluate, and enhance information systems facilitating the business internal control process, and will assist clients and other Technology Risk professionals in performing information technology control and security engagements.', '  ', 'Skills and attributes for success', '  ', '   ', ' ', 'Collaborate with other members of the engagement team to plan the engagement and develop work program timelines, risk assessments, and other planning documents.', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Work with the engagement team to document the business processes dependent on information technology', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Serve as a fieldwork leader by directing the daily progress of fieldwork, informing supervisors of engagement status, and managing staff performance', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Demonstrate and apply a thorough understanding of complex information systems', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Use knowledge of the current IT environment and industry IT trends to identify the engagement and client service issues, and communicate this information to the engagement team and client management through written correspondence and verbal presentations', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Demonstrate and apply strong project management skills, inspire teamwork and responsibility with engagement team members, and use current technology and tools to enhance the effectiveness of deliverables and services', ' ', '   ', ' ', 'Manage a portfolio of assignments as project lead', ' ', '  ']
req: ['To qualify for the role you must have', '  ', '   ', 'A recognized university degree in accounting, business, information technology, or other relevant discipline with 1\xa0year\xa0of working experience', '   ', 'Willingness to travel on overseas assignment as the need arises', '   ', 'Significant experience in applying relevant technical knowledge in at least one of the following engagements: ', '(a) financial statement audits;', ' ', '(b) internal or operational audits;', ' ', '(c) ISAE 3402 Attest engagements; and/or', ' ', '(d) ERP security and control reviews (Oracle, SAP, PeopleSoft)', ' ', '(e) SOX integrated audit', ' ', '   ', 'Project management skills', '   ', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills and presentation skills', '   ', 'Leadership, teamwork and client service skills', '   ', 'Demonstrated integrity within a professional environment', '  ', '  ', 'Ideally, you will also have', '  ', '   ', 'CPA, CA, CISA, CISSP, CISM, CBCP, CIA, CIPP, CGEIT certification ', '\xa0', ' ', '  ', '  ', 'What we look for', '  ', 'Highly motivated individuals with excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to prioritize shifting workloads in a rapidly changing industry. An effective communicator, you’ll be a confident team player that collaborates with people from various teams while looking to develop your career in a dynamic organization.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'What working at EY offers ', '  ', 'EY offers a competitive remuneration package where you’ll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. ', 'We are committed to being an inclusive employer and are happy to consider flexible working arrangements. ', 'Plus, we offer:', '  ', '   ', 'Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around', '   ', 'Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career', '   ', 'The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that’s right for you', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'About EY', '  ', 'As a global leader in assurance, tax, transaction and advisory services, we’re using the finance products, expertise and systems we’ve developed to build a better working world. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we’ll make our ambition to be the best employer by 2020 a reality.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'If you can confidently demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.', '  ', 'Join us in building a better working world.\xa0 ', '  ', 'Apply now.']

job_title: ['2019 Full Time Campus Analyst - Engineering Division']
desc: ['ABOUT GOLDMAN SACHS', '  ', 'The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a leading global investment banking, securities and investment management firm that provides a wide range of financial services to a substantial and diversified client base that includes corporations, financial institutions, governments and individuals. Founded in 1869, the firm is headquartered in New York and maintains offices in all major financial centers around the world.', '  ', 'ABOUT ENGINEERING', '  ', 'Our Engineers don’t just make things – we make things possible.\xa0 Change the world by connecting people and capital with ideas.\xa0 Solve the most challenging and pressing engineering problems for our clients.\xa0 Join our engineering teams that build massively scalable software and systems, architect low latency infrastructure solutions, proactively guard against cyber threats, and leverage machine learning alongside financial engineering to continuously turn data into action.\xa0 Create new businesses, transform finance, and explore a world of opportunity at the speed of markets.', '  ', 'ROLES', '  ', 'Software Engineering', '  ', 'Transform our business and work across all areas of the firm to design and implement high-quality, scalable and smart solutions. Leveraging both internal and open source services, we design and develop applications capable of building, maintaining, and processing large & complex data sets. Ensuring we have the most up-to-date and actionable information, we constantly strive to boost performance and exceed industry standards in order to meet our clients’ evolving needs. We look for ways to improve our operations and enhance our client offerings through internal and external platforms as we build and expand the capacity for data mining, anomaly detection, and business intelligence.', '  ', 'Financial Modelling', '  ', 'We look beyond the numbers and find the trends. As a member of our team, you will extract meaningful information to engineer advice and solutions that have real-world implications for our clients and the firm. \xa0This level of expert analysis involves large, at times global, data sets – both structured and unstructured – to build predictive models that are relevant to specific business centers and account for market variables. These quantitative techniques then inform effective and accurate cross-asset trade and portfolio ideas for our clients. In collaboration with your team and others across the firm, you will build and enhance advanced quantitative and analytical methods, utilizing software to design risk modeling systems and develop machine learning algorithms. Specifically, your role will focus on providing APIs to clients helping them generate alpha, risk calculations and business metrics. This valuable information will allow them to build and challenge risk models that identify and quantify market and liquidity risk and modeling vulnerabilities.', '  ', 'Infrastructure Engineering', '  ', 'Infrastructure Engineering is a multi-faceted role that allows you to explore data center design, networks, storage, cloud computing, big data, application messaging, databases, communications, market data and software languages. Make things possible for our clients and the firm as you design and build our compute and data infrastructure. You will put your expertise to work in a variety of challenges, from identifying internal hardware needs, to implementing public and private cloud-based solutions to providing seamless, on-demand scaling of our applications. \xa0We provide a robust testing platform that involves the best standards, solutions and tools to ensure uninterrupted operation of all of our lines of business. You will have the opportunity to use data mining techniques to identify and react to problems in the firm’s infrastructure and platforms. A role on this team allows you to use your experience to help us transform the future at Goldman Sachs.']

desc: ['The Security Metrics and Reporting Analyst position will blend deep data visualization skill with a strong report and dashboard development background and a keen business sense to help develop a leading edge information security metrics reporting solution.\xa0 In addition, the chosen candidate may be asked to support and administering a multi-core visualization tools (e.g. Tableau) Server Environment including upgrades, configuration and tuning.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'The Security Metrics and Reporting Analyst will help extend the catalogue of business reports that help the Information Security Department on a day to day basis.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'The Security Metrics and Reporting Analyst will be responsible for delivering and supporting information security business intelligence reports and dashboards, in partnership with internal business stake-holders, and security and engineering teams. The Security Metrics and Reporting Analyst will lead enhancements and small-scale projects (from inception through to production) and will be responsible for creating and maintaining online reports and dashboards that house information on vulnerabilities, threats, incident and compliance data related to the organization.\xa0', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'Responsibilities:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Work with data warehousing specialists to understand and create accurate security reports to support Information Security and Risk Metrics, historical data trend analysis, and identification of opportunities to drive continuous process improvement', ' ', 'Develop report templates and fit relevant security metrics data into the templates', ' ', 'Use visualisation tools (e.g. Tableau) to contextualize information in a manner suitable to executive audiences', ' ', 'Identify key business metrics measurements and develop methods to represent data in support of the measurements', ' ', 'Cultivate an understanding of security concepts to assist in identifying ongoing information, measurement and reporting needs', ' ', 'Work with internal teams and other team members to understand and define reporting requirements', ' ', 'Provide guidance and insight on data visualization and reporting/dishoarding best practices', ' ', 'Document reporting requirements and define report templates and dashboard specifications', ' ', 'Perform the administration, configuration, maintenance & upgrade of visualization tools (e.g. Tableau) Servers', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Qualifications:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Possess strong data modelling skillset and background.', ' ', 'Possess strong analytical reasoning skills with the ability to recognize and evaluate facts, to objectively analyze situations, and to synthesize and organize data/information from multiple sources and highlight salient facts', ' ', 'Extensive SQL experience including stored procedures, complex joins, creation of views, database scripting and performance tuning.\xa0', ' ', 'Extensive experience with visualization tools (e.g. Tableau) and with analytical tools supporting data analysis and reporting (MicroStrategy, SSRS).', ' ', 'Bachelors Degree in Computer Science (or related field) or equivalent work experience', ' ', '5+ years of advanced data reporting, data visualization, and executive dashboard creation', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Additional Preferred Qualifications:', ' ', ' ', ' ', '3+ years of experience in visualization tools (e.g. Tableau) server administration, including server configuration (proxy, failover, etc.), tuning and optimization', ' ', 'Experience installing, upgrading and configuring visualization tools (e.g. Tableau) Server for high-availability', ' ', 'Advanced experience in the design and creation of security and compliance metrics as well as dashboards for Senior Management', ' ', 'Experience with scripting languages (Python, Perl, Bash, PHP, etc.).', ' ', ' ']

desc: ['About Janio', '  ', "Janio is a cross-border logistics platform that provides an integrated end-to-end logistics solution to merchants across Southeast Asia (SEA). At our core we operate as a smart logistics solutions provider, serving merchants and logistics partners and connecting industry players across the globe. Through Janio, we strive to create a truly integrated network that brings together every key player to become the backbone supporting SEA's growing e-commerce ecosystem. Looking ahead, our platform would look to incorporate elements of AI and machine learning to provide a suite of smart solutions for real-time tracking, route optimization, warehouse management and dynamic forecasting to truly become a data-intelligent platform.", '  ', 'Regional Operations Manager\xa0– Special Projects', '  ', 'Janio Asia is looking for a\xa0', 'Regional Operations Manager\xa0', 'to join our rapidly expanding Special Projects team. Regional Operations Managers are exposed to multiple aspects of setting up a business in a fast-paced startup environment. We invite candidates with an\xa0entrepreneurial and\xa0motivated mindset, as well as a keen interest in combining logistics with new technologies, to apply.', '  ', 'The successful candidate will:', '  ', ' \t', 'be treated as co-business owner\xa0who positively contributes not only to\xa0operations but all aspects of the business', ' \t', 'be involved in the following functions: Business Intelligence, Project Management, and Service Excellence', ' \t', 'be tasked with ensuring a consistent, high-level of service across all countries we operate in', ' \t', 'liaise with colleagues and partners across multiple geographies to troubleshoot and resolve any and all issues related to fulfillment and/or transportation.', ' ', '  ', 'This position reports directly to the VP of Operations. We offer candidates opportunities to develop and grow professionally as valued team members in a dynamic and often cross-functional startup environment.']

desc: ['CPM Consulting, specialists in Enterprise Performance Management solutions', '  ', 'CPM Consulting, a BackOffice Associates, LLC Company, provides professional consulting services on SAP technology in aligning, designing and implementing SAP solutions for business planning, budgeting and financial consolidation, business intelligence and analytics, technology innovation and creative solution delivery with exclusive focus on Enterprise Performance Management and SAP BPC for an organization.', '  ', 'CPM Consulting has delivered SAP EPM (Enterprise Performance Management) solutions for more than a decade for 100+ blue chip companies. We deliver best practice solutions tailored to your business and your industry. Our strength is to provide best-in-class performance management solutions using the latest SAP Enterprise Performance Management tools available in the market.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'We work with CFO’s across the globe to achieve their risk adjusted strategic goals. CPM Consulting provides a unique, integrated approach to performance management that can support better decisions by helping organizations improve their ability to analyze a wide range of financial, operational, competitive and marketplace information.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Position Summary:', '  ', 'In this position, you will be a Solution Architect Expert responsible for analyzing requirements, design, develop and implement SAP Analytics Solutions.\xa0 This position will be at the center of our project management, product and sales teams.\xa0 Activities will be a mix of project delivery and pre-sales.', '  ', 'Position is based in Singapore, Singapore.', '  ', 'This position requires only physical activity associated with office routines. Travelling will be 75% within APJ and ME.']

desc: ['At DataRobot, we are pushing human-machine collaboration to its limits. We are looking for engineers passionate about building data-driven systems and automation. Join us on our mission to build a company for the 21st century.', '  ', 'We treat the company as a system of people, software, and data. Our job is to automate everything software can do better while providing people with information and tools to excel at the rest.', '  ', 'We design workflows, build interfaces for humans and machines to work well together, instrument processes, analyze, and optimize them. Your job will be to implement software that makes DataRobot company work as a single well-oiled machine.', '  ', 'You will be responsible for:', '  ', ' \t', 'Designing and building human-machine workflows (creating tools, interfaces, integrations, etc).', ' \t', 'Writing applications that automate parts the company operations using algorithms and AI.', ' \t', 'Instrumenting the business: collecting accurate data about everything that happens in the company and delivering it to people who make decisions, from individual contributors to the CEO.', ' ', '  ', 'We move fast and dislike bureaucracy. You will get a high degree of autonomy and responsibility. We expect every person on the team to self-manage, navigate the complexity, and figure out the best way to add value. You will work in close contact with your customers (who are also your colleagues) in quick iterations. You will be able to see the outcomes and value of your work right away.\xa0', '  ', 'As a bonus, you will learn how SaaS business works in from the inside, and get experience in Business Intelligence and Product Management.']

desc: ['Job Title: Senior Product/Market Manager', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'SWIFT provides the platform, messaging, standards, and products & services to over 11,500 customers in 212 countries and territories. It is the lifeblood of the global financial community, facilitating payments, securities, trade finance and FX transactions. We operate a global financial network, with interfaces and integration software footprint at client premises, enabled by a fast growing services business. Financial crime compliance and business intelligence is a new and growing part of our product portfolio.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Our employees are the foundation of our success. If you are motivated by being part of a dynamic, growing and engaging work environment, in a firm obsessed with creating value for its member community, SWIFT is a good fit for you. We value expertise, integrity and customer focus.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'This role is part of the APAC Commercial organisation. You will be part of a team of pre-sales\xa0solution architects\xa0for one or more sub-regions, providing technical expertise and partnership to our clients as they solve their pressing business needs.', '  ', ' \xa0']
req: ['Responsibilities:', '  ', 'Your responsibilities will be to:', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Define, develop and/or validate improved/new product/ market concepts and/or business solutions based upon customer needs.', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Define and develop a mid to long term marketing plan to inform internal/external parties about strategic product/market development.', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Ensure and/or produce detailed product definitions and associated business cases for new and renewed products, within the framework of the overall business strategy. Coordinate the approval for business cases, provide IT with customer/product requirements and act as an interface between product development and commercial divisions.', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Initiate, drive and control product launch projects to ensure timely delivery of agreed specifications. Manage all aspects of the marketing plan (product/pricing offer, promotion, training of commercial teams and customers and the development of user documentation).', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Keep abreast with trends in the industry and share information with other divisions/departments.', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Manage a product portfolio through their life cycle by defining yearly sales targets, continuously monitoring P&L and ensuring continually product improvements or renewals.', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Liaise with other divisions/departments of the company, customers, vendors, regulatory bodies and industry associations and make presentations.', '   ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Provide advice and guidance to less senior product/market managers.\xa0', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Qualifications:', '  ', 'Do you have what it takes?', '  ', '   ', 'University degree in Business, Marketing, Computer Science or related fields, or equivalent experience.\xa0', '   ', 'Minimum 5 years of experience of as product manager.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Minimum of 10 \xa0years of experience in the financial operations, product or services in project development and planning.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Experience in SWIFT products, services and standards messaging solutions', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Experience in market infrastructure (e.g. central bank, stock exchange, clearing house, central securities depository) systems or operations would be advantageous.\xa0', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Able to work in a multi-cultural and multi-country team environment', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Fluent in English written or spoken\xa0\xa0', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'Ability to lead a team with strong, analytical and customer orientation skills', '   ', 'Knowledge in modern integration techniques and technologies.', '  ']

desc: ['CPM Consulting, specialists in Enterprise Performance Management solutions', '  ', 'CPM Consulting, a BackOffice Associates, LLC Company, provides professional consulting services on SAP technology in aligning, designing and implementing SAP solutions for business planning, budgeting and financial consolidation, business intelligence and analytics, technology innovation and creative solution delivery with exclusive focus on Enterprise Performance Management and SAP BPC for an organization.', '  ', 'CPM Consulting has delivered SAP EPM (Enterprise Performance Management) solutions for more than a decade for 100+ blue chip companies. We deliver best practice solutions tailored to your business and your industry. Our strength is to provide best-in-class performance management solutions using the latest SAP Enterprise Performance Management tools available in the market.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'We work with CFO’s across the globe to achieve their risk adjusted strategic goals. CPM Consulting provides a unique, integrated approach to performance management that can support better decisions by helping organizations improve their ability to analyze a wide range of financial, operational, competitive and marketplace information.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Position Summary:', '  ', 'In this position, you will be a Solution Architect Expert responsible for analyzing requirements, design, develop and implement SAP Analytics Solutions.\xa0 This position will be at the center of our project management, product and sales teams.\xa0 Activities will be a mix of project delivery and pre-sales.', '  ', 'Position is based in Singapore, Singapore.', '  ', 'This position requires only physical activity associated with office routines. Travelling will be 75% within APJ and ME.']

desc: [' Thermo Fisher Scientific 12 Months Finance Program (TFP Program)', '  ', 'When you are part of the team at Thermo Fisher Scientific, you will do important work. Surrounded by collaborative colleagues, you will have the support and opportunities that only a global leader can give you. Our respected, growing organization has an exceptional strategy for the near term and beyond. Take your place on our strong team, and help us make significant contributions to the world.', '  ', 'This Program is a 12-months graduate program, where talents are invited to discover whether they have what it takes to develop a life-long career in finance and the life science sector, with the market leader in serving science. Successful applicants are carefully selected, consciously mapped, and assigned to various Financial Planning & Analysis, Accounting, or other suitable roles over the 12-month fixed term hire period, doing real and impactful business and finance work, contributing significantly to the success of Thermo Fisher Scientific.\xa0', '  ', 'Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc. (NYSE: TMO) is the world leader in serving science, with revenues of $23 billion and more than 70,000 employees in over 50 countries. Our mission is to enable our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. We help our customers accelerate life sciences research, solve complex analytical challenges, improve patient diagnostics, and increase laboratory productivity. Through our premier brands – Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, and Unity Lab Services – we offer an unmatched combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience, and comprehensive support.', '  ', 'During the 12-month program duration, if and when suitable, permanent roles open, the TFP talent will be invited to join us as a permanent employee within the Finance team, making further significant contributions to the organization.\xa0', '  ', 'Job Title: Financial Analyst (Associate)\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support the APAC and Emerging Market finance reporting and forecasting process.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Improve analytical tools, systems, and processes to support all businesses across the region.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support regional projects in finance related work-streams.', '  ', 'Key Responsibilities\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Drive standard finance management process and keep on looking for opportunities of improvement.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support FP&A manager in developing and improving the planning and forecasting tools.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Collaborate with division team, build regional business intelligence capability, provide visibility to commercial team, and improve forecast accuracy.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Clean up finance related information in HR management system and ensure data integrity.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support annual planning process at regional level, consolidate forecast submitted by countries, and prepare preliminary analysis for executive review.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Participate in ad hoc projects aimed at supporting organic growth, EBITA expansion and liquidation.', '  ', 'At Thermo Fisher Scientific, each one of our 70,000 extraordinary minds has a unique story to tell. Join us and contribute to our singular mission—enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Apply today http://jobs.thermofisher.com', '  ', 'Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, colour, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.', ' \xa0']
req: ['Key Responsibilities\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Drive standard finance management process and keep on looking for opportunities of improvement.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support FP&A manager in developing and improving the planning and forecasting tools.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Collaborate with division team, build regional business intelligence capability, provide visibility to commercial team, and improve forecast accuracy.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Clean up finance related information in HR management system and ensure data integrity.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support annual planning process at regional level, consolidate forecast submitted by countries, and prepare preliminary analysis for executive review.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Participate in ad hoc projects aimed at supporting organic growth, EBITA expansion and liquidation.']

Through our premier brands – Thermo Scientific, Applied Biosystems, Invitrogen, Fisher Scientific, and Unity Lab Services – we offer an unmatched combination of innovative technologies, purchasing convenience, and comprehensive support.', '  ', 'During the 12-month program duration, if and when suitable, permanent roles open, the TFP talent will be invited to join us as a permanent employee within the Finance team, making further significant contributions to the organization.\xa0', '  ', 'Job Title: Financial Analyst (Associate)\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support the APAC and Emerging Market finance reporting and forecasting process.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Improve analytical tools, systems, and processes to support all businesses across the region.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support regional projects in finance related work-streams.', '  ', 'Key Responsibilities\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Drive standard finance management process and keep on looking for opportunities of improvement.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support FP&A manager in developing and improving the planning and forecasting tools.', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Collaborate with division team, build regional business intelligence capability, provide visibility to commercial team, and improve forecast accuracy.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Clean up finance related information in HR management system and ensure data integrity.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Support annual planning process at regional level, consolidate forecast submitted by countries, and prepare preliminary analysis for executive review.\xa0', ' •\xa0\xa0 \xa0Participate in ad hoc projects aimed at supporting organic growth, EBITA expansion and liquidation.', '  ', 'At Thermo Fisher Scientific, each one of our 70,000 extraordinary minds has a unique story to tell. Join us and contribute to our singular mission—enabling our customers to make the world healthier, cleaner and safer. Apply today http://jobs.thermofisher.com', '  ', 'Thermo Fisher Scientific is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, colour, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.', ' \xa0']

desc: ['Dubbed “The Most Innovative Streaming Video Service” by Forbes, Rakuten Viki is the world’s leading platform for Asian entertainment and lifestyle, where tens of millions of people watch their favorite TV shows, movies, and influencer videos and engage with the content. With more than a billion words translated into 200+ languages by a community of avid fans, Viki brings global entertainment to fans everywhere.', '  ', 'Soompi, also part of Rakuten Viki, is one of the biggest global K-pop news sites and the longest-running fandom community. From innovative engagement features to original content and social shopping, Rakuten Viki and Soompi are pushing the boundaries of user engagement and social viewing.', '  ', 'At Rakuten Viki, our Engineering teams utilize leading-edge technologies to build a world class product. You will join a diverse and talented team with great ambitions to change the digital entertainment landscape. The current team is responsible for the API and business logic modeling and is currently working on lots of exciting stuff. Some current projects include Migrating to GCP, Intelligent recommendations and Smarter Notifications.', '  ', 'We are looking for top talent to join our Engineering team as a Senior Platform Engineer. Your primary responsibility will be tactically and strategically managing the services that power our API and business intelligence, as well as driving architecture changes to scale them. You will also work closely with the Web and Mobile teams to provide users with best experiences and CMS team for designing workflows. Essential duties and responsibilities also include managing operational workflow, mentoring juniors and empowering the team to take critical technical decisions. You need to be able to take ownership of features and systems and take them to the next level while working with stakeholders around you. If this excites and inspires you then take up the opportunity and come be a part of our Rakuten Viki team in Singapore.']
req: ['Responsibilities', '  ', "We don't require experience in any particular technology, but you should have the ability to chew through difficult technical problems and gain insights from them. A good foundation in understanding of practical operating system concepts around linux/unix and grasp of basic networking are essential. We are using Go/Golang, Node.js, Ruby, Python, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, Redis and AWS/GCP and experience with them is desirable but you could also have worked on other technologies. We believe you should have the knack for learning whatever languages and technologies come your way. Past experience in scaling systems or working with high scale systems is a must."]

desc: ['Sabre is a technology solutions provider to the global travel and tourism industry. It offers a broad range of technology solutions including data-driven business intelligence, mobile, distribution and Software-as-a-Service solutions which are used by travel suppliers (airlines, hotels, car rental outlets, railways, cruise lines and tour operators) and travel buyers (travel agencies, travel management companies and corporate travel departments) to plan, market, sell, serve and operate their business. In 2013, Sabre’s technology processed over $100 billion of estimated travel spending and more than 1.1 trillion system messages. Headquartered in Southlake, Texas, USA, Sabre employs approximately 10,000 people in approximately 60 countries around the world. We serve our customers through cutting-edge technology developed in six facilities located across four continents.', '  ', 'The company operates three brands/businesses: Sabre Airline Solutions, Sabre Hospitality Solutions, and Sabre Travel Network.', '  ', ' \t', 'Under direct supervision, responsible for developing, implementing and/or maintaining one or a combination of general accounting systems.', ' \t', 'Prepares journal entries, maintains and reconciles ledger accounts. Provides record of assets, liabilities and other financial transactions.', ' \t', 'Balances books periodically and prepares profit and loss, income and balance sheet statements.', ' \t', 'Maintains receipts and disbursement reports. May prepare federal, state, and local reports and tax returns.', ' \t', 'May interpret reports and records for managers. Assist with analysis of non-complex ledger accounts and resolve issues.', ' \t', 'Post entries to general ledger and assist with month end close process.', ' \t', 'Prepare account reconciliation. Assist with special projects as needed.', ' ']
