desc: ["The Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR) is Singapore's lead public sector agency that fosters world-class scientific research and talent to drive economic growth and transform Singapore into a vibrant knowledge-based and innovation driven economy. \xa0For more information about A*STAR, please visit: www.a-star.edu.sg", '  ', 'To drive the adoption of industry 4.0 solutions, ARTC will be setting up a FMCG (Fast Moving Consumer Goods) full scale demonstrator. This public-private partnership programme aims to co-develop a hyper personalised line with industry players, to collaborate and develop Future or Manufacturing (FoM) technologies, based on real applications in advanced manufacturing and remanufacturing.', '  ', 'With the demonstrating platform being developed together with end-users, technology providers and research institutes in A*STAR and institutes of higher learning (IHL) to test-bed processes, benefits to the economy and the workforce.', '  ', 'We are looking for an enthusiastic individual who will be supporting our connectivity and machine to machine communications group which is in charge of supporting the connectivity infrastructure for our this project.', '  ', 'The responsibilities include development and implementation of different machine to machine communication paradigms, IoT and cloud connectivity.', '  ', 'JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: -', '  ', ' \t', 'Be part of a taskforce to support and contribute to the Factory of the future (Industry 4.0) vision for the centre with impact to Singapore as whole.', ' \t', 'Research, investigate and execute smart manufacturing factory concepts in machine to machine communications within the context of the Factory of the Future (knowledge about the manufacturing domain will be most welcomed).', ' \t', 'To support the development of Machine to machine communications with the support of domain experts in the field.', ' \t', 'To perform research on smart manufacturing concepts applied to the FMCG domain and its related processes with the support of experts in the field who will be providing ground knowledge to interpret results from the data mining and machine learning activities.', ' \t', 'To lead the writing of technical reports and presentations of technical results.', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Bachelor/Master of science in:\xa0 Telecommunications, Physics, Mechanical Engineering, Control Engineering, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics.', ' \t', 'Development skills in one or more of the following: Python, Java or C++ is desired.', ' \t', 'Knowledge about Thingsworx platform will be a plus.', ' \t', 'Excellent interpersonal and communication (verbal & written) skills in English is a must.', ' \t', 'Ability to multitask and roadmap project needs.', ' \t', 'Experience in PLC, sensor or machine to machine communications is desired but not a must as it will be developed as a new skill if needed.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

desc: ['We have a one-year Research Fellow position for the research work of microwave imaging using machine learning and holographic phase encryption.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Expect to develop algorithms for microwave imaging and apply machine learning to improve their performance.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Expect to combine wave physics with machine learning, rather than a “black-box” way of applying machine learning.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Expected to develop robust phase retrieval algorithms and apply them to holographic phase encryption.', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'Expected to study the sensitivity and complexity of security keys for the designed nanoscale security infrastructures.', '  ', ' ']

desc: ['Job description:', ' ', ' You will be working on the development of front-end audio processing for tele-conferencing system.', ' With the guidance of a research team, you will be implementing a fusion centre that performs speech diarization.', ' You are expected to have keen interests in data synchronisation, acoustic signal processing and/or machine learning. You should be familiar with Python programming language. Familiarity with cloud computing and software frameworks such as Matlab, Numpy, Pytorch, Tensorflow, or Keras is an advantage (though not necessary).', ' In terms of research exposure, you will also be given the opportunity to learn, apply, and develop algorithms to enhance, extract, and transcribe noisy speech signals using a variety of signal processing and machine learning algorithms.', ' You will therefore be exposed to theories and practices of signal processing and machine learning. You will have the opportunity to work closely with other research staff to implement these algorithms in Python programming language.', ' \xa0']

desc: ['Company overview:', '  ', 'Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers.', '  ', 'The area: Trust & Safety', '  ', 'At Google we work hard to earn our users’ trust every day. Trust & Safety is Google’s team of abuse fighting and user trust experts working daily to make the internet a safer place. We partner with teams across Google to deliver bold solutions in abuse areas such as malware, spam and account hijacking. A diverse team of Analysts, Policy Specialists, Engineers, and Program Managers, we work to reduce risk and fight abuse across all of Google’s products, protecting our users, advertisers, and publishers across the globe in over 40 languages.', '  ', 'The role: Abuse Analyst, Real Time Communications - Singapore', '  ', "Trust & Safety team members are tasked with identifying and taking on the biggest problems that challenge the safety and integrity of our products. They use technical know-how, excellent problem-solving skills, user insights, and proactive communication to protect users and our partners from abuse across Google products like Search, Maps, Gmail, and Google Ads. On this team, you're a big-picture thinker and strategic team-player with a passion for doing what’s right. You work globally and cross-functionally with Google engineers and product managers to identify and fight abuse and fraud cases at Google speed - with urgency. And you take pride in knowing that every day you are working hard to promote trust in Google and ensuring the highest levels of user safety.", '  ', 'Additional Role Description:', '  ', "Our Trust & Safety team has the critical responsibility of protecting Google's users and ensuring online safety by fighting web abuse and fraud across Google products. The Trust and Safety Real Time Communications (RTC) team’s mission is to stop abusers from exploiting the gaps on our RTC products.\xa0", ' ', " As an Abuse Analyst you will help us uncovering complex abuse issues, using machine learning and analytics and working closely with our engineering partners. You will understand the user's point of view and leverage big-picture thinking, strategic leadership, and technical skills to ensure their safety and meet their needs. In this role, you will work globally and cross-functionally with Product Managers and engineering partners to navigate challenging online safety situations and quickly handle abuse and fraud cases.", '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '- Develop anti-abuse programs to solve for cross-product vulnerabilities and ensure successful global roll-outs. Design countermeasures for attacks across various client properties.', '  ', '- Analyze metrics, dig into underlying vulnerabilities, and design solutions. Represent the abuse team in cross-functional, cross-product area conversations with teams around the company, advising on counter-abuse strategies and coordinating integration efforts.', '  ', '- Develop and deploy machine learning models collaborating with Engineering partners to solve fraud/abuse problems at scale.', '  ', '- Define workflow processes for manual reviews and machine learning labels. Collaborate with Product, Design, Legal, Policy, and Industry partners to advance the state-of-the-art across the Internet as a whole.', '  ', '- Align cross-functional teams toward a common, measurable goal.']
req: ['Minimum qualifications:', '  ', '- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or related technical field.', '  ', '- Experience deriving abuse signals and conclusions from data.', '  ', '- Experience summarizing data.', '  ', '- Experience facilitating automation and prevention processes.', '  ', 'Preferred qualifications:', '  ', '- Experience in a technical role (e.g., Data Scientist, Quantitative Analyst, Technical Program Manager, Engineer).', '  ', '- Experience developing machine learning models. Experience in one or more programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C++).', '  ', '- Experience in statistics, working with statistical packages (e.g., R, SAS, Matlab) and large datasets (SQL).', '  ', '- Experience delivering projects that involve multiple cross-functional stakeholders across geographies.', '  ', '- Experience with fraud/abuse investigations, fraud/risk management, and security and threat analysis in the context of Internet-related products/activities.', '  ', '- Ability to work remotely and maintain excellent communication and interpersonal skills.']

desc: ['Who are we:', '  ', 'Hubble is a technology startup focused on revolutionising the Construction Industry. The Construction industry undertakes the world’s largest, most expensive, and complex projects ever dreamt of by mankind. Yet, the Construction industry is notoriously slow to adopt new technologies and as a result, there exists a large amount of inefficiencies and problems that Hubble can create positive value and make a great impact on. This impacts the homes people live in, offices people work in, and cities generations live in.', '  ', 'There is no other industry where technology can have a greater impact. Bar none.', '  ', 'Hubble’s vision is to build the pillars of trust for the Construction industry and we are on a mission to develop the autonomous self-building construction sites of tomorrow - powered by big data, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.. Our first step to our mission is to track the Man, Machine, Material, and Money (4M) data - for the Construction industry. The 4M data can be used to optimise operations at the worksites as well as to build an automated trading platform for the 4M. We have grown rapidly to become the market leader in each of the 4M verticals:', '  ', "1. Man: We have more than 10,000 construction workers (~5% market share) on Hubble's platform and have tracked more than 35 million man-hours in total.", '  ', "2. Machine: We track more than 1.5 million machinery transactions/year and have >US$100 million worth of machinery on Hubble's platform today.", '  ', "3. Material: We developed Hubble Maps (Patent Pending) for precise indoor material and man tracking. We were awarded BCA's Innovation Grant 2018 and presented our technology to DPM Teo Chee Hean.", '  ', '4. Money: We are deployed at iconic projects such as Project Jewel, Paya Lebar Quarters, Gardens by the Bay, and City Gate and have tracked more than $1 billion in project value.', '  ', 'Interesting fact: We have grown rapidly without any venture funding to become the market leader in this space in less than 1 year. Our partners include the largest and most prestigious Construction companies such as Woh Hup, Lum Chang, Hexacon, Erect Group, Koh Kock Leong Enterprise, Chuan Lim Construction, and OAS Painting and Construction.', '  ', 'We have also built the best engineering, product, and business team comprising the best and brightest of Singapore. We are a collegial set up and are extremely collaborative. We are hiring aggressively and are looking for motivated, smart, driven, and resourceful people to join our team.', '  ', 'Who will you be working with:', '  ', 'If you connect with any of the description below, please apply immediately:', '  ', ' \t', 'Purpose driven', ' \t', 'Hungry, ambitions, and self-motivated', ' \t', 'Meritocratic, results/performance > age/bureaucracy', ' \t', 'Resourceful, independent, chart our own destiny', ' \t', 'Determined, perseverance, and hard working', ' \t', 'Creative, innovative, out of the box', ' ', '  ', 'Yes, the above is everyone of us at Hubble.', '  ', 'What will you be doing:', '  ', ' \t', 'Developing a clean and maintainable code using software engineering best-practices and modern platforms.', ' \t', 'Leading full product development lifecycle from ideation to live production', ' \t', 'Day-to-day tech operations such as server maintenance and deployment.', ' ']
req: ['What skill sets do you need:', '  ', ' \t', 'Have a good understanding of web application architecture (REST & JWT)', ' \t', 'Experience in implementing various software engineering design patterns', ' \t', 'Good working knowledge in one or more of these frameworks: Ruby on Rails, AngularJS, ReactJS, and React Native', ' \t', 'Familiar with Git', ' \t', 'Experience in DevOps and in building scalable products will be an added advantage.', ' \t', 'Comfortable with working in a fast-paced environment and highly collaborative team to solve real business problems', ' \t', 'Versatility and enthusiasm to tackle new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward', ' \t', 'Applicants with leadership qualities will be an added benefit', ' ']

desc: ['A research associate position on security, formal verification and program analysis is available in the Cyber Security Lab, School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanyang Technological University. The position requires software analysis, machine learning and programming skills for the development of automated techniques to carry out the verification process and program analysis.']

desc: ['A Research Fellow position is available at the Energy Research Institute @ NTU (ERI@N), Nanyang Technological University, in the areas of energy storage thermal simulation/analysis with Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning.The position includes but not limited to leading a team of engineers and students in fulfilling the deliverables of the project, conducting research and designing and developing algorithms, models as well as techniques for purposes of prediction and estimation of battery thermal conditions, predictive maintenance and data processing. The candidate would design the thermal distribution model for an MWh level battery energy storage system for smart grid.', '  ', 'Candidate must have rich experience in thermal simulation, FEA, machine learning and numeral calculations. The selected candidate is expected to contribute to the project straight away. Knowledge of image processing and time-series data regression would be a plus.', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['  ', 'PhD Degree in Computer Science/Electrical Engineering with research in battery storage related topics', '  ', 'Hands-on experience with electrical thermal simulation for battery energy storage systems, including battery cells/packages/rack/systems, preferred simulation platforms, e.g., Ansys Fluent.', '  ', 'Well-developed skills on battery energy storage systems operating condition monitoring and analysis, e.g., battery safety, health and etc.', '  ', 'Knowledge with basic machine learning algorithms, like neural network, SVM, deep learning.', '  ', 'Image processing and signal processing analysis using convolutional neural network would be a plus.', '  ', 'Independent problem solver with the ability to co-operate and work in a team', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['NUS Business School is recognized as one of the top business schools in the Asia-Pacific region. It also co-hosts the\xa0', 'NUS Business Analytics Centre', '\xa0jointly with the NUS School of Computing. Our vision is to be the leading business school in Asia, globally recognised for excellence in education and research, and our mission is to advance knowledge and develop leaders so as to serve business and society.', '  ', 'The Department of Analytics & Operations in the National University of Singapore (NUS) Business School is seeking qualified candidates for a Lecturer/Senior Lecturer (Educator Track) position in analytics and operations, starting July 2019. The appointee will be expected to teach both undergraduate and graduate courses such as text analytics, social media analytics, network analytics and general machine learning/AI. Candidates should ideally have a Ph.D. degree in data science, machine learning or a related field, plus teaching experience at university level. Candidates with a Master’s degree and profound industry experience in relevant areas might also be considered. We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package as well as a promising career path.']
req: ['The NUS Business School has a long tradition of excellence in both teaching and research. We strive to nurture future-ready, open-minded, and professionally competent graduates. The ideal candidate should be a passionate and student-centric educator who can demonstrate a commitment to a teaching career, a practitioner who can relate machine learning theories to business applications, and a coach who will groom our students into business-focused and analytics-driven managers. Candidates who are early career academics should ideally have at least some previous teaching assistant experience, while those more experienced candidates should have previous lecturing experience, evidence of curriculum development and ideally also experience in supervising Master’s students.', '  ', 'Qualified applicants should submit a full CV (including a full list of publications and teaching achievements), a cover letter addressing their teaching philosophy, and three letters of reference (or a list of three individuals who can serve as references) to Dr Liu Qizhang (bizlqz@nus.edu.sg), on or before ', '31st May 2019', '.\xa0Applicants without a publication record should also submit a job market paper.']

desc: ['A Research Fellow position is available in the School of Electrical & Electronic Engineering at Nanyang Technological University.', '  ', 'Established in 1981, the School of Electrical & Electronic Engineering (EEE) is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and strong tradition in research. To support teaching and cutting-edge research, EEE is host to 11 research centres and more than 50 laboratories, which are well-equipped with modern facilities and state-of-the-art equipment. With about 200 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,300 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world.', '  ', 'The research staff will work on using machine learning approaches to tackle challenges in wireless communications, such as blind signals classification and detection, and channel parameter estimation in constrained channels, etc.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', ' \t', 'Developing machine learning algorithm to solve problems in wireless communications, especially for blind receiver.', ' \t', 'Testing the developed algorithms by using raw data.', ' \t', 'Presenting work progress and publishing research findings.', ' \t', 'Work closely with PI, team members and collaborators to ensure timely and efficient completion of project milestones.', ' ']
req: ['Education background/ experience required:', '  ', ' \t', 'PhD degree in Computer Engineering/Computer Science/Electrical Engineering.', ' ', '  ', 'Specific Knowledge & Skills:', '  ', ' \t', 'Strong foundation in wireless communication algorithms and optimization techniques.', ' \t', 'Familiarity with machine learning and deep learning techniques and algorithms, and open-source machine learning frameworks such as Keras and Tensorflow, etc.', ' \t', 'Familiarity with C/Python/Matlab language.', ' \t', 'Good English reading and writing skills.', ' \t', 'Good communication skills and ability to work in a team.', ' ', '  ', 'We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

desc: ['About Dathena Science', '  ', 'Dathena is a Swiss and Singaporean company developing data governance software based on machine learning algorithms. Dathena is the most complete and accurate data governance platform and is the only solution to easily classify and manage data with this level of accuracy while helping companies to comply with regulations. Using cutting edge machine learning technology, Dathena sift through all unstructured data allowing to regain full control on company’s information.', '  ', 'Job Purpose', '  ', "As a Cloud Operations Engineer, you will maintain reliable infrastructure so that our R&D and Product Teams can build solutions that solve our clients and partners' hardest problems and can be counted on when they are needed most. You will work collaboratively with Software and A.I. engineers to understand what they need to get their jobs done. You care deeply about the availability and security of our systems, and configuration as code is your tool for ensuring that everything is operating as it should.", '  ', 'Core Responsability', '  ', ' \t', 'Manage and secure Linux-based cloud systems and networks at scale.', ' \t', 'Work with tools to automate critical aspects of production systems such as: configuration management and deployment of infrastructure.', ' \t', 'Maintain the stability and performance of the cloud platform.', ' \t', 'Utilize the latest industry standard tools and practices to meet the evolving needs of our internal engineers/developers and external clients/partners.', ' ']

desc: ['About Isentia', '  ', "Isentia is the Asia-Pacific region's leading media intelligence company; we're a client-centric organization where you can really add value to our clients' businesses.\xa0\xa0", '  ', 'Our clients are diverse, ranging from globally renowned brands right through to start-ups and not for profit organisations.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'We provide our team members with constructive feedback to foster their career growth, and you will have many opportunities to work with fun and talented people.\xa0 We also have an open and inclusive culture where we embrace opportunities to do better and we celebrate achievements wildly.', '  ', 'We offer an opportunity to work with a great team of talented, innovative and passionate people across the Asia-Pacific and access to our innovative search technology, comprehensive coverage and expert research. We also offer a competitive salary and a heap of benefits!', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Job description', '  ', 'At Isentia, we are passionate about helping communicators understand media, data and content. This starts with our Tech team working with the latest cloud platforms and machine learning algorithms to collect data, analyse it and inform our customer on the issues important to them.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Our Software\xa0 Engineering team in Singapore is looking for Senior Software Engineers. Ideally, full-stack engineer (Nodejs/ Express or Python/ Flask,\xa0Angular 6 and Typescript). You have experience in developing APIs, micro services and integrating them with responsive Single Page Applications. To be successful in this role you will require a good experience in AWS, DevOps, CI/CD, and TDD.', '  ', 'It‘s a really great time to join our software engineering team. We are agile and lean in our delivery approach. We run regular hackathon and blitz days. We stay ahead of the technology curve – Kubernetes, Apache Spark, Tensorflow you name it. This is an exceptional opportunity for someone who wants to really make a difference to our teams and clients by delivering solutions that truly meet the business needs and requirements.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', ' \t', 'working within an agile environment as part of a cross-functional collaborative team', ' \t', 'develop new products features involving front end as well as back end interactively and incrementally\xa0', ' \t', 'implement integration with big data, natural language processing and machine learning services', ' \t', 'collaborating your team and product owner to perform task breakdown, estimation, and prioritization.\xa0', ' \t', 'ensure that you are meeting our development standards and delivering high-quality software.', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'You’re an experienced Senior Software Engineer/ Software Engineer with strong exposure in building high-throughput digital and data platforms.', ' \t', 'You have strong experience with\xa0at-least two of the following technologies: Nodejs and Express, Python and Flask, Angular 6 and Typescript.', ' \t', 'You have developed high-quality pixel perfect and highly aesthetic UI implementation to meet business needs and requirements', ' \t', 'You have a background in software engineering, strong experience with data structures and design patterns.', ' \t', 'You come from a cloud-native DevOps environment with a focus on highly available and\xa0scalable applications.', ' \t', 'You know how to build software with support for HA, scalability, fault tolerance and security.', ' \t', 'You are a team player with great communication skills who thrive working with people with diverse background.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'If you worked as a Senior Software Engineer what would you have done last week?', '  ', ' \t', 'Developed new APIs, microservices, and UI components and deployed multiple times in Production via our Continuous delivery process.', ' \t', 'Wrote automated unit tests, performance tests, and worked on various strategies to improve the quality of the software we deliver.', ' \t', 'Learned something new – for instance how to speed up your development workflow using Docker and Kubernetes or codify your build process.', ' \t', 'You mentored and coached junior software engineers in your squad; participated in various internal guilds and alliance meetings.', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'If you are interested in this role, then please send in your resume together with your salary expectation and notice period\xa0to Carrie.Lim@isentia.com now! We regret that only shortlisted applicants will be notified.']

address: ['TUV SUD PSB BUILDING, 1 SCIENCE PARK DRIVE 118221']
desc: ['TÜV SÜD is an international service corporation and a world leader in consulting, testing, certification, and training. Headquartered in Munich, Germany, TÜV SÜD, employs more than 24,000 professionals across 850 offices in more than 50 countries around the globe.', '  ', 'In line with Singapore’s Smart Nation initiative, TÜV SÜD setup a global Center of Excellence (CoE) Digital Service in Singapore to drive the development of new services and businesses in our customers’ sectors and future markets.', '  ', 'For our strategic development of “Continuous Certification” we are currently looking for a highly skilled senior software architect to lead implementation efforts of new tools and machine learning algorithms in the domains of ‘Smart City’, ‘Smart Equipment’, and ‘Industrie 4.0’. We offer the unique opportunity to work with world leaders at the forefront of smart digital systems, shaping the way people use rely on technology. The team of the CoE embodies the spirit of a dynamic ‘start-up’ environment, but backed with reliability and strength of an MNC.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Position Summary', '  ', 'The Centre of Excellence Singapore is a key driver of TÜV SÜDs international digital initiative. The successful candidate will take a leading role in the development of novel tools and services under the strategic thrust of smart inspection and the domain of visual analytics. Visual inspection takes a key role in typical inspection workflows. Automation of visual inspection holds the promise to increase productivity, reduce risk, and enable novel inspection services. For example, drone-based inspection of large equipment and civil infrastructure can already automate data collection and reduce the risk for inspectors to work at height. With advanced visual analytics algorithms, defects can increasingly be identified and quantified automatically. The successful candidate will lead development projects of visual inspection technology and develop business plans to bring the technology to market. \xa0\xa0', '  ', 'Key Responsibilities', '  ', 'Development of visual analytics algorithms for automatic façade inspection', '  ', 'Toolchain integration including done base data collection, and machine learning backends', '  ', 'Design workflow and dashboards for visual inspection services', '  ', 'Automatically generate inspection reports', '  ', 'Lead development teams with interdisciplinary backgrounds', '  ', 'Liaise with TÜV SÜD domain experts and external stakeholders', '  ', 'Project representative for TÜV SÜD for business development \xa0', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['§\xa0 Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or comparable with a focus on software design and implementation', '  ', '§\xa0 More than 5 years of relevant work experience in industry or academia developing machine learning algorithms and working with image data', '  ', '§\xa0 Strong project management experience', '  ', '§\xa0 Background in deep learning and large scale parallel processing', '  ', '§\xa0 Background in production ready software system development', '  ', '§\xa0 Team player with ability to work in international and multi-cultural teams', '  ', '§\xa0 Strong communications skills, fluent in English (oral and written)', '  ', '§\xa0 Ability to represent the company and discuss with external stakeholders', '  ', '§\xa0 Highly motivated to perform applied research and bring solutions to the market', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['Project Name: Unattended Ground Sensors', '  ', 'Research Fellow position available in School of EEE, NTU for industry sponsored project for developing neuromorphic embedded system for image recognition.', '  ', 'Established in 1981, the ', 'SCHOOL OF ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING (EEE)', ' http://www.eee.ntu.edu.sg is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and research. With more than 150 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,000 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world and ranks 6th in the field of Electrical & Electronic Engineering in the 2017 QS World University Rankings by Subjects.', ' \xa0', ' The position is in the BRAIN lab (http://www3.ntu.edu.sg/home/arindam.basu/ ) under the supervision of Dr. Arindam Basu.', '  ', 'Selected candidate has to lead in system integration of custom machine learning ELM IC with neuromorphic camera and FPGA platform. He/she will get to work with cutting edge neuromorphic image sensors and develop one of the lowest power machine learning chips in the world. The candidate will get the chance to use this chip for video processing and develop new generations of this design with ample opportunity for basic research as well as commercialization through startup.', '  ', '   ', 'Main job is to write Verilog/VHDL codes for interfacing FPGA with custom ELM IC developed by team and neuromorphic image sensor', '   ', 'Develop library of Verilog/VHDL codes for basic image processing blocks and neural networks', '   ', 'Need to co-work with algorithm person to optimize the neural network for hardware friendly implementation', '  ', '  ', 'Application Procedure:', '  ', 'Please email a CV and any other relevant documents to arindam.basu@ntu.edu.sg clearly mentioning the project name, job field and job position applied for. Email subject should include UGS_2_RF and all attachments to email be named as UGS_2_RF_*. \xa0Also mention in email earliest date when you can join and intended period of stay. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified for interview.']

desc: ['A research assistant position on security, formal verification and program analysis is available in the Cyber Security Lab, School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanyang Technological University. The research assistant will work with the cyber-security lab group using technologies in security, formal methods, machine learning and software engineering. The position involves conducting basic research, developing tools, writing report, and working as part of a research team. The position requires software analysis, machine learning and programming skills for the development of automated techniques to carry out the verification process and program analysis.']

desc: ['\xa0', '  ', 'Provide data support for the development of our proprietary deal management system.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Some Things To Know Before You Apply', '  ', ' \t', 'We have big plans to disrupt the traditional fundraising process for private businesses', ' \t', 'You will work with a diverse team of former investment bankers, strategy consultants and business owners in developing, monitoring and improving products to facilitate the activity of private investing', ' \t', 'Everything we do is focused on helping businesses do business, better', ' \t', 'We work really hard but play really hard as well', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Job Purpose', '  ', ' \t', 'Help to build Fundnel products for the next phase of growth along with our vision', ' \t', 'Work in a team with other data analysts to build develop the brain of our proprietary platform, Deal Management System using machine learning to make sure Fundnel is able to evaluate and screen businesses efficiently and accurately', ' ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Roles & Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Interpret data, analyse results using statistical techniques, identify trends or patterns in complex data sets, and provide ongoing deal analytics reports to support investment decisions', ' \t', 'Create an analysis framework that provides the insights needed to inform business decisions', ' \t', 'Provide insights from multiple large data-sets through visualization and storytelling', ' \t', 'Build and maintain data procedures that gathers and process data from multiple technology platforms, ultimately driving automation and machine learning', ' \t', 'Process, cleanse, and verify the integrity of data used for analysis', ' \t', 'Identify and define new process improvement opportunities', ' ']

job_title: ['Project Manager, Systems Integration (3-year contract), Centre for Teaching Excellence']
desc: [' ', 'COMPANY DESCRIPTION', ' ', '  ', "Singapore Management University is a place where high-level professionalism blends together with a healthy informality. The 'family-like' atmosphere among the SMU community fosters a culture where employees work, plan, organise and play together – building a strong collegiality and morale within the university.", 'Our commitment to attract and retain talent is ongoing. We offer attractive benefits and welfare, competitive compensation packages, and generous professional development opportunities – all to meet the work-life needs of our staff. No wonder, then, that SMU continues to be given numerous awards and recognition for its human resource excellence.', '  ', ' ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', ' ', '  ', 'The EDGE: EdTech Greenhouse, under the ambit of SMU’s Centre for Teaching Excellence, is an exciting educational technology set-up which aims to translate high potential research projects (e.g. Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, learning analytics etc.) into minimum viable products for potential campus-wide distribution, bringing about the synthesis of design and development to enhance student learning outcomes.', '  ', 'As part of the dynamic EDGE team, the Project Manager, Systems Integration, is required to identify and explore the complex technical and business issues involved in integrating custom software, hardware solutions, commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) software and business procedures and services. This would require the clear analysis of existing research prototypes and user requirements for translation to deployment to the university. The project manager’s role is to manage projects of increasing scale, complexity, and risk and to make sure that all of the components come together to ensure that the projects are completed on time and within budget. He/she will work closely with faculty researchers, software developers and the SMU’s Integrated Information Technology Services to understand user requirements, define and deliver new features, test new concepts, and assist with IT Systems integration and final implementation.', '  ', 'Job Description', '  ', '   ', 'Explore product concepts to find and propose promising directions that address both human and business needs.', '   ', 'Study existing system architecture and propose strategic decisions based on associated rationales about the overall structure, including the mapping of human interaction with these components.', '   ', 'Gather data to analyse and specify the requirements of a system as part of the IT Systems Analysis and Design process.', '   ', 'Supervise and support the coding and development process of software prototypes and minimum viable products.', '   ', 'Collaborate closely with software developer(s) and researchers.', '   ', 'Project management and support multiple projects simultaneously while meeting tight deadlines.', '   ', 'Advise front-end engineers on User Interface (UI) implementation best practices.', '  ']
req: [' \t', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science/Engineering.", ' \t', '3 to 5 years of professional experience in project management and application of project management methodologies.', ' \t', 'Experience in managing cross-functional projects.', ' \t', 'Ability to write codes to develop proof of concept/minimum viable product systems.', ' \t', 'Project Management Professional (PMP) is not required, but would be advantageous.', ' \t', 'Ability to build relationships with and influence other functional areas.', ' \t', 'Ability to apply Agile and Design Thinking/user-centric methodology to understand user requirements.', ' \t', 'Experience in the supervision of the coding and development of software prototypes.', ' \t', 'Knowledge in common database manipulation language, e.g. Structured Query Language (SQL) and applications programming.', ' \t', 'Experience in machine learning methods and algorithm would be advantageous.', ' \t', 'Strong interpersonal skills.', ' \t', 'Highly developed verbal and written communication skills.', ' \t', 'Experience in managing cross-functional projects.', ' \t', 'Organization and time management skills.', ' \t', 'Problem-solving skills with ability to perform root cause analysis.', ' \t', 'Ability to manage several concurrent projects.', ' \t', 'Knowledge of the development project lifecycle (e.g., design, development, testing, implementation, etc.)', ' \t', 'Extensive experience in meeting planning, facilitation, and presentation.', ' ', '  ', 'OTHER INFORMATION', '  ', 'Candidates who do not possess the stipulated qualifications but have relevant work experience may still apply. Remuneration and appointment terms shall commensurate with qualifications and experience. SMU reserves the right to modify the appointment terms where necessary.']

desc: ['Soft robotics is a growing, new field that focuses on these mechanical qualities and on the integration of materials, structures, and software. In the same way that animal movements are based on the tight integration of skin for protection and sensing, soft robotics aims to achieve better and simpler mechanisms by exploiting the ‘mechanical intelligence’ of soft materials. This job aims to develop intelligent soft robotics with 2D materials protective and sensory skin, and also to build a machine-learning model to enhance the analytic capability of robotics.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The intelligent soft robotics will feature', '  ', ' \t', 'high mechanical stretchability,', ' \t', 'effective chemical and flame protection that allows the personnel and robotic to survive or work in a harsh environment,', ' \t', 'skin-like sensing capacities that can monitor the actuation of pneumatic robotic hands and their interaction with human/environment, and', ' \t', 'AI neural networks with advanced analytics capabilities.', ' ', '  ', 'The machine with sensors can enhance their environmental awareness and improve the robotic-human interaction, which will be effective in overcoming mobility limitations experienced with standard rigid tools.']
req: ['A Ph.D. degree in Chemical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Material Science, Chemistry, or related fields. The ability to work independently, and adapt to new areas is required as the needs of the project evolve. The candidates with computational background (coding or simulation) will be highly preferred. Experience in 2D materials assembly, stretchable electronics, electrochemical characterizations, and soft robotics would be an advantage. The candidate should have excellent written and verbal communication skills as well as excellent interpersonal skills.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Applicants should email a cover letter and curriculum vitae to Asst. Prof. Po-Yen Chen (checp@nus.edu.sg). The CV should include educational and professional background, a list of publications/posters/conference presentations, and contact information of referees.']

desc: ['About Tookitaki', '  ', 'We are a machine learning powered advanced forecasting platform, focussed on compliance and operational risk management space. Our primary clients are banks, financial institutions and insurance companies. We are bringing a paradigm shift in the approach of risk forecasting, by helping BFSI sector move from static rules engine to dynamically adaptive platform. The key highlights are - ability to choose from multiple non-linear models, improve model performance over time through self-learning technique and deploy models in production faster via pre-packaged distributed environment.', '  ', 'Engineering @ Tookitaki', '  ', 'The engineering team is responsible for building a robust forecasting platform, which can add significant value to BFSI vertical in solving operational and compliance risk problems. We take pride in building the system right and continuously evolving it. We thrive by customer’s success and successful delivery of the projects has always been our top priority.']

desc: ['Allianz’s Data Science team is responsible for ensuring the company is well equipped with the skills and technology needed to build the next data-driven business model for insurance. The team runs multiple environment using continuous integration and deployment practice. We work side-by-side with the business to define the technical requirements and with the data scientists to implement scalable, production-ready API and infrastructure using best practices. We are seeking a customer-focused, passionate and driven Data Science Engineer with experience in developing Python-based API and cloud-based infrastructure.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Mastery of Python, or similar language.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Experience with Relational databases or NoSQL databases.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Proven understanding of the full software development lifecycle including testing, continuous integration, and deployment.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Excellent problem solving, critical thinking, and communication skills.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Solid grasp of computer science fundamentals including data structures and algorithms.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Understanding of machine learning techniques.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Proven ability to evaluate and apply new technologies in a short time.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Self-motivated, proactive, and solution-oriented.', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Experience with cloud platform services desired.', '  ', 'Description', '  ', 'With the large volume of data which we will be leveraging, our job is to build and maintain proper data processing solution to bring reliable experiences for our customers. If you’re interested in being a part of a team that’s constantly learning and problem-solving, we’d love to talk with you. As a Data Science Engineer, you will work as part of the data science team in Allianz to lead the design and implementation of systems and tools to bring to life data products. You will be:', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Developing and implementing production backend system to serve data products', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Designing system and data architecture', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Working with partners to integrate systems', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Problem-solving and developing solutions at the intersection of data and systems', '  ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Innovating by recognizing opportunities for automation and tools improvements']

desc: ['As a Data Science Engineer in DataRobot, you will work on our machine learning platform and actively contribute to the automation of data science best practices and the development of our state-of-the-art preprocessing, modeling and reporting capabilities.', '  ', 'As a Data Science Engineer on our team, you will accelerate the process of engineering features to get the most out of multiple data sources and data types. The people you will work with own the entire feature learning experience for DataRobot, and is responsible for making sure our feature discovery automation and resulting models are the best in the world.', '  ', 'You will build out Data Management and ETL system inside DataRobot utilizing distributed frameworks such as Spark, Hadoop and Kubernetes. You will build scalable solutions to process high data volumes, with the main focus on crafting robust components for data intake, cleanup and full variety of data transformation. You will also be responsible for designing and implementing features from start to finish, including clean and easy to use APIs, automated tests, and deployment infrastructure.']
req: ['   ', '5+ years of combined python Engineering / Data Science experience    ', '     ', 'Minimum 1 year of Engineering experience', '     ', 'Minimum 1 year of Data Science experience', '    ', ' ', '  ']

job_title: ['AI Engineer  /  Senior AI Engineer (100E) for AISG']
desc: ['The candidate will join a team of AI researchers, apprentices, data and software engineers. With the team, he or she will experiment and build AI Minimum Viable Product (MVP) solutions that can help Singapore companies improve their businesses using AI.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'The candidate is expected to have at least 3 years of experience in developing machine learning models and performing statistical analysis in an industry or commercial setting. He or she should be familiar with the concepts of statistical learning and the technologies to put them into practice including Python programming, Scikit-learn and Tensorflow libraries, data engineering and big data technologies such as SQL, Spark, Docker.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'A more senior candidate is expected to provide technical leadership, engage stakeholders, mentor and train AI apprentices in the projects.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Duties and Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Develop an AI MVP solution that addresses company’s problems', ' \t', 'Perform the necessary statistical modelling, data engineering and analysis, coding, testing, validation and, occasionally, deployment to ensure accurate and scalable AI solution', ' \t', 'Prepare training materials for AI apprentices, conduct the training and mentor them throughout the project duration', ' \t', 'Contribute to the proposal writing and the initial engagement stage with companies', ' \t', 'Practice agile methodology in project execution', ' \t', 'Contribute to community building activities such as conducting meetups, technical sharing, blogging and competition', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Master or PhD in machine learning, statistics, AI, computer science and other relevant equivalent quantitative fields; Bachelor who demonstrates strong industry experience, or startup attitudes is welcome to apply', ' \t', 'Statistical learning concepts: \t', ' \t\t', 'Must-have: supervised learning, deep neural network, unsupervised learning, e.g. clustering, dimensionality reduction', ' \t\t', 'Good-to-have: CNN, RNN, kernel machines, auto-encoder, reinforcement learning', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Practical machine learning tools: \t', ' \t\t', 'Must-have: Python or R', ' \t\t', 'Good-to-have: Jupyter, Tensorflow, Pytorch, Scikit-learn', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Data engineering and big data tech stack: \t', ' \t\t', 'Must-have: basic SQL', ' \t\t', 'Good-to-have: Spark, Docker, Anaconda, TF serving, Airflow, distributed computing', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Data story-telling, information visualisation and technical writing skills', ' \t', 'Proficiency in running machine learning models in the cloud (e.g. Azure, GCP, EC2); able to use Virtual Machine Instances on these platforms', ' ']
skills: ['Analysis', 'Analytics', 'Business Analysis', 'Business Intelligence', 'Business Process', 'Data Analysis', 'Data Modeling', 'Data Warehousing', 'Database Design', 'Databases', 'ETL', 'IT Management', 'Management', 'Microsoft SQL Server', 'Process Improvement', 'Project Management', 'Requirements Analysis', 'SDLC', 'SQL', 'Strategy']

desc: ['Our vision is to build a unified Commercial Digital Platform capability (data, people, processes, technology), which will enable us to enable a\xa0step change in commercial performance, transform customer experiences, and play a pioneering role in redefining our industry over the long term.', '  ', 'Our aim is to deliver the most engaging experiences for our customers, underpinned by digital technologies and new agile ways of working.', '  ', 'As part of this work, in partnership with BCG Digital Ventures (part of the Boston Consulting Group), Rio Tinto has built a MVP for a predictive shipping analytics platform using the latest Machine Learning and AI technologies. They are now looking for smart people to join the team and propel the next phase of the product’s development, and support the broader digitalisation transformation across Rio Tinto’s commercial function.', '  ', "We're working with a modern tech stack - ES6, React and Redux, with a Python back end deployed on AWS, and are looking for experienced engineers to join us, working on the design and development of the new product under the direction of the Venture CTO.\xa0", '  ', "What you'll do:", '  ', '   ', 'Collaborating with a team of engineers across the venture team to ensure we deliver an empowering user experience', '   ', 'Communicating ideas across the cross-functional team in an effective manner', '   ', 'Sharing technical solutions and product ideas through design reviews, pair programming, code reviews and discussions', '   ', 'Utilising a proactive and responsive approach to problem solving', '   ', 'Implementing highly scalable and maintainable frontend services, and working with business specialists and visual designers to design optimal solutions', '   ', 'Working with ES6, React (boilerplate), Redux', '  ']
req: ["What you'll bring:", '  ', '   ', 'Sustained experience in professional software development using ES6 and React', '   ', 'An appreciation for design, with a focus on building elegant applications that are pleasing to the eye', '   ', 'Strong analytical and debugging skills', '   ', 'A preference for working with cross-disciplinary teams to introduce and enhance behaviour and test-driven approaches, resulting in clean, elegant code and application architectures', '   ', 'Experience of working with team members to encourage the writing of clean, elegant code using test-first approaches', '   ', 'A background working in teams using Agile approaches', '  ', '  ', 'Tech Stack:', '  ', '   ', 'ES6, React, Node, AWS, Serverless\xa0\xa0', '  ']

desc: ['The Rapid-Rich Object SEarch (ROSE) Lab is a research initiative of Nanyang Technological University (NTU) aims to create a platform for fast mobile searches on object databases.\xa0 The three key thrusts of the ROSE Lab are:\xa0 (i) large-scale object database collection and analytics, (ii) scalable mobile object search with contextual mobility, and (iii) media cloud platform.\xa0 Resources at the ROSE Lab consist of NTU Faculty, Researchers, PhD Students, and Visiting Scholars & Students from other institutions from around the world.\xa0Learn more about ROSE Lab at http://rose.ntu.edu.sg/', '  ', 'Job Description', '  ', 'The successful applicant will be responsible for the development of action recognition and computer vision systems using machine learning techniques.\xa0 This includes:', '  ', '  ', 'Develop action recognition and computer vision systems, including parallelising and optimising the algorithms.', '  ', 'Working with industry partners of the ROSE Lab to test the classification systems.', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Master degree in Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science, or Engineering.', ' \t', 'Must have research and development experience in Human Activity Analysis, Computer Vision, and Machine Learning.', ' \t', 'Must be good at C/C++.', ' \t', 'Must be good at Python.', ' \t', 'Applicants with experience in deep learning with convolutional and/or recurrent neural networks are highly preferred.', ' \t', 'Ideally, the applicant should have experience working with large-scale datasets.', ' \t', 'Applicants with good publication are highly preferred.', ' \t', 'Good interpersonal skills, with the ability to work with people from varied backgrounds.\xa0', ' ', '  ', 'We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

desc: ['DataRobot changes the way users build and deploy highly accurate machine learning models.\xa0What does it take to develop the highest quality data science product on the market? \xa0A hybrid testing strategy that combines humans and automation and gets best of both worlds.\xa0Our QA Philosophy at DataRobot is one of Quality “Assistance” rather than assurance; as a result, our lean team focuses on empowering every engineering team to own the quality of their code and ensure adequate test coverage for new features.', '  ', 'As a member of the Quality Squad, you will:', '  ', ' \t', 'Test new features for upcoming releases.', ' \t', 'Help write test plans, test reports, and provide suggestion for improving the QA processes.', ' \t', 'Perform exploratory testing, communicate with product and development teams to develop a strong understanding of the project and product testing objectives.', ' \t', 'Manage directives for third-party manual regression testing.', ' \t', 'Review test coverage of the upcoming features and provide suggestions to improve the quality of the test.', ' \t', 'Review results of automated tests.', ' \t', 'Be an active member of the team, suggesting improvements of the processes to increase the quality of the product and performance of the team', ' \t', 'Successful candidates will be passionate about exploratory testing and test automation, initiative-driven, and self-directed.', ' ']
req: [' \t', '3+ years of professional quality assurance and testing experience with web applications', ' \t', 'Good knowledge of testing theory, especially of exploratory testing methods', ' \t', 'Experience with REST API testing', ' \t', 'Experience with testing different databases (PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL, etc)', ' \t', 'Experience with test management tools, (TestRail), automation servers (Jenkins), version control software (GitHub, Bitbucket), and Linux and/or Mac OS X', ' \t', 'Good English skills', ' \t', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or equivalent', ' ', '  ', ' Recommended:', '  ', ' \t', 'Test automation experience: Protractor/NodeJS/Javascript/Python', ' \t', 'Jenkins/Docker/AWS expertise', ' \t', 'Data science experience with computational metrics', ' \t', 'Technical writing experience', ' ']
skills: ['5S', 'Continuous Improvement', 'DMAIC', 'Engineering', 'FMEA', 'ISO', 'Kaizen', 'Lean Manufacturing', 'Manufacturing', 'PPAP', 'Process Improvement', 'Product Development', 'Quality Assurance', 'Quality Control', 'Quality Management', 'Quality System', 'Root Cause Analysis', 'Six Sigma', 'SPC', 'Supplier Quality']

desc: ['As a Sales Development Representative, your job will be to find and engage with prospects to drive continued sales growth. DataRobot is a predictive analytics platform to help companies transform their business using Machine Learning. Our customers include many F500 companies, some of the largest banks and insurance in the world, as well as numerous fintech companies.', '  ', 'We are looking for exceptional candidates to join our fast and ambitious growing team. You will get an opportunity to work with the some of the world’s best Data Scientists and embrace AI in your daily workflow. If you are passionate about cutting edge technology and are looking to join one of the fastest growing companies in the world – let’s have a chat. This is a perfect role for any hardworking candidate with a strong desire to boost their career.', '  ', 'Individuals seeking employment at DataRobot are considered without regards to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, or sexual orientation.']
req: ['Experience Required', '  ', ' \t', '2+ years of client facing sales development experience in a business-to-business environment', ' \t', 'Excellent verbal and written English and Japanese communication', ' \t', 'Consistently achieved or exceeded past sales development targets', ' \t', 'History of creative, persistent, and effective outbound sales lead follow-up', ' \t', 'Must exhibit the commitment, attention to detail, time management, and organization needed to simultaneously manage multiple tasks/deadlines and thrive in a metrics-oriented culture', ' \t', 'Must be a self-starter, be comfortable with limited supervision, perform under pressure, and have solid problem-solving skills', ' \t', 'Knowledge of and experience in the machine learning/predictive analytics space is a big plus', ' \t', 'Past experience with Salesforce, LinkedIn, Outreach.io, Chart.io a plus', ' ', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Professionally and persistently follow up with leads via email, phone, and LinkedIn', ' \t', 'Book qualified meetings and generate pipeline as an individual contributor as well as a team player', ' \t', 'Meet or exceed assigned goals from marketing while promoting camaraderie, sharing best practices, providing assistance, and motivating others with a positive attitude', ' \t', 'Understand the latest industry trends and show dedication to continuous learning on all fronts', ' \t', 'Provide feedback to peers and internal teams to help develop and improve marketing materials', ' \t', 'Maintain up-to-date information in Salesforce.com', ' ']

desc: ['The National University of Singapore invites applications for the position of Research Assistant in the Department of Computer Science, School of Computing (SoC). SoC is strongly committed to research excellence in all its dimensions: Searching for fundamental results and insights, developing novel computational solutions to a wide range of applications, building large-scale experimental systems and improving the wellbeing of society. We seek to play an active role both internationally and locally in the core and emerging areas of Computer Science and Information Systems.', '  ', 'The Research Assistant will be responsible for working closely with the Principal Investigator and lab members on one or more research projects. He/she should possess experience and interest in the following research areas:', '  ', '  ', 'Artificial Intelligence, machine learning', '  ', 'Probabilistic models and inference algorithms', '  ', 'Decision making under uncertainty, e.g., Markov decision process (MDP) and partially observable Markov decision process (POMDP)', ' ', '  ', 'Only shortlisted applicants will be notified.\xa0']
req: ['  ', 'A Bachelor’s degree with Honours or a Master’s degree in the relevant area; and', '  ', 'Experience in research.', ' ', '  ', 'Applicants with prior publications in the relevant area will be considered favourably.']

desc: ['Job title: Full Stack Developer\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 ', '  ', 'Reports to: Solution Architect\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'About Dathena Science', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Dathena is a Swiss and Singaporean company developing data governance software based on artificial intelligence algorithms. Dathena is the most complete and accurate data governance and classification platform and is the only solution to easily classify and manage data with this level of accuracy while helping companies to comply with regulations. Using cutting edge machine learning technology, Dathena sift through all unstructured data allowing to regain full control on company’s information.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'We are looking for a Full Stack Developer for a permanent position or an internship to work with us and our partners to improve our leading technology in managing the confidentiality of information of our Fortune 500 clients.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Job Purpose:', '  ', '   ', 'Full Stack Developer, keen to develop web/cloud-oriented and big data technologies, and integrate new libraries / framework into our codebase.', '   ', 'Bring the knowledge and curiosity in Dathena to develop big data applications.', '   ', "Live your passion for software development in exciting Data Science and Cybersecurity projects and be inspired by your colleagues' enthusiasm.", '  ']
req: ['Responsibilities:\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'You will implement sophisticated product development projects for the enterprise and cloud environments using modern, agile project methods within the Dathena Development & Engineering team.', '   ', 'You will efficiently and competently solve tricky software challenges, because continuous further development and active knowledge exchange mean that you will be working with the latest methods and tools and always be on trend.', '   ', 'As a Full Stack Developer, you will cooperate with interdisciplinary teams in projects and experience how technology and team spirit unite to create innovative solutions and work closely with our team of data scientists, researchers and developers to implement the state of the art.', '  ', '  ', 'Skills and Qualifications:', '  ', '   ', 'Python 3+', '   ', 'JavaScript: React & Node.JS', '   ', 'Message queues (RabbitMQ / ZeroMQ)', '   ', 'Database design & usage (MySQL / PostgreSQL)', '   ', 'Used to develop and deploy on Ubuntu and/or OSX', '   ', 'Celery is a plus', '   ', 'Django / MVC is a plus', '   ', 'Docker is a plus', '  ', '  ', 'Soft Skills:', '  ', '   ', 'Fluent in English', '   ', 'Data-oriented personality', '   ', 'Time management', '   ', 'Interpersonal Skills', '   ', 'Critical Thinking', '   ', 'Proactive and interested in A.I., Big Data and cyber-security, the candidate should be able to implement good security practices.', '   ', 'New tools are available every day, some of them could improve our overall environment. The Full Stack Developer has to be lazy in a smart way: everything should be automated with as little human interaction as possible', '  ', '  ', 'Working Conditions:', '  ', '   ', 'The Full Stack Developer must fully embrace the team spirit of a young and innovative Start-up. They must be able to adapt to a multi-cultural environment. Travel and remote location might be required.', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Location', ': Singapore\xa0', '  ', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['Data Engineer (5 days, Orchard, $3500-4000)', '  ', 'Leading System Integrator company providing IT solutions for network, IT infrastructure, analytics, cyber security and managed services.', '  ', 'Job Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', 'Design, engineer, configure and administer BI project based on given functional and technical requirements', '   ', "Collaborate with pre-sales, project and relevant internal teams to deliver the optimal technical solution to client's business problems", '   ', 'Develop real-time and batch data ingesting and processing pipelines to be used for analysis, machine learning, dashboards, alerts and visualizations', '   ', 'Review and monitor ETL tasks and performance', '   ', 'Support testing and deployment', '   ', 'Provide recommendations and implementation changes to optimize in the customer environment.', '   ', 'Write and develop custom scripts as needed', '  ', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['The main responsibility of the data science lead position is to drive, facilitate and manage artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) development in Scoot. As a Data Science lead, you will develop AI solutions to challenging\xa0problems to drive Scoot’s business growth. You will also manage and own the entire end-to-end lifecycle of designing models, working closely with key internal and external stakeholders to design, build, implement and maintain AI solutions.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Lead and manage AI and ML activities, and ensure alignment to business objectives and strategies', ' \t', 'Collaborate with stakeholders to identify AI opportunities that will drive new business initiatives and growth', ' \t', 'Develop algorithms and pragmatic solutions towards automation and optimisation', ' \t', 'Thought leader and trusted advisor in the analytics/data science/AI domain', ' \t', "Assist in defining deliverables and distribution of the team's cycles for sprints in each product development cycle", ' \t', 'Work closely with a team of internal and external data analysts, data scientists, data engineers and business units for successful technical delivery of data science or AI models in commercial projects', ' ', '  ', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, Operations Research or similar field', ' \t', 'At least 3-5 years’ experience as a Data Scientist/Data Engineer or similar role', ' \t', 'Highly proficient and experienced in scripting languages and have rapid prototyping skills such as SQL, Python, Java', ' \t', 'Solid knowledge of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Framework ecosystems and languages, such as TensorFlow', ' \t', 'Previous experience in recommending system and pricing optimisation models is a plus', ' \t', 'Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform, Big Query, Big Query ML is highly preferred', ' \t', 'Experience deploying large-scale machine learning systems in the cloud environment is a strong plus', ' \t', 'Willingness to learn and able to pick up new technology or new concepts fast', ' \t', 'Awareness of business objectives and ability to apply this understanding to recommend and implement product development for complex technical problems', ' ']

desc: ['BAMBU is a FinTech startup, who specializes in providing Robo-Advisory solutions for banks, insurance companies to non-financial industries like Telcos & Ecommerce. Leveraging on machine learning, we believe we can change the way people save, invest and manage their wealth. We have been rapidly expanding and in a short span of two years, have clinched 10 clients across ASEAN, EMEA, and US. We were chosen as the best startup for Fintech final 2017 as well as Fintech of the Year by The Asset Awards 2017.', '  ', 'Here at BAMBU, we believe wealth management should be made easily accessible, through delivering great products that provide beautiful user journeys and experiences. We don’t just want to make it simpler, we want to redefine the entire way wealth services are delivered.', '  ', 'We are looking for a Business Analyst who shares the same passion with us. You will be at forefront of the implementation of our technology, communication with our clients and ensuring our cutting-edge products are being delivered. You should be a multidisciplinary person who can speak both tech and business language.', '  ', 'Key Responsibilities:', '  ', '   ', 'Work closely with our development team to determine the requirements of a project or program, and communicating them clearly to stakeholders, facilitators and partners.', '   ', 'Implement advanced strategies for gathering, reviewing and analyzing data requirements', '   ', 'Convert client requirements into business logic\xa0', '   ', 'Conduct various requirements workshop to ensure smooth delivery', '   ', 'Working with stakeholders at all levels as defined by the individuals project', '   ', 'Assisting with integration and acceptance testing', '   ', 'Providing support during and post implementation', '   ', 'Ensure smooth communication with our client by acting as a ‘translator’ between business and IT', '   ', 'Testing of APIs from external software providers\xa0', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'Excellent interpersonal and communication skills – written and verbal', '   ', '\xa0Experience working directly with customers\xa0', '   ', '\xa0Experience working in a startup environment', '   ', 'Experience with agile software delivery', '   ', 'Experience with software-as-a-service and API-based business models\xa0\xa0', '   ', 'Understanding of\xa0microservice architecture', '   ', 'Banking Experience in Wealth Management/ Group Technology and Operations preferred\xa0', '   ', 'Javascript or Python experience preferred', '  ']

desc: ['About Us', '  ', 'Our ambitious goal of helping innovators build a better world with data started in 2009. Today, we are one of the fastest growing enterprise companies in history, surpassing $1B in revenue at the end of 2017.', '  ', 'The world is experiencing a technological revolution driven by AI, machine learning, virtual reality, quantum computing and self-driving cars -- all of which require large amounts of data and put Pure’s technology literally in the driver’s seat. Our solutions deliver real-time, secure data to power mission-critical production, DevOps, and modern analytics in multi-cloud environments. With a Satmetrix NPS score in the top 1% of B2B companies worldwide, our customer-first culture and commitment to innovation create a thriving company that employees, customers, partners, and investors love. For more information on our business, check out the corporate fact sheet here.', '  ', 'Digital Marketing Team at Pure', '  ', 'The Pure Storage Global Digital Marketing team is focused on supporting hyper growth, geographic expansion, and delivering world-class, dynamic, and intelligent online experiences that engage and delight our prospects, customers, partners, and employees globally. The team is focused on optimising every digital touchpoint and conversion trigger to grow revenue. We’re looking for a passionate digital marketing leader for our innovative Digital Marketing team. The team is responsible for global paid and organic search, paid media, social media marketing, purestorage.com and the digital analytics that ties it all together. The Digital Marketing team will also be responsible for capturing demand gen best practices and piloting innovation opportunities for marketing.', '  ', 'This individual will be responsible for planning and optimising Pure’s paid digital media, demand generation, and the company’s social media programmes in APJ (Asia-Pacific and Japan). In this role, you will support our efforts to drive demand and multi-million-dollar pipeline through APJ paid media, social media, and web experiences optimised to accelerate conversions and drive incremental revenue. You will oversee and manage social and media agency relationships and be responsible for working with agency partners and Pure’ analytics suite to track and report on digital media performance.', '  ', 'You will work closely with the global digital marketing team, theater program marketing, and field marketing to develop a digital media strategy that aligns with business goals and drives demand for the theatre. We are looking for a team member who has a proven track record of rolling up their sleeves to get the work done, thrives on analysis to refine how to optimise and has a global mindset. This role will pioneer new approaches and tactics by contributing to enterprise-wide digital strategies, and new approaches to brand storytelling.\xa0 This position is based in Singapore or Tokyo, Japan and will report to the Head of the Global Demand Centre.', '  ', 'What You Will Be Doing WEB?', '  ', '  ', 'Collaborate with APJ programs and field marketing teams on the strategy and planning of APJ digital media programmes including paid search, programmatic media, and retargeting, paid & organic social, and content syndication. Work with appointed media and social agencies to lead the execution, reporting, and ongoing optimisation of these media programmes.', '  ', 'Design and execute digital media plans that are aligned with the prospect and/or customer’s journey', '  ', 'Work closely with colleagues in the Global Demand Center to define audience segmentation needs for the theatre, plan and execute targeted programs using data intelligence, track digital lead quality and provide feedback on BoM for digital activities.', '  ', 'Work with agencies and internal analytics to set-up digital tracking needs and consolidate reporting to showcase digital media performance for the APJ theater.', '  ', 'Work hands-on with the Pure Storage “marchitecture” in the region. Currently including (not limited to) SFDC, Tableau, Adobe Analytics & Marketo.', '  ', 'Partner with key stakeholders, including APJ Leadership and field marketing managers, Digital Team, Product Marketing, Campaigns, Partner, Customer References and Corporate teams to ensure purestorage.com is optimised as a frictionless, localised and personalised experience to accelerate conversions and deliver measurable business results in APJ.', ' ']
req: ['What You Bring To The Team', '  ', '  ', 'Proven work experience managing paid digital media and organic social media programmes in the B2B technology space and across APJ markets and an understanding of how to leverage paid, earned and owned media', '  ', 'Experience with account-based marketing, and using data intelligence to deliver targeted activities to various audience segments', '  ', 'Experience driving B2B demand generation in APJ markets. Experience with Japan market is a must.', '  ', 'Demonstrated experience in successfully executing a social programme that includes growing followers organically, increasing engagements, and demand gen. conversions', '  ', 'Strong project management skills with proven track record of delivering high-quality work under tight timelines', '  ', 'Self-motivated and takes initiative; can work independently on multiple projects at once and has the ability to demonstrate sound decision-making and react quickly under pressure', '  ', 'Demonstrated track record of leveraging data-driven research/analysis to drive strategic direction and website optimisation', '  ', 'Solid knowledge of SEO and keyword research', '  ', 'BS/BA degree required', '  ', '8-10 years of digital and social media media experience and/or digital marketing strategy and execution management', ' ', '  ', 'Pure creates opportunities for your development and career growth.', '  ', 'At Pure, we believe that each Puritan is a leader contributing to the success of our business, regardless of role. We offer an assortment of learning options available to all Puritans, including workshops on leadership, management, career development and more! We’re here to change the world and we hope you join us!', '  ', 'Popular Perks', '  ', 'Our rewards philosophy is tailored to provide Puritans globally competitive compensation and benefit programmes that enable innovation and growth. We offer a wide variety of benefits and perks including comprehensive medical insurance, meal service, opportunities to attend events, join sports leagues, employee assistance programme, work-life services, travel assistance, and employee resource groups – all of which are thoughtfully designed to maintain mind and body wellness. Through our Pure Good Foundation, we also offer numerous volunteer opportunities for employees to give back across the globe.']
