desc: [' ', 'COMPANY DESCRIPTION', ' ', '  ', 'NTUC Enterprise Co-operative Limited is the holding entity and single largest shareholder of the NTUC group of Social Enterprises. We aim to create a greater social force to do good by harnessing the capabilities of the social enterprises to meet pressing social needs in areas like health and eldercare, childcare, daily essentials, cooked food and financial services. Serving over two million customers, NTUC Enterprise wants to enable and empower all in Singapore to live better and more meaningful lives.', '  ', 'The NTUC Enterprise Centre of Excellence for Data, Digitalisation and Technology leads the transformation of the NTUC Social Enterprises by leveraging digital technologies to become more nimble, adaptable and innovative in today’s digital age. The NTUC Enterprise Centre of Excellence for Data, Digitalisation and Technology has been registered as NTUC Enterprise Nexus, a wholly owned subsidiary of NTUC Enterprise.', '  ', ' ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', ' ', '  ', 'We are seeking a candidate with a track record in business analytics and consumer insights to fill an opening in NTUC Link’s Customer and Digital Analytics unit.', '  ', 'This unit has oversight on all analytics and insights related to our loyalty program’s CRM database, deals and rewards mobile app, website, digital marketing, and consumer research. This position is tasked with aiding the formulation of data-driven engagement strategies, via a thorough understanding of the business’ most valuable assets – its customers.', '  ', 'The ideal candidate should be experienced in the application of analytical and quantitative methods to extract insights from customer transaction and campaign data, across online and offline channels. It is an excellent opportunity for someone who is skilled at telling a story with numbers, and who has a talent for stitching together and visualising insights that are actionable and understandable by business stakeholders.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '   ', 'Partner with Customer Engagement, Marketing and Product business units to understand their priorities on an ongoing basis.', '   ', 'Work with the Head of Customer and Digital Analytics on defining an analytical strategy to address the identified opportunities, covering analytical approaches to take, and data requirements to enable them.', '   ', 'Mine and interrogate customer transaction data (offline + mobile app), web/app event data, and 3', 'rd', '-party data (research and market intelligence) to extract and stitch together insights.', '   ', 'Perform statistical analyses where required to support the evaluation of marketing campaigns via A/B tests and other advanced experiments.', '   ', 'Communicate analytical findings and recommendations to senior management and business stakeholders, via a mix of scrum sessions, online dashboards and Powerpoint presentations.', '   ', 'Work with data science and machine learning engineering teams to ensure customer understanding is reflected in data science models that the business deploys (eg. personalization and recommendation systems).', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'At least 2-3 years in business intelligence/customer insights roles in consumer marketing, retail, consumer goods, ecommerce, technology, banking/insurance, or market research. Grade and remuneration will be commensurate with experience and credentials.', '   ', 'Proficiency in SQL, R or Python is a must. Experience interfacing with cloud platforms like AWS Redshift is an advantage.', '   ', 'Familiarity with BI and visualisation tools like Tableau/Qlik/Power BI.', '   ', 'Prior exposure to web analytics tools like Google Analytics/Adobe Catalyst, tech stacks in marketing/advertising, or large volumes of event data from tag management solutions is an advantage.', '   ', 'Good understanding of statistical analysis, inference and experimental design.', '   ', 'Team player who is able to build strong partnerships and collaborations with the business.', '   ', 'Bachelor or Masters in Economics, Statistics, Mathematics, Operations Research, Business Analytics, Computer Science, Finance, or equivalent, coupled with a quantitative career track.', '  ']
skills: ['Analysis', 'Business Analysis', 'Business Strategy', 'Corporate Finance', 'Data Analysis', 'Equities', 'Financial Analysis', 'Financial Modeling', 'Investment Banking', 'Investments', 'Leadership', 'Management', 'Microsoft Excel', 'Microsoft Office', 'Process Improvement', 'Project Management', 'Research', 'Strategic Planning', 'Strategy', 'Valuation']

desc: ['ABOUT TAIGER', '  ', 'Headquartered in Singapore, TAIGER is a fast-growing Artificial Intelligence (AI) company with a global footprint. Our mission is to help organizations optimize operational efficiencies by automating complex cognitive tasks. We are a market leader and the pioneer of Knowledge Work AutomationTM. The solutions we provide use natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision techniques (e.g. semantic analysis, concept-extraction, multi-language knowledge graphs, and object detection) to provide unparalleled accuracy in information extraction for industry leaders across the financial services, government sectors and more. TAIGER is recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor. Find out more about us at www.taiger.com and www.linkedin.com/company/taiger', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER', '  ', 'We are looking for an experienced leader that is passionate about the potential of TAIGER. You should be genuinely excited by the prospect of building new functions and leading a passionate team of high performers as TAIGER expands in scale; and be motivated by the proposition of your contributions having a real impact on TAIGER’s growth.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', '  ', '   ', 'Develop algorithms, data models and build products and solutions based on state-of-the-art AI technology.', '   ', 'Create innovative, marketable products using research in fields of NLP, Semantics and Machine Learning.', '   ', 'Design architecture and behaviour of software modules and use industry Agile standards to perform analysis, estimation, implementation, testing and deployment of applications.', '   ', 'Ensure technical quality through best practices like TDD, Code Review, CI.', '   ', 'Bring ideas to the table to improve TAIGER’s technology and product. Work and be involved in key decisions in Engineering, Product and Delivery teams.', '   ', 'Take leadership in driving projects or product features while working in autonomous, cross-functional squads, taking ownership of development activities and knowledge sharing. Mentor and guide junior developers and provide technical expertise.', '  ']
req: ['REQUIREMENTS', '  ', '   ', 'MSc/BSc in computer science, engineering or related technical discipline, or equivalent.', '   ', '5+ years of experience in software development with team management experience.', '   ', 'Strong experience in Java EE, Spring, Object Orientation and Design Patterns.', '   ', 'Solid knowledge in databases, like MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, architecture patterns, like MVC, ETL, SOA, Microservices, and software best practices, like TDD, CI.', '   ', 'Familiarity with Agile or XP methodologies.', '   ', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills in English with ability to effectively communicate with teams and clients.', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'YOU WILL BE AT AN ADVANTAGE WITH THESE SKILLS', '  ', '   ', 'Understanding in front-end development like JavaScript, HTML, CSS.', '   ', 'Good understanding of security, performance, scalability aspects', '   ', 'Working knowledge on software lifecycle management, code organization and experience as a tech lead or project manager.', '   ', 'Proactivity in suggesting solutions and improvements.', '   ', 'Familiarity or interest in AI, Semantic Technologies, NLP and Search Engines.', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'In TAIGER we believe that diversity of experience, perspectives, and background will result in a better workplace for our team and a better product for our clients. Join the growing team at TAIGER today!']

desc: ['We are looking for a postdoctoral fellow who can do numerical simulation and analysis of non-Newtonian turbulent flows. The candidate will be collaborating with another postdoc who will apply machine learning to the flow database.']
req: ['The candidate should', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'have a PhD degree in Mechanical Engineering or Applied Mathematics or related;', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'be familiar with numerical simulations of non-Newtonian flows and particle-laden flows;', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'be familiar with the classical postprocessing analysis of turbulent flows;', '  ', '  ', '  ', 'be familiar with reduced order modelling/flow control.', '  ', ' ']

desc: ['Established in 1981, the SCHOOL OF ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING (EEE) ', 'http://www.eee.ntu.edu.sg ', 'is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and research. With more than 150 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,000 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world and ranks 6th in the field of Electrical & Electronic Engineering in the 2017 QS World University Rankings by Subjects.', '  ', 'Job\xa0Description:', '  ', 'A Research Associate position is available in the School of Electrical & Electronic Engineering at Nanyang Technological University.', '  ', 'This position is for detecting high frequency signals of unknown bandwidths received from a wideband antenna array. Modulation types of the received signals have to be identified. Multiple signals with diverse modulation and bandwidth characteristics can be present in the detected signals. Machine learning algorithms have to be developed to solve the above listed tasks. Training data is expected to have known as well as unknown signals too.']
req: [' \t', "Master's Degree in a relevant field.", ' \t', 'Research experiences in machine learning algorithm development is essential.', ' \t', 'Deep learning, randomization-based fast learning neural networks and random forest based algorithms in the context of classification and time series analysis are extremely valuable.', ' \t', 'Exposure to signal processing will be an advantage.', ' \t', 'Excellent programming skills are needed.\xa0', ' ', '  ', 'We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

an agile development team.', '   ', 'You will write automated unit, system and acceptance tests as appropriate to support our continuous integration pipelines.', '   ', 'You will work closely with desc: ["Business Integrity's mission is to ensure safe and trusted connections between people, businesses, and Facebook. Our team works together to anticipate and predict potential threats to our platform, design and build tools to protect against these threats, and then implement and enforce these systems at scale. We leverage data analysis, machine learning and a robust infrastructure to review the quality of promoted content on our platform. We partner closely with several cross-functional teams, including product, engineering, and data science, to ensure high quality and safe experiences for both people and businesses across the Facebook family of apps.\xa0", ' ', " Successful candidates for this team are adaptable, creative, have a bias toward action, aren't afraid of being wrong, and can successfully work across various teams & countries. Opportunities are available in Singapore."]

desc: ['Our vision is to build a unified Commercial Digital Platform capability (data, people,', ' processes, technology), which will enable us to enable a step change in commercial', ' performance, transform customer experiences, and play a pioneering role in', ' redefining our industry over the long term.', ' Our aim is to deliver the most engaging experiences for our customers, underpinned', ' by digital technologies and new agile ways of working.', ' As part of this work, in partnership with BCG Digital Ventures (part of the Boston', ' Consulting Group), we have built a MVP for a predictive shipping analytics platform', ' using the latest Machine Learning and AI technologies. We are now looking for smart', ' people to join the team and propel the next phase of the product’s development, and', ' support the broader digitalisation transformation across Rio Tinto’s commercial', ' function.', ' Lead Designers drive UX strategy and interaction design to create, engage and', ' inspire. They have a strong understanding of design thinking, human-centred design,', ' human computer interaction and are fluent in the latest technology trends. They are', ' design leaders, innovative problem solvers, self-starters and strong collaborators', ' who excel in a fast-paced environment.', ' Responsibilities', ' ● Lead the design process and decision making for Prophesea', ' including planning, prioritising, and scheduling.', ' ● Lead and participate in concept sessions leveraging ethnographic', ' research and design thinking.', ' ● Balance user frictions and needs with other stakeholder goals,', ' market viability and technical feasibility.', ' ● Translate user insights into concepts, personas, user journeys,', ' storyboards, system maps, user flows, wireframes, visual design', ' comps and prototypes with Sketch, Adobe CS, InVision, and other', ' tools.', ' ● Incorporate user research and usability testing to iterate on product', ' solutions.', ' ● Collaborate effectively with multi-disciplinary teams including', ' Management Consultants, Product Managers, Engineers, Marketers,', ' and Corporate Executives.', ' ● Communicate the product vision and articulate design decisions and', ' trade-offs to stakeholders both verbally and visually.', ' ● Partner with engineering to ensure designs are properly', ' implemented.']
req: ['Background', ' ● Several years of experience as an Experience Designer preferred.', ' ● Prior people management experience is essential', ' ● Working experience with Sketch, Adobe CS, and InVision.', ' ● Proven experience delivering concepts, personas, user journeys,', ' storyboards, user flows, wireframes, prototypes, etc.', ' ● Exceptional communication skills and presentation skills.', ' ● Excellent people management skills to collaborate with colleagues', ' and cross-functional teams']

desc: ['FPGA Application Developer (AI Platform)', ' 4Paradigm Technology (Singapore)', '  ', 'ABOUT US ', ' 4Paradigm Technology (第四范式, https://www.4paradigm.com/) is an Artificial Intelligence (AI) service and solution provider with headquarter in Beijing, China. The company has cutting-edge machine learning technologies helping enterprises improve efficiency, reduce risk, and maximize business value. The company’s clients are from banks, insurances, investments, governments, energy, hospitals, security, media, and retail. The representative clients include Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (the world’s largest bank), Ruijin Hospital (one of the most reputable hospitals in China) and so on. The company has received joint investment from Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, Bank of China and China Construction Bank in 2018. This is the first time of joint investment into a technology company by state-owned banks in China.', '  ', 'The Singapore R&D office was established in 2018, which is the first oversea branch of 4Paradigm Technology. We are looking for talents to join us to help build next generation AI platforms.', '  ', 'WORKING LOCATION', ' Singapore', '  ', 'JOB DESCRIPTION', ' The Singapore-based R&D office is looking for ', 'FPGA Application Developers ', 'to help build the next generation high performance AI platforms.', ' •\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Profiling and performance analysis for existing systems', ' •\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Performance improvement for AI applications employing FPGA acceleration']
req: ['REQUIREMENT', ' This role will take responsibility of building efficient AI platforms using heterogeneous computing, especially FPGA.', '  ', '•\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree or above in Electrical/Electronics/Computer Science; PhD a plus', ' •\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa01+ year’ experience of hardware development using Verilog, VHDL, HLS or OpenCL', ' •\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good knowledge of fundamental data structures and algorithms', ' •\xa0 \xa0 \xa0Good knowledge of high performance computing concepts, e.g., computer architecture, performance tuning, multi-core, GPU', ' •\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in programming languages, e.g., C/C++/Java/Python', ' •\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fresh graduates with relevant experience are also welcome', ' •\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0NO AI BACKGROUND REQUIRED', '  ', 'APPLICATION', ' Please send CV to lumian@4paradigm.com or apply online if you are interested.']

desc: ['Company overview:', '  ', 'Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers.', '  ', 'The area: Global Clients & Agency Solutions', '  ', "Our Global Clients & Agency Solutions team helps serve some of the world's largest brands. Our dedicated teams of marketing and advertising specialists use their unique skill sets to help shape how companies grow their businesses in the digital age. We aspire to advise our clients on all aspects of their online business strategy. Using Google's broad range of products, we help our clients connect instantly and seamlessly with their audiences.", '  ', 'The role: Unskippable Labs Experimentation Lead - Singapore', '  ', "Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing business grow. Using your influencing and relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users.", '  ', 'Additional Role Description:', '  ', "Unskippable Labs' vision is to provide leading-edge guidance on vertically-driven ad campaign effectiveness through global scaled experimentation and analysis driven by machine learning and activated through flexible engagements with key Global Client and Agency Solutions (GCAS) and Large Customer Sales (LCS) clients to evolve their advertising on our platforms and beyond.", ' ', ' As the Unskippable Labs Experimentation Lead , you will help shape the Unskippable Lab’s Experimentation agenda for Asia-Pacific (APAC) and lead client engagements to educate them on our understanding of how ads and attention are evolving. You will apply knowledge from existing experimentation to our customers; creative assets, identify the right experiment opportunities, clearly defining the hypotheses, setting up the experiment, and distilling it down into actionable insights. You will also be responsible for managing the Unskippable team in APAC. In this role, you will work with the Advanced Brand Acceleration Ads Intelligence team to develop new templates and reporting dashboards that enable sellers to do their analyses of experiments.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '- Consult on creative assets of opportunities with clients and their agencies. Present key creative and vertical narratives and identify experimentation opportunities against the areas outlined by the team.', '  ', '- Develop hypotheses for experimentation and lead the pitch with clients. Work with the creative strategist and agencies on the development of the test assets.', '  ', '- Lead the analysis and interpretation of results and insights across all experiments. Scale learnings internally with other APAC teams.', '  ', '- Lead recruitment of the Unskippable Army and manage regular trainings and connects. Work closely with the APAC Experiments team.', '  ', '- Connect regularly with the experimentation leads in other Unskippable Lab centres, share learnings, and share best practices for the APAC team. Liaise with the ABAT Ad Intelligence team to leverage scalable templates and tools.']
req: ['Minimum qualifications:', '  ', '- 3 years of experience in a video specialist and/or analytical role.', '  ', '- Experience with Google and YouTube media and measurement solutions products.', '  ', 'Preferred qualifications:', '  ', '- Experience as a video specialist, analytical lead, or Account Strategist in LCS or Global Client and Agency Solutions (GCAS).', '  ', '- Experience as an account manager and video technologies.', '  ', '- Able to make recommendations for clients about how to best use Google/YouTube media and measurement products.', '  ', '- Ability to craft stories from data, frame hypotheses, and mine data and insights around creative effectiveness. Ability to craft presentations for clients.', '  ', '- Ability to identify opportunities comfortably speaking in front of executive audiences.', '  ', '- Interest about how ads work. Excellent business judgment, analytical, and presentation skills.']

desc: ['The Tectus Dreamlab team pioneers the development of cutting-edge cross-platform apps in the engineering and construction sector. The flagship product, “', 'Screening Eagle', '”\xa0Virtual Inspection Platform, is a holistic portal for asset monitoring, maintenance and inspection. The engineers are spread across iOS, web frontend, backend, AR/VR, 3D rendering, computer vision and machine learning.', '  ', 'You’ll be part of a small and highly talented team of people working end-to-end on the products. Our primary backend stack is Go, but it’s ok if you don’t have direct experience with it because we believe strongly that a good engineer can pick up any language in short time. We rapidly adopt emerging best-of-breed technologies, like Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform and React/Redux, to name few.', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', 'Take ownership of the backend tasks and work closely with the development teams;', '   ', 'Design and implement the business logic through strategic choice of data structure and algorithms;', '   ', 'Develop, test, document and deploy web APIs, batch jobs, webhooks, or integrations based on the business requirements;', '   ', 'Emphasise heavily on code testing and designing for testability;', '   ', 'Continuously document design decisions;', '   ', 'Adopt best dev-ops/tech-ops practices and make continuous automated testing, releases and deployments;', '   ', 'Offer mentorship to junior developers in the team.', '  ']
req: ['Required Qualifications', '  ', '   ', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience;', '   ', 'Strong programming skills, solid data structure and algorithm fundamentals;', '   ', 'At least 4 years of practical backend development for real-world products in any language/framework, preferably in Go.', '   ', 'Experience in SQL databases, writing schemas and designing high performance queries;', '   ', 'Experience in in-memory key-value database like Redis;', '   ', 'Deep technical understanding of scalability, resilience, high availability and the corresponding architecture, technologies and designs;', '   ', 'Experience with dev-ops/tech-ops, like Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, to name a few;', '   ', 'Familiar with AWS services and related cloud technologies;', '   ', 'Experience in Containerization and Orchestration technologies like Docker and Kubernetes;', '   ', 'Strong troubleshooting and debugging skills;', '   ', 'Self-motivated and willing to learn new technologies continuously;', '   ', 'Embrace the open source community.', '  ']

desc: ['We are inviting suitable highly motivated candidates to apply for a full-time position in the Tan Chin Tuan Lab of Optical Imaging, Photodynamic and Proton Therapy Laboratory, Precision Radiation Oncology Programme.', '  ', 'The selected individual is expected to:', ' - Contribute actively to our Genomics and Radiomics research that is focused on using next-generation sequencing (NGS) and radiological imaging datasets to developing biomarkers predictive of clinical responses in cancer patients undergoing radiotherapy.', ' - Perform model building, radiomics features extraction using machine learning, statistical analyses, genomics sequencing data analysis, and other relevant computational analyses.', ' - Work closely with the existing research team, comprising of clinicians, research staff and statisticians, gaining exposure through local and international collaborative projects.', '  ', '\xa0\xa0']

desc: ['Company overview:', '  ', 'Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers.', '  ', 'The area: Global Clients & Agency Solutions', '  ', "Our Global Clients & Agency Solutions team helps serve some of the world's largest brands. Our dedicated teams of marketing and advertising specialists use their unique skill sets to help shape how companies grow their businesses in the digital age. We aspire to advise our clients on all aspects of their online business strategy. Using Google's broad range of products, we help our clients connect instantly and seamlessly with their audiences.", '  ', 'The role: Creative Strategist, Unskippable Labs - Singapore', '  ', "Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing business grow. Using your influencing and relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users.", '  ', 'Additional Role Description:', '  ', 'Unskippable Labs vision: to provide leading-edge guidance on vertically-driven ad campaign effectiveness through global scaled experimentation and analysis driven by machine learning and activated through flexible engagements with key GCAS and LCS clients to evolve their advertising on our platforms and beyond.', ' ', ' This role will lead creative guidance as a part of the Unskippable Labs center team in partnership with insights and product/brand specialists. You will be the creative thought leader within your region, team and vertical. You will also diagnose opportunities for improving creative effectiveness in video and implement them in partnership with clients and agencies.', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '- Develop the core creative guidance for ad effectiveness across formats in partnership with media and product specialists.', '  ', '- Deliver that guidance in compelling and actionable ways to executive creative and brand clients.', '  ', '- Provide effective feedback on creative during development from idea to storyboard to edited assets.', '  ', '- Develop new hypotheses for creative experimentation and explore them via both client and unbranded experimentation.', '  ', '- Partner with regional service teams to ensure cohesive guidance on ad effectiveness recommendations.']
req: ['Minimum qualifications:', '  ', '- BA/BS degree in a related field, or equivalent practical experience.', '  ', '- 7 years of experience in creative strategy with demonstrated expertise in digital video.', '  ', 'Preferred qualifications:', '  ', '- Experience working across brand verticals and geographies.', '  ', '- Ability to create effective ads, from initial idea through final edit.', '  ', '- Developed writing, pitch-crafting and presenting skills.']

desc: ['The School of Business (SBIZ) at Singapore University of Social Sciences\xa0aims to educate business minds and in the process, transform the lives of our students when they graduate with a business degree. SBIZ currently has more than 4,000 students enrolled in various degree programmes.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Our students are mainly working adults who are keen to upgrade and remain competitive in the fast-paced business world. We also have a sizable group of full-time students pursuing their degree education full time in the University.\xa0To equip our students for a better future, we provide them with a curriculum that is industry-relevant and we adopt innovative and practice-oriented pedagogical approaches (e.g. case study, flipped-classroom). Classes are interactive in nature and instructors go beyond lectures and facilitate interactive discussions and activities that require application of theories to solve real world problems. As most of our students are working, they are able to apply what they have learnt in the classroom to real-life scenarios in their workplace almost immediately. This enables them to live out our maxim - Learn Today, Apply Tomorrow.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'SBIZ is now recruiting passionate full-time faculty members who are aligned with our education aspirations. The responsibilities of SBIZ full-time faculty members include teaching and developing courses, conducting academic and/or applied research, and managing degree programmes and projects. We are interested in candidates in the following areas:', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Accountancy (especially in the areas of Financial Accounting, Managerial Accounting, Assurance, Taxation, Business Valuation and Accounting Theory)\xa0', '   ', 'Analytics (especially in the areas of Machine Learning, Data Mining, Text Mining, Statistics, Forecasting, Optimisation, Data Visualisation, Data Management, IoT and Big Data)', '   ', 'Business Law', '   ', 'Entrepreneurship\xa0', '   ', 'Finance', '   ', 'Information Systems', '   ', 'Project Management', '   ', 'Quality Management', '   ', 'Supply Chain Management (especially in the areas of Procurement and International Trade \xa0System)', '   ', 'Strategy', '   ', 'Operations Management', '   ', 'Customer Relationship\xa0Management', '   ', "Business excellence (especially in the area of SPRING Singapore's Business Excellence framework)", '  ']
req: ['   ', 'Ph.D. degree holder in a relevant discipline. Ph.D candidates nearing completion will also be considered.', '   ', 'Candidate with teaching and/or working experience in the relevant area will have an added advantage.', '   ', 'In the area of Finance, candidates with a Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) qualification or those in the area of Fintech, crytocurrency and digital banking will have an added advantage.', '   ', "In the area of Accountancy, candidates with a Chartered Accountant of Singapore qualification (or equivalent professional qualification) and at least a Master's degree in a relevant area will also be considered.\xa0", '   ', "In the area of Business Law, candidates with a Bachelor's degree in Law and at least 5 years of relevant working experience will also be considered.", '  ', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'For more information and application, please visit our website:\xa0http://www.suss.edu.sg/careers/appointments-vacancies/Pages/Academic-Appointments-(Full-time).aspx', '  ', '(Only shortlisted candidates will be notified)']

desc: ['The Cybersecurity & Technology Controls group at JPMorgan Chase aligns the firm’s cybersecurity, access management, controls and resiliency teams. The group proactively and strategically\xa0 partners with all lines of business and functions to enable them to design, adopt and integrate appropriate controls; deliver processes and solutions efficiently and consistently; and drive automation of controls. The group’s number one priority is to enable the business by keeping the firm safe, stable and resilient.', '  ', 'We are looking for multi-disciplined forward-looking technologists like you with diverse backgrounds and experiences including in areas such as cybersecurity, big data, machine learning risk management and controls, compliance and oversight, cloud security.', '  ', '\xa0', ' Role:', '  ', '•Support several technical teams across varying big-data Enterprise platforms.', ' •Responsible for adhering to the Agile framework while coaching teams through the scrum process (80%). Occasional project management tasks (20%) [BA-related work]', ' •Position reports to the responsible ADM', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '•Organizing agile events using Scrum methodology -- facilitating daily stand-up meetings, reviews, retrospectives, grooming (PBRs), release planning, demos and other Scrum-related meetings', ' •Testing processes and development platforms for high-level IT Enterprise systems', ' •Tracking and communicating team velocity and sprint/release progress', ' •Assist technical team with making appropriate commitments through story selection and task definition', ' •Collaborating with team, developing and maintaining team standards, tools, and best practices, including working agreements, definition of ready and definition of done', ' •Identifying and removing impediments and preventing distractions', ' •Maintaining process documentation, reports and applicable dashboards in JIRA', ' •Serving as an Agile coach within the organization, while implementing and socializing scrum to newly formed teams', ' •Providing coaching and direction to new Scrum Masters', ' •Organizing and facilitating team interactions with other departments and vendors who do not practice scrum to deliver products on time', ' •Assisting with backlog maintenance (collaborating specifically with Product Owners), leading the team through long-term roadmap exercises, forecasting long-term project deliverables', ' •Assisting with internal and external communication, improving transparency, and broadcasting information, as needed', ' •Project Planning, including development of a project plan', ' •Documenting project scope, budget, schedule and organizational objectives', ' •Facilitating and leading team meetings that are cross-functional in nature', ' •Leading the project team through implementation of the solution', ' •Managing vendor engagements, which may include facilitating selection processes, providing input into the Statement of Work, management of deliverables and vendor resources', ' •Conducting project closure, and ensuring proper operationalization of effort', ' •Acting as an ambassador of Technology & Architecture with Product Management, answering LOB-wide questions', ' •Supporting the publishing of weekly summaries and other artifacts requested by leadership', '  ', '\xa0']
req: ['\xa0', '  ', 'Requirements:', '  ', '•Jira experience + other Atlassian suite of products (Confluence, etc.)', ' •3-5 years of Scrum Master experience', ' •Expert level facilitation and communication skills: ability to facilitate teams through tough conversations and maintain a positive and supportive team environment', ' •Ability to respond quickly, flexibly and positively to change, using it as an opportunity to learn, develop, practice and support the organization', ' •Ability to collect and analyze data', ' •Ability to manage a budget within Excel', ' •Excellent conceptual, analysis, organizational, and problem solving skills', ' •Capable of defining problems, collecting data, establishing fact, drawing conclusions and recommending solutions', '  ', ' Good to have:', '  ', '•Scrum Master certification', ' •SAFe certification', ' •Advanced coaching skills within the Agile and Scrum frameworks', '  ', 'Your expertise in cyber, combined with your desire to provide innovative security services, will be an asset to our CyberSecurity team. Help deliver high-quality security solutions across all our lines of business around the world by creating, designing, implementing, and maintaining next-level technology. The work you’ll do is vital, as it will protect over $18 trillion of assets under custody and $393 billion in deposits every day.', '  ', 'We strongly encourage all applicants to apply via our careers website where you are able join our Talent Network to receive customized vacancy notifications and ensure that your details are accessible by our global recruiting team - www.jpmorganchase.com/careers.', '  ', 'A quick link to this particular job posting can be found in this URL: http://jobs.jpmorganchase.com/ListJobs/ByKeyword/190019046/', '  ', 'Please note that only short-listed candidates will be notified. We thank you for your interest and wish you all the best in your career.', '  ', 'Yours Sincerely,', ' Human Resources', ' JPMorgan']

desc: ['The Solar Energy Research Institute of Singapore (SERIS) is Singapore’s national institute for applied solar energy research.', '  ', 'SERIS conducts industry-oriented research and development as well as use-inspired basic research in the field of solar energy conversion. The institute collaborates closely with universities, research organisations, government agencies and industry, both locally and globally. The collaborations with companies from the global solar sector span from small startups to industry leading heavyweights.', '  ', 'Job Scope:', '  ', 'In view of recent developments, SERIS is currently looking for a high-calibre individual, with an outstanding drive towards innovation and applying deep-tech systems to the fields of energy meteorology and solar forecasting. He / She will conduct research activities and responsible for managing product and software development specifically in the area of sky cameras and sky imagers.', '  ', 'Essential duties and responsibilities include the following (other duties may be assigned):', '  ', ' \t', 'Further evolve the field of sky cameras and sky imagers for the application in operational solar forecasting', ' \t', 'Drive SERIS’ in-house developments on sky cameras and sky imagers and design & implement new features and functionalities, which entails hardware & software development, field-testing & certification.', ' \t', 'Investigate on machine learning based forecasting models from the sky camera’s atmospheric observations.', ' \t', 'Develop the sky camera based system for monitoring the cloud coverage and cloud dynamics.', ' \t', 'Analyze radiance distributions and create 3-D solar insolation profiles.', ' \t', 'Work on techniques to estimate global, direct and diffuse irradiance.', ' \t', 'Evaluate market potential and assess the possibility to create a spin-off company for the SERIS’ in-house developed sky camera.', ' ']
req: [' \t', 'PhD in Electrical Engineering with focus on power electronics and knowledge on embedded systems & micro-electronics.', ' \t', 'Know-how and experience in PV system technology, IoT (Internet of Things) applications, forecasting methodologies.', ' \t', 'Additional knowledge in meteorology and/or atmospheric physics is desirable', ' \t', 'Demonstrated significant scientific contributions in the form of top-tier journals papers and leading conference contributions.', ' \t', 'Candidates are expected to have hands-on experience in commercializing products from an ideation stage all the way until certification and market entry.', ' \t', 'Additional management degree is desirable.', ' \t', 'Proven excellent engineering and project management skills', ' \t', 'Demonstrated strong initiative and follow through in executing project initiatives, overcoming obstacles and balancing multiple priorities effectively with strong negotiation skills.', ' \t', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced team environment with engineers, consultants, regulators and customers.', ' \t', 'Highly motivated, well organized and can work efficiently both in teams as well as independently.', ' \t', 'Possess a passion for sustainable energy.', ' \t', 'Minimum 4 - 5 years of experience', ' ']

desc: ['The Genome Institute of Singapore (GIS) is an institute of the Agency for Science, Technology and Research (A*STAR). It has a global vision that seeks to use genomic sciences to improve public health and public prosperity. Established in 2001 as a centre for genomic discovery, the GIS will pursue the integration of technology, genetics and biology towards the goal of individualized medicine.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'We are looking for motivated candidate who will be developing/maintaining relational databases and web portal hosting high-throughput screening data from across A*STAR, NUS, NUH and industry users.\xa0The individual will conduct analysis conforming to the ISO standard procedures established in the platform and develop customised analyses for academic as well as industry users. He/she will assist in\xa0the development of machine learning models for predicting drug response from various types of cellular models, image segmentation and analysis of cellular microscopy images as well as development of new platform technologies through research collaborations with academic and industry partners.']

A*STAR may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. These policies may be amended from time to time without notice. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']

At our core we operate as a smart logistics solutions provider, serving merchants and logistics partners and connecting industry players across the globe. Through Janio, we strive to create a truly integrated network that brings together every key player to become the backbone supporting SEA's growing e-commerce ecosystem. Looking ahead, our platform would look to incorporate elements of AI and machine learning to provide a suite of smart solutions for real-time tracking, route optimization, warehouse management and dynamic forecasting to truly become a data-intelligent platform.", '  ', 'Head of Digital Marketing', '  ', 'Working at the intersection of technology and business, our goal is to bring the world’s most innovative people to Janio and provide the tools to help them thrive. desc: ['About Janio', '  ', "Janio is a cross-border logistics platform that provides an integrated end-to-end logistics solution to merchants across Southeast Asia (SEA). At our core we operate as a smart logistics solutions provider, serving merchants and logistics partners and connecting industry players across the globe. Through Janio, we strive to create a truly integrated network that brings together every key player to become the backbone supporting SEA's growing e-commerce ecosystem. Looking ahead, our platform would look to incorporate elements of AI and machine learning to provide a suite of smart solutions for real-time tracking, route optimization, warehouse management and dynamic forecasting to truly become a data-intelligent platform.", '  ', 'Regional Business Development Manager', '  ', 'Janio Asia is looking for a Regional Business Development Manager to join our team. Regional Managers are exposed to multiple aspects of setting up a business in a fast-paced startup environment. We invite candidates with an entrepreneurial and motivated mindset, as well as a keen interest in combining logistics with new technologies, to apply.', '  ', 'The successful candidate will:', '  ', ' \t', ' \t', 'be treated as co-business owner who positively contributes not only to business development/sales\xa0but all aspects of the business', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'be tasked with ensuring a consistent, high-level of service across all countries we operate in', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'liaise with colleagues and partners across multiple geographies to troubleshoot and resolve any and all issues related to business development and sales', ' \t', ' ', '  ', 'This position reports directly to the Chief Operating Office (COO). We offer candidates opportunities to develop and grow professionally as valued team members in a dynamic and often cross-functional startup environment.']

desc: ['Established in 1981, the SCHOOL OF ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING (EEE) http://www.eee.ntu.edu.sg is one of the founding Schools of the Nanyang Technological University. Built on a culture of excellence, the School is renowned for its high academic standards and research. With more than 150 faculty members and an enrolment of more than 4,000, of which about 1,000 are graduate students, it is one of the largest EEE schools in the world and ranks 6th in the field of Electrical & Electronic Engineering in the 2017 QS World University Rankings by Subjects.', '  ', 'The School of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore invites applications for several postdoc research fellow positions in the following areas:', '  ', ' \t', 'Robot vision', ' \t', 'Machine Learning', ' \t', 'Mobile robotics', ' ', '  ', '\xa0']

desc: ['The Technology Group (TG) is a key enabler to keep our business moving forward and is constantly exploiting state-of-the-art information technologies to enhance GIC’s ability to be the leading global long-term investment firm. We aim to provide users with empowering and transformational capabilities, and to create an inclusive, innovative and integrated work environment.', '  ', 'This role is embedded in an integrated team that provides investment services for all public market investment activities.', '  ', 'Exposure opportunities', '  ', '   ', 'You will play a key project\xa0lead / manager\xa0role in investment services public market\xa0domains to: ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 - build and support systems across entire trade lifecycle to achieve world-class operational excellence and execution;', ' ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 -\xa0help the firm manage and interface with external fund managers who bring extended investment expertise and intelligence to table', ' ', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'As a person with strong analytical reasoning and conceptual thinking skills, you will use your technology know-how to bring value to the business.', '   ', 'You will participate in high-value complex projects based on Agile principles and work with an expanded toolset beyond the traditional programming languages, including Python, Tableau, Informatica, Jenkins and messaging technologies, while keeping an eye out for emerging technology trends and developments.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'As an excellent team player with a collaborative mind-set, you will work hand-in-hand with various facets of the business across Front, Middle, and Back Office, the extended Technology team in GIC as well as industry peers and partners.', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'You will have access to structured and unstructured data and use data science techniques including predictive modelling and machine learning to identify areas to enhance business capabilities (for External Managers domain).', '  ', '  ', '   ', 'You will also work alongside experienced professionals and continue to learn.', '  ']

job_title: ['VP, Data & Digital Strategic Transformation Lead, Improvement Program, T&O (WD02837)']
desc: ['Business Function', '  ', "Group Technology and Operations (T&O) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. In Group T&O, we manage the majority of the Bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.", '  ', 'Responsibilities\xa0', '  ', ' \t', 'To be part of Central COO team and be able to articulate and market the vision for Tech Strategic programs across T&O.', ' \t', 'Able to contribute and participate in the Platform Transformation programs and concepts to enable technology platform transformation across group.\xa0\xa0', ' \t', 'Practitioner of business agile and 4D methodology, able to define Epics, Workstreams based on the organizational Hoshin.', ' \t', 'End-to-end management of transformation projects from the preparation of Benefits Map, initialization phase (business case) to the execution phase (setup, status update, tracking and implementation).', ' \t', 'Deploy machine learning solution into production environment and integrate into operation\xa0', ' \t', 'Identify and solve issues when putting model into production – load balancing, distribution, through-put, latency, availability, stability, refactoring, repackaging, versioning, scoring, real time / online scoring, performance monitoring and management,\xa0', ' \t', 'Provide insights based on data analysis to derive on the strategic decisions.', ' \t', 'Provide leadership to the program to equip them with the necessary skills to perform their roles through consultative management.\xa0', ' \t', 'Driving a team of skilled SME across the internal technology units (eg. desc: ['We are looking for a highly motivated and talented individual with passion in oncology and genomics laboratory research to join the Translational Radiation Oncology (TRO) Research Programme. You will primarily work with the Principal Investigator (PI) and the current research and clinical teams comprising two radiation oncologists, two research fellows, two clinical research coordinators and four research officers.', '  ', 'The primary responsibilities of the position will include but not limited to the following: -\xa0', '  ', '   ', 'Contribute actively to our genomics and radiomics research that is focused on using next-generation sequencing and radiological imaging datasets to develop biomarkers predictive of clinical responses in cancer patients undergoing radiotherapy.\xa0\xa0', '   ', 'Perform model building, genomics sequencing data analysis, radiomics features extraction using machine learning, statistical analyses and other relevant computational analyses to better understand the complexity of radioresistance of head and neck cancers and prostate cancers.', '   ', 'Be involved in inter-departmental collaborations with oncologists, pathologists, scientists as well as local and international collaborators.', '  ']
req: ['   ', 'PhD in Computational Biology, Computer Science, Mathematics, Biostatistics or Physics.', '   ', 'Research experience in a genomics, oncology, molecular/cellular biology or immunology laboratory.\xa0', '   ', 'Knowledge and experience in genomics analyses (e.g. analyses of WES, RNASeq data) and biostatistical analyses of clinical datasets would be advantageous.', '   ', 'Highly motivated, organised, meticulous and committed to high quality standards.', '   ', 'Strong organisational, interpersonal and presentation skills.', '   ', 'Analytical and self-confident with a mature personality.', '   ', 'Responsible and passionate about radiomics, genomics and oncology research.', '   ', 'A team player with a collaborative mindset who is able to prioritise and multi-task.', '  ', '  ', '\xa0', 'We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.', '\xa0']

job_title: ['Enforcement Detection Analyst, Trust and Safety, YouTube - Singapor']
desc: ['Company overview:', '  ', 'Google is not a conventional company, and we don’t intend to become one. True, we share attributes with the world’s most successful organizations – a focus on innovation and smart business practices comes to mind – but even as we continue to grow, we’re committed to retaining a small-company feel. At Google, we know that every employee has something important to say, and that every employee is integral to our success. We provide individually-tailored compensation packages that can be comprised of competitive salary, bonus, and equity components, along with the opportunity to earn further financial bonuses and rewards. Googlers thrive in small, focused teams and high-energy environments, believe in the ability of technology to change the world, and are as passionate about their lives as they are about their work. For more information, visit www.google.com/careers.', '  ', 'The area: YouTube', '  ', 'At YouTube, we believe that everyone deserves to have a voice, and that the world is a better place when we listen, share, and build community through our stories. We work together to give everyone the power to share their story, explore what they love, and connect with one another in the process. Working at the intersection of cutting-edge technology and boundless creativity, we move at the speed of culture with a shared goal to show people the world. We explore new ideas, solve real problems, and have fun — and we do it all together.', '  ', 'The role: Enforcement Detection Analyst, Trust and Safety, YouTube - Singapore', '  ', 'Fast-paced, dynamic, and proactive, YouTube’s Trust & Safety team is dedicated to making YouTube a safe place for users, viewers, and content creators around the world to belong, create, and express themselves. Whether understanding and solving their online content concerns, navigating within global legal frameworks, or writing and enforcing worldwide policy, the Trust & Safety team is on the frontlines of enhancing the YouTube experience, building internet safety, and protecting free speech in our ever-evolving digital world.', '  ', 'Additional Role Description:', '  ', 'As an Enforcement Detection Analyst, you will be responsible for identifying and removing disruptive content as quickly as possible. You will use advanced modeling and analytical techniques on hundreds of features against a massive corpus and hundreds of hours of new content being uploaded every minute.\xa0', '  ', 'Responsibilities:', '  ', '- Develop and implement strategies and models and heuristic rules to enforce YouTube content policies at scale across hundreds of millions of videos/comments. Leverage Machine Learning, as appropriate.', '  ', '- Deliver improvements to our performance metrics based on deep understanding of drivers of operations. Leverage deep programming skills to ensure that solutions fit within the current complex product and backend infrastructures.', '  ', '- Work closely with the Policy and Operations teams to understand the evolving policy enforcement landscape, and with Engineering teams to develop and test new features that address operational needs.', '  ', '- Provide rapid incident response for abuse problems, operating independently. Analyze and draw conclusions on root-causes and define and implement mitigation steps.']
req: ['Minimum qualifications:', '  ', '- MS degree in a technical field or equivalent practical experience.', '  ', '- 2 years of work experience in a relevant field.', '  ', '- Experience with machine learning, programming, database querying (SQL) and statistics.', '  ', '- Experience with creating metrics to measure performance of models, building dashboards and reporting.', '  ', 'Preferred qualifications:', '  ', '- Exceptional problem-solving and analytical abilities with a proven history of going above and beyond to make operational improvements and solve tough problems.', '  ', '- Experience or demonstrated interest in content policy and/or anti-abuse operations at scale.', '  ', '- Experience with machine learning tools, techniques, and systems.', '  ', '- Experience with abuse fighting at scale in similar product domains.', '  ', '- Demonstrated ability in working with a variety of stakeholders to gather requirements, explaining models, and iterating to make improvements.', '  ', '- Strong written and spoken communication skills.']

Smart Nation System Engineers are responsible for developing and designing Smart Nation Platform Solutions utilising the latest sensors, middleware, IOT, geospatial, 3D models, machine learning, robotics and leading software development technologies. The role requires you to keep abreast of development in the latest technology. You will also be required to see out a project from conception to the final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to details.', ' ', '\xa0', ' ', 'What to Expect:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Identification of requirements, development of smart city solutions from conceptualisation to design and development to productization', ' ', 'Develop front end applications and user interfaces', ' ', 'Develop back end system software', ' ', 'Work alongside UI/UX engineers to develop user friendly front end interfaces', ' ', 'Design and develop APIs', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'How to Succeed:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Degree in Computer Science or Engineering (or equivalent)', ' ', 'Proficiency with at least 2 of the following: ', ' ', 'Front-end languages such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript', ' ', 'JavaScript frameworks such as Angular JS, React, Node and Amber', ' ', 'Server side languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, PHP and .Net', ' ', 'Utilisation of PaaS and SaaS such as Google, Azure and AWS technology stack', ' ', 'Micro-controllers and firmware development', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Familiarity with at least 2 of the following: ', ' ', 'Database technology such as MySQL, Oracle and MongoDB', ' ', 'Apache Hadoop software library', ' ', 'Linux and Windows operating systems', ' ', 'Internetworking and IOT protocols like MQTT', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Knowledge of OSRF ROS (Robot Operating System), IIOT Middleware such as DDS, OPC-UA, BACNET, Unity, CAD software such as AutoCAD, Solidworks, Revit will be an added advantage', ' ', 'Excellent verbal communication skills', ' ', 'Excellent problem solving skills', ' ', 'Attention to details', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Candidates are required to showcase any interesting projects (Personal or Work) that they have done. If you think you have met the above requirements, we look forward to meeting you.']

job_title: ['SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER - SEARCH LANGUAGE PROCESSING, APPLE MEDIA PRODUCTS']
desc: ['Engineer in Singapore. Innovate at Apple.', '  ', 'Our engineers have created some tough acts to follow, and they continue to lead us to innovative breakthroughs. Because they are driven not by what would be easy, but by what would be amazing.', '  ', 'Team', " We are a diverse collective of thinkers and doers, continually reimagining what's possible to help us all find what we love in new ways. The AMP Search team powers search for iTunes, App Store, Apple Music, Apple TV, Podcasts, Books and more on iOS, macOS, tvOS and watchOS.", '  ', 'As a member of the Apple Media Products Search team you will be working on various components of the Search platform - search ranking, search query interpretation, language models, index data modelling and pipelines.', '  ', 'Responsibilities will include design, development and maintenance of core search components that serve customers worldwide. You will also be responsible for bringing the latest in search and discovery ideas to production at a large scale. If you want to craft new ways for customers to discover content in a rapidly growing catalog on the Apple ecosystem of devices and platforms, this is the place to be.', '  ', "The Apple Media Products Search Team is looking for extraordinary engineers to help build next-generation search features for Apple's ground breaking devices and platforms. We are a key part of the Apple ecosystem, supporting all of users. We operate globally in languages around the world. We strive to provide the best search experience for our customers.", '  ', 'YOU WILL:', '  ', '   ', 'Have a major impact on the way people search & discover Apple Media content on Apple devices worldwide.', '   ', 'Be part of a team with strong expertise in software engineering, information retrieval, language processing, data mining, machine learning, scalable systems, and parallel processing (Hadoop, Scala, Spark).', '   ', 'Be responsible for improving search recall and precision.', '   ', 'Use big data technology to evaluate and prioritize content discovery features.', '   ', 'Conduct AB Tests to ensure we objectively measure improvements.', '   ', 'Ensure successful deployment of features, code, data, and models in production.', '   ', 'Work in collaboration with other world-class engineers, researchers, and statisticians to ensure the features and models are functioning at or above expected performance levels.', '   ', 'Work on Natural Language Processing (NLP), Tokenization, Stemming, Lemmatization, and Synonym mining Improve Search Recall, Text Indexing and Query Rewrites Design & Implement solutions for automated unit and integration tests that enable continuous integration and delivery.', '  ', '  ', 'Support search:', '  ', '   ', 'On all devices (macOS, iOS, tvOS, watchOS, Siri/HomePod)', '   ', 'Across media products (App Store, iTunes, Music, Video, Books, Podcasts)', '   ', 'Globally in languages from Arabic to Russian and everything in between', '  ']

desc: ['Engineer in Singapore. Innovate at Apple.', '  ', 'Our engineers have created some tough acts to follow, and they continue to lead us to innovative breakthroughs. Because they’re driven not by what would be easy, but by what would be amazing.', '  ', 'Team', ' We’re a diverse collective of thinkers and doers, continually reimagining what’s possible to help us all find what we love in new ways. The AMP Search team powers search for iTunes, App Store, Apple Music, Apple TV, Podcasts, Books and more on iOS, macOS, tvOS and watchOS.', '  ', 'As a member of the Apple Media Products Search team you will be working on various components of the Search platform - search ranking, search query interpretation, language models, index data modelling and pipelines.', '  ', 'Responsibilities will include design, development and maintenance of core search components that serve customers worldwide. You will also be responsible for bringing the latest in search and discovery ideas to production at a large scale. desc: ['About Janio', '  ', "Janio is a cross-border logistics platform that provides an integrated end-to-end logistics solution to merchants across Southeast Asia (SEA). At our core we operate as a smart logistics solutions provider, serving merchants and logistics partners and connecting industry players across the globe. Through Janio, we strive to create a truly integrated network that brings together every key player to become the backbone supporting SEA's growing e-commerce ecosystem. Looking ahead, our platform would look to incorporate elements of AI and machine learning to provide a suite of smart solutions for real-time tracking, route optimization, warehouse management and dynamic forecasting to truly become a data-intelligent platform.", '  ', 'Regional Operations Executive – Special Projects', '  ', 'Janio Asia is looking for a\xa0', 'Regional Operations Executive ', 'to join our rapidly expanding Special Projects team. At Janio, Regional Operations Executives\xa0are exposed to multiple aspects of setting up a business in a fast-paced startup environment and are tasked with ensuring consistent, high-level service across all countries we operate in.\xa0We invite candidates with an\xa0entrepreneurial and\xa0motivated mindset, as well as a keen interest in combining logistics with new technologies to apply.', '  ', 'The successful candidate will:', '  ', ' \t', 'liaise with colleagues and partners across multiple geographies to troubleshoot and resolve any and all issues related to fulfillment and/or transportation.', ' \t', ' \t', 'Effectively communicate with network partners across all parts of the supply chain to ensure smooth transition throughout each step', ' \t', ' \t', ' \t', 'Work with customer service and account management teams to efficiently investigate and resolve client-related issues in a timely manner', ' \t', ' ']

desc: ['The Application Infrastructures (AI) team of the Government Digital Services (GDS) Team aims to spearhead the digital transformation of government. Our objective is to catapult our government infrastructure into the new digital era with faster time to market, operational agility, automated deployment and scalability. AI is an open source, agile development and operation house that is bold, agile and collaborative. The team is responsible for designing, prototyping, building and operating different products and services. Today, AI has 3 flagship products and several upcoming initiatives.', ' ', 'As a\xa0', 'Delivery Manager', ', you will be responsible for identifying and mitigating potential delivery impacts to ensure successful project delivery through close collaboration with cross-functional teams. We are looking for an individual with strong interpersonal skills who likes working in a delivery focused, agile environment with multidisciplinary teams.', ' ', 'What to Expect:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Manage Product Delivery: Ensure products are delivered according to customer priorities and timelines, coaching and enabling the team where needed.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Building Up Teams: Institute engineering best practices and methodologies such as Agile. Facilitate open team communications and foster a culture of continual improvement.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Delivery Support: Support the team through project management activities such as tracking finances, hiring and recruitment, managing relationships with vendors and management. Triage run-time issues, and actively clear development impediments.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Business Modelling: Develop business plans, including product pricing, negotiations with vendors and channel strategy. Effectively communicate recommendations to management and create buy-in with customers.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'How to Succeed:', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Bachelor’s degree in any quantitative discipline or equivalent practical experience.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Experience with modern software engineering methodologies such as Agile.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Experience with coaching teams towards self-leadership and open communication.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Diplomacy, leadership and facilitation are necessary skills.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Be oriented towards transparency, trust, encouraging autonomy, mastery and purpose.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Prepare to challenge and change the status quo if it does not enable the team.', ' ', ' ', ' ', 'Knowledge of modern software technology stacks and machine learning will be favored', ' ', ' ']

job_title: ['MCT Global Planning Mfg Data Science Engineer']
desc: ['Job Description', '  ', 'As a MCT (Manufacturing Central Team) Manufacturing Data Science Engineer, you will work with global manufacturing sites and deliver the machine learning driven solutions to improve the operational performance (maximize the output and reduce the product cycle time) and drive company manufacturing excellence. You will analyze the manufacturing operational data and identify the opportunities to initiate and develop the machine learning driven solutions using the cutting-edge techniques, such as machine learning and data science, to optimize the manufacturing operation. You are required constantly to learn new cutting-edge technology and creatively apply/deliver solutions to the manufacturing operations. The success candidate will work with diverse teams; IT, Big data, manufacturing engineering team to understand the business needs, analysis methodologies and come up with systematic solutions for historical root cause analysis through machine learning, future issues prediction and provide guidance for follow up solutions to resolve the problems.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Roles and Responsibilities:', '  ', 'You will regularly work with company’s manufacturing team, IT and big data team to ensure solutions meet or exceed customer requirements.', ' As part of your responsibilities you will be required to:', " •Work with different stakeholders within company's global network in a collaborative manner to develop new machine learning solutions that improve the fab performance and optimize the fab operation", ' •Apply machine learning techniques to the simulation-based fab scheduler to optimize the manufacturing operations, including, but not limited to: Simulation model optimization, machine learning based dispatcher, and Q-time/job change optimization', ' •Create the machine learning applications to eliminate the manual work or facilitate the operational decision making', ' •Design and develop the machine learning based manufacturing solutions to optimize the fab operation', ' •Be proficient with data analysis and data visualization, understand manufacturing theory and terminologies']
req: ['Education', ' •Bachelor’s Degree in Industrial Engineering, Data Science, Computer Science/Engineering, or a related field is required', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'Requirements:', ' •2+ years’ experience in the machine learning application to the manufacturing domains, especially to the semiconductor manufacturing', ' •Strong skills in machine learning (supervised/unsupervised/semi-supervised)', ' •Good knowledge in the manufacturing operation simulation', ' •Good knowledge in programming (e.g. C#/C++, Python, SQL, etc.)', ' •Any exposure to below will be advantageous •Python in Hadoop ecosystem (Spark, Hive, HBase, etc.)', ' •Database (MS SQL, Oracle, MySQL, Teradata, etc.)', ' •Data visualization tools or libraries e.g. Tableau, Power BI, Python visualization library, and JavaScript library (D3)', '  ', '•Effective oral and written communication with strong analytical, problem solving, multitasking and project management skills are essential on the job.', ' •The proven ability and willingness to continuously learn and improve skills', ' •Passion and accountability for the environment you will be responsible for', ' •Strong problem-solving skills with logical approach', ' •Able and willing to travel overseas (minimum 25% or higher)', ' •Passion and accountability for the environment you will be responsible for', ' •Proficient in English, strong communication skills (verbal, written, presentation, interpersonal)']

desc: ['Who We Are:', '  ', 'Twitter users generate many terabytes of data every day; Twitter engineers run hundreds of experiments; Twitter Data Engineers build data pipelines and data processes that calculate metrics and scale increasingly sophisticated models of users and content.', '  ', 'The Data Science team at Twitter is at the intersection of all this data and strives to make it actionable to all business units around Twitter. Data Engineers work alongside Data Scientists analyze this data via observational analyses, trend analyses, modeling, and new measurement strategies. We also implement metrics to track the impact of new product experiments and more generally find ways to make very large scale data approachable to guide our decisions.', '  ', '\xa0', '  ', 'What You’ll Do:', '  ', 'Twitter has very large and complex datasets. As a Twitter Data Engineer you will build datasets and make them accessible to our partner teams by writing great production code to simplify the complexity. Your work will enable Product Managers and other decision-makers across the company to bring together insights and inform our product and strategy. In every decision that you influence, you will see the product improve and be more valuable to Twitter users.', '  ', 'We are trying to improve Twitter. To improve something, we need to be able to measure it. As a Data Engineer you will enable better measurements and ensure measurement accuracy so that we know where we are doing well and where we want to improve.', '  ', 'As such, you will:', '  ', ' \t', 'Design, develop, and launch extremely efficient and reliable data pipelines to move data and to provide intuitive analytics to our partner teams.', ' \t', 'Make Twitter-scale data more discoverable and easy to use for Data Scientists and Analysts across the company.', ' \t', 'Collaborate with other engineers and Data Scientists to discover the best solutions.', ' \t', 'Support your colleagues by reviewing code and designs.', ' \t', 'Diagnose and solve issues in our existing data pipelines and envision and build their successors.', ' ', '  ', 'Who You Are:', '  ', 'You want to be part of a community of the most talented, forward-thinking Data Scientists and Engineers in the industry. You are a strong Scala or Java developer. You demonstrate clear and concise communication and data-driven decision-making.', '  ', 'You are passionate about learning or growing your expertise in some or all of the following:', '  ', ' \t', 'Data Pipelines', ' \t', 'Data Warehousing', ' \t', 'Statistics', ' \t', 'Metrics Development', ' ']

desc: ['We are looking for a savvy\xa0', 'Data Engineer', '\xa0to join our growing team of analytics experts. The hire will be responsible for expanding and optimizing our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross-functional teams. The ideal candidate is an experienced data pipeline builder and data wrangler who enjoys optimizing data systems and building them from the ground up. The Data Engineer will support our software developers, data analysts and data scientists on data initiatives and will ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects. He/She must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the data needs of multiple teams, systems and products. The right candidate will be excited by the prospect of optimizing or even re-designing our company’s data architecture to support our next generation of products and data initiatives.']
req: ['Responsibilities', '  ', ' \t', 'Build the infrastructure and set up routines for optimal ETL for data from wide varieties of data sources utilizing SQL', ' \t', 'Design and build normalized and denormalized database solutions using healthcare industry best practices for data warehousing for specific client requirements, using Microsoft SQL Server Database programming (stored procedures and database design)', ' \t', 'Work with internal stakeholders to understand business needs for data structure, availability, scalability and accessibility; support translation of these data business needs into technical system requirements and build greater functionality to our data systems', ' \t', 'Identify opportunities for improvements and provide ongoing optimization, monitoring and tracking of data flow/ pipeline architecture', ' \t', 'Provide data management support to users', ' \t', 'Develop technical and training manuals', ' ', '  ', 'Requirements', '  ', ' \t', 'BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field', ' \t', '5-7 years of experience as a database developer or database engineer', ' \t', 'In-depth understanding of data management (e.g. permissions, recovery, security and monitoring) and Relational Database Management Systems', ' \t', 'Knowledge of software development and user interface web applications', ' \t', 'Hands on experience with SQL', ' \t', "An ability to understand front-end users' requirements and a problem-solving attitude", ' ', '  ', 'Benefits', '  ', ' \t', 'Opportunity to work with senior stakeholders and lead high-value projects with large enterprise clients', ' \t', 'Opportunity to work on our cutting edge AI and optimization software', ' \t', 'Competitive salary package', ' ']

desc: ['Sephora Southeast Asia is a highly data-driven business, with analytics expertise embedded across many business areas, and a complex suite of internally developed and external technology to drive best-in-class customer experience and personalization, return on advertising spend and conversion.', '  ', 'We are looking to a hire a proactive, commercially savvy data engineer to make sure all our data users - be they analysts, end users or AI-driven systems, have access to the right data at the right time, and ensure its accuracy.', '  ', 'Responsibilities', '  ', '   ', 'Build automated processes to pull data from various systems/platforms into our BigQuery data warehouse', '   ', 'Ensure data is successfully updated and accurate on a daily or real-time basis; implement appropriate monitoring to stop data problems becoming business problems', '   ', 'Design fit-for-purpose schemas, and related ETL processes, to enable analytical teams across the business to be effective', '   ', 'Work with engineering and business teams to put the right data in the right place at the right time to enable cross-channel targeting and personalization', '   ', 'Take ownership of data quality issues, conduct root cause analysis and coordinate with external vendors and internal teams to resolve', '   ', 'Support analysts in productionizing customer models and scripts', '   ', 'Take a robust yet pragmatic view of data security, ensuring our customers’ data is protected and compliant, whilst enabling agility and innovation', '   ', 'Keeping up to date on research and development of new technologies and techniques to enhance our data warehouse', '  ']
